 552  8A35
 553  8A35              ; Checks to see if current ship swapped in is in our sights
 554  8A35              ; we don;t need to deal with planets or sun as they have their own memory bank
 555  8A35              ShipInSights:           ClearCarryFlag                          ; Carry clear no hit
 555  8A35 B7          >                        or a
 556  8A36                                      ReturnIfMemIsNegative UBnKzsgn
 556  8A36 3A 14 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 556  8A39 E6 80       >                        and     $80
 556  8A3B C0          >                        ret     nz
 557  8A3C 3A 3D C0                             ld      a,(UBnKexplDsp)                 ; get exploding flag and or with x and y high
 558  8A3F 2A 0C C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                    ; do 16 bit fetch as we will often need both bytes
 559  8A42 ED 4B 0F C0                          ld      bc,(UBnKylo)                    ; .
 560  8A46 B4                                   or      h
 561  8A47 B0                                   or      b
 562  8A48 C0                                   ret     nz                              ; if exploding or x hi or y hi are set then its nto targetable
 563  8A49 7D                                   ld      a,l                             ; hl =xlo ^ 2
 564  8A4A                                      DEEquSquareA                            ; .
 564  8A4A 57          >                        ld  d,a
 564  8A4B 5F          >                        ld  e,a
 564  8A4C ED 30       >                        mul de
 565  8A4E 62 6B                                ld      hl,de                           ; .
 566  8A50 79                                   ld      a,c                             ; de = de = ylo ^ 2
 567  8A51                                      DEEquSquareA                            ; .
 567  8A51 57          >                        ld  d,a
 567  8A52 5F          >                        ld  e,a
 567  8A53 ED 30       >                        mul de
 568  8A55 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; hl = xlo ^ 2 + ylo ^ 2
 569  8A56 D8                                   ret     c                               ; if there was a carry then out of line of sight
 570  8A57 ED 5B 17 C3                          ld      de,(MissileLockLoAddr)          ; get targettable area ^ 2 from blueprint copy
 571  8A5B                                      cpHLDE                                  ; now compare x^2 + y^2 to target area
 571  8A5B E5          >                        push    hl
 571  8A5C A7          >                        and     a
 571  8A5D ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
 571  8A5F E1          >                        pop     hl
 572  8A60 28 01                                jr      z,.EdgeHit                      ; if its an edge hit then we need to set carry
 573  8A62 C9                                   ret                                     ; if its < area then its a hit and carry is set, we will not work on =
 574  8A63              .EdgeHit:               SetCarryFlag                            ; its an edge hit then we need to set carry
 574  8A63 37          >                        scf
 575  8A64 C9                                   ret

 239+ 8C17 ~                                    ld      a,h
 240+ 8C17 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
 241+ 8C17 ~                                    ld      h,a
 242+ 8C17 ~                                    ld      a,(reglo)
 243+ 8C17 ~                                    sla     a
 244+ 8C17 ~                                    rl      l
 245+ 8C17 ~                                    rl      h
 246+ 8C17 ~                                    sla     a
 247+ 8C17 ~                                    rl      l
 248+ 8C17 ~                                    rl      h
 249+ 8C17 ~                                    sla     a
 250+ 8C17 ~                                    rl      l
 251+ 8C17 ~                                    rl      h
 252+ 8C17 ~                                    sla     a
 253+ 8C17 ~                                    rl      l
 254+ 8C17 ~                                    rl      h
 255+ 8C17 ~                                    sla     a
 256+ 8C17 ~                                    rl      l
 257+ 8C17 ~                                    rl      h
 258+ 8C17 ~                                    sla     a
 259+ 8C17 ~                                    rl      l
 260+ 8C17 ~                                    rl      h
 261+ 8C17                                      ENDM
 262+ 8C17
 263+ 8C17              SunShiftRight           MACRO   reglo, reghi, regsgn
 264+ 8C17 ~                                    ld      a,regsgn
 265+ 8C17 ~                                    srl     a
 266+ 8C17 ~                                    rr      reghi
 267+ 8C17 ~                                    rr      reglo
 268+ 8C17 ~                                    ld      regsgn,a
 269+ 8C17                                      ENDM
 270+ 8C17
 271+ 8C17              ;SunShiftPosTo15Bit:     ld      de,(SBnKzlo)
 272+ 8C17              ;                        ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)
 273+ 8C17              ;                        push    af
 274+ 8C17              ;                        and     SignMask8Bit
 275+ 8C17              ;                        ld      iyl,a
 276+ 8C17              ;                        ld      hl,(SBnKxlo)
 277+ 8C17              ;                        ld      a,(SBnKxsgn)
 278+ 8C17              ;                        push    af
 279+ 8C17              ;                        and     SignMask8Bit
 280+ 8C17              ;                        ld      ixl,a
 281+ 8C17              ;                        ld      bc,(SBnKylo)
 282+ 8C17              ;                        ld      a,(SBnKysgn)
 283+ 8C17              ;                        and     SignMask8Bit
 284+ 8C17              ;                        push    af
 285+ 8C17              ;                        ld      iyh,a
 286+ 8C17              ;.ShiftLoop:             ld      a,iyh
 287+ 8C17              ;                        or      iyl
 288+ 8C17              ;                        or      ixl
 289+ 8C17              ;                        jr      z,.ShiftBit15
 290+ 8C17              ;.ShiftZ:                SunShiftRight iyl, d, e
 291+ 8C17              ;.ShiftX:                SunShiftRight ixl, h, l
 292+ 8C17              ;.ShiftY:                SunShiftRight ixh, b, c
 293+ 8C17              ;                        jr      .ShipLoop
 294+ 8C17              ;.ShiftBit15:            ld      a,iyh
 295+ 8C17              ;                        or      iyl
 296+ 8C17              ;                        or      ixl
 297+ 8C17              ;                        jr      z,.CompletedShift
 298+ 8C17              ;.ShiftZ:                SunShiftRight iyl, d, e
 299+ 8C17              ;.ShiftX:                SunShiftRight ixl, h, l
 300+ 8C17              ;.ShiftY:                SunShiftRight ixh, b, c             ; finally shift to 15 bits so we can get the sign back
 301+ 8C17              ;.CompletedShift:        pop     af                          ; get ysgn
 302+ 8C17              ;                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 303+ 8C17              ;                        or      b
 304+ 8C17              ;                        ld      b,a
 305+ 8C17              ;                        pop     af                          ; get xsgn
 306+ 8C17              ;                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 307+ 8C17              ;                        or      h
 308+ 8C17              ;                        ld      h,a
 309+ 8C17              ;                        pop     af                          ; get zsgn
 310+ 8C17              ;                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 311+ 8C17              ;                        or      d
 312+ 8C17              ;                        ld      d,a
 313+ 8C17              ;                        ret
 314+ 8C17              ;
 315+ 8C17 ED 5B 17 C0  ScalePlanetPos:         ld      de,(PBnKzhi)                ; de = abs z & save sign on stack
 316+ 8C1B 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; .
 317+ 8C1C F5                                   push    af                          ; .
 318+ 8C1D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; .
 319+ 8C1F 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
 320+ 8C20 2A 11 C0                             ld      hl,(PBnKxhi)                ; hl = abs x & save sign on stack
 321+ 8C23 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
 322+ 8C24 F5                                   push    af                          ; .
 323+ 8C25 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; .
 324+ 8C27 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; .
 325+ 8C28 ED 4B 14 C0                          ld      bc,(PBnKyhi)                ; bc = abs y & save sign on stack
 326+ 8C2C 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; .
 327+ 8C2D F5                                   push    af                          ; .
 328+ 8C2E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; .
 329+ 8C30 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
 330+ 8C31 78           .ShiftLoop:             ld      a,b                         ; Scale down to an 8 bit value
 331+ 8C32 B2                                   or      d                           ; .
 332+ 8C33 B4                                   or      h                           ; .
 333+ 8C34 28 0E                                jr      z,.Shifted                  ; .
 334+ 8C36                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; .
 334+ 8C36 CB 38       >			   srl b
 334+ 8C38 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 335+ 8C3A                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 335+ 8C3A CB 3C       >			   srl h
 335+ 8C3C CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 336+ 8C3E                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; .
 336+ 8C3E CB 3A       >			   srl d
 336+ 8C40 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 337+ 8C42 18 ED                                jr      .ShiftLoop
 338+ 8C44 79           .Shifted:               ld      a,c                         ; See if we already have 7 bit
 339+ 8C45 B5                                   or      l                           ;
 340+ 8C46 B3                                   or      e                           ;
 341+ 8C47 E6 80                                and     $80                         ;
 342+ 8C49 28 0C                                jr      z,.NoAdditionalShift        ;
 343+ 8C4B                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; we want 7 bit
 343+ 8C4B CB 38       >			   srl b
 343+ 8C4D CB 19       >			   rr  c
 344+ 8C4F                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; to acommodate the sign
 344+ 8C4F CB 3C       >			   srl h
 344+ 8C51 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 345+ 8C53                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; .
 345+ 8C53 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 345+ 8C55 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 346+ 8C57 F1           .NoAdditionalShift:     pop     af                          ; get ysgn
 347+ 8C58 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ;
 348+ 8C5A 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; bc = shifted signed Y
 349+ 8C5B F1                                   pop     af                          ; get xsgn
 350+ 8C5C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ;
 351+ 8C5E 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; hl = shifted signed X
 352+ 8C5F F1                                   pop     af                          ; get zsgn
 353+ 8C60 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ;
 354+ 8C62 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; de = shifted signed Z
 355+ 8C63 C9                                   ret
 356+ 8C64
 357+ 8C64 ED 5B 17 C0  ScaleSunPos:            ld      de,(SBnKzhi)                ; de = abs z & save sign on stack
 358+ 8C68 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; .
 359+ 8C69 F5                                   push    af                          ; .
 360+ 8C6A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; .
 361+ 8C6C 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
 362+ 8C6D 2A 11 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKxhi)                ; hl = abs x & save sign on stack
 363+ 8C70 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
 364+ 8C71 F5                                   push    af                          ; .
 365+ 8C72 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; .
 366+ 8C74 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; .
 367+ 8C75 ED 4B 14 C0                          ld      bc,(SBnKyhi)                ; bc = abs y & save sign on stack
 368+ 8C79 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; .
 369+ 8C7A F5                                   push    af                          ; .
 370+ 8C7B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; .
 371+ 8C7D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
 372+ 8C7E 78           .ShiftLoop:             ld      a,b                         ; Scale down to an 8 bit value
 373+ 8C7F B2                                   or      d                           ; .
 374+ 8C80 B4                                   or      h                           ; .
 375+ 8C81 28 0E                                jr      z,.Shifted                  ; .
 376+ 8C83                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; .
 376+ 8C83 CB 38       >			   srl b
 376+ 8C85 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 377+ 8C87                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 377+ 8C87 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 377+ 8C89 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 378+ 8C8B                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; .
 378+ 8C8B CB 3A       >			   srl d
 378+ 8C8D CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 379+ 8C8F 18 ED                                jr      .ShiftLoop
 380+ 8C91 79           .Shifted:               ld      a,c                         ; See if we already have 7 bit
 381+ 8C92 B5                                   or      l                           ;
 382+ 8C93 B3                                   or      e                           ;
 383+ 8C94 E6 80                                and     $80                         ;
 384+ 8C96 28 0C                                jr      z,.NoAdditionalShift        ;
 385+ 8C98                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; we want 7 bit
 385+ 8C98 CB 38       >			   srl b
 385+ 8C9A CB 19       >			   rr  c
 386+ 8C9C                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; to acommodate the sign
 386+ 8C9C CB 3C       >			   srl h
 386+ 8C9E CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 387+ 8CA0                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; .
 387+ 8CA0 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 387+ 8CA2 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 388+ 8CA4 F1           .NoAdditionalShift:     pop     af                          ; get ysgn
 389+ 8CA5 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ;
 390+ 8CA7 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; bc = shifted signed Y
 391+ 8CA8 F1                                   pop     af                          ; get xsgn
 392+ 8CA9 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ;
 393+ 8CAB 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; hl = shifted signed X
 394+ 8CAC F1                                   pop     af                          ; get zsgn
 395+ 8CAD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ;
 396+ 8CAF 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; de = shifted signed Z
 397+ 8CB0 C9                                   ret
 398+ 8CB1
 399+ 8CB1              ;compass sun
 400+ 8CB1              ;            if value is still 24 bit
 401+ 8CB1              ;                copy xhi/xsgn y and z to xxx15 ([2 1 0 ] [ 5 4 3] [ 8 7 6 ]
 402+ 8CB1              ;                normalise vector (note this assumes sun is just sign byte+ 2 bytes)
 403+ 8CB1              ;                tempk39 = OR 3 low bytes
 404+ 8CB1              ;                tempkA = OR 3 high bytes
 405+ 8CB1              ;                 TAL2:    repeat
 406+ 8CB1              ;                             asl tempka tempk39
 407+ 8CB1              ;                             exit if carry set
 408+ 8CB1              ;                             x coord << 1
 409+ 8CB1              ;                             y corrd << 1
 410+ 8CB1              ;                             z coord << 1
 411+ 8CB1              ;                          until carry clear
 412+ 8CB1              ;                 TA2:     shift x y and z right one and put sign bit in from sign bytes
 413+ 8CB1              ;                          now XX15 holds sign + 7 bit bytes maximused for coords
 414+ 8CB1              ;                          RQ = AP = X ^ 2
 415+ 8CB1              ;                          TP = AP = Y ^ 2
 416+ 8CB1              ;                          RQ = RQ + TP
 417+ 8CB1              ;                          TP = AP = Z ^ 2
 418+ 8CB1              ;                          RQ = RQ + TP
 419+ 8CB1              ;                          Q = SQRT (RQ)
 420+ 8CB1              ;                          for each coord - A = A/Q * 3/ 8
 421+ 8CB1              ;
 422+ 8CB1              ;
 423+ 8CB1
 424+ 8CB1 ED 5B 17 C0  UpscaleSunPosition:     ld      de,(SBnKzhi)                ; de = abs z & save sign on stack
 425+ 8CB5 2A 11 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKxhi)                ; hl = abs x & save sign on stack
 426+ 8CB8 ED 4B 14 C0                          ld      bc,(SBnKyhi)                ; bc = abs y & save sign on stack
 427+ 8CBC 7A                                   ld      a,d
 428+ 8CBD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 429+ 8CBF CB 3F                                srl     a
 430+ 8CC1 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 431+ 8CC3 7C                                   ld      a,h
 432+ 8CC4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 433+ 8CC6 FD B5                                or      iyl
 434+ 8CC8 CB 3F                                srl     a
 435+ 8CCA 78                                   ld      a,b
 436+ 8CCB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 437+ 8CCD FD B5                                or      iyl
 438+ 8CCF FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; IYL now equals YXH00000 where letters = sign bits
 439+ 8CD1                                      ClearSignBit d
 439+ 8CD1 7A          >                        ld      a,d
 439+ 8CD2 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 439+ 8CD4 57          >                        ld      d,a
 440+ 8CD5                                      ClearSignBit h
 440+ 8CD5 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 440+ 8CD6 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 440+ 8CD8 67          >                        ld      h,a
 441+ 8CD9                                      ClearSignBit b
 441+ 8CD9 78          >                        ld      a,b
 441+ 8CDA E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 441+ 8CDC 47          >                        ld      b,a
 442+ 8CDD 78                                   ld      a,b
 443+ 8CDE B3                                   or      e
 444+ 8CDF B4                                   or      h
 445+ 8CE0 B5                                   or      l
 446+ 8CE1 B0                                   or      b
 447+ 8CE2 B1                                   or      c
 448+ 8CE3 28 41                                jr      z, .Setto1                 ; to prevent and infinite loop in upscale if all zero
 449+ 8CE5 7A                                   ld      a,d
 450+ 8CE6 B3                                   or      e
 451+ 8CE7 B4                                   or      h
 452+ 8CE8 CB 27                                sla     a
 453+ 8CEA 38 15                                jr      c,.DoneCalc
 454+ 8CEC 28 13                                jr      z,.DoneCalc
 455+ 8CEE              .UpscaleLoop:           ShiftDELeft1
 455+ 8CEE CB 23       >			   sla e
 455+ 8CF0 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 456+ 8CF2                                      ShiftHLLeft1
 456+ 8CF2 CB 25       >			   sla l
 456+ 8CF4 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 457+ 8CF6                                      ShiftBCLeft1
 457+ 8CF6 CB 21       >			   sla c
 457+ 8CF8 CB 10       >			   rl  b
 458+ 8CFA CB 27                                sla     a
 459+ 8CFC 38 03                                jr      c,.DoneCalc
 460+ 8CFE C3 EE 8C                             jp      .UpscaleLoop
 461+ 8D01              .DoneCalc               ShiftDERight1
 461+ 8D01 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 461+ 8D03 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 462+ 8D05                                      ShiftHLRight1
 462+ 8D05 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 462+ 8D07 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 463+ 8D09                                      ShiftBCRight1
 463+ 8D09 CB 38       >			   srl b
 463+ 8D0B CB 19       >			   rr  c
 464+ 8D0D 5A           .NowSetResultInLowByte: ld      e,d
 465+ 8D0E 6C                                   ld      l,h
 466+ 8D0F 48                                   ld      c,b
 467+ 8D10 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 468+ 8D12 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 469+ 8D14 47                                   ld      b,a
 470+ 8D15 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 471+ 8D17 CB 27                                sla     a
 472+ 8D19 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 473+ 8D1B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 474+ 8D1D 67                                   ld      h,a
 475+ 8D1E FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 476+ 8D20 CB 27                                sla     a
 477+ 8D22 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 478+ 8D24 57                                   ld      d,a
 479+ 8D25 C9                                   ret
 480+ 8D26 3E 01        .Setto1:                ld      a,1
 481+ 8D28 4F                                   ld      c,a
 482+ 8D29 5F                                   ld      e,a
 483+ 8D2A 6F                                   ld      l,a
 484+ 8D2B FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 485+ 8D2D CB 27                                sla     a
 486+ 8D2F CB 27                                sla     a
 487+ 8D31 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 488+ 8D33 B3                                   or      e
 489+ 8D34 5F                                   ld      e,a
 490+ 8D35 C9                                   ret
 491+ 8D36
 492+ 8D36
 493+ 8D36              UpdateCompassSun:       MMUSelectSun
 493+ 8D36 ED 91 56 53 >                     nextreg SunMMU,            BankSunData
 494+ 8D3A CD 64 8C                             call    ScaleSunPos                 ; get as 7 bit signed
 495+ 8D3D C5 E5 D5                             push    bc,,hl,,de                  ; +3 save to stack Y, X and Z scaled and signed hihg = sign, low = 7 bit value
 496+ 8D40 51           .normaliseYSqr:         ld      d,c                         ; bc = y ^ 2
 497+ 8D41 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 498+ 8D42 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 499+ 8D44 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; .
 500+ 8D46 55           .normaliseXSqr:         ld      d,l                         ; hl = x ^ 2
 501+ 8D47 5D                                   ld      e,l                         ; .
 502+ 8D48 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 503+ 8D4A EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 504+ 8D4B D1           .normaliseZSqr:         pop     de                          ; +2 get Z saved from stack so now stack contains Y Z X
 505+ 8D4C 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = z ^
 506+ 8D4D ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 507+ 8D4F 19           .normaliseSqrt:         add     hl,de                       ; de = x^2 + y^2 + z^2
 508+ 8D50 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ; .
 509+ 8D51 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 510+ 8D52 CD 2F B0                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; (Q) = hl = sqrt (x^2 + y^2 + x^2)
 511+ 8D55                                      ; if h <> 0 then more difficult
 512+ 8D55 55                                   ld      d,l                         ; iyl = q
 513+ 8D56 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d                       ; .
 514+ 8D58 E1           .NormaliseX:            pop     hl                          ; +1 get back hl x scaled
 515+ 8D59 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 516+ 8D5A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 517+ 8D5C 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 518+ 8D5D C5                                   push    bc                          ; +2 save bc temporarily as it will get altered
 519+ 8D5E 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit abs z
 520+ 8D5F CD A8 B5                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS           ; e = a /q * 96 (d was already loaded with q)
 521+ 8D62 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 522+ 8D63                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; a = e / 10
 522+ 8D63 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 522+ 8D65 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 522+ 8D67 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 522+ 8D68 19          >                        add     hl,de
 522+ 8D69 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 522+ 8D6A 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 522+ 8D6B 19          >                        add     hl,de
 522+ 8D6C 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 523+ 8D6D 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
 524+ 8D6E C1                                   pop     bc                          ; +1 retrieve bc
 525+ 8D6F FE 00                                cp      0                           ; if result in h was 0 then done
 526+ 8D71 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormX                ; in case we end up with - 0
 527+ 8D73 CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 528+ 8D75 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormX
 529+ 8D77 ED 44                                neg
 530+ 8D79 DD 67        .DoneNormX:             ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = (signed 2's c x /q * 96) / 10
 531+ 8D7B FD 55        .NormaliseY:            ld      d,iyl                       ; d = q
 532+ 8D7D E1                                   pop     hl                          ; +0 hl y scaled
 533+ 8D7E 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 534+ 8D7F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 535+ 8D81 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 536+ 8D82 C5                                   push    bc                          ; +1 save sign to stack
 537+ 8D83 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit signed z
 538+ 8D84 CD A8 B5                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS           ; .
 539+ 8D87 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = e / 10
 540+ 8D88                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; .
 540+ 8D88 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 540+ 8D8A 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 540+ 8D8C 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 540+ 8D8D 19          >                        add     hl,de
 540+ 8D8E 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 540+ 8D8F 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 540+ 8D90 19          >                        add     hl,de
 540+ 8D91 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 541+ 8D92 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; retrieve sign
 542+ 8D93 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; +1 retrieve sign
 543+ 8D94 FE 00                                cp      0
 544+ 8D96 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormY                ; in case we end up with - 0
 545+ 8D98 CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 546+ 8D9A 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormY
 547+ 8D9C ED 44                                neg                                 ;
 548+ 8D9E 47           .DoneNormY:             ld      b,a                         ; result from Y
 549+ 8D9F DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; x = saved X
 550+ 8DA1              .SetSprite:             MMUSelectSpriteBank
 550+ 8DA1 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 551+ 8DA5 CD 05 E1                             call    compass_sun_move
 552+ 8DA8 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
 553+ 8DAA CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 554+ 8DAC 20 04                                jr      nz,.SunBehind
 555+ 8DAE CD 8C E1     .SunInfront:            call    show_compass_sun_infront
 556+ 8DB1 C9                                   ret
 557+ 8DB2 CD 97 E1     .SunBehind:             call    show_compass_sun_behind
 558+ 8DB5 C9                                   ret
 559+ 8DB6
 560+ 8DB6
 561+ 8DB6              UpdateCompassPlanet:    MMUSelectPlanet
 561+ 8DB6 ED 91 56 54 >                     nextreg PlanetMMU,         BankPlanetData
 562+ 8DBA CD 17 8C                             call    ScalePlanetPos              ; get as 7 bit signed
 563+ 8DBD C5 E5 D5                             push    bc,,hl,,de                  ; save to stack Y, Z, X and copy of X scaled and signed hihg = sign, low = 7 bit value
 564+ 8DC0 51           .normaliseYSqr:         ld      d,c                         ; bc = y ^ 2
 565+ 8DC1 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 566+ 8DC2 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 567+ 8DC4 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; .
 568+ 8DC6 55           .normaliseXSqr:         ld      d,l                         ; hl = x ^ 2
 569+ 8DC7 5D                                   ld      e,l                         ; .
 570+ 8DC8 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 571+ 8DCA EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 572+ 8DCB D1           .normaliseZSqr:         pop     de                          ; get saved from stack 2
 573+ 8DCC 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = z ^
 574+ 8DCD ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 575+ 8DCF 19           .normaliseSqrt:         add     hl,de                       ; hl = x^2 + y^2 + z^2
 576+ 8DD0 09                                   add     hl,bc
 577+ 8DD1 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 578+ 8DD2 CD 2F B0                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; (Q) = hl = sqrt (x^2 + y^2 + x^2)
 579+ 8DD5                                      ; if h <> 0 then more difficult
 580+ 8DD5 55                                   ld      d,l                         ; iyl = q
 581+ 8DD6 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d                       ; .
 582+ 8DD8 E1           .NormaliseX:            pop     hl                          ; hl x scaled
 583+ 8DD9 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 584+ 8DDA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 585+ 8DDC 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 586+ 8DDD C5                                   push    bc                          ; save sign to stack
 587+ 8DDE 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit abs z
 588+ 8DDF CD A8 B5                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS              ; e = a /q * 96 (d was already loaded with q)
 589+ 8DE2 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 590+ 8DE3                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; a = e / 10
 590+ 8DE3 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 590+ 8DE5 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 590+ 8DE7 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 590+ 8DE8 19          >                        add     hl,de
 590+ 8DE9 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 590+ 8DEA 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 590+ 8DEB 19          >                        add     hl,de
 590+ 8DEC 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 591+ 8DED 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
 592+ 8DEE C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve sign
 593+ 8DEF FE 00                                cp      0
 594+ 8DF1 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormX                ; in case we end up with - 0
 595+ 8DF3 CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 596+ 8DF5 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormX
 597+ 8DF7 ED 44                                neg
 598+ 8DF9 DD 67        .DoneNormX:             ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = (signed 2's c x /q * 96) / 10
 599+ 8DFB FD 55        .NormaliseY:            ld      d,iyl                       ; d = q
 600+ 8DFD E1                                   pop     hl                          ; hl y scaled
 601+ 8DFE 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 602+ 8DFF E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 603+ 8E01 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 604+ 8E02 C5                                   push    bc                          ; save sign to stack
 605+ 8E03 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit signed z
 606+ 8E04 CD A8 B5                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS           ; .
 607+ 8E07 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = e / 10
 608+ 8E08                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; .
 608+ 8E08 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 608+ 8E0A 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 608+ 8E0C 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 608+ 8E0D 19          >                        add     hl,de
 608+ 8E0E 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 608+ 8E0F 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 608+ 8E10 19          >                        add     hl,de
 608+ 8E11 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 609+ 8E12 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; retrieve sign
 610+ 8E13 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve sign
 611+ 8E14 FE 00                                cp      0
 612+ 8E16 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormY                 ; in case we end up with - 0
 613+ 8E18 CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 614+ 8E1A 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormY
 615+ 8E1C ED 44                                neg                                 ;
 616+ 8E1E 47           .DoneNormY:             ld      b,a                         ; result from Y
 617+ 8E1F DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; x = saved X
 618+ 8E21              .SetSprite:             MMUSelectSpriteBank
 618+ 8E21 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 619+ 8E25 CD 17 E1                             call    compass_station_move
 620+ 8E28 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
 621+ 8E2A CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 622+ 8E2C 20 04                                jr      nz,.PlanetBehind
 623+ 8E2E CD A2 E1     .PlanetInfront:         call    show_compass_station_infront
 624+ 8E31 C9                                   ret
 625+ 8E32 CD AD E1     .PlanetBehind:          call    show_compass_station_behind
 626+ 8E35 C9                                   ret
 627+ 8E36
 628+ 8E36              UpdatePlanetSun:        MMUSelectPlanet
 628+ 8E36 ED 91 56 54 >                     nextreg PlanetMMU,         BankPlanetData
 629+ 8E3A                                      Shift24BitScan  PBnKyhi, PBnKylo
 629+ 8E3A 2A 14 C0    >                        ld      hl,(PBnKyhi)
 629+ 8E3D 44          >                        ld      b,h
 629+ 8E3E 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 629+ 8E3F E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 629+ 8E41 67          >                        ld      h,a
 629+ 8E42 3A 13 C0    >                        ld      a,(PBnKylo)
 629+ 8E45 CB 27       >                        sla     a
 629+ 8E47 CB 15       >                        rl      l
 629+ 8E49 CB 14       >                        rl      h
 629+ 8E4B CB 27       >                        sla     a
 629+ 8E4D CB 15       >                        rl      l
 629+ 8E4F CB 14       >                        rl      h
 629+ 8E51 CB 27       >                        sla     a
 629+ 8E53 CB 15       >                        rl      l
 629+ 8E55 CB 14       >                        rl      h
 629+ 8E57 CB 27       >                        sla     a
 629+ 8E59 CB 15       >                        rl      l
 629+ 8E5B CB 14       >                        rl      h
 629+ 8E5D CB 27       >                        sla     a
 629+ 8E5F CB 15       >                        rl      l
 629+ 8E61 CB 14       >                        rl      h
 629+ 8E63 CB 27       >                        sla     a
 629+ 8E65 CB 15       >                        rl      l
 629+ 8E67 CB 14       >                        rl      h
 630+ 8E69 3A 12 C0     .IsItInRange:           ld      a,(PBnKxsgn)                ; if the high byte is not
 631+ 8E6C 21 15 C0                             ld      hl,PBnKysgn                 ; a sign only
 632+ 8E6F B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; then its too far away
 633+ 8E70 21 18 C0                             ld      hl,PBnKzsgn                 ; for the scanner to draw
 634+ 8E73 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; so rely on the compass
 635+ 8E74 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ;
 636+ 8E76 C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
 637+ 8E77 2A 16 C0     .ItsInRange:            ld      hl,(PBnKzlo)                ; we will get unsigned values
 638+ 8E7A ED 5B 10 C0                          ld      de,(PBnKxlo)
 639+ 8E7E ED 4B 13 C0                          ld      bc,(PBnKylo)
 640+ 8E82 7C                                   ld      a,h
 641+ 8E83 B2                                   or      d
 642+ 8E84 B0                                   or      b
 643+ 8E85 E6 C0                                and     %11000000
 644+ 8E87 C0                                   ret     nz                          ; if distance Hi > 64 on any ccord- off screen
 645+ 8E88 3A 12 C0     .MakeX2Compliment:      ld      a,(PBnKxsgn)
 646+ 8E8B CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 647+ 8E8D 28 04                                jr      z,.absXHi
 648+ 8E8F                                      NegD
 648+ 8E8F 7A          >                    ld      a,d
 648+ 8E90 ED 44       >                    neg
 648+ 8E92 57          >                    ld      d,a
 649+ 8E93 7A           .absXHi:                ld      a,d
 650+ 8E94 C6 80                                add     ScannerX
 651+ 8E96 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; store adjusted X in ixh
 652+ 8E98 CB 3C        .ProcessZCoord:         srl     h
 653+ 8E9A CB 3C                                srl     h
 654+ 8E9C 3A 18 C0     .MakeZ2Compliment:      ld      a,(PBnKzsgn)
 655+ 8E9F CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 656+ 8EA1 28 04                                jr      z,.absZHi
 657+ 8EA3                                      NegH
 657+ 8EA3 7C          >                    ld      a,h
 657+ 8EA4 ED 44       >                    neg
 657+ 8EA6 67          >                    ld      h,a
 658+ 8EA7 3E AB        .absZHi:                ld      a,ScannerY
 659+ 8EA9 94                                   sub     h
 660+ 8EAA FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; make iyh adjusted Z = row on screen
 661+ 8EAC CB 38        .ProcessStickLength:    srl     b                           ; divide b by 2
 662+ 8EAE 20 0B                                jr      nz,.StickHasLength
 663+ 8EB0 FD 7C        .Stick0Length:          ld      a,iyh                       ; abs stick end is row - length
 664+ 8EB2 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 665+ 8EB4                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 665+ 8EB4 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 666+ 8EB8 C3 E3 8E                             jp      .NoStick
 667+ 8EBB 3A 15 C0     .StickHasLength:        ld      a,(PBnKysgn)                ; if b  =  0 then no line
 668+ 8EBE CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 669+ 8EC0 28 04                                jr      z,.absYHi
 670+ 8EC2                                      NegB
 670+ 8EC2 78          >                    ld      a,b
 670+ 8EC3 ED 44       >                    neg
 670+ 8EC5 47          >                    ld      b,a
 671+ 8EC6 FD 7C        .absYHi:                ld      a,iyh
 672+ 8EC8 90           .SetStickPos:           sub     b
 673+ 8EC9                                      JumpIfALTNusng ScannerBottom, .StickOnScreen
 673+ 8EC9 FE BE       >                        cp      ScannerBottom
 673+ 8ECB DA D0 8E    >                        jp		c, .StickOnScreen
 674+ 8ECE 3E BE                                ld      a,ScannerBottom
 675+ 8ED0 FD 6F        .StickOnScreen:         ld      iyl,a                       ; iyh is again stick end point
 676+ 8ED2 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a
 677+ 8ED4 FD 44                                ld      b,iyh                       ; from row
 678+ 8ED6 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; from col
 679+ 8ED8 FD 55                                ld      d,iyl                       ; to row
 680+ 8EDA 1E B4                                ld      e,L2SunScanner
 681+ 8EDC                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 681+ 8EDC ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 682+ 8EE0 CD 60 E3                             call    l2_draw_vert_line_to
 683+ 8EE3 FD 45        .NoStick:               ld      b,iyl                       ; row
 684+ 8EE5 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; col
 685+ 8EE7 3E FC                                ld      a,L2SunScannerBright
 686+ 8EE9 CD 37 E1                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 687+ 8EEC FD 45                                ld      b,iyl
 688+ 8EEE DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh
 689+ 8EF0 0C                                   inc     c
 690+ 8EF1 3E FC                                ld      a,L2SunScannerBright
 691+ 8EF3 CD 37 E1                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 692+ 8EF6 C9                                   ret
 693+ 8EF7
 694+ 8EF7              UpdateCompassStation:   MMUSelectShipBankN 0
 694+ 8EF7 ED 91 57 00 >					 nextreg ShipModelMMU,	    0
 695+ 8EFB
 696+ 8EFB CD 64 8C                             call    ScaleSunPos                 ; get as 7 bit signed
 697+ 8EFE C5 D5 E5 D5                          push    bc,,de,,hl,,de              ; save to stack Y, Z, X and copy of X scaled and signed hihg = sign, low = 7 bit value
 698+ 8F02 51           .normaliseYSqr:         ld      d,c                         ; bc = y ^ 2
 699+ 8F03 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 700+ 8F04 ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 701+ 8F06 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; .
 702+ 8F08 55           .normaliseXSqr:         ld      d,l                         ; hl = x ^ 2
 703+ 8F09 5D                                   ld      e,l                         ; .
 704+ 8F0A ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 705+ 8F0C EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 706+ 8F0D D1           .normaliseZSqr:         pop     de                          ; get saved from stack 2
 707+ 8F0E 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = z ^
 708+ 8F0F ED 30                                mul                                 ; .
 709+ 8F11 19           .normaliseSqrt:         add     hl,de                       ; hl = x^2 + y^2 + x^2
 710+ 8F12 09                                   add     hl,bc
 711+ 8F13 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 712+ 8F14 CD 2F B0                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; (Q) = hl = sqrt (x^2 + y^2 + x^2)
 713+ 8F17                                      ; if h <> 0 then more difficult
 714+ 8F17 55                                   ld      d,l                         ; iyl = q
 715+ 8F18 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d                       ; .
 716+ 8F1A E1           .NormaliseX:            pop     hl                          ; hl x scaled
 717+ 8F1B 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 718+ 8F1C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 719+ 8F1E 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 720+ 8F1F C5                                   push    bc                          ; save sign to stack
 721+ 8F20 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit abs z
 722+ 8F21 CD A8 B5                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS              ; e = a /q * 96 (d was already loaded with q)
 723+ 8F24 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 724+ 8F25                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; a = e / 10
 724+ 8F25 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 724+ 8F27 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 724+ 8F29 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 724+ 8F2A 19          >                        add     hl,de
 724+ 8F2B 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 724+ 8F2C 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 724+ 8F2D 19          >                        add     hl,de
 724+ 8F2E 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 725+ 8F2F 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
 726+ 8F30 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve sign
 727+ 8F31 FE 00                                cp      0
 728+ 8F33 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormX                 ; in case we end up with - 0
 729+ 8F35 CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 730+ 8F37 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormX
 731+ 8F39 ED 44                                neg
 732+ 8F3B DD 67        .DoneNormX:             ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = (signed 2's c x /q * 96) / 10
 733+ 8F3D FD 55        .NormaliseZ:            ld      d,iyl                       ; d = q
 734+ 8F3F E1                                   pop     hl                          ; hl z scaled
 735+ 8F40 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 736+ 8F41 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 737+ 8F43 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 738+ 8F44 C5                                   push    bc                          ; save sign to stack
 739+ 8F45 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; e = a /q * 96
 740+ 8F46 CD A8 B5                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS              ; .
 741+ 8F49 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = e / 10
 742+ 8F4A                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; .
 742+ 8F4A 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 742+ 8F4C 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 742+ 8F4E 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 742+ 8F4F 19          >                        add     hl,de
 742+ 8F50 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 742+ 8F51 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 742+ 8F52 19          >                        add     hl,de
 742+ 8F53 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 743+ 8F54 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; retrieve sign
 744+ 8F55 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve sign
 745+ 8F56 CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 746+ 8F58 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormZ
 747+ 8F5A ED 44                                neg
 748+ 8F5C DD 6F        .DoneNormZ:             ld      ixl,a                       ; .
 749+ 8F5E FD 55        .NormaliseY:            ld      d,iyl                       ; d = q
 750+ 8F60 E1                                   pop     hl                          ; hl y scaled
 751+ 8F61 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; c = sign
 752+ 8F62 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 753+ 8F64 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; .
 754+ 8F65 C5                                   push    bc                          ; save sign to stack
 755+ 8F66 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; a = 8 bit signed z
 756+ 8F67 CD A8 B5                             call    AequAdivQmul96ABS              ; .
 757+ 8F6A 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = e / 10
 758+ 8F6B                                      EDiv10Inline                        ; .
 758+ 8F6B 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
 758+ 8F6D 62 6B       >                        ld      hl,de
 758+ 8F6F 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 758+ 8F70 19          >                        add     hl,de
 758+ 8F71 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 758+ 8F72 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 758+ 8F73 19          >                        add     hl,de
 758+ 8F74 29          >                        add     hl,hl
 759+ 8F75 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; retrieve sign
 760+ 8F76 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve sign
 761+ 8F77 FE 00                                cp      0
 762+ 8F79 28 06                                jr      z,.DoneNormY                ; in case we end up with - 0
 763+ 8F7B CB 79                                bit     7,c                         ; if sign is negative then 2'c value
 764+ 8F7D 28 02                                jr      z,.DoneNormY
 765+ 8F7F ED 44                                neg
 766+ 8F81 47           .DoneNormY:             ld      b,a                         ; .
 767+ 8F82 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh
 768+ 8F84              .SetSprite:             MMUSelectSpriteBank
 768+ 8F84 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 769+ 8F88 CD 05 E1                             call    compass_sun_move

 771+ 8F8D CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 772+ 8F8F 20 04                                jr      nz,.SunBehind
 773+ 8F91 CD 8C E1     .SunInfront:            call    show_compass_sun_infront
 774+ 8F94 C9                                   ret

 794+ 8FE8 E6 C0                                and     %11000000
 795+ 8FEA C0                                   ret     nz                          ; if distance Hi > 64 on any ccord- off screen
 796+ 8FEB 3A 12 C0     .MakeX2Compliment:      ld      a,(SBnKxsgn)
 797+ 8FEE CB 7F                                bit     7,a

 799+ 8FF2 7A          >                    ld      a,d
 799+ 8FF3 ED 44       >                    neg

 848+ 908D 3A 12 C0     .IsItInRange:           ld      a,(PBnKxsgn)                ; if the high byte is not
 849+ 9090 21 15 C0                             ld      hl,PBnKysgn                 ; a sign only
 850+ 9093 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; then its too far away
 851+ 9094 21 18 C0                             ld      hl,PBnKzsgn                 ; for the scanner to draw
 852+ 9097 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; so rely on the compass
 853+ 9098 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ;
 854+ 909A C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
 855+ 909B 2A 16 C0     .ItsInRange:            ld      hl,(PBnKzlo)                ; we will get unsigned values
 856+ 909E ED 5B 10 C0                          ld      de,(PBnKxlo)
 857+ 90A2 ED 4B 13 C0                          ld      bc,(PBnKylo)
 858+ 90A6 7C                                   ld      a,h
 859+ 90A7 B2                                   or      d
 860+ 90A8 B0                                   or      b
 861+ 90A9 E6 C0                                and     %11000000
 862+ 90AB C0                                   ret     nz                          ; if distance Hi > 64 on any ccord- off screen
 863+ 90AC 3A 12 C0     .MakeX2Compliment:      ld      a,(PBnKxsgn)
 864+ 90AF CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 865+ 90B1 28 04                                jr      z,.absXHi
 866+ 90B3                                      NegD
 866+ 90B3 7A          >                    ld      a,d
 866+ 90B4 ED 44       >                    neg
 866+ 90B6 57          >                    ld      d,a
 867+ 90B7 7A           .absXHi:                ld      a,d
 868+ 90B8 C6 80                                add     ScannerX
 869+ 90BA DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; store adjusted X in ixh
 870+ 90BC CB 3C        .ProcessZCoord:         srl     h
 871+ 90BE CB 3C                                srl     h
 872+ 90C0 3A 18 C0     .MakeZ2Compliment:      ld      a,(PBnKzsgn)
 873+ 90C3 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 874+ 90C5 28 04                                jr      z,.absZHi
 875+ 90C7                                      NegH
 875+ 90C7 7C          >                    ld      a,h
 875+ 90C8 ED 44       >                    neg
 875+ 90CA 67          >                    ld      h,a
 876+ 90CB 3E AB        .absZHi:                ld      a,ScannerY
 877+ 90CD 94                                   sub     h
 878+ 90CE FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; make iyh adjusted Z = row on screen
 879+ 90D0 CB 38        .ProcessStickLength:    srl     b                           ; divide b by 2
 880+ 90D2 20 0B                                jr      nz,.StickHasLength
 881+ 90D4 FD 7C        .Stick0Length:          ld      a,iyh                       ; abs stick end is row - length
 882+ 90D6 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 883+ 90D8                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 883+ 90D8 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 884+ 90DC C3 07 91                             jp      .NoStick
 885+ 90DF 3A 15 C0     .StickHasLength:        ld      a,(PBnKysgn)                ; if b  =  0 then no line
 886+ 90E2 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 887+ 90E4 28 04                                jr      z,.absYHi
 888+ 90E6                                      NegB
 888+ 90E6 78          >                    ld      a,b
 888+ 90E7 ED 44       >                    neg
 888+ 90E9 47          >                    ld      b,a
 889+ 90EA FD 7C        .absYHi:                ld      a,iyh
 890+ 90EC 90           .SetStickPos:           sub     b
 891+ 90ED                                      JumpIfALTNusng ScannerBottom, .StickOnScreen
 891+ 90ED FE BE       >                        cp      ScannerBottom
 891+ 90EF DA F4 90    >                        jp		c, .StickOnScreen
 892+ 90F2 3E BE                                ld      a,ScannerBottom
 893+ 90F4 FD 6F        .StickOnScreen:         ld      iyl,a                       ; iyh is again stick end point
 894+ 90F6 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a
 895+ 90F8 FD 44                                ld      b,iyh                       ; from row
 896+ 90FA DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; from col
 897+ 90FC FD 55                                ld      d,iyl                       ; to row
 898+ 90FE 1E B4                                ld      e,L2SunScanner
 899+ 9100                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 899+ 9100 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 900+ 9104 CD 60 E3                             call    l2_draw_vert_line_to
 901+ 9107 FD 45        .NoStick:               ld      b,iyl                       ; row
 902+ 9109 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh                       ; col
 903+ 910B 3E FC                                ld      a,L2SunScannerBright
 904+ 910D CD 37 E1                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 905+ 9110 FD 45                                ld      b,iyl
 906+ 9112 DD 4C                                ld      c,ixh
 907+ 9114 0C                                   inc     c
 908+ 9115 3E FC                                ld      a,L2SunScannerBright
 909+ 9117 CD 37 E1                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 910+ 911A C9                                   ret
 911+ 911B
 912+ 911B
 913+ 911B              ; As the space station is always ship 0 then we can just use the scanner
 914+ 911B
 915+ 911B              ; This will go though all the universe ship data banks and plot, for now we will just work on one bank
 916+ 911B 3A 3D C0     UpdateScannerShip:      ld      a,(UBnKexplDsp)             ; if bit 4 is clear then ship should not be drawn
 917+ 911E CB 67                                bit     4,a                         ; .
 918+ 9120                                      ;DEBUG ret     z                           ; .
 919+ 9120 3A 2D C3                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; if its a planet or sun, do not display
 920+ 9123 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 921+ 9125 C0                                   ret     nz

# file opened: ./Tables/message_queue.asm
   1+ 91C1
   2+ 91C1
   3+ 91C1              ResetMessageQueue:      ZeroA
   3+ 91C1 AF          >                        xor a
   4+ 91C2 32 01 9D                             ld      (MessageCount),a
   5+ 91C5 32 02 9D                             ld      (MessageCurrent),a
   6+ 91C8 21 05 9D                             ld      hl,MessageQueue
   7+ 91CB 11 03 9D                             ld      de,MessageIndex
   8+ 91CE 06 05                                ld      b,5
   9+ 91D0 7D           .ClearMessageIndexs:    ld      a,l                                 ; Wipe out the indexes to all the data
  10+ 91D1 12                                   ld      (de),a                              ;
  11+ 91D2 13                                   inc     de                                  ;
  12+ 91D3 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
  13+ 91D4 12                                   ld      (de),a                              ;
  14+ 91D5 13                                   inc     de                                  ;
  15+ 91D6 3E 21                                ld      a,MESSAGESIZE                       ;
  16+ 91D8 ED 31                                add     hl,a                                ;
  17+ 91DA 10 F4                                djnz    .ClearMessageIndexs                 ;
  18+ 91DC 21 05 9D     .ClearText:             ld      hl,MessageQueue
  19+ 91DF 11 AA 00                             ld      de,(MAXMESSAGES * MESSAGESIZE) + MAXMESSAGES    ; MessageQueue + MessageTimeout
  20+ 91E2 3E 00                                ld      a,0
  21+ 91E4 CD AB 99                             call	memfill_dma
  22+ 91E7 C9                                   ret
  23+ 91E8
  24+ 91E8              ; Message to enqeue is a string held at DE that must be terminated in \0
  25+ 91E8              ;                                       IYH = timer for message
  26+ 91E8 3A 01 9D     EnqueMessage:           ld      a,(MessageCount)                    ; Maximum message count check
  27+ 91EB                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng    MAXMESSAGES            ; we do not enque if queue is full
  27+ 91EB FE 05       >                        cp    MAXMESSAGES
  27+ 91ED D0          >                        ret	 nc
  28+ 91EE 3C                                   inc     a
  29+ 91EF 32 01 9D                             ld      (MessageCount),a                    ; get ready for next message
  30+ 91F2 4F           .AddMessage:            ld      c,a
  31+ 91F3 3A 02 9D                             ld      a,(MessageCurrent)                  ; a = current message id + count + 1
  32+ 91F6 81                                   add     c                                   ;
  33+ 91F7                                      JumpIfALTNusng MAXMESSAGES, .ReadyToAdd     ; a = a modulus 5 (note we can only hit 5 messages
  33+ 91F7 FE 05       >                        cp      MAXMESSAGES
  33+ 91F9 DA FE 91    >                        jp		c, .ReadyToAdd
  34+ 91FC D6 05        .CircularQueue:         sub     MAXMESSAGES                         ; so only need 1 cycle of modulus
  35+ 91FE 21 AA 9D     .ReadyToAdd:            ld      hl,MessageTimeout                   ; write out message display time
  36+ 9201 ED 31                                add     hl,a                                ; as some may be brief messages
  37+ 9203 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
  38+ 9204 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                               ;
  39+ 9206 77                                   ld      (hl),a                              ;
  40+ 9207 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back index
  41+ 9208 21 03 9D                             ld      hl,MessageIndex
  42+ 920B                                      HLEquAddrAtHLPlusA                          ; hl = target location for message
  42+ 920B CB 27       >                    sla         a
  42+ 920D ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  42+ 920F 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
  42+ 9210 23          >                    inc         hl
  42+ 9211 66          >                    ld          h,(hl)
  42+ 9212 6F          >                    ld          l,a
  43+ 9213 EB                                   ex      de,hl                               ; de = destination, hl = message
  44+ 9214                                      ldCopyTextAtHLtoDE                          ; copy over text as we have done the rest
  44+ 9214 7E          >.CopyLoop:              ld      a,(hl)
  44+ 9215 12          >                        ld      (de),a
  44+ 9216 FE 00       >                        cp      0
  44+ 9218 CA 1F 92    >                        jp      z,.DoneCopy
  44+ 921B 23          >                        inc     hl
  44+ 921C 13          >                        inc     de
  44+ 921D 18 F5       >                        jr      .CopyLoop
  44+ 921F             >.DoneCopy:
  45+ 921F C9                                   ret
  46+ 9220
  47+ 9220 3A 02 9D     UpdateMessageTimer:     ld      a,(MessageCurrent)
  48+ 9223 21 AA 9D                             ld      hl,MessageTimeout
  49+ 9226 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  50+ 9228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  51+ 9229 3D                                   dec     a
  52+ 922A 28 02                                jr      z,.UpdateQueue
  53+ 922C 77           .UpdateTimer            ld      (hl),a
  54+ 922D C9                                   ret
  55+ 922E 77           .UpdateQueue:           ld      (hl),a
  56+ 922F 21 01 9D                             ld      hl,MessageCount
  57+ 9232 35                                   dec     (hl)
  58+ 9233 3A 02 9D                             ld      a,(MessageCurrent)
  59+ 9236 23                                   inc     hl
  60+ 9237                                      JumpIfALTNusng MAXMESSAGES, .ReadyToUpdate
  60+ 9237 FE 05       >                        cp      MAXMESSAGES
  60+ 9239 DA 3D 92    >                        jp		c, .ReadyToUpdate
  61+ 923C              .CircularQueue:         ZeroA
  61+ 923C AF          >                        xor a
  62+ 923D 32 02 9D     .ReadyToUpdate          ld      (MessageCurrent),a
  63+ 9240 C9                                   ret
  64+ 9241

# file opened: ./Tables/LaserStatsTable.asm
   1+ 932E              ; LaserTypeTable
   2+ 932E              ; laser type = id of laser
   3+ 932E              ; laser pulse pause = time before next pulse
   4+ 932E              ; laser pulse duration = time laser is on per shot
   5+ 932E              ; laser damage output
   6+ 932E              ;
   7+ 932E              ; LaserType
   8+ 932E              ; LaserPulseRate                          ; how many pulses can be fired before long pause
   9+ 932E              ; LaserPulseOnTime                        ; cycles laser is on for
  10+ 932E              ; LaserPulseOffTime                       ; cycles laser is off for

  12+ 932E              ; LaserDamageOutput                       ; amount of damage for a laser hit
  13+ 932E              ; LaserEnergyDrain                        ; amount of energy drained by cycle
  14+ 932E              ; LaserHeat                               ; amount of heat generated
  15+ 932E              ; LaserDurability                         ; probabability out of 255 that a hit on unshielded will add random amount of damage
  16+ 932E              ; LaserDurabilityAmount                   ; max amount of damagage can be sustained in one damage hit
  17+ 932E              ; LaserInMarkets                          ; can this laser be purchased 0 = yes 1 = no
  18+ 932E              ; LaserTechLevel                          ; minimum tech level system to buy from
