 612  94E1
 613  94E1                  include "./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
   1+ 94E1              ; We enter here with hl pointing at XX16 and bc = XX15 value
   2+ 94E1              ; so xx12 = XX15 * XX16 row
   3+ 94E1              XX12ProcessOneRow:
   4+ 94E1              XX12CalcXCell:
   5+ 94E1 ED 4B 8E C0          ld		bc,(UBnkXScaled)
   6+ 94E5 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
   7+ 94E6 23           		inc		hl
   8+ 94E7 56           		ld		d,(hl)                                  ; so now e = xx16 value d = xx16 sign
   9+ 94E8 7A           		ld		a,d
  10+ 94E9 A8                   xor     b
  11+ 94EA E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit                            ; a = XX 16 sign
  12+ 94EC DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  13+ 94EE 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  14+ 94EF E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  15+ 94F1 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  16+ 94F2 E5           		push	hl
  17+ 94F3 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  18+ 94F5 60           		ld		h,b
  19+ 94F6 69           		ld		l,c
  20+ 94F7 CD 50 AF     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  21+ 94FA 22 EC 99     		ld		(XX12PVarResult1),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result, we only want to use high byte later
  22+ 94FD DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  23+ 94FF 32 F3 99     		ld		(XX12PVarSign1),a					    ; S = sign  not sign 1 and 2 are reversed in memory so that fetchign back will put 1 in high byte 2 in low byte
  24+ 9502 E1           		pop		hl
  25+ 9503              XX12CalcYCell:
  26+ 9503 ED 4B 90 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkYScaled)
  27+ 9507 23           		inc		hl
  28+ 9508 5E           		ld		e,(hl)							    	; get orientation ZX
  29+ 9509 23           		inc		hl
  30+ 950A 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  31+ 950B 7A           		ld		a,d
  32+ 950C A8                   xor     b
  33+ 950D E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  34+ 950F DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; XX16 orientation sign to ixh
  35+ 9511 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  36+ 9512 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  37+ 9514 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  38+ 9515 E5           		push	hl
  39+ 9516 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  40+ 9518 60           		ld		h,b
  41+ 9519 69           		ld		l,c
  42+ 951A CD 50 AF     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  43+ 951D 22 EE 99     		ld		(XX12PVarResult2),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  44+ 9520 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  45+ 9522 32 F2 99     		ld		(XX12PVarSign2),a					    ; S = sign
  46+ 9525 E1           		pop		hl
  47+ 9526              XX12CalcZCell:
  48+ 9526 ED 4B 92 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkZScaled)
  49+ 952A 23           		inc		hl
  50+ 952B 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
  51+ 952C 23           		inc		hl
  52+ 952D 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  53+ 952E 7A           		ld		a,d
  54+ 952F A8                   xor     b
  55+ 9530 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 9532 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  57+ 9534 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  58+ 9535 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  59+ 9537 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  60+ 9538 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  61+ 953A 60           		ld		h,b
  62+ 953B 69           		ld		l,c
  63+ 953C CD 50 AF     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  64+ 953F 22 F0 99     		ld		(XX12PVarResult3),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  65+ 9542 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  66+ 9544 32 F4 99     		ld		(XX12PVarSign3),a					    ; S = sign
  67+ 9547              XX12CalcCellResult:
  68+ 9547 2A EC 99     		ld		hl,(XX12PVarResult1)				    ; X Cell Result
  69+ 954A ED 5B EE 99  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult2)				    ; Y Cell Result
  70+ 954E ED 4B F2 99  		ld		bc,(XX12PVarSign2)					    ; b = var 1 result sign c = var 2 result signs
  71+ 9552              XX12MSBOnly:
  72+ 9552 6C           		ld		l,h									    ; now move results into lower byte so / 256
  73+ 9553 5A           		ld		e,d									    ; for both results
  74+ 9554 AF           		xor		a									    ;
  75+ 9555 67           		ld		h,a									    ;
  76+ 9556 57           		ld		d,a									    ; so set high byte to 0
  77+ 9557 CD 81 AC     		call	ADDHLDESignBC                           ;  XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result1 + result 2 signed in a
  78+ 955A 47           		ld		b,a									    ; move sign into b ready for next calc
  79+ 955B 3A F4 99     		ld		a,(XX12PVarSign3)					    ; result of the calcZ cell
  80+ 955E 4F           		ld		c,a									    ; goes into c to align with DE
  81+ 955F ED 5B F0 99  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult3)				    ; now add result to Result 3
  82+ 9563 5A           		ld		e,d                                     ; d = result /256
  83+ 9564 16 00        		ld		d,0									    ; and only us high byte
  84+ 9566 CD 81 AC     		call	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result and a = sign
  85+ 9569 C9           		ret											    ; hl = result, a = sign
  86+ 956A              								    ; hl = result, a = sign
  87+ 956A
  88+ 956A              XX12EquNodeDotTransMat:							    ; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
  89+ 956A              ;...X cell
  90+ 956A 21 61 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
  91+ 956D CD E1 94             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
  92+ 9570 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
  93+ 9571 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
  94+ 9572 B0           		or		b
  95+ 9573 32 95 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
  96+ 9576 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
  97+ 9577 32 94 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
  98+ 957A              ;...Y cell
  99+ 957A 21 69 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 100+ 957D CD E1 94             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 101+ 9580 47           		ld		b,a
 102+ 9581 7C           		ld		a,h
 103+ 9582              ;		ld		a,l
 104+ 9582 B0           		or		b
 105+ 9583 32 97 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 106+ 9586 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 107+ 9587 32 96 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 108+ 958A              ;...Z cell
 109+ 958A 21 71 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 110+ 958D CD E1 94             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 111+ 9590 47           		ld		b,a
 112+ 9591 7C                   ld		a,h
 113+ 9592              ;		ld		a,l
 114+ 9592 B0           		or		b
 115+ 9593 32 99 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 116+ 9596 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 117+ 9597 32 98 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 118+ 959A C9                   ret
 119+ 959B
 120+ 959B              XX12EquNodeDotOrientation:							; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 121+ 959B              ;...X cell
 122+ 959B 21 61 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 123+ 959E CD E1 94             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 124+ 95A1 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 125+ 95A2 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 126+ 95A3 B0           		or		b
 127+ 95A4 32 95 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 128+ 95A7 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 129+ 95A8 32 94 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 130+ 95AB              ;...Y cell
 131+ 95AB 21 69 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 132+ 95AE CD E1 94             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 133+ 95B1 47           		ld		b,a
 134+ 95B2 7C           		ld		a,h
 135+ 95B3              ;		ld		a,l
 136+ 95B3 B0           		or		b
 137+ 95B4 32 97 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 138+ 95B7 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 139+ 95B8 32 96 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 140+ 95BB              ;...Z cell
 141+ 95BB 21 71 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 142+ 95BE CD E1 94             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 143+ 95C1 47           		ld		b,a
 144+ 95C2 7C                   ld		a,h
 145+ 95C3              ;		ld		a,l
 146+ 95C3 B0           		or		b
 147+ 95C4 32 99 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 148+ 95C7 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 149+ 95C8 32 98 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 150+ 95CB C9                   ret
 151+ 95CC
 152+ 95CC              XX12EquNodeDotXX16:					         		; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 153+ 95CC              ;...X cell
 154+ 95CC 21 49 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 155+ 95CF CD E1 94             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 156+ 95D2 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 157+ 95D3 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 158+ 95D4 B0           		or		b
 159+ 95D5 32 95 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 160+ 95D8 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 161+ 95D9 32 94 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 162+ 95DC              ;...Y cell
 163+ 95DC 21 4F C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 164+ 95DF CD E1 94             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 165+ 95E2 47           		ld		b,a
 166+ 95E3 7C           		ld		a,h
 167+ 95E4              ;		ld		a,l
 168+ 95E4 B0           		or		b
 169+ 95E5 32 97 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 170+ 95E8 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 171+ 95E9 32 96 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 172+ 95EC              ;...Z cell
 173+ 95EC 21 55 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 174+ 95EF CD E1 94             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 175+ 95F2 47           		ld		b,a
 176+ 95F3 7C                   ld		a,h
 177+ 95F4              ;		ld		a,l
 178+ 95F4 B0           		or		b
 179+ 95F5 32 99 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 180+ 95F8 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 181+ 95F9 32 98 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 182+ 95FC C9                   ret
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
 614  95FD                  include "./ModelRender/CopyXX12ToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ./ModelRender/CopyXX12ToXX15.asm
   1+ 95FD 21 94 C0     CopyXX12ToXX15:         ld      hl,XX12

   5+ 9608 C9                                   ret

 616  9675                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 9675              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 9675                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
   3+ 9675 06 09                                ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   4+ 9677 21 49 C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 967A                                      MMUSelectMathsTables
   5+ 967A ED 91 50 63 >                     nextreg MathsTablesMMU,    BankMathsTables
   6+ 967E 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
   7+ 967F 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
   8+ 9680 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
   9+ 9681 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
  10+ 9682 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
  11+ 9683 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  12+ 9685 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  13+ 9687                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 9687 CB 23       >			   sla e
  13+ 9689 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  14+ 968B 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  15+ 968C C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  16+ 968D E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  17+ 968E CD CB 00                             call    AEquAmul256Div197Log;
  18+ 9691 E1                                   pop		hl
  19+ 9692 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  20+ 9693 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  21+ 9694 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  22+ 9695 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  23+ 9697 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  24+ 9698 C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  25+ 9699 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  26+ 969A 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  27+ 969C                                      MMUSelectROM0
  27+ 969C ED 91 50 FF >                     nextreg EXSDOSMMU0,        BankROM
  28+ 96A0 C9                                   ret
  29+ 96A1                      ELSE
  30+ 96A1 ~                                    ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
  31+ 96A1 ~                                    ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
  32+ 96A1 ~                                    ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
  33+ 96A1 ~            .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
  34+ 96A1 ~                                    ld		e,a                 ;
  35+ 96A1 ~                                    inc		hl                  ;
  36+ 96A1 ~                                    ld		a,(hl)              ;
  37+ 96A1 ~                                    ld		d,a                 ;
  38+ 96A1 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  39+ 96A1 ~                                    ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  40+ 96A1 ~                                    ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  41+ 96A1 ~                                    ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  42+ 96A1 ~                                    push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  43+ 96A1 ~                                    push	hl                  ; save HL
  44+ 96A1 ~                                    call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  45+ 96A1 ~                                    pop		hl
  46+ 96A1 ~                                    dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  47+ 96A1 ~                                    ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  48+ 96A1 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  49+ 96A1 ~                                ;    ld      a,(hl)
  50+ 96A1 ~                                ;    and     $80
  51+ 96A1 ~                                    ld      a,ixl
  52+ 96A1 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  53+ 96A1 ~                                    pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  54+ 96A1 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  55+ 96A1 ~                                    djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  56+ 96A1 ~                                    ret
  57+ 96A1                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
 617  96A1
 618  96A1                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 96A1              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 96A1              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 96A1              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 96A1              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 96A1
   6+ 96A1              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 96A1              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 96A1
   9+ 96A1 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 96A2 CD 82 A3                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 96A5 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 96A6 F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 96A8 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 96A9 E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 96AB 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 96AC 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 96AD EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 96AE CD 82 A3                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 96B1 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 96B2 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 96B3 E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 96B5 B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 96B6 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 96B7 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 96B8 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 96B9 CD 82 A3                             call    doRND
  27+ 96BC EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 96BD F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 96BF 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 96C0 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 96C1 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 96C3 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 96C4 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 96C5 CD 82 A3                             call    doRND
  35+ 96C8 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 96C9 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 96CA E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 96CC B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 96CD 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 96CE 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 96CF EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 96D0 CD 82 A3                             call    doRND
  43+ 96D3 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 96D4 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 96D6 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 96D7 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 96D8 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 96DA E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 96DC 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 96DD 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 96DE C9                                   ret
  52+ 96DF
  53+ 96DF EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 96E0 CD 82 A3                             call    doRND
  55+ 96E3 CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 96E5 CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 96E7 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 96E8 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 96EA 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 96EB E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 96ED 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 96EE 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 96EF EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 96F0 CD 82 A3                             call    doRND
  65+ 96F3 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 96F4 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 96F5 E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 96F7 B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 96F8 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 96F9 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 96FA EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 96FB CD 82 A3                             call    doRND
  73+ 96FE CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 9700 CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 9702 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 9703 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 9705 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 9706 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 9707 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 9709 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 970A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 970B CD 82 A3                             call    doRND
  83+ 970E EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 970F 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 9710 E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 9712 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 9713 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 9714 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 9715 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 9716 CD 82 A3                             call    doRND
  91+ 9719 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 971A F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 971C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 971D 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 971E F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 9720 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 9722 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 9723 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 9724 C9                                   ret
 100+ 9725
 101+ 9725              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 102+ 9725 7C           StarsSUBHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 103+ 9726 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 104+ 9728 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 105+ 9729 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 106+ 972A                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 106+ 972A FA 58 97    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
 107+ 972D 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 108+ 972E B2                                   or      d
 109+ 972F                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 109+ 972F FA 39 97    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
 110+ 9732 B7                                   or      a
 111+ 9733 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 112+ 9735                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 112+ 9735 FA 4C 97    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 113+ 9738 C9                                   ret
 114+ 9739 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 115+ 973A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 116+ 973C 67                                   ld      h,a
 117+ 973D 7A                                   ld      a,d
 118+ 973E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 119+ 9740 57                                   ld      d,a
 120+ 9741 B7                                   or      a
 121+ 9742 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 122+ 9744                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 122+ 9744 FA 4C 97    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 123+ 9747 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 124+ 9748 F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 125+ 974A 67                                   ld      h,a
 126+ 974B C9                                   ret
 127+ 974C              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
 127+ 974C AF          >                    xor a
 127+ 974D 95          >                    sub l
 127+ 974E 6F          >                    ld l,a
 127+ 974F 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 127+ 9750 94          >                    sub h
 127+ 9751 67          >                    ld h,a
 128+ 9752 78                                   ld      a,b
 129+ 9753 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 130+ 9755 B4                                   or      h
 131+ 9756 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 132+ 9757 C9                                   ret
 133+ 9758 B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
 134+ 9759 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 135+ 975A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 136+ 975C 67                                   ld      h,a
 137+ 975D 7A                                   ld      a,d
 138+ 975E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 139+ 9760 57                                   ld      d,a
 140+ 9761 19                                   add     hl,de
 141+ 9762 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 142+ 9763 B4                                   or      h
 143+ 9764 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 144+ 9765 C9                                   ret
 145+ 9766
 146+ 9766 7C           StarsADDHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 147+ 9767 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 148+ 9769 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 149+ 976A AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 150+ 976B                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 150+ 976B FA 83 97    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 151+ 976E 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 152+ 976F B2                                   or      d
 153+ 9770                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 153+ 9770 FA 75 97    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 154+ 9773 19                                   add     hl,de
 155+ 9774 C9                                   ret
 156+ 9775 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 157+ 9776 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 158+ 9778 67                                   ld      h,a
 159+ 9779 7A                                   ld      a,d
 160+ 977A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 977C 57                                   ld      d,a
 162+ 977D 19                                   add     hl,de
 163+ 977E 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 164+ 9780 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 165+ 9781 67                                   ld      h,a
 166+ 9782 C9                                   ret
 167+ 9783 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; here HL and DE are opposite  so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 168+ 9784 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 169+ 9786 67                                   ld      h,a
 170+ 9787 7A                                   ld      a,d
 171+ 9788 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 172+ 978A 57                                   ld      d,a
 173+ 978B B7                                   or      a
 174+ 978C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 175+ 978E 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 176+ 9790 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 177+ 9791 B4                                   or      h
 178+ 9792 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 179+ 9793 C9                                   ret
 180+ 9794              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL
 180+ 9794 AF          >                    xor a
 180+ 9795 95          >                    sub l
 180+ 9796 6F          >                    ld l,a
 180+ 9797 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 180+ 9798 94          >                    sub h
 180+ 9799 67          >                    ld h,a
 181+ 979A 78                                   ld      a,b
 182+ 979B EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 183+ 979D B4                                   or      h
 184+ 979E 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 185+ 979F C9                                   ret
 186+ 97A0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 187+ 97A0 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 188+ 97A2 21 3F A0                             ld      hl,varDust
 189+ 97A5 CD A1 96     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 190+ 97A8 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 191+ 97AA C9                                   ret
 192+ 97AB              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 193+ 97AB 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 194+ 97AD 21 3F A0                             ld      hl,varDust
 195+ 97B0 CD DF 96     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 196+ 97B3 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 197+ 97B5 C9                                   ret
 198+ 97B6              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 199+ 97B6 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 200+ 97B8 FD 21 3F A0                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 201+ 97BC C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 202+ 97BD FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 203+ 97C0 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 204+ 97C1 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 205+ 97C3 3A E1 9D                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 206+ 97C6                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 206+ 97C6 A7          >                        and     a
 206+ 97C7 C2 CB 97    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 207+ 97CA 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 208+ 97CB 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 209+ 97CC 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 210+ 97CE CD 1B B2                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 211+ 97D1                                      ShiftHLRight1
 211+ 97D1 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 211+ 97D3 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 212+ 97D5                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 212+ 97D5 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 212+ 97D7 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 213+ 97D9 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 214+ 97DA F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 215+ 97DC DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 216+ 97DE FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 216+ 97E2 66 05
 217+ 97E4 ED 5B E2 9D                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 218+ 97E8 CD 25 97                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned
 219+ 97EB                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 219+ 97EB CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 219+ 97ED C2 42 99    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 220+ 97F0 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 220+ 97F4 74 05
 221+ 97F6 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 221+ 97FA 66 01
 222+ 97FC 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 223+ 97FD E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 224+ 97FF 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 225+ 9800 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 226+ 9802 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 227+ 9804 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 228+ 9805 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 229+ 9807 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 230+ 9808 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 231+ 9809 CD 66 97                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 232+ 980C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 233+ 980D E6 7F                                and     $7F
 234+ 980F                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 234+ 980F FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 234+ 9811 D2 42 99    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 235+ 9814 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 235+ 9818 74 01
 236+ 981A FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 236+ 981E 66 03
 237+ 9820 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 238+ 9821 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 239+ 9823 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 240+ 9824 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 241+ 9826 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 242+ 9828 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 243+ 9829 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 244+ 982B B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 245+ 982C 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 246+ 982D CD 66 97                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 247+ 9830 7C                                   ld      a,h
 248+ 9831 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 249+ 9833                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 249+ 9833 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 249+ 9835 D2 42 99    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 250+ 9838 7C                                   ld      a,h
 251+ 9839 E6 80                                and     $80
 252+ 983B 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 253+ 983D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 254+ 983E                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 254+ 983E FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 254+ 9840 D2 42 99    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 255+ 9843 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 255+ 9847 74 03
 256+ 9849              ; Now roll
 257+ 9849              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 258+ 9849 2A FC 9C     .XRoll:                 ld      hl,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 259+ 984C 7D                                   ld      a,l
 260+ 984D FE 00                                cp      0
 261+ 984F 28 4C                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 262+ 9851                                      ;break
 263+ 9851                                      ;ld      a,$80
 264+ 9851                                      ;xor     l                                   ; l = flipped sign as we are rotating stars not us
 265+ 9851 E5                                   push    hl
 266+ 9852 7C                                   ld      a,h
 267+ 9853 E6 80                                and     $80
 268+ 9855 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 269+ 9856 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 270+ 9857 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 271+ 985A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 272+ 985B E6 80                                and     $80
 273+ 985D 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 274+ 985E 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 275+ 985F E6 7F                                and     $7F
 276+ 9861 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 277+ 9862 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 278+ 9864 79                                   ld      a,c
 279+ 9865 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 280+ 9866 B2                                   or      d
 281+ 9867 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 282+ 9868 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 282+ 986C 66 01
 283+ 986E CD 25 97                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 284+ 9871 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 284+ 9875 74 01
 285+ 9877              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 286+ 9877              .YRoll:                 ;break
 287+ 9877 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 288+ 9878 7C                                   ld      a,h
 289+ 9879 E6 80                                and     $80
 290+ 987B 4F           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 291+ 987C 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 292+ 987D FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 293+ 9880 5F                                   ld      e,a
 294+ 9881 E6 80                                and     $80
 295+ 9883 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 296+ 9884 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 297+ 9885 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 298+ 9887 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 299+ 9888 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 300+ 988A 79                                   ld      a,c
 301+ 988B A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 302+ 988C B2                                   or      d
 303+ 988D 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 304+ 988E FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 304+ 9892 66 03
 305+ 9894 CD 66 97                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 306+ 9897 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 306+ 989B 74 03
 307+ 989D 3A F0 9C     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 308+ 98A0 FE 00                                cp      0
 309+ 98A2 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 310+ 98A4              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 311+ 98A4 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 312+ 98A5 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 313+ 98A8 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 314+ 98A9 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 315+ 98AB 5F                                   ld      e,a
 316+ 98AC ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 317+ 98AE                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 317+ 98AE CB 23       >			   sla e
 317+ 98B0 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 318+ 98B2 3A F2 9C                             ld      a,(BET2FLIP)                        ; get inverted Sign
 319+ 98B5 B2                                   or      d
 320+ 98B6 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 321+ 98B7 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 321+ 98BB 66 03
 322+ 98BD CD 66 97                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned
 323+ 98C0 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 323+ 98C4 74 03
 324+ 98C6              ; now work out screen pos
 325+ 98C6              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 326+ 98C6              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 327+ 98C6              ;        pop     de
 328+ 98C6               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 329+ 98C6                                      ;pop     de
 330+ 98C6              .NoPitch:
 331+ 98C6 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 332+ 98C9 6F                                   ld      l,a
 333+ 98CA E6 7F                                and     $7F
 334+ 98CC                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 334+ 98CC CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 334+ 98CE C2 D7 98    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 335+ 98D1 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 336+ 98D3 4F                                   ld      c,a
 337+ 98D4 C3 DC 98                             jp      StarDoneX
 338+ 98D7 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 339+ 98D8 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 340+ 98DA 90                                   sub     b
 341+ 98DB 4F                                   ld      c,a
 342+ 98DC FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 343+ 98DF 6F                                   ld      l,a
 344+ 98E0 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 345+ 98E2                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 345+ 98E2 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 345+ 98E4 C2 ED 98    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 346+ 98E7 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 347+ 98E9 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 98EA C3 F2 98                             jp      StarDoneY
 349+ 98ED 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 350+ 98EE 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 351+ 98F0 90                                   sub     b
 352+ 98F1 47                                   ld      b,a
 353+ 98F2 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 354+ 98F4 C5                                   push    bc
 355+ 98F5              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 355+ 98F5 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 355+ 98F9 CD 37 E1       call    l2_plot_pixel
 356+ 98FC FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 357+ 98FF C1                                   pop    bc
 358+ 9900                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 358+ 9900 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 358+ 9902 D2 32 99    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 359+ 9905 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 360+ 9907 0C                                   inc     c
 361+ 9908 C5                                   push    bc
 362+ 9909                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 362+ 9909 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 363+ 990D CD 37 E1                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 364+ 9910 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 365+ 9913 C1                                   pop    bc
 366+ 9914                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 366+ 9914 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 366+ 9916 D2 32 99    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 367+ 9919 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 368+ 991B 04                                   inc     b
 369+ 991C C5                                   push    bc
 370+ 991D                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 370+ 991D ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 370+ 9921 CD 37 E1         call    l2_plot_pixel
 371+ 9924 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 372+ 9927 C1                                   pop    bc
 373+ 9928 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 374+ 992A 0D                                   dec     c
 375+ 992B                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 375+ 992B ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 375+ 992F CD 37 E1         call    l2_plot_pixel
 376+ 9932 C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 377+ 9933 FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 378+ 9935 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 379+ 9936 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 380+ 993A E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 381+ 993B FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 382+ 993D 05                                   dec     b
 383+ 993E C2 BC 97                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 384+ 9941 C9                                   ret
 385+ 9942 C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 386+ 9943 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 387+ 9945 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 388+ 9946 CD A1 96                             call    InitStarAtHL
 389+ 9949 C3 33 99                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 390+ 994C              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 391+ 994C FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 392+ 994F FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 393+ 9952 6F                                   ld      l,a
 394+ 9953 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 395+ 9955 47                                   ld      b,a
 396+ 9956 CD 80 B1                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 397+ 9959 7D                                   ld      a,l
 398+ 995A                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 398+ 995A CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 398+ 995C C2 67 99    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 399+ 995F              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 400+ 995F 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 401+ 9961 26 00                                ld          h,0
 402+ 9963 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 403+ 9964 C3 6E 99                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 404+ 9967              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 405+ 9967 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 406+ 9969 26 00                                ld          h,0
 407+ 996B                                      ClearCarryFlag
 407+ 996B B7          >                        or a
 408+ 996C ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 409+ 996E              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 410+ 996E 7D                                   ld          a,l
 411+ 996F 32 97 A0                             ld          (varStarX),a
 412+ 9972 C9                                   ret
 413+ 9973
 414+ 9973 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 415+ 9976 FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 416+ 9979 6F                                   ld          l,a
 417+ 997A E6 7F                                and         $7F
 418+ 997C 47                                   ld          b,a
 419+ 997D CD 80 B1                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 420+ 9980 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 421+ 9981                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 421+ 9981 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 421+ 9983 C2 8E 99    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 422+ 9986                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 423+ 9986 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 424+ 9988                                      ClearCarryFlag
 424+ 9988 B7          >                        or a
 425+ 9989 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 426+ 998B C3 93 99                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 427+ 998E              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 428+ 998E 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 429+ 9990 26 00                                ld          h,0
 430+ 9992 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 431+ 9993              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 432+ 9993 7D                                   ld          a,l
 433+ 9994 32 98 A0                             ld          (varStarY),a
 434+ 9997 C9                                   ret
 435+ 9998
 436+ 9998
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm

 625  9998                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 9998
   2+ 9998 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 9999 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 999D 7D
   4+ 999E 98 99        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 99A0 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 99A2 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 99A5 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 99A7 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 99AB              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 99AB
  11+ 99AB              memfill_dma:
  12+ 99AB              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 99AB              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 99AB 32 98 99     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 99AE              .set_target:
  16+ 99AE 22 A5 99     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 99B1              .set_length:
  18+ 99B1 ED 53 A0 99  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 99B5              .write_dma:
  20+ 99B5 21 99 99     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 99B8 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 99BA 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 99BC ED B3        	otir
  24+ 99BE C9           	ret
  25+ 99BF
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 626  99BF                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 99BF
   2+ 99BF 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 99C3 7D
   3+ 99C4 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 99C6 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 99C8 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 99CB 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 99CD 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 99D1              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 99D1
  10+ 99D1              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 99D1              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 99D1              .set_target:
  13+ 99D1 22 CB 99     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 99D4              .set_source:
  15+ 99D4 ED 53 C4 99  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 99D8              .set_length:
  17+ 99D8 ED 43 C6 99  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 99DC              .write_dma:
  19+ 99DC 21 BF 99     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 99DF 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 99E1 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 99E3 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 99E5 C9           	ret
  24+ 99E6

  35+ 99F5              ;   EscapePod  Inventory   Status        MarketPrices   LocalChart  RollRight   RolLLeft                EnergyBomb  Quit

  38+ 99F5              ;   30         31          32            33             34          Right       36          37          EnergyBomb  39
  39+ 99F5              ;   VK_ENTER   VK_L,       VK_K,         VK_J,          VK_H,       VK_SPACE    VK_SYM,     VK_M,       VK_N,       VK_B
  40+ 99F5              ;              Launch                    Distance       Hyperspace  Laser                               DockComp    BuyCargo
  41+ 99F5              ;              ResumeGame
  42+ 99F5
  43+ 99F5              ; You can read address to check keystate by address KeyboardMap + c_Pressed corresponding key. There is also an addr_ helper too
  44+ 99F5
  45+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Front         equ 0  * 2
  46+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Aft           equ 1  * 2
  47+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Left          equ 2  * 2
  48+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Right         equ 3  * 2
  49+ 99F5              c_Pressed_RollLeft      equ 4  * 2
  50+ 99F5              c_Pressed_RollRight     equ 5  * 2
  51+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Dive          equ 6  * 2
  52+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Climb         equ 7  * 2
  53+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Accellerate   equ 8  * 2
  54+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Decellerate   equ 9  * 2
  55+ 99F5              c_Pressed_FireLaser     equ 10 * 2
  56+ 99F5              c_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ 11 * 2
  57+ 99F5              c_Pressed_FireMissile   equ 12 * 2
  58+ 99F5              c_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ 13 * 2
  59+ 99F5              c_Pressed_ECM           equ 14 * 2
  60+ 99F5              c_Pressed_EnergyBomb    equ 15 * 2
  61+ 99F5              c_Pressed_EscapePod     equ 16 * 2
  62+ 99F5              c_Pressed_DockingComp   equ 17 * 2
  63+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Hyperspace    equ 18 * 2
  64+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Distance      equ 19 * 2
  65+ 99F5              c_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ 20 * 2
  66+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Launch        equ 21 * 2
  67+ 99F5              c_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ 22 * 2
  68+ 99F5              c_Pressed_SellCargo     equ 23 * 2
  69+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Equip         equ 24 * 2
  70+ 99F5              c_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ 25 * 2
  71+ 99F5              c_Pressed_LocalChart    equ 26 * 2
  72+ 99F5              c_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ 27 * 2
  73+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Status        equ 28 * 2
  74+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Inventory     equ 29 * 2
  75+ 99F5              c_Pressed_GameSkip      equ 30 * 2
  76+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Save          equ 31 * 2
  77+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Freeze        equ 32 * 2
  78+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Resume        equ 33 * 2
  79+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Recentre      equ 34 * 2
  80+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Quit          equ 35 * 2
  81+ 99F5              c_Pressed_PlanetData    equ 36 * 2
  82+ 99F5              c_Pressed_CursorUp      equ 37 * 2
  83+ 99F5              c_Pressed_CursorDown    equ 38 * 2
  84+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Find          equ 39 * 2
  85+ 99F5              c_Pressed_Yes           equ 40 * 2
  86+ 99F5              c_Pressed_No            equ 41 * 2

  88+ 99F5
  89+ 99F5              ; half row 1
  90+ 99F5              VK_CAPS  				equ 0
  91+ 99F5              VK_Z  					equ 1
  92+ 99F5              VK_X  					equ 2
  93+ 99F5              VK_C  					equ 3
  94+ 99F5              VK_V  					equ 4
  95+ 99F5              ; half row 2
  96+ 99F5              VK_A  					equ 5
  97+ 99F5              VK_S  					equ 6
  98+ 99F5              VK_D  					equ 7
  99+ 99F5              VK_F  					equ 8

 101+ 99F5              ; half row 3
 102+ 99F5              VK_Q  					equ 10
 103+ 99F5              VK_W  					equ 11
 104+ 99F5              VK_E  					equ 12
 105+ 99F5              VK_R  					equ 13
 106+ 99F5              VK_T  					equ 14
 107+ 99F5              ; half row 4
 108+ 99F5              VK_1  					equ 15
 109+ 99F5              VK_2  					equ 16
 110+ 99F5              VK_3  					equ 17
 111+ 99F5              VK_4  					equ 18
 112+ 99F5              VK_5  					equ 19
 113+ 99F5              ; half row 5
 114+ 99F5              VK_0 					equ 20
 115+ 99F5              VK_9 					equ 21
 116+ 99F5              VK_8 					equ 22
 117+ 99F5              VK_7 					equ 23
 118+ 99F5              VK_6 					equ 24
 119+ 99F5              ; half row 6

 141+ 99F5              KeyCode_Left         	equ VK_3
 142+ 99F5              KeyCode_Right        	equ VK_4
 143+ 99F5              KeyCode_RollLeft     	equ VK_O
 144+ 99F5              KeyCode_RollRight    	equ VK_P
 145+ 99F5              KeyCode_Dive         	equ VK_Q
 146+ 99F5              KeyCode_Climb        	equ VK_A
 147+ 99F5              KeyCode_Accellerate  	equ VK_W
 148+ 99F5              KeyCode_Decellerate  	equ VK_S

 155+ 99F5              KeyCode_EnergyBomb   	equ VK_U

 157+ 99F5              KeyCode_DockingComp  	equ VK_N

 159+ 99F5              KeyCode_Distance     	equ VK_J
 160+ 99F5              KeyCode_HomeCursor   	equ VK_G
 161+ 99F5              KeyCode_Launch       	equ VK_L
 162+ 99F5              KeyCode_BuyCargo     	equ VK_B
 163+ 99F5              KeyCode_SellCargo    	equ VK_V
 164+ 99F5              KeyCode_Equip        	equ VK_C
 165+ 99F5              KeyCode_GalacticChrt 	equ VK_5
 166+ 99F5              KeyCode_LocalChart   	equ VK_6
 167+ 99F5              KeyCode_MarketPrices 	equ VK_7
 168+ 99F5              KeyCode_Status       	equ VK_8
 169+ 99F5              KeyCode_Inventory    	equ VK_9
 170+ 99F5              KeyCode_GameSkip     	equ VK_Z
 171+ 99F5              KeyCode_Save         	equ VK_O
 172+ 99F5              KeyCode_Freeze       	equ VK_B
 173+ 99F5              KeyCode_Resume       	equ VK_L
 174+ 99F5              KeyCode_Recentre     	equ VK_D
 175+ 99F5              KeyCode_Quit         	equ VK_Y
 176+ 99F5              KeyCode_PlanetData   	equ VK_0
 177+ 99F5              KeyCode_CursorUp        equ VK_Q
 178+ 99F5              KeyCode_CursorDown      equ VK_A
 179+ 99F5              KeyCode_PressedYes      equ VK_Y
 180+ 99F5              KeyCode_PressedNo       equ VK_N
 181+ 99F5
 182+ 99F5 00 00 00...  Keys					DS	40          ; This is the list of key states for all the VK keys presssed i.e. VK_CAPS through to VK_B
 183+ 9A1D              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 184+ 9A1D 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 185+ 9A25 FE FD FB F7  KeyAddrTab				DB	$FE, $FD, $FB, $F7, $EF, $DF, $BF, $7F
 185+ 9A29 EF DF BF 7F
 186+ 9A2D              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 187+ 9A2D              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 188+ 9A2D              ; key list sequence is in table above
 189+ 9A2D 04 9A 05 9A  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 189+ 9A31 06 9A 07 9A
 189+ 9A35 0F 9A
 190+ 9A37 0E 9A FF 99                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 190+ 9A3B FA 99 00 9A
 190+ 9A3F FB 99
 191+ 9A41 18 9A 03 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM
 191+ 9A45 FD 99 02 9A
 191+ 9A49 01 9A
 192+ 9A4B 11 9A F5 99                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_EnergyBomb   ,Keys+KeyCode_EscapePod    ,Keys+KeyCode_DockingComp  ,Keys+KeyCode_Hyperspace   ,Keys+KeyCode_Distance
 192+ 9A4F 1B 9A 17 9A
 192+ 9A53 16 9A
 193+ 9A55 FE 99 14 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_HomeCursor   ,Keys+KeyCode_Launch       ,Keys+KeyCode_BuyCargo     ,Keys+KeyCode_SellCargo    ,Keys+KeyCode_Equip
 193+ 9A59 1C 9A F9 99
 193+ 9A5D F8 99
 194+ 9A5F 08 9A 0D 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GalacticChrt ,Keys+KeyCode_LocalChart   ,Keys+KeyCode_MarketPrices ,Keys+KeyCode_Status       ,Keys+KeyCode_Inventory
 194+ 9A63 0C 9A 0B 9A
 194+ 9A67 0A 9A
 195+ 9A69 F6 99 0F 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GameSkip     ,Keys+KeyCode_Save         ,Keys+KeyCode_Freeze       ,Keys+KeyCode_Resume       ,Keys+KeyCode_Recentre
 195+ 9A6D 1C 9A 14 9A
 195+ 9A71 FC 99
 196+ 9A73 12 9A 09 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_Quit         ,Keys+KeyCode_PlanetData   ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorUp     ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorDown   ,Keys+KeyCode_Find
 196+ 9A77 FF 99 FA 99
 196+ 9A7B FD 99
 197+ 9A7D 12 9A 1B 9A                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_PressedYes   ,Keys+KeyCode_PressedNo
 198+ 9A81
 199+ 9A81 23 5A 58 43  ASCII_Map:              DB "#","Z","X","C","V"
 199+ 9A85 56
 200+ 9A86 41 53 44 46                          DB "A","S","D","F","G"
 200+ 9A8A 47
 201+ 9A8B 51 57 45 52                          DB "Q","W","E","R","T"
 201+ 9A8F 54
 202+ 9A90 31 32 33 34                          DB "1","2","3","4","5"
 202+ 9A94 35
 203+ 9A95 30 39 38 37                          DB "0","9","8","7","6"
 203+ 9A99 36
 204+ 9A9A 50 4F 49 55                          DB "P","O","I","U","Y"
 204+ 9A9E 59
 205+ 9A9F 3E 4C 4B 4A                          DB ">","L","K","J","H"
 205+ 9AA3 48
 206+ 9AA4 20 5E 4D 4E                          DB " ","^","M","N","B"
 206+ 9AA8 42
 207+ 9AA9
 208+ 9AA9              ; mapping of a code to the lookup table Keyboard map. So if you are using an addr_Pressed you can then fetch from KeyboardMap the address in Keys
 209+ 9AA9              ; for the raw key press status
 210+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 211+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 212+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 213+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 214+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft
 215+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_RollRight     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollRight
 216+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Dive          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Dive
 217+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Climb         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Climb
 218+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Accellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Accellerate
 219+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Decellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Decellerate
 220+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_FireLaser     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireLaser
 221+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_TargetMissle
 222+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_FireMissile   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireMissile
 223+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_UnarmMissile
 224+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_ECM           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_ECM

 228+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Hyperspace    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Hyperspace
 229+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Distance      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Distance
 230+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_HomeCursor
 231+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 232+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 233+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 234+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 235+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 236+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 237+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 238+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 239+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 240+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 241+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save
 242+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Freeze        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Freeze
 243+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume
 244+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Recentre      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Recentre
 245+ 9AA9              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit
