 250+ 9AA9
 251+ 9AA9
 252+ 9AA9              MIsKeyPressed:          MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 253+ 9AA9 ~                                    ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 254+ 9AA9 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 255+ 9AA9 ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero   misstarget
 256+ 9AA9                                      ENDM
 257+ 9AA9
 258+ 9AA9 21 F5 99     init_keyboard:          ld		hl,Keys                         ; no key s are pressed by default
 259+ 9AAC 11 28 00                             ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen               ;
 260+ 9AAF 3E 00                                ld		a,0                             ;
 261+ 9AB1 CD AB 99                             call	memfill_dma                     ;
 262+ 9AB4 C9                                   ret                                     ;
 263+ 9AB5
 264+ 9AB5
 265+ 9AB5
 266+ 9AB5 DD 21 1D 9A  scan_keyboard:          ld		ix,RawKeys                      ; hl = table of raw IO port readings
 267+ 9AB9 21 25 9A                             ld		hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 268+ 9ABC 0E 08                                ld		c,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 269+ 9ABE 11 F5 99                             ld      de,Keys                         ; ix = table of key states from raw read
 270+ 9AC1 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 271+ 9AC2 DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 272+ 9AC4 DD 77 00                             ld      (ix+0),a                        ; save raw scan
 273+ 9AC7 DD 23                                inc     ix
 274+ 9AC9 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 275+ 9ACA 06 05        .ProcessInputBits:      ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 276+ 9ACC 1F           .ProcessBitsLoop:       rra                                     ; shit bit 0 into carry
 277+ 9ACD CB 47                                bit		0,a								; is bit set
 278+ 9ACF 30 08                                jr      nc,.SetKeyPressed               ; low bit means it was pressed
 279+ 9AD1 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 280+ 9AD3                                      ZeroA
 280+ 9AD3 AF          >                        xor a
 281+ 9AD4 C3 E1 9A                             jp      .SetKey
 282+ 9AD7 20 0B                                jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 283+ 9AD9 FD 6F        .SetKeyPressed:	        ld      iyl,a                           ; save current input byte
 284+ 9ADB 1A                                   ld      a,(de)                          ; get current keystate
 285+ 9ADC FE 02                                cp      2
 286+ 9ADE 28 02                                jr      z,.AlreadyHeld
 287+ 9AE0 3C                                   inc     a                               ; and increment by 1 as its moved from previous state
 288+ 9AE1 12           .SetKey:                ld		(de),a				  	        ; save key Pressed state
 289+ 9AE2 FD 7D        .AlreadyHeld:           ld      a,iyl                           ; and retrieve the current input byte
 290+ 9AE4 13           .SkipKeySet:	        inc		de								; move to next key
 291+ 9AE5 10 E5                                djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 292+ 9AE7 0D                                   dec     c                               ; thats one row of bits all processed
 293+ 9AE8 20 D7                                jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 294+ 9AEA C9                                   ret
 295+ 9AEB
 296+ 9AEB
 297+ 9AEB
 298+ 9AEB              GetKeyStateAddressDE:   MACRO
 299+ 9AEB ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 300+ 9AEB ~                                    add     hl,a
 301+ 9AEB ~                                    ld      e,(hl)
 302+ 9AEB ~                                    inc     hl
 303+ 9AEB ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                          ; now de = address in keypress list
 304+ 9AEB                                      ENDM
 305+ 9AEB
 306+ 9AEB              GetKeyStateAddressHL:   MACRO
 307+ 9AEB ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 308+ 9AEB ~                                    add     hl,a
 309+ 9AEB ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 310+ 9AEB ~                                    inc     hl
 311+ 9AEB ~                                    ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 312+ 9AEB ~                                    ld      l,a
 313+ 9AEB                                      ENDM
 314+ 9AEB
 315+ 9AEB
 316+ 9AEB              ;;old debug codeCurrentX            DB 0
 317+ 9AEB              ;;old debug codeCurrentY            DB 0
 318+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code
 319+ 9AEB              ;;old debug codedisplayKeyStatus:       xor         a
 320+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 321+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          hl,RawKeys
 322+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(hl)
 323+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        and         %00011111
 324+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          b,5
 325+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code.displayLoop:           push        bc,,hl
 326+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        rra
 327+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        jr          c,.displayNoPress
 328+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code.displayPress:          push        af
 329+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 330+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 331+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 332+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 333+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'*'
 334+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 335+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 336+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 337+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 338+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 339+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 340+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 341+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 342+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ret
 343+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code.displayNoPress:        push        af
 344+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 345+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 346+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 347+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 348+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'O'
 349+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 350+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 351+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 352+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 353+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 354+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 355+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 356+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 357+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ret
 358+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code
 359+ 9AEB              ;;old debug codedisplayDownStatus:      ld  a,(Keys+      KeyCode_CursorUp)
 360+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        cp  0
 361+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayNoUp
 362+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        cp  1
 363+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayUp
 364+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code.displayHeld:           ld      de,8*15
 365+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"*"
 366+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 367+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 368+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ret
 369+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code.displayUp:             ld      de,8*15
 370+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"+"
 371+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 372+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 373+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ret
 374+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code.displayNoUp:             ld      de,8*15
 375+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"O"
 376+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 377+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 378+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code                        ret
 379+ 9AEB              ;;old debug code
 380+ 9AEB
 381+ 9AEB
 382+ 9AEB              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan, waits until key gets to state 1, if it was already held then#
 383+ 9AEB              ; it will have to be let go to reset of 0 and scan again
 384+ 9AEB              ; Deprecated as not used as yet
 385+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_press:   GetKeyStateAddressHL
 386+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 387+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 388+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 389+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 390+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 391+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfANENusng  1,.wait_loop             ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 392+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 393+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        ret
 394+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan waits until key gets to state 2
 395+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_held:    GetKeyStateAddressDE
 396+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 397+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 398+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 399+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 400+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 401+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  2, .wait_loop
 402+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 403+ 9AEB              ;;;;;;                        ret
 404+ 9AEB
 405+ 9AEB              ; Gets the current keystate of the c_Pressed Key in a register
 406+ 9AEB              get_key_a_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 406+ 9AEB 21 2D 9A    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 406+ 9AEE ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 406+ 9AF0 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 406+ 9AF1 23          >                        inc     hl
 406+ 9AF2 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 406+ 9AF3 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 407+ 9AF4 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 408+ 9AF5 C9                                   ret
 409+ 9AF6
 410+ 9AF6              ; sets they keystate of c pressed key in a register to 1 (pressed)
 411+ 9AF6              force_key_press:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; read key locations
 411+ 9AF6 21 2D 9A    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 411+ 9AF9 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 411+ 9AFB 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 411+ 9AFC 23          >                        inc     hl
 411+ 9AFD 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 411+ 9AFE 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 412+ 9AFF 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 413+ 9B01 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 414+ 9B02 C9                                   ret
 415+ 9B03
 416+ 9B03              is_key_up_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL
 416+ 9B03 21 2D 9A    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 416+ 9B06 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 416+ 9B08 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 416+ 9B09 23          >                        inc     hl
 416+ 9B0A 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 416+ 9B0B 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 417+ 9B0C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 418+ 9B0D FE 00                                cp      0
 419+ 9B0F C9                                   ret
 420+ 9B10
 421+ 9B10              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 422+ 9B10              is_key_pressed:         GetKeyStateAddressHL
 422+ 9B10 21 2D 9A    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 422+ 9B13 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 422+ 9B15 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 422+ 9B16 23          >                        inc     hl
 422+ 9B17 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 422+ 9B18 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 423+ 9B19 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 424+ 9B1A FE 01                                cp      1                               ; we cant just test bit 0 as this may have been held long
 425+ 9B1C C9                                   ret
 426+ 9B1D
 427+ 9B1D              ; returns nz is set if c_ key is held, if key was held then keystate would be 2 or 3, i.e. bit 1 set
 428+ 9B1D              is_key_held:            GetKeyStateAddressHL
 428+ 9B1D 21 2D 9A    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 428+ 9B20 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 428+ 9B22 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 428+ 9B23 23          >                        inc     hl
 428+ 9B24 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 428+ 9B25 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 429+ 9B26 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 430+ 9B27 E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 431+ 9B29 C9                                   ret
 432+ 9B2A
 433+ 9B2A              ; checks to see if any key is pressed in the key table
 434+ 9B2A 21 F5 99     is_any_key_pressed:     ld      hl,Keys
 435+ 9B2D 01 28 00                             ld      bc,40
 436+ 9B30 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 437+ 9B32 ED B1                                cpir                                    ; search for the value 1
 438+ 9B34 28 03                                jr      z,.KeyPressed                   ; if a key was pressed then handle press
 439+ 9B36                                      SetAFalse
 439+ 9B36 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 440+ 9B38 C9                                   ret
 441+ 9B39 3E 27        .KeyPressed:            ld      a,39                            ; so c will be how many keys still to scan
 442+ 9B3B 91                                   sub     c                               ; so a = 40 - c to get to result
 443+ 9B3C C9                                   ret
 444+ 9B3D
 445+ 9B3D 21 F5 99     is_any_key_held:        ld      hl,Keys
 446+ 9B40 06 28                                ld      b,40
 447+ 9B42 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 448+ 9B44 7E           .KeyReadLoop:           ld      a,(hl)
 449+ 9B45 E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 450+ 9B47 C2 51 9B                             jp      nz,.KeyPressed
 451+ 9B4A 23                                   inc     hl
 452+ 9B4B 0C                                   inc     c
 453+ 9B4C 10 F6                                djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 454+ 9B4E                                      SetAFalse
 454+ 9B4E 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 455+ 9B50 C9                                   ret
 456+ 9B51 79           .KeyPressed:            ld      a,c
 457+ 9B52 C9                                   ret
 458+ 9B53
 459+ 9B53
 460+ 9B53 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 461+ 9B71 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 462+ 9B72 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 463+ 9B73 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 464+ 9B74 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 465+ 9B75              InputLimit              EQU 20
 466+ 9B75
 467+ 9B75 21 53 9B     keyboard_copy_input_to_de:  ld      hl,InputString
 468+ 9B78 3A 72 9B                                 ld      a,(InputCursor)
 469+ 9B7B FE 00                                    cp      0
 470+ 9B7D 28 05                                    jr      z,.NoString
 471+ 9B7F 4F                                       ld      c,a
 472+ 9B80 06 00                                    ld      b,0
 473+ 9B82 ED B0                                    ldir
 474+ 9B84 3E 00        .NoString                   ld      a,0
 475+ 9B86 12                                       ld      (de),a
 476+ 9B87 C9                                       ret
 477+ 9B88
 478+ 9B88 AF           initInputText:          xor     a
 479+ 9B89 32 72 9B                             ld      (InputCursor),a
 480+ 9B8C                                      SetMemFalse EnterPressed
 480+ 9B8C 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 480+ 9B8E 32 73 9B    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 481+ 9B91                                      SetMemFalse InputChanged
 481+ 9B91 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 481+ 9B93 32 74 9B    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 482+ 9B96 21 53 9B                             ld      hl,InputString
 483+ 9B99 06 1E                                ld      b,30
 484+ 9B9B 77           .wipeloop:              ld      (hl),a
 485+ 9B9C 23                                   inc     hl
 486+ 9B9D 10 FC                                djnz    .wipeloop
 487+ 9B9F C9                                   ret
 488+ 9BA0
 489+ 9BA0              InputName:              SetMemFalse InputChanged
 489+ 9BA0 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 489+ 9BA2 32 74 9B    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 490+ 9BA5 CD 2A 9B                             call    is_any_key_pressed
 491+ 9BA8 FE FF                                cp      $FF
 492+ 9BAA C8                                   ret     z
 493+ 9BAB 4F           .KeyPressed:            ld      c,a
 494+ 9BAC 3A 72 9B                             ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 495+ 9BAF FE 14                                cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 496+ 9BB1 28 0B                                jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 497+ 9BB3 21 81 9A                             ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 498+ 9BB6 79                                   ld      a,c
 499+ 9BB7 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 500+ 9BB9 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 501+ 9BBA FE 41                                cp      "A"
 502+ 9BBC 30 0B                                jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 503+ 9BBE              ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 504+ 9BBE FE 20        .DeleteOrEnterOnly      cp      " "                             ; if space was  pressed (mapped to Hash in ASCII table))
 505+ 9BC0 28 33                                jr      z,.SpacePressed               ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 506+ 9BC2 FE 3E                                cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 507+ 9BC4 28 19                                jr      z,.EnterPressed
 508+ 9BC6 FE 23                                cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 509+ 9BC8 C9                                   ret
 510+ 9BC9 47           .AlphaPressed:          ld      b,a
 511+ 9BCA 3A 72 9B                             ld      a,(InputCursor)
 512+ 9BCD 4F                                   ld      c,a
 513+ 9BCE 21 53 9B                             ld      hl,InputString
 514+ 9BD1 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 515+ 9BD3 78                                   ld      a,b
 516+ 9BD4 70                                   ld      (hl),b
 517+ 9BD5 79                                   ld      a,c
 518+ 9BD6 21 72 9B                             ld      hl,InputCursor
 519+ 9BD9 34                                   inc     (hl)
 520+ 9BDA                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 520+ 9BDA AF          >                        xor     a
 520+ 9BDB 32 74 9B    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 521+ 9BDE C9                                   ret
 522+ 9BDF 3A 72 9B     .EnterPressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)
 523+ 9BE2 21 53 9B                             ld      hl,InputString
 524+ 9BE5 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 525+ 9BE7                                      ZeroA
 525+ 9BE7 AF          >                        xor a
 526+ 9BE8 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 527+ 9BE9                                      SetMemTrue EnterPressed
 527+ 9BE9 AF          >                        xor     a
 527+ 9BEA 32 73 9B    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 528+ 9BED                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 528+ 9BED AF          >                        xor     a
 528+ 9BEE 32 74 9B    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 529+ 9BF1 CD A9 9A                             call    init_keyboard           ; Flush keyboard status so futher inputs don't auto read the enter key as a second press
 530+ 9BF4 C9                                   ret
 531+ 9BF5 3A 72 9B     .SpacePressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)         ; Space = delete
 532+ 9BF8 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; if input is zero length then can not delete
 533+ 9BFA C8                                   ret     z
 534+ 9BFB 3D                                   dec     a                       ; move back one and update cursor pos
 535+ 9BFC 32 72 9B                             ld      (InputCursor),a         ;
 536+ 9BFF 21 53 9B                             ld      hl,InputString          ; now update end of line to null
 537+ 9C02 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 538+ 9C04                                      ZeroA                           ; .
 538+ 9C04 AF          >                        xor a
 539+ 9C05 77                                   ld      (hl),a                  ; .
 540+ 9C06                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 540+ 9C06 AF          >                        xor     a
 540+ 9C07 32 74 9B    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 541+ 9C0A C9                                   ret
 542+ 9C0B
 543+ 9C0B              TargetMissileTest:      JumpIfMemZero NbrMissiles,      .ClearTargetting
 543+ 9C0B 3A 50 9E    >                        ld  a,(NbrMissiles)
 543+ 9C0E A7          >                        and a
 543+ 9C0F CA 26 9C    >                        jp  z,.ClearTargetting
 544+ 9C12 3A E5 A0                             ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)   ; if we are comitted to launch
 545+ 9C15 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                         ; then don't scan
 546+ 9C17 C8                                   ret     z                           ; as it will be cleared on launch
 547+ 9C18 3E 16        .ScanForKey:            ld      a,c_Pressed_TargetMissle    ; if not pressed we are done
 548+ 9C1A CD 10 9B                             call    is_key_pressed              ; .
 549+ 9C1D C0                                   ret     nz                          ; .
 550+ 9C1E 3A E5 A0     .TargetPressed:         ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)   ; get flag back
 551+ 9C21                                      JumpIfAEqNusng StageMissileNoTarget, .SetTargetting
 551+ 9C21 FE FF       >                        cp     StageMissileNoTarget
 551+ 9C23 CA 2C 9C    >                        jp      z,.SetTargetting
 552+ 9C26              .ClearTargetting:       SetMemToN   MissileTargettingFlag, StageMissileNoTarget
 552+ 9C26 3E FF       >                        ld      a,StageMissileNoTarget
 552+ 9C28 32 E5 A0    >                        ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 553+ 9C2B C9                                   ret
 554+ 9C2C              .SetTargetting:         SetMemToN   MissileTargettingFlag, StageMissileTargeting
 554+ 9C2C 3E FE       >                        ld      a,StageMissileTargeting
 554+ 9C2E 32 E5 A0    >                        ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 555+ 9C31 C9                                   ret
 556+ 9C32
 557+ 9C32 AF           MovementKeyTest:        xor     a
 558+ 9C33 32 D1 9E                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 559+ 9C36 3A F0 9D                             ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 560+ 9C39 E6 FC                                and     $FC
 561+ 9C3B 20 26                                jr      nz,CursorKeys
 562+ 9C3D 2A 3B 9A     ClimbDiveKeys:          ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 563+ 9C40 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 564+ 9C41                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanDiveKey
 564+ 9C41 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 564+ 9C42 CA 50 9C    >                        jp	    z, ScanDiveKey
 565+ 9C45 3A D1 9E                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 566+ 9C48 F6 80                                or      $80
 567+ 9C4A 32 D1 9E                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 568+ 9C4D C3 86 9C                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 569+ 9C50 2A 39 9A     ScanDiveKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)
 570+ 9C53 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 571+ 9C54                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 571+ 9C54 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 571+ 9C55 CA 86 9C    >                        jp	    z, ScanLeftKey
 572+ 9C58 3A D1 9E                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 573+ 9C5B F6 40                                or      $40
 574+ 9C5D 32 D1 9E                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 575+ 9C60 C3 86 9C                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 576+ 9C63 2A 77 9A     CursorKeys:             ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)
 577+ 9C66 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 578+ 9C67                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanCursorDownKey
 578+ 9C67 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 578+ 9C68 CA 76 9C    >                        jp	    z, ScanCursorDownKey
 579+ 9C6B 3A D1 9E                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 580+ 9C6E F6 80                                or      $80
 581+ 9C70 32 D1 9E                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 582+ 9C73 C3 86 9C                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 583+ 9C76 2A 79 9A     ScanCursorDownKey:      ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 584+ 9C79 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 585+ 9C7A                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 585+ 9C7A A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 585+ 9C7B CA 86 9C    >                        jp	    z, ScanLeftKey
 586+ 9C7E 3A D1 9E                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 587+ 9C81 F6 40                                or      $40
 588+ 9C83 32 D1 9E                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 589+ 9C86 2A 35 9A     ScanLeftKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 590+ 9C89 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 591+ 9C8A                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRightKey
 591+ 9C8A A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 591+ 9C8B CA 97 9C    >                        jp	    z, ScanRightKey
 592+ 9C8E 3A D1 9E                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 593+ 9C91 F6 20                                or      $20
 594+ 9C93 32 D1 9E                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 595+ 9C96 C9                                   ret
 596+ 9C97 2A 37 9A     ScanRightKey:           ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 597+ 9C9A 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 598+ 9C9B                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanHomeKey
 598+ 9C9B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 598+ 9C9C CA A8 9C    >                        jp	    z, ScanHomeKey
 599+ 9C9F 3A D1 9E                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 600+ 9CA2 F6 10                                or      $10
 601+ 9CA4 32 D1 9E                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 602+ 9CA7 C9                                   ret
 603+ 9CA8 2A 55 9A     ScanHomeKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 604+ 9CAB 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 605+ 9CAC                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRecentreKey
 605+ 9CAC A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 605+ 9CAD CA B9 9C    >                        jp	    z, ScanRecentreKey
 606+ 9CB0 3A D1 9E                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 607+ 9CB3 F6 08                                or      $08
 608+ 9CB5 32 D1 9E                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 609+ 9CB8 C9                                   ret
 610+ 9CB9 2A 71 9A     ScanRecentreKey:        ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Recentre)
 611+ 9CBC 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 612+ 9CBD                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 612+ 9CBD A7          >                        and     a
 612+ 9CBE C8          >                        ret     z
 613+ 9CBF 3A D1 9E                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 614+ 9CC2 F6 04                                or      $04
 615+ 9CC4 32 D1 9E                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 616+ 9CC7 C9                                   ret

 122+ 9CC8              ; Ship Data
 123+ 9CC8              ;;;;	.XX21	\ -> &5600 \ Table of pointers to ships' data given to XX0
 124+ 9CC8              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen
 125+ 9CC8              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  2 is #SST  Space Station, Coriolis or Dodo.
 126+ 9CC8              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  3 is #ESC  Escape capsule

 132+ 9CC8              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  9 is #SHU  Shuttle
 133+ 9CC8              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 10 is       Transporter
 134+ 9CC8              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 11 is #CYL  Cobra Mk III,  Boa

 313+ 9EED 00           PresentSystemX			DB	0				; System we are currently in
 314+ 9EEE 00           PresentSystemY			DB  0				; System we are currently in
 315+ 9EEF 00           TargetSystemX			DB	0				; System we are targeting for jump
 316+ 9EF0 00           TargetSystemY			DB	0				; System we are targeting for jump
 317+ 9EF1 00           GovPresentSystem		DB	0				; 03AE Govenment
 318+ 9EF2 00           TekPresentSystem		DB	0				; 03AF Technology
 319+ 9EF3
 320+ 9EF3 00           CompassColor			DB	0				; 03C5
 321+ 9EF4 00           SoundToggle				DB	0				; 03C6
 322+ 9EF5 00           KeyboardRecenterToggle	DB	0				; 03C8
 323+ 9EF6 00           PATGMask				DB	0				; &03C9    \ PATG	\ Mask to scan keyboard X-key, for misjump
 324+ 9EF7 00           FlashToggle				DB  0				; 03CA \ FLH \ flash toggle
 325+ 9EF8 00           ReverseJoystick			DB	0				; 03CB \ JSTGY \ Y reverse joystick Y channel
 326+ 9EF9 00           JoystickToggle			DB	0				; 03CD  \ JSTK    \ K toggle keyboard/joystick
 327+ 9EFA 00           DigitalJoystick			DB	0				; 03CE \ JDB   \ . = toggle between keyboard and bitpaddle
 328+ 9EFB 00           DiskReadFailFlag		DB	0				; 03CF \ CATF \ Disk catalog fail flag
 329+ 9EFC
 330+ 9EFC              ; Working Data
 331+ 9EFC
 332+ 9EFC              ;UniverseTable			DS	26				; 1741  \ address pointers for 13 ships INF on pages &9. 37 bytes each.
 333+ 9EFC              ; $0900 =	EQUW page9+37* 0 \ copied to inner worskpace INWK on zero-page when needed
 334+ 9EFC              ; $0925 =	EQUW page9+37* 1
 335+ 9EFC              ; $094A =	EQUW page9+37* 2
 336+ 9EFC              ; $096F =	EQUW page9+37* 3
 337+ 9EFC              ; $0994 =	EQUW page9+37* 4
 338+ 9EFC              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 339+ 9EFC              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 340+ 9EFC              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 341+ 9EFC              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 342+ 9EFC              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9
 343+ 9EFC              ; $0A72 =	EQUW page9+37*10
 344+ 9EFC              ; $0A97 =	EQUW page9+37*11
 345+ 9EFC              ; $0ABC =	EQUW page9+37*12 \ allwk up to &0ABC while heap for edges working down from &CFF.
 346+ 9EFC
 347+ 9EFC
 348+ 9EFC
 349+ 9EFC              ; 0b00 is start address of data to save
 350+ 9EFC              ; Now MissionData VarTP					DB	0				; 0358 TP? The Plan  \ mission uses lower 4 bits
 351+ 9EFC              											; Bit mask XXXX10XX - Thargoid plan mission
 352+ 9EFC
 353+ 9EFC 00           MissionData				DB	0				; &0B00	  \ look at data, first byte is TP mission bits
 354+ 9EFD
 355+ 9EFD 00 00        FileNameStringPointer	DW	0				;0C00	   \ pointer to filename string
 356+ 9EFF 00 00        CommanderLoadAddress	DW	0				;0C03
 357+ 9F01 00 00        LengthOfFile			DW	0				;0C0B
 358+ 9F03 00 00        SaveDataEndAddress		DW	0				;&0C0F	      \ &0C00 is end address of data to save
 359+ 9F05
 360+ 9F05 00 00 00...  EdgesBuffer				DS 50
 361+ 9F37              EdgesBufferSP			equ	$				; Was $0CFF			; Heap pointer for edges buffer
 362+ 9F37              ShipLinesBufferSP		equ EdgesBufferSP	; was $0CFF
 363+ 9F37
 364+ 9F37 00 00 00...  ShipLineStack			DS  70			; For now but will be in the page later
 365+ 9F7D              ShipLineStackTop		equ $ - ShipLineStack
 366+ 9F7D
 367+ 9F7D 00 00 00...  LSO						DS 	$C0				;0E00 Line Buffer Solar of 192 lines (may be 191 in reality)
 368+ A03D              ; LSX vector overlaps with LSO
 369+ A03D 00           LSX2					DB	0				; &0EC0	    \ LSX2 bline buffer size?
 370+ A03E 00           LSY2					DB	0           	; &0F0E	    \ LSY2
 371+ A03F
 372+ A03F              ; Star Positions are 16 bit 3d coordinates
 373+ A03F 00 00 00...  varDust                 DS  MaxNumberOfStars * 6
 374+ A081 00 00 00...  varDustSceen            DS  MaxNumberOfStars * 2 ; To optimise star list to wipe from screen
 375+ A097 00           varStarX                DB  0
 376+ A098 00           varStarY                DB  0
 377+ A099 00 00 00...  varDustX                DS MaxNumberOfStars *2
 378+ A0AF 00 00 00...  varDustY                DS MaxNumberOfStars *2
 379+ A0C5 00 00 00...  varDustZ                DS MaxNumberOfStars *2
 380+ A0DB              ; -- Player Runtime Data
 381+ A0DB 00           GunTemperature          DB  0
 382+ A0DC 00           CabinTemperature        DB  0
 383+ A0DD 00           PlayerForwardSheild0	DB	0 ; ?????
 384+ A0DE 00           PlayerForwardSheild1    DB	0
 385+ A0DF 00           PlayerForwardSheild2    DB	0
 386+ A0E0 00           ForeShield				DB	0				; These three must be contiguous
 387+ A0E1 00           AftShield				DB	0				; .
 388+ A0E2 00           PlayerEnergy			DB	0				; and in this order
 389+ A0E3 00           CompassX				DB	0				; 03A8
 390+ A0E4 00           CompassY				DB	0				; 03A9
 391+ A0E5              ; Simplification of missile targetting
 392+ A0E5              ; $FF no missile targettting enabled
 393+ A0E5              ; $FE missile targetting, no target selected
 394+ A0E5              ; bit 7 set then tagetting and lower nibble holds missile target and launching
 395+ A0E5              ; bit 7 clear launch at selected target in lower nibble
 396+ A0E5 00           MissileTargettingFlag   DB  0
 397+ A0E6              ;;MissileTarget			DB  0				; 45
 398+ A0E6              ;;MissileLaunchFlag       DB  0
 399+ A0E6 00 00 00...  CommanderName           DS  15
 400+ A0F5 00           CommanderName0			DB	0				; Sneaky little 0 to allow use of print name directly
 401+ A0F6 00           BadnessStatus           DB  0
 402+ A0F7              ;note rapidly changing views could reset these so need to consider it in an array
 403+ A0F7              ; LaserType
 404+ A0F7              ; LaserPulseRate                          ; how many pulses can be fired before long pause
 405+ A0F7              ; LaserPulsePause                         ; time before next pulse - 0 = beam
 406+ A0F7              ; LaserPulseRest                          ; time before pulse count resets to 0
 407+ A0F7              ; LaserDamageOutput                       ; amount of damage for a laser hit
 408+ A0F7              ; LaserEnergyDrain                        ; amount of energy drained by cycle
 409+ A0F7              ; LaserHeat                               ; amount of heat generated
 410+ A0F7              ; LaserDurability                         ; probabability out of 255 that a hit on unshielded will add random amount of damage
 411+ A0F7              ; LaserDurabilityAmount                   ; max amount of damagage can be sustained in one damage hit
 412+ A0F7              ; LaserInMarkets                          ; can this laser be purchased 0 = yes 1 = no
 413+ A0F7              ; LaserTechLevel                          ; minimum tech level system to buy from
 414+ A0F7              ; need to add copy table routines
 415+ A0F7 00           CurrLaserType           DB  0               ; current view laser type, copied in from LaserType array
 416+ A0F8 00           CurrLaserDamage         DB  0               ; copied in from LaserDamagedFlag array
 417+ A0F9 00           CurrLaserPulseRate      DB  0               ; current view laser amount of pulses
 418+ A0FA 00           CurrLaserPulseOnTime    DB  0               ; how many cycles the laser is on
 419+ A0FB 00           CurrLaserPulseOffTime   DB  0               ; how many cycles the laser is on
 420+ A0FC 00           CurrLaserPulseRest      DB  0               ; current view laser delay setup between pulses
 421+ A0FD
 422+ A0FD 00           CurrLaserBurstRate      DB  0
 423+ A0FE 00           CurrLaserBurstCount     DB  0

 427+ A102 00           CurrLaserDurability     DB  0
 428+ A103 00           CurrLaserDurabilityAmount DB  0
 429+ A104
 430+ A104              ; Count down timers must be aligned like this to work
 431+ A104 00           CurrLaserPulseOnCount   DB  0               ; how many cycles the laser is on timer
 432+ A105 00           CurrLaserPulseOffCount  DB  0               ; how many cycles the laser is on timer
 433+ A106 00           CurrLaserPulseRestCount DB  0               ; countdown after shooting for next shot
 434+ A107 00           CurrLaserPulseRateCount DB  0               ; current view laser current pulses fired

   1+ A161 90          >                        sub     a,b
   1+ A162 32 E2 A0    >                        ld      (PlayerEnergy),a
   1+ A165 38 03       >                        jr      c,.ZeroSystem

   1+ A16A             >.ZeroSystem:            ZeroA
   1+ A16A AF          >                        xor a
   1+ A16B 32 E2 A0    >                        ld      (PlayerEnergy),a
   1+ A16E             >.ExitPoint
   2+ A16E                                      BoostSystem GunTemperature, CurrLaserHeat

  33+ A1E6 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; add to counter
  34+ A1E7 05                                   dec     b
  35+ A1E8 23                                   inc     hl
  36+ A1E9 10 F9                                djnz    .AddLoop

  40+ A1F0 4F                                   ld      c,a

  44+ A1F9 C9                                   ret
  45+ A1FA              .CargoFull:             SetCarryFlag

  93+ A268 3A E2 A0     RechargeShip:           ld      a,(PlayerEnergy)
  94+ A26B CB 7F                                bit     7,a
  95+ A26D 28 0D                                jr      z,.UpdatePlayerEnergy
  96+ A26F 21 E0 A0     .ShieldCharge:          ld      hl,ForeShield
  97+ A272 34                                   inc     (hl)
  98+ A273 20 01                                jr      nz,.DoneForeShield
  99+ A275 35           .ForeOverCharge:        dec     (hl)
 100+ A276 23           .DoneForeShield:        inc     hl                                              ; point to aft shield
 101+ A277 34                                   inc     (hl)
 102+ A278 20 01                                jr      nz,.DoneAftShield
 103+ A27A 35                                   dec     (hl)                                            ; back to 255
 104+ A27B 23           .DoneAftShield:         inc     hl                                              ; point to energy
 105+ A27C 34           .UpdatePlayerEnergy:    inc     (hl)
 106+ A27D 28 0A                                jr      z,.OverflowedEnergy
 107+ A27F 3A 6D A3                             ld      a,(ExtraEnergyUnit)
 108+ A282                                      ReturnIfANENusng EquipmentItemFitted                    ; if energy unit fitted an extra step
 108+ A282 FE FF       >                        cp      EquipmentItemFitted
 108+ A284 C0          >                        ret     nz
 109+ A285 34           .EnergyUnitFitted:      inc     (hl)
 110+ A286 28 01                                jr      z,.OverflowedEnergy
 111+ A288 C9                                   ret
 112+ A289 35           .OverflowedEnergy:      dec     (hl)                                            ;  restore to 255
 113+ A28A C9                                   ret
 114+ A28B 21 E2 A0     .SkipShieldCharge:      ld      hl,PlayerEnergy
 115+ A28E 18 EC                                jr      .UpdatePlayerEnergy
 116+ A290
 117+ A290              ; sets carry to true if target
 118+ A290 3A E5 A0     IsMissileLockedOn:      ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 119+ A293 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 120+ A295 28 07                                jr      z, .TargetSelected
 121+ A297 E6 70                                and     $70                         ; are all upper bits set (we can ignore bit 7)
 122+ A299 CA 9E A2                             jp      z, .TargetSelected           ; if its only bit 7 then we have a lock
 123+ A29C                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; if bitsd 6 to 4 were set then it must be unlocked status
 123+ A29C B7          >                        or a
 124+ A29D C9                                   ret
 125+ A29E              .TargetSelected:        JumpIfSlotAEmpty .TargetInvalid     ; does slot A have an target
 125+ A29E 21 B6 9E    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 125+ A2A1 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 125+ A2A3 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 125+ A2A4 3C          >                        inc     a
 125+ A2A5 CA AB A2    >                        jp      z,.TargetInvalid    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 125+ A2A8 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 126+ A2A9                                      SetCarryFlag
 126+ A2A9 37          >                        scf
 127+ A2AA C9                                   ret
 128+ A2AB 3E FF        .TargetInvalid:         ld      a, StageMissileNoTarget     ; housekeep missile status if target gone
 129+ A2AD 32 E5 A0                             ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 130+ A2B0 C9                                   ret

 132+ A2B1              SetMissileTargetting:   MACRO
 133+ A2B1 ~                                    SetMemTrue MissileTargettingFlag
 134+ A2B1                                      ENDM
 135+ A2B1
 136+ A2B1              ClearMissileTargetting: MACRO
 137+ A2B1 ~                                    SetMemTrue MissileTargettingFlag
 138+ A2B1                                      ENDM

 642  A2B1                  INCLUDE "./Variables/UniverseSlotRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/UniverseSlotRoutines.asm
   1+ A2B1              ; Note this code is core code and can not be in a memory bank unless do explosion code is changed too
   2+ A2B1 AF           ClearSlotCount:         xor     a
   3+ A2B2 21 B6 9E                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
   4+ A2B5 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize ; prbably not needed + UniverseSlotTypeSize
   5+ A2B7 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a
   6+ A2B8 23                                   inc     hl
   7+ A2B9 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
   8+ A2BB C9                                   ret
   9+ A2BC
  10+ A2BC              ; Initialises all types to a count of 1 where there is an occupied universe slot
  11+ A2BC              ; this needs expanding to cater for a missing type, find type and increment count (use cpir?)
  12+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK CorrectSlotCount:       call    ClearSlotCount
  13+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK                         ld      hl,UniverseSlotCount
  14+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK                         ld      de,UniverseSlotList
  15+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK                         ld      b,UniverseSlotListSize
  16+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK .fillLoop:              ld      a,(de)
  17+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK                         cp      $FF
  18+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK                         jr      z,.SkipSlot
  19+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK .CorrectSlot:           ld      (hl),a
  20+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK                         inc     hl
  21+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK                         ld      (hl),1
  22+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK                         inc     hl
  23+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK                         inc     hl
  24+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK .SkipSlot               inc     de
  25+ A2BC              ; DOE NOT WORK                         djnz    .fillLoop
  26+ A2BC C9                                   ret
  27+ A2BD              ; Wipe all items
  28+ A2BD 3E FF        ClearUnivSlotList:      ld      a,$FF
  29+ A2BF 21 B6 9E                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  30+ A2C2 06 18                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize * 2
  31+ A2C4 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a
  32+ A2C5 23                                   inc     hl
  33+ A2C6 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
  34+ A2C8 C9                                   ret
  35+ A2C9
  36+ A2C9 21 B6 9E     SetSlot0ToSpaceStation: ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  37+ A2CC 36 02                                ld      (hl),ShipTypeStation
  38+ A2CE 21 C2 9E                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotType
  39+ A2D1 36 02                                ld      (hl),ShipTypeStation
  40+ A2D3 C9                                   ret
  41+ A2D4
  42+ A2D4 21 B6 9E     SetSlotAToTypeB:        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  43+ A2D7 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  44+ A2D9 70                                   ld      (hl),b
  45+ A2DA C9                                   ret
  46+ A2DB
  47+ A2DB 21 C2 9E     SetSlotAToClassB:       ld      hl,UniverseSlotType
  48+ A2DE ED 31                                add     hl,a
  49+ A2E0 70                                   ld      (hl),b
  50+ A2E1 C9                                   ret
  51+ A2E2
  52+ A2E2              ; Clears all except slot A, used when say restarting a space station post launch
  53+ A2E2 57           ClearFreeSlotListSaveA: ld      d,a
  54+ A2E3 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  55+ A2E5 21 B6 9E                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  56+ A2E8 06 18                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize * 2
  57+ A2EA 79           .fillLoop:              ld      a,c
  58+ A2EB BA                                   cp      d
  59+ A2EC 28 03                                jr      z,.SkipSlot
  60+ A2EE 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  61+ A2F0 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  62+ A2F1 23           .SkipSlot:              inc     hl
  63+ A2F2 23                                   inc     hl
  64+ A2F3 10 F5                                djnz    .fillLoop
  65+ A2F5 C9                                   ret
  66+ A2F6
  67+ A2F6 21 B6 9E     ClearSlotA:             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  68+ A2F9 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  69+ A2FB 36 FF                                ld      (hl),$FF
  70+ A2FD 3E 0C                                ld      a,UniverseSlotListSize  ; move to types
  71+ A2FF ED 31                                add     hl,a
  72+ A301 36 FF                                ld      (hl),$FF
  73+ A303 C9                                   ret
  74+ A304              ; Space Station will always be slot 0
  75+ A304
  76+ A304 21 C3 9E     AreShipsPresent:        ld      hl,UniverseSlotType+1
  77+ A307 06 0B                                ld      b,UniverseSlotListSize -1      ; ignore space station
  78+ A309 7E           .NextShip:              ld      a,(hl)
  79+ A30A FE 00                                cp      ShipTypeNormal
  80+ A30C                                      ClearCarryFlag
  80+ A30C B7          >                        or a
  81+ A30D C8                                   ret     z
  82+ A30E 23                                   inc     hl
  83+ A30F 10 F8                                djnz    .NextShip
  84+ A311                                      SetCarryFlag
  84+ A311 37          >                        scf
  85+ A312 C9                                   ret
  86+ A313
  87+ A313 21 B6 9E     IsSpaceStationPresent:  ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  88+ A316                                      ClearCarryFlag
  88+ A316 B7          >                        or a
  89+ A317 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
  90+ A318                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ShipTypeStation
  90+ A318 FE 02       >                        cp      ShipTypeStation
  90+ A31A C8          >                        ret     z
  91+ A31B                                      SetCarryFlag
  91+ A31B 37          >                        scf
  92+ A31C C9                                   ret
  93+ A31D
  94+ A31D 21 B6 9E     GetTypeAtSlotA:         ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  95+ A320 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  96+ A322 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  97+ A323 C9                                   ret
  98+ A324
  99+ A324 21 B7 9E     IsPlanetOrSpaceStation: ld      hl,UniverseSlotList+1
 100+ A327 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 101+ A328 C9                                   ret
 102+ A329
 103+ A329 21 B6 9E     FindNextFreeSlotInC:    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 104+ A32C 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize
 105+ A32E 0E 00                                ld      c, 0
 106+ A330 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
 107+ A331                                      JumpIfAEqNusng $FF, .FoundSlot
 107+ A331 FE FF       >                        cp     $FF
 107+ A333 CA 3C A3    >                        jp      z,.FoundSlot
 108+ A336 0C                                   inc     c
 109+ A337 23                                   inc     hl
 110+ A338 10 F6                                djnz    .SearchLoop
 111+ A33A                                      SetCarryFlag
 111+ A33A 37          >                        scf
 112+ A33B C9                                   ret
 113+ A33C              .FoundSlot:             ClearCarryFlag
 113+ A33C B7          >                        or a
 114+ A33D C9                                   ret

 645  A381
 646  A381                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ A381              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ A381              doRND2:
   3+ A381 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ A382              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ A382              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ A382              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ A382              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ A382 3A D8 9C                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ A385 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ A387 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ A388 21 DA 9C     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ A38B 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ A38C 32 D8 9C     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ A38F 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ A390 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ A391 32 DA 9C                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ A394 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ A395 3A D9 9C                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ A398 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ A399 21 DB 9C     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ A39C 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ A39D 32 D9 9C                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ A3A0 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ A3A1 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ A3A2 32 DB 9C                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ A3A5 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ A3A6                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ A3A6 C9                                   ret
  29+ A3A7
  30+ A3A7 21 D8 9C     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed
  31+ A3AA 11 DC 9C                             ld      de,RandomSeedSave
  32+ A3AD 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  33+ A3B0 ED A0                                ldi
  34+ A3B2 ED A0                                ldi
  35+ A3B4 ED A0                                ldi
  36+ A3B6 ED A0                                ldi
  37+ A3B8 C9                                   ret
  38+ A3B9
  39+ A3B9 21 DC 9C     restoreRandomSeeds:     ld      hl,RandomSeedSave
  40+ A3BC 11 D8 9C                             ld      de,RandomSeed
  41+ A3BF 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  42+ A3C2 ED A0                                ldi
  43+ A3C4 ED A0                                ldi
  44+ A3C6 ED A0                                ldi
  45+ A3C8 ED A0                                ldi
  46+ A3CA C9                                   ret
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm
 647  A3CB                  INCLUDE "./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm
   1+ A3CB 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ A3CF 58 59 53 45
   1+ A3D3 45 44
   2+ A3D5 21 E7 9E     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ A3D8 11 D1 9D                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ A3DB ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ A3DD ED A0                                ldi
   6+ A3DF ED A0                                ldi
   7+ A3E1 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ A3E3 ED A0                                ldi
   9+ A3E5 ED A0                                ldi
  10+ A3E7 C9                                   ret
  11+ A3E8
  12+ A3E8 21 D1 9D     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ A3EB 11 E7 9E                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ A3EE 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ A3F0
  16+ A3F0 21 E7 9E     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ A3F3 11 DB 9E                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ A3F6 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ A3F8
  20+ A3F8 21 DB 9E     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ A3FB 11 E7 9E                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ A3FE 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ A400
  24+ A400 21 DB 9E     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ A403 11 D1 9D                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ A406 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ A408
  28+ A408 21 D1 9D     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ A40B 11 DB 9E                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ A40E 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ A410
  32+ A410              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ A410 CD 13 A4     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ A413              .NextStep:
  35+ A413 CD 16 A4     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ A416              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ A416 3A D1 9D     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ A419 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ A41A 21 D3 9D     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ A41D 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ A41E 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ A41F 3A D2 9D     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ A422 21 D4 9D     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ A425 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ A426 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ A427 3A D3 9D     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ A42A 32 D1 9D     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ A42D 3A D4 9D     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ A430 32 D2 9D     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ A433 3A D6 9D     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ A436 32 D4 9D     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ A439 3A D5 9D     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ A43C 32 D3 9D     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ A43F B7           		or		a
  55+ A440 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ A441 21 D3 9D     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ A444 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ A445 32 D5 9D     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ A448 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ A449 21 D4 9D     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ A44C 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ A44D 32 D6 9D     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ A450 C9           		ret
  64+ A451
  65+ A451              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ A451 CD 54 A4     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ A454              .NextStep:
  68+ A454 CD 57 A4     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ A457              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ A457              ; x = a + c
  71+ A457 3A DB 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ A45A B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ A45B 21 DD 9E     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ A45E 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ A45F 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ A460              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ A460 3A DC 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ A463 21 DE 9E     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ A466 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ A467 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ A468 3A DD 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ A46B 32 DB 9E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ A46E 3A DE 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ A471 32 DC 9E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ A474 3A E0 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ A477 32 DE 9E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ A47A 3A DF 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ A47D 32 DD 9E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ A480 B7           		or		a
  90+ A481 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ A482 21 DD 9E     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ A485 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ A486 32 DF 9E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ A489 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ A48A 21 DE 9E     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ A48D 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ A48E 32 E0 9E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ A491 C9           		ret
  99+ A492
 100+ A492 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ A493 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ A494 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ A495
 104+ A495 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ A496 32 EA 9D                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ A499 3A D2 9D     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ A49C 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ A49D 3A EE 9E     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ A4A0 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ A4A1 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ A4A2 90                                   sub		b
 112+ A4A3 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ A4A5 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ A4A7 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ A4A9 32 94 A4     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ A4AC ED 5B 92 A4                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ A4B0 BA                                   cp		d
 118+ A4B1 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ A4B3 3A D4 9D     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ A4B6 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ A4B7 3A ED 9E                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ A4BA 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ A4BB 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ A4BC 90                                   sub		b
 125+ A4BD CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ A4BF 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ A4C1 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ A4C3 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ A4C4 BB                                   cp		e
 130+ A4C5 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ A4C7 3A 94 A4     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ A4CA 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ A4CB ED 43 92 A4                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ A4CF C5                                   push	bc
 135+ A4D0 CD 08 A4                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ A4D3 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ A4D4 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ A4D5 B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ A4D6 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ A4D7 CD 10 A4     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ A4DA 3A EA 9D                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ A4DD 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ A4DE FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ A4E0 C8                                   ret		z
 145+ A4E1 32 EA 9D                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ A4E4 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ A4E6
 148+ A4E6              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ A4E6 3A DC 9E     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ A4E9 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ A4EB 32 6F 9E     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ A4EE 3A DD 9E     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ A4F1 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ A4F3 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ A4F5 CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ A4F7 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ A4F9 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ A4FB 32 70 9E     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ A4FE CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ A500 FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ A502 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ A504              .Fedual:
 163+ A504 3A 6F 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ A507 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ A509 32 6F 9E     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ A50C              .CanBeRich:
 167+ A50C 3A 6F 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ A50F EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ A511 32 71 9E     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ A514 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ A515 3A DE 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ A518 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ A51A 80           		add		a,b
 174+ A51B 32 71 9E     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ A51E 3A 70 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ A521 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ A523 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ A524 3A 71 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ A527 80           		add		a,b
 180+ A528 32 71 9E     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ A52B CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ A52D CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ A52F 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ A530 3A 6F 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ A533 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ A534 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ A535 3A 70 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ A538 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ A539 32 72 9E     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ A53C 3A 6F 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ A53F EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ A541 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ A543 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ A544 3A 70 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ A547 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ A549 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ A54A ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ A54C 3A 72 9E     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ A54F 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ A550 ED 30        		mul
 201+ A552 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ A554 CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ A556 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ A558 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ A55A CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ A55C CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ A55E ED 53 74 9E  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ A562              .DoRadius:
 209+ A562 3A DE 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ A565 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ A566 3A E0 9E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ A569 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ A56B C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ A56D 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ A56E ED 43 78 9E  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ A572 C9           		ret
 217+ A573
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm
 648  A573                  INCLUDE "./Tables/text_tables.asm"
# file opened: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

  36+ A6B9
  37+ A6B9
  38+ A6B9              getTableText:
  39+ A6B9              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ A6B9              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ A6B9 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ A6BA ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ A6BC ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ A6BE 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ A6BF 23           	inc		hl
  46+ A6C0 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ A6C1 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ A6C2 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ A6C3 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ A6C4
  51+ A6C4
  52+ A6C4              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ A6C4              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ A6C4              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ A6C4              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ A6C4              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ A6C4              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ A6C4              getRankIndex:
  59+ A6C4              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ A6C4              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ A6C4 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ A6C5 B3           	or		e
  63+ A6C6 FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ A6C8 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ A6C9 AF           	xor 	a
  66+ A6CA 21 18 A6     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ A6CD              .testLoop:
  68+ A6CD 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ A6CE 23           	inc		hl
  70+ A6CF 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ A6D0 E5           	push	hl
  72+ A6D1 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ A6D2 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ A6D3 CD 5F B3     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ A6D6 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ A6D8              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ A6D8 E1           	pop		hl
  78+ A6D9 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ A6DA 23           	inc		hl
  80+ A6DB 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ A6DC 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ A6DE              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ A6DE E1           	pop		hl
  84+ A6DF C9           	ret
  85+ A6E0
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 177+ AB61
 178+ AB61              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 179+ AB61              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 180+ AB61
 181+ AB61              CapitaliseString:
 182+ AB61              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ AB61              .CapLoop:
 184+ AB61 23           	inc		hl
 185+ AB62 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ AB63 FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ AB65 C8           	ret		z
 188+ AB66 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ AB68 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ AB6A FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ AB6C 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ AB6E              .LowerCase:
 193+ AB6E C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ AB70 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ AB71 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ AB73
 197+ AB73              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ AB73 21 E4 A9     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ AB76 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ AB78 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ AB7A D5           	push	de
 202+ AB7B 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ AB7C 23           	inc		hl
 204+ AB7D 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ AB7E EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ AB7F D1           	pop		de
 207+ AB80 C9           	ret
 208+ AB81
 209+ AB81
 210+ AB81              expandTokenToString:
 211+ AB81              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ AB81 21 0A AB     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ AB84 CD B9 A6     	call	getTableText
 214+ AB87 11 40 AB     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ AB8A              .ReadLoop:
 216+ AB8A 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ AB8B FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ AB8D 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ AB8F E5           	push	hl
 220+ AB90 D5           	push	de
 221+ AB91 21 E4 A9     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ AB94 CD B9 A6     	call	getTableText
 223+ AB97 D1           	pop		de
 224+ AB98              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ AB98 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ AB99 FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ AB9B 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ AB9D              ;.GetChar:
 229+ AB9D 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ AB9E 13           	inc		de
 231+ AB9F 23           	inc		hl
 232+ ABA0 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ ABA2              .AddSpace:
 234+ ABA2 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ ABA4 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ ABA5 13           	inc		de
 237+ ABA6 E1           	pop		hl
 238+ ABA7 23           	inc		hl
 239+ ABA8 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ ABAA              .ReadDone:
 241+ ABAA 1B           	dec		de
 242+ ABAB AF           	xor		a
 243+ ABAC 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ ABAD C9           	ret
 245+ ABAE

  12+ AC27              NamingLoop:
  13+ AC27 3A E0 9E     	ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)	; a = first byte of name seed
  14+ AC2A E6 1F        	and 	$1F					; Keep bottom 5 bits only
  15+ AC2C FE 00        	cp		0					; 0 = skip 2 chars
  16+ AC2E 28 12        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  17+ AC30 C6 0C        	add		a,12
  18+ AC32 CB 27        	sla		a					; phrase = (a+12)*2
  19+ AC34 21 AE AB     	ld		hl,name_digrams
  20+ AC37 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  21+ AC39 ED A0        	ldi
  22+ AC3B 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
  23+ AC3C FE 3F        	cp		'?'
  24+ AC3E 28 02        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  25+ AC40              .AddExtra:
  26+ AC40 ED A0        	ldi
  27+ AC42              .SkipPhrase:

  29+ AC43 CD 57 A4     	call	working_seed
  30+ AC46 D1           	pop		de
  31+ AC47 C9           	ret

  90+ AC48              ;PlanetDigram:
  91+ AC48              ;	cp		&A0							; >- 160
  92+ AC48              ;	jr		c,MorePage4
  93+ AC48              ;	and		$7F							; 128 to 159 now 0 to 31
  94+ AC48              ;	asl		2							; Multiply by 2
  95+ AC48              ;	ld		hl, name_digrams2
