 105+ AC48              ;MorePage4:
 106+ AC48              ;	sub		$A0
 107+ AC48              ;ExtraTokenCheck:
 108+ AC48              ;	push	de							; save target address
 109+ AC48              ;	push	bc
 110+ AC48              ;	ld		b,a
 111+ AC48              ;	ld		hl,varV
 112+ AC48              ;	ld		(VarV),0400
 113+ AC48              ;	ld		(varV),a
 114+ AC48              ;	ld
 115+ AC48              ;
 116+ AC48              ;		.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 117+ AC48              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 118+ AC48              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 119+ AC48              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 120+ AC48              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 121+ AC48              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 122+ AC48              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 123+ AC48              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 124+ AC48              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 125+ AC48              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 126+ AC48              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 127+ AC48              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 128+ AC48              ;
 129+ AC48              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 130+ AC48              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 131+ AC48              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 132+ AC48              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 133+ AC48              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 134+ AC48              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 135+ AC48              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 136+ AC48              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 137+ AC48              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 138+ AC48              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 139+ AC48              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 140+ AC48              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 141+ AC48              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 142+ AC48              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 143+ AC48              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 144+ AC48              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 145+ AC48              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 146+ AC48              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 147+ AC48              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 148+ AC48              ;C8                      INY
 149+ AC48              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 150+ AC48              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 151+ AC48              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 152+ AC48              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 153+ AC48              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 154+ AC48              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 155+ AC48              ;98                      TYA
 156+ AC48              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 157+ AC48              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 158+ AC48              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 159+ AC48              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 160+ AC48              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 161+ AC48              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 162+ AC48              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 163+ AC48              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 164+ AC48              ;68                      PLA
 165+ AC48              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 166+ AC48              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 167+ AC48              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 168+ AC48              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 169+ AC48              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 170+ AC48              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 171+ AC48              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 172+ AC48              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 173+ AC48              ;

 176+ AC48              ;
 177+ AC48              ;
 178+ AC48              ;
 179+ AC48              ;		.TT27	\ -> &36E0 \ process flight text Token in Acc
 180+ AC48              ;;AA                      TAX		\ copy token to count down
 181+ AC48              ;;F0 DE                   BEQ csh		\ Acc = 0, up to Cash
 182+ AC48              ;30 74                   BMI TT43	\ if token is >  127 down, page4 token or digram
 183+ AC48              ;CA                      DEX
 184+ AC48              ;F0 BC                   BEQ tal		\ Acc == 1, up, print Galaxy number.
 185+ AC48              ;CA                      DEX
 186+ AC48              ;F0 A3                   BEQ ypl		\ Acc == 2, up, present planet in QQ2.
 187+ AC48              ;CA                      DEX
 188+ AC48              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over, else X == 0
 189+ AC48              ;4C 0A 33                JMP &330A \ cpl \ Acc = 3 print Planet name for seed QQ15
 190+ AC48              ;CA                      DEX
 191+ AC48              ;F0 8A                   BEQ cmn		\ Acc == 4, up, commander name.
 192+ AC48              ;CA                      DEX
 193+ AC48              ;F0 B5                   BEQ fwl		\ Acc == 5, up, fuel followed by cash.
 194+ AC48              ;CA                      DEX
 195+ AC48              ;D0 05                   BNE  P%+7	\ hop over, else X == 0
 196+ AC48              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ AC48              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ AC48              ;60                      RTS
 199+ AC48              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ AC48              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ AC48              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ AC48              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ AC48              ;60                      RTS
 204+ AC48              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ AC48              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ AC48              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ AC48              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ AC48              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ AC48              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ AC48              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ AC48              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ AC48              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ AC48              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ AC48              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ AC48              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ AC48              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ AC48              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ AC48              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ AC48              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ AC48              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ AC48              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ AC48              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ AC48              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ AC48              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ AC48              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ AC48              ;
 227+ AC48              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ AC48              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ AC48              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ AC48              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ AC48              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ AC48              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ AC48              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ AC48              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ AC48              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ AC48              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ AC48              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ AC48              ;
 239+ AC48              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ AC48              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ AC48              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ AC48              ;
 243+ AC48              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ AC48              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ AC48              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ AC48              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ AC48              ;
 248+ AC48              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ AC48              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ AC48              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ AC48              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ AC48              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ AC48              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ AC48              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ AC48              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ AC48              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ AC48              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ AC48              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ AC48              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ AC48              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ AC48              ;
 262+ AC48              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ AC48              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ AC48              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ AC48              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ AC48              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ AC48              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ AC48              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ AC48              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ AC48              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ AC48              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ AC48              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ AC48              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ AC48              ;
 275+ AC48              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ AC48              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ AC48              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ AC48              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ AC48              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ AC48              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ AC48              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ AC48              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ AC48              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ AC48              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ AC48              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ AC48              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ AC48              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ AC48              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ AC48              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ AC48              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ AC48              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ AC48              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ AC48              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ AC48              ;C8                      INY
 295+ AC48              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ AC48              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ AC48              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ AC48              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ AC48              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ AC48              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ AC48              ;98                      TYA
 302+ AC48              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ AC48              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ AC48              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 305+ AC48              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 306+ AC48              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 307+ AC48              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 308+ AC48              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 309+ AC48              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 310+ AC48              ;68                      PLA
 311+ AC48              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 312+ AC48              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 313+ AC48              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 314+ AC48              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 315+ AC48              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 316+ AC48              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 317+ AC48              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 318+ AC48              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 319+ AC48              ;
 320+ AC48              ;
 321+ AC48              ;

   1+ AC48              ;; calcs BHB + CDE where B and C are signs and may be 24 bit
   2+ AC48              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ AC48              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ AC48 78           AHLEquBHLaddCDE:        ld      a,b
   5+ AC49 A9                                   xor     c
   6+ AC4A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   7+ AC4C                                      JumpIfNegative   .OppositeSigns
   7+ AC4C FA 5F AC    >                        jp		m, .OppositeSigns
   8+ AC4F DD 60        .SameSigns:             ld      ixh,b                      ; ixh = b
   9+ AC51                                      ClearSignBit b                      ; b = ABS b
   9+ AC51 78          >                        ld      a,b
   9+ AC52 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
   9+ AC54 47          >                        ld      b,a
  10+ AC55 19                                   add     hl,de                      ; hl = hl + de
  11+ AC56 78                                   ld      a,b                        ; a = b + c + carry
  12+ AC57 89                                   adc     c                          ;
  13+ AC58 47                                   ld      b,a                        ;
  14+ AC59 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh                      ;
  15+ AC5B                                      SignBitOnlyA                        ;
  15+ AC5B E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  16+ AC5D B0                                   or      b                          ;
  17+ AC5E C9                                   ret                                ;
  18+ AC5F DD 60        .OppositeSigns:         ld      ixh,b
  19+ AC61 DD 69                                ld      ixl,c
  20+ AC63                                      ClearSignBit c                      ; c = ABS C
  20+ AC63 79          >                        ld      a,c
  20+ AC64 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  20+ AC66 4F          >                        ld      c,a
  21+ AC67 78                                   ld      a,b
  22+ AC68                                      ClearSignBitA
  22+ AC68 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  23+ AC6A 99                                   sbc     c
  24+ AC6B                                      JumpIfNegative  .OppositeCDEgtBHL
  24+ AC6B FA 7A AC    >                        jp		m, .OppositeCDEgtBHL
  25+ AC6E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  26+ AC70                                      JumpIfNegative  .OppositeCDEgtBHL
  26+ AC70 FA 7A AC    >                        jp		m, .OppositeCDEgtBHL

  29+ AC76 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  30+ AC78 B0                                   or      b                          ;
  31+ AC79 C9                                   ret                                ;
  32+ AC7A EB           .OppositeCDEgtBHL:      ex      de,hl
  33+ AC7B 78                                   ld      a,b
  34+ AC7C 41                                   ld      b,c
  35+ AC7D 4F                                   ld      c,a
  36+ AC7E C3 5F AC                             jp      .OppositeSigns

  39+ AC81 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
  40+ AC82 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  41+ AC84 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  42+ AC85                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  42+ AC85 FA 93 AC    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
  43+ AC88 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
  44+ AC89 B1                                   or      c
  45+ AC8A                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg    ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  45+ AC8A FA 8F AC    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  46+ AC8D 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  47+ AC8E C9                                   ret
  48+ AC8F 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  49+ AC90 78                                   ld      a,b
  50+ AC91 B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  51+ AC92 C9                                   ret
  52+ AC93              ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       ClearCarryFlag
  52+ AC93 B7          >                        or a
  53+ AC94 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  54+ AC96 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  55+ AC98 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry: ld      a,b                        ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  56+ AC99 C9                                   ret
  57+ AC9A              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                               ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  57+ AC9A AF          >                    xor a
  57+ AC9B 95          >                    sub l
  57+ AC9C 6F          >                    ld l,a
  57+ AC9D 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  57+ AC9E 94          >                    sub h
  57+ AC9F 67          >                    ld h,a
  58+ ACA0 78                                   ld      a,b
  59+ ACA1 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  60+ ACA3 C9                                   ret

  63+ ACA4 CB 7C        addhldesigned:          bit     7,h
  64+ ACA6 20 03                                jr      nz,.noneghl
  65+ ACA8 CD 75 B3                             call    negate16hl
  66+ ACAB CB 7A        .noneghl:               bit     7,d
  67+ ACAD 20 03                                jr      nz,.nonegde
  68+ ACAF CD 7C B3                             call    negate16de
  69+ ACB2 19           .nonegde:               add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
  70+ ACB3 AF                                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
  71+ ACB4 CB 7C                                bit     7,h
  72+ ACB6 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
  73+ ACB7 CD 75 B3                             call    negate16hl
  74+ ACBA 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  75+ ACBC C9                                   ret

  77+ ACBD
  78+ ACBD              ; HL(2sc) = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
  79+ ACBD 16 00        HL2cEquHLSgnPlusAusgn:  ld      d,0
  80+ ACBF 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; set up DE = A
  81+ ACC0 7C                                   ld      a,h
  82+ ACC1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  83+ ACC3 28 07                                jr      z,.HLPositive               ; if HL is negative then do HL - A
  84+ ACC5 67           .HLNegative:            ld      h,a                         ; hl = ABS (HL)
  85+ ACC6                                      NegHL                               ; hl = - hl
  85+ ACC6 AF          >                    xor a
  85+ ACC7 95          >                    sub l
  85+ ACC8 6F          >                    ld l,a
  85+ ACC9 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  85+ ACCA 94          >                    sub h
  85+ ACCB 67          >                    ld h,a
  86+ ACCC              .HLPositive:            ClearCarryFlag                      ; now do adc hl,de
  86+ ACCC B7          >                        or a
  87+ ACCD ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; aftert his hl will be 2's c
  88+ ACCF C9                                   ret
  89+ ACD0
  90+ ACD0 5F           HLEquHLSgnPlusAusgn:    ld      e,a
  91+ ACD1 7C                                   ld      a,h
  92+ ACD2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  93+ ACD4 20 04                                jr      nz,.HLNegative              ; if HL is negative then do HL - A
  94+ ACD6 7B           .HLPositive:            ld      a,e                         ; else its HL + A
  95+ ACD7 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  96+ ACD9 C9                                   ret
  97+ ACDA              .HLNegative:            ClearSignBit    h                   ; Clear sign of HL
  97+ ACDA 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  97+ ACDB E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  97+ ACDD 67          >                        ld      h,a
  98+ ACDE                                      NegHL                               ; and convert to 2's C
  98+ ACDE AF          >                    xor a
  98+ ACDF 95          >                    sub l
  98+ ACE0 6F          >                    ld l,a
  98+ ACE1 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  98+ ACE2 94          >                    sub h
  98+ ACE3 67          >                    ld h,a
  99+ ACE4 16 00                                ld      d,0
 100+ ACE6                                      ClearCarryFlag
 100+ ACE6 B7          >                        or a
 101+ ACE7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; now add a to -ve HL , add does not do 2's c
 102+ ACE9 FA F1 AC                             jp      m,.FlipResult               ; if it was negative then its really positive
 103+ ACEC                                      SetSignBit      h
 103+ ACEC 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 103+ ACED F6 80       >                        or      SignOnly8Bit
 103+ ACEF 67          >                        ld      h,a
 104+ ACF0 C9                                   ret
 105+ ACF1              .FlipResult:            NegHL                               ; so if -hl + A => HL - A => HL - DE is negative then the actual result is +ve
 105+ ACF1 AF          >                    xor a
 105+ ACF2 95          >                    sub l
 105+ ACF3 6F          >                    ld l,a
 105+ ACF4 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 105+ ACF5 94          >                    sub h
 105+ ACF6 67          >                    ld h,a
 106+ ACF7 C9                                   ret
