 110+ ACF8              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
 111+ ACF8 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
 112+ ACF9 5C                                   ld      e,h
 113+ ACFA 7C                                   ld      a,h
 114+ ACFB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 115+ ACFD 67                                   ld      h,a
 116+ ACFE 7A                                   ld      a,d
 117+ ACFF ED 31                                add     hl,a
 118+ AD01 7B                                   ld      a,e
 119+ AD02 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 120+ AD04 B4                                   or      h
 121+ AD05 C9                                   ret
 122+ AD06              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
 123+ AD06 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
 124+ AD07 4F                                   ld      c,a
 125+ AD08 78                                   ld      a,b
 126+ AD09 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 127+ AD0B 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
 128+ AD0D EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
 129+ AD0E 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
 130+ AD10 69                                   ld      l,c
 131+ AD11                                      ClearCarryFlag
 131+ AD11 B7          >                        or a
 132+ AD12 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
 133+ AD14 C9                                   ret
 134+ AD15 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
 135+ AD16 ED 31                                add hl,a
 136+ AD18 C9                                   ret
 137+ AD19              ;tested mathstestsun2
 138+ AD19              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
 139+ AD19 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
 140+ AD1A AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
 141+ AD1B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 142+ AD1D 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
 143+ AD1F 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
 144+ AD20 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
 145+ AD22 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
 146+ AD24 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 147+ AD25 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 148+ AD27 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 149+ AD28 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 150+ AD29 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 151+ AD2B 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 152+ AD2C 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
 153+ AD2D 85                                   add     l                   ; .
 154+ AD2E 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 155+ AD2F 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
 156+ AD30 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
 157+ AD31 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 158+ AD32 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
 159+ AD33 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
 160+ AD34 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
 161+ AD36 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 162+ AD37 C9                                   ret                         ; done
 163+ AD38 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 164+ AD39 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
 165+ AD3B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 166+ AD3D 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 167+ AD3E 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 168+ AD3F FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
 169+ AD41 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 170+ AD43 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 171+ AD44 E5                                   push    hl                  ; save hl
 172+ AD45 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; hl = bc - de, if bc < de then there is a carry
 173+ AD47 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
 174+ AD49 E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
 175+ AD4A 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
 176+ AD4C 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
 177+ AD4E 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
 178+ AD4F                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
 178+ AD4F BD          >                        cp      l
 178+ AD50 DA 5A AD    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
 179+ AD53 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
 180+ AD55              ; The same so its just zero
 181+ AD55 AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
 182+ AD56 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
 183+ AD57 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
 184+ AD58 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
 185+ AD59 C9                                   ret                        ; .
 186+ AD5A              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
 187+ AD5A 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
 188+ AD5B 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
 189+ AD5C 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
 190+ AD5D 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
 191+ AD5E 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
 192+ AD5F 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
 193+ AD60 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
 194+ AD61 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
 195+ AD62 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
 196+ AD63 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
 197+ AD65 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 198+ AD67 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 199+ AD68 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 200+ AD69 C9                                   ret
 201+ AD6A 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
 202+ AD6B 95                                   sub     l                  ;
 203+ AD6C 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
 204+ AD6D 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
 205+ AD6E 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
 206+ AD6F 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
 207+ AD70 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
 208+ AD71 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 209+ AD72 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 210+ AD73 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 211+ AD75 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 212+ AD77 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 213+ AD78 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 214+ AD79 C9                                   ret
 215+ AD7A
 216+ AD7A
 217+ AD7A              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 218+ AD7A 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 219+ AD7B 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 220+ AD7C A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 221+ AD7D CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 222+ AD7F 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 223+ AD81 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 224+ AD82 C9                                   ret                             ; return
 225+ AD83 ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 226+ AD85 D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 227+ AD86 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 228+ AD87 EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 229+ AD88 A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 230+ AD89 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 231+ AD8B 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 232+ AD8C C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 233+ AD8D
 234+ AD8D
 235+ AD8D
 236+ AD8D              ; a = value to add
 237+ AD8D              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 238+ AD8D              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 239+ AD8D              addINWKbasigned:
 240+ AD8D 21 0C C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 241+ AD90 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 242+ AD91 78           		ld		a,b
 243+ AD92 ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 244+ AD94 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 245+ AD95 E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 246+ AD97 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 247+ AD98 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 248+ AD99 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 249+ AD9B              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 250+ AD9B              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 251+ AD9B              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 252+ AD9B              addhlcsigned:
 253+ AD9B 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 254+ AD9C 23                   inc     hl
 255+ AD9D 56                   ld      d,(hl)
 256+ AD9E 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 257+ AD9F 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 258+ ADA0 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 259+ ADA1 A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 260+ ADA2 CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 261+ ADA4 28 2B                jr      z,.postivecalc
 262+ ADA6              .negativecalc:
 263+ ADA6 7C                   ld      a,h
 264+ ADA7 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 265+ ADA9 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 266+ ADAA DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 267+ ADAC 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 268+ ADAE ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
 269+ ADB0 DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 270+ ADB2 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 271+ ADB3 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 272+ ADB4 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 273+ ADB6 DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 274+ ADB8 F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 275+ ADBA A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 276+ ADBB 77                   ld      (hl),a
 277+ ADBC 2B                   dec     hl
 278+ ADBD 72                   ld      (hl),d
 279+ ADBE 2B                   dec     hl
 280+ ADBF 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 281+ ADC0 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 282+ ADC1 D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 283+ ADC2              .nocarry:
 284+ ADC2                      NegHL                               ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 284+ ADC2 AF          >                    xor a
 284+ ADC3 95          >                    sub l
 284+ ADC4 6F          >                    ld l,a
 284+ ADC5 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 284+ ADC6 94          >                    sub h
 284+ ADC7 67          >                    ld h,a
 285+ ADC8 B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
 286+ ADC9 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 287+ ADCA 73                   ld      (hl),e
 288+ ADCB 23                   inc     hl
 289+ ADCC 72                   ld      (hl),d
 290+ ADCD 23                   inc     hl
 291+ ADCE 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 292+ ADCF EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 293+ ADD0 C9                   ret
 294+ ADD1              .postivecalc:
 295+ ADD1 DD 68                ld      ixl,b
 296+ ADD3 06 00                ld      b,0
 297+ ADD5 19                   add     hl,de
 298+ ADD6 EB                   ex      de,hl
 299+ ADD7 DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 300+ ADD9 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 301+ ADDA 2B                   dec     hl
 302+ ADDB 72                   ld      (hl),d
 303+ ADDC 2B                   dec     hl
 304+ ADDD 73                   ld      (hl),e
 305+ ADDE C9                   ret
 306+ ADDF
 307+ ADDF              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 308+ ADDF              ;MVT1
 309+ ADDF              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 310+ ADDF              ;    A = sign bit => T
 311+ ADDF              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 312+ ADDF              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 313+ ADDF              ;
 314+ ADDF              ;        and h, 7F
 315+ ADDF              ;        b = 0
 316+ ADDF              ;        c = varS
 317+ ADDF              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 318+ ADDF              ;        retain carry
 319+ ADDF              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 320+ ADDF              ;        and 7F
 321+ ADDF              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 322+ ADDF              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 323+ ADDF              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 324+ ADDF              ;
 325+ ADDF              ;    else
 326+ ADDF              ;MV10.
 327+ ADDF              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 328+ ADDF              ;        or      sign bit
 329+ ADDF
 330+ ADDF
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_add.asm
 657  ADDF                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
   1+ ADDF              ; Note its big endian
   2+ ADDF 2A 47 A3     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ ADE2 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ ADE3 22 47 A3                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ ADE6 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ ADE9 2A 49 A3                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ ADEC ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ ADEE 22 49 A3                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ ADF1 C9                                   ret
  10+ ADF2
  11+ ADF2 2A 47 A3     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ ADF5 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ ADF6 B5                                   or      l
  14+ ADF7 2A 49 A3                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ ADFA B4                                   or      h
  16+ ADFB B5                                   or      l
  17+ ADFC C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ ADFD B7                                   or      a
  19+ ADFE 2A 47 A3                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ AE01 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ AE03 22 47 A3                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ AE06 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ AE09 2A 49 A3                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ AE0C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ AE0E 22 49 A3                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ AE11                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ AE11 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ AE13 C2 17 AE    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ AE16 C9                                   ret
  28+ AE17 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ AE1A 22 47 A3                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ AE1D 22 49 A3                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ AE20 C9                                   ret
  32+ AE21
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
 658  AE21                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ AE21              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ AE21              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ AE21 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ AE22 E5                                   push hl
   5+ AE23 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ AE25 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ AE27 E5                                   push hl
   8+ AE28 AF                                   xor a
   9+ AE29 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ AE2A 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ AE2B DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ AE2D CB 10                                rl b
  13+ AE2F ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ AE31 17                                   rla
  15+ AE32 B9                                   cp c
  16+ AE33 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ AE35 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ AE37 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ AE39 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ AE3A 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ AE3C ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ AE3E 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ AE3F DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ AE41 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ AE42 2D                                   dec l
  26+ AE43 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ AE44 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ AE46 D1                                   pop de
  29+ AE47 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ AE48 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ AE4A D1                                   pop de
  32+ AE4B C9                                   ret
  33+ AE4C
  34+ AE4C FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ AE4E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ AE50 CD 21 AE                             call    Div24by24
  37+ AE53 F5                                   push    af
  38+ AE54 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ AE56 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ AE58 B1                                   or      c
  41+ AE59 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ AE5A F1                                   pop     af
  43+ AE5B C9                                   ret
  44+ AE5C
  45+ AE5C                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ AE5C FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ AE5E A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ AE5F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ AE61 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ AE63 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ AE64 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ AE66 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ AE67 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ AE69 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ AE6B CD 21 AE                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ AE6E FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ AE70 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ AE72 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ AE73 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ AE75 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ AE76 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ AE78 C9                                   ret
  63+ AE79
  64+ AE79              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ AE79              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ AE79              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ AE79              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ AE79 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ AE7A 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ AE7C 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ AE7E 3A E5 9D                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ AE81 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ AE82 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ AE85 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ AE86 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ AE88 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ AE8A 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ AE8B ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ AE8D ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ AE8F 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ AE91 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ AE92 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ AE93 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ AE95 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ AE96 32 E6 9D                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ AE99 C9                                   ret
  87+ AE9A
  88+ AE9A
  89+ AE9A
  90+ AE9A
# file closed: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
 659  AE9A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ AE9A              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ AE9A 2A E6 9D                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ AE9D 3A E5 9D                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ AEA0 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ AEA2 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ AEA5 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ AEA6                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ AEA6 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ AEA8 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ AEAA CB 20                                sla b
   9+ AEAC 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ AEAE EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ AEAF 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ AEB0 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ AEB1              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ AEB1 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ AEB3 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ AEB5 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ AEB7 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ AEB9 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ AEBB EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ AEBC D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ AEBE C9                                   ret
  20+ AEBF
  21+ AEBF
  22+ AEBF              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ AEBF ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ AEBF ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ AEBF ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ AEBF ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ AEBF ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ AEBF ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ AEBF ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ AEBF ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ AEBF ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ AEBF ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ AEBF ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ AEBF ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ AEBF ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ AEBF ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ AEBF ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ AEBF ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ AEBF                                      ENDM
  40+ AEBF
  41+ AEBF
  42+ AEBF
  43+ AEBF                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ AEBF              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ AEBF 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ AEC0 3A E5 9D    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ AEC3 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ AEC4 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ AEC5 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ AEC7 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ AEC8 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ AEC9 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ AECB 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ AECC 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ AECD E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ AECF 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ AED0 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ AED2 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ AED3 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ AED4 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ AED5 2A E6 9D     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ AED8 CD E1 AE                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ AEDB EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ AEDC                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ AEDC B7          >                        or a
  49+ AEDD DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ AEDF 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ AEE0 C9                                   ret
  52+ AEE1
  53+ AEE1
  54+ AEE1 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ AEE2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ AEE4 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ AEE5 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ AEE6                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ AEE6 FA FE AE    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ AEE9 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ AEEA B2                                   or      d
  61+ AEEB                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ AEEB FA F0 AE    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ AEEE 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ AEEF C9                                   ret
  64+ AEF0 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ AEF1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ AEF3 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ AEF4 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ AEF5 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ AEF7 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ AEF8 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ AEF9 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ AEFB B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ AEFC 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ AEFD C9                                   ret
  75+ AEFE 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ AEFF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ AF01 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ AF02 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ AF03 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ AF05 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ AF06 B7                                   or      a
  82+ AF07 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ AF09 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ AF0B 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ AF0C B4                                   or      h
  86+ AF0D 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ AF0E C9                                   ret
  88+ AF0F              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ AF0F AF          >                    xor a
  88+ AF10 95          >                    sub l
  88+ AF11 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ AF12 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ AF13 94          >                    sub h
  88+ AF14 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ AF15 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ AF16 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ AF18 B4                                   or      h
  92+ AF19 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ AF1A C9                                   ret
  94+ AF1B
  95+ AF1B
  96+ AF1B                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ AF1B                  ;
  98+ AF1B                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ AF1B                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ AF1B                  ;
 101+ AF1B                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ AF1B                  ;         carry reset
 103+ AF1B                  ;
 104+ AF1B                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ AF1B 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ AF1C 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ AF1D ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ AF1F EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ AF20 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ AF22
 111+ AF22 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ AF23 85                                   add a,l
 113+ AF24 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ AF25 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ AF26
 116+ AF26 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ AF27 CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ AF29 C9                                   ret
 119+ AF2A
 120+ AF2A 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 121+ AF2B 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 122+ AF2C ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 123+ AF2E EB                                   ex      de,hl
 124+ AF2F C9                                   ret
 125+ AF30
 126+ AF30                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 127+ AF30                 ;
 128+ AF30                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 129+ AF30                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 130+ AF30                 ;
 131+ AF30                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 132+ AF30                 ;         carry reset
 133+ AF30                 ;
 134+ AF30                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 135+ AF30
 136+ AF30
 137+ AF30
 138+ AF30 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 139+ AF31 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 140+ AF32 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 141+ AF33 6A                                   ld l,d
 142+ AF34 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 143+ AF35 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 144+ AF36              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 145+ AF36 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 146+ AF38 EB                                   ex de,hl
 147+ AF39 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 148+ AF3B
 149+ AF3B AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 150+ AF3C 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 151+ AF3D 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 152+ AF3E
 153+ AF3E 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 154+ AF3F 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 155+ AF40 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 156+ AF42
 157+ AF42 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 158+ AF43 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 159+ AF44
 160+ AF44 7A                                   ld a,d
 161+ AF45 85                                   add a,l
 162+ AF46 67                                   ld h,a
 163+ AF47 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 164+ AF48
 165+ AF48 D1                                   pop de
 166+ AF49 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 167+ AF4B
 168+ AF4B EB                                   ex de,hl
 169+ AF4C ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 170+ AF4E EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 171+ AF4F
 172+ AF4F C9                                   ret
 173+ AF50
 174+ AF50              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 175+ AF50              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 176+ AF50              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 177+ AF50              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 178+ AF50              ;         carry reset
 179+ AF50              ; maths is
 180+ AF50              ;        hl = y , de= x
 181+ AF50              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 182+ AF50              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 183+ AF50              ;
 184+ AF50              ;
 185+ AF50              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 186+ AF50 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 187+ AF51 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 188+ AF52 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 189+ AF53 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 190+ AF54 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 191+ AF55 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 192+ AF56 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 193+ AF58 EB                                   ex de,hl
 194+ AF59 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 195+ AF5B 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 196+ AF5C 59                                   ld e,c
 197+ AF5D 50                                   ld d,b
 198+ AF5E ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 199+ AF60 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 200+ AF61 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 201+ AF62 67                                   ld h,a
 202+ AF63 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 203+ AF64                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 204+ AF64 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 205+ AF65 C1                                   pop     bc
 206+ AF66 C9                                   ret
 207+ AF67
 208+ AF67
 209+ AF67              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 210+ AF67              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 211+ AF67 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 212+ AF68 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 213+ AF69 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 214+ AF6B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 215+ AF6D 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 216+ AF6E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 217+ AF70 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 218+ AF71 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 219+ AF72 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 220+ AF74              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 221+ AF74 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 222+ AF75 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 223+ AF76 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 224+ AF78 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 225+ AF79 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 226+ AF7A 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 227+ AF7B 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 228+ AF7C 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 229+ AF7D 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 230+ AF7E ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 231+ AF80 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 232+ AF81 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 233+ AF82 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 234+ AF83 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 235+ AF84 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 236+ AF85 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 237+ AF86 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 238+ AF87 ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 239+ AF89 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 240+ AF8A 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 241+ AF8B FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 242+ AF8D 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 243+ AF8E C9                                   ret
 244+ AF8F
 245+ AF8F              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 246+ AF8F              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 247+ AF8F              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 248+ AF8F              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 249+ AF8F              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 250+ AF8F              ;mult3
 251+ AF8F              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 252+ AF8F              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 253+ AF8F              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 254+ AF8F              ; Algorithm
 255+ AF8F              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 256+ AF8F              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 257+ AF8F              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 258+ AF8F              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 259+ AF8F              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 260+ AF8F              ;
 261+ AF8F              ;
 262+ AF8F 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 263+ AF90 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 264+ AF91 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 265+ AF93 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 266+ AF95 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 267+ AF96 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 268+ AF98 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 269+ AF99 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 270+ AF9A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 271+ AF9C 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 272+ AF9D B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 273+ AF9E 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 274+ AFA0 7C                                   ld      a,h
 275+ AFA1 B5                                   or      l
 276+ AFA2 B3                                   or      e
 277+ AFA3 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 278+ AFA5              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 279+ AFA5 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 280+ AFA6 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 281+ AFA8 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 282+ AFA9 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 283+ AFAB 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 284+ AFAC 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 285+ AFAD ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 286+ AFAF FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 287+ AFB1 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 288+ AFB2 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 289+ AFB3 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 290+ AFB5 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 291+ AFB6 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 292+ AFB7 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 293+ AFB9 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 294+ AFBB 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 295+ AFBC 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 296+ AFBD 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 297+ AFBE CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 298+ AFC0 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 299+ AFC2 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 300+ AFC3 C9                                   ret
 301+ AFC4 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 302+ AFC7                                      ZeroA
 302+ AFC7 AF          >                        xor a
 303+ AFC8 4F                                   ld      c,a
 304+ AFC9 6F                                   ld      l,a
 305+ AFCA C9                                   ret
 306+ AFCB
 307+ AFCB              ;;;
 308+ AFCB              ;;;
 309+ AFCB              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 310+ AFCB              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 311+ AFCB              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 312+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 313+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 314+ AFCB              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 315+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 316+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 317+ AFCB              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 318+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 319+ AFCB              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 320+ AFCB              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 321+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 322+ AFCB              ;;;                        or      l
 323+ AFCB              ;;;                        or      e
 324+ AFCB              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 325+ AFCB              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 326+ AFCB              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 327+ AFCB              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 328+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 329+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 330+ AFCB              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 331+ AFCB              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 332+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 333+ AFCB              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 334+ AFCB              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 335+ AFCB              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 336+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 337+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 338+ AFCB              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 339+ AFCB              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 340+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 341+ AFCB              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 342+ AFCB              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 343+ AFCB              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 344+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 345+ AFCB              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 346+ AFCB              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 347+ AFCB              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 348+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 349+ AFCB              ;;;                        ret
 350+ AFCB              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 351+ AFCB              ;;;                        ZeroA
 352+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 353+ AFCB              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 354+ AFCB              ;;;                        ret
 355+ AFCB
 356+ AFCB              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 357+ AFCB              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 358+ AFCB              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 359+ AFCB              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 360+ AFCB              ;         carry reset
 361+ AFCB              ;
 362+ AFCB              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 363+ AFCB 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 364+ AFCC AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 365+ AFCD 32 CB AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 366+ AFD0 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 367+ AFD1 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 368+ AFD4 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 369+ AFD6 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 370+ AFD8 57                                   ld      d,a
 371+ AFD9 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 372+ AFDB 32 CB AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 373+ AFDE 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 374+ AFDF ED 27 80                             test    $80
 375+ AFE2 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 376+ AFE4 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 377+ AFE6 67                                   ld      h,a
 378+ AFE7 3A CB AF                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 379+ AFEA EE 80                                xor     $80
 380+ AFEC 32 CB AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 381+ AFEF CD 50 AF     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 382+ AFF2 3A CB AF     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 383+ AFF5 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 384+ AFF8 C8                                   ret     z
 385+ AFF9 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 386+ AFFA 95                                   sub 	l
 387+ AFFB 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 388+ AFFC 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 389+ AFFD 94                                   sub 	h
 390+ AFFE 67                                   ld 		h,a
 391+ AFFF C9                                   ret
 392+ B000
 393+ B000 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 394+ B001 32 CB AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 395+ B004 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 396+ B005 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 397+ B008 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 398+ B00A E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 399+ B00C 57                                   ld      d,a
 400+ B00D 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 401+ B00F 32 CB AF                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 402+ B012 CD 50 AF     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 403+ B015 3A CB AF     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 404+ B018 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 405+ B01B C8                                   ret     z
 406+ B01C AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 407+ B01D 95                                   sub 	l
 408+ B01E 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 409+ B01F 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 410+ B020 94                                   sub 	h
 411+ B021 67                                   ld 		h,a
 412+ B022 C9                                   ret
 413+ B023
 414+ B023
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
 660  B023                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ B023              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ B023              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ B023
   4+ B023              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ B023 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ B023 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ B023 ~            			mul
   8+ B023              			ENDM
   9+ B023
  10+ B023              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ B023 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ B023 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ B023 ~            			mul
  14+ B023 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ B023              			ENDM
  16+ B023
  17+ B023
  18+ B023              asm_squa:
  19+ B023 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ B025              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ B025              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ B025              asm_squa2:
  23+ B025 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ B026 57           	ld d,a
  25+ B027 ED 30        	mul
  26+ B029 ED 53 E3 9C  	ld (varP),de
  27+ B02D 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ B02E C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
 661  B02F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ B02F              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ B02F              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ B02F              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ B02F              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ B02F              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ B02F              asm_sqrt:
   7+ B02F 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ B032 61           	ld h,c
   9+ B033 69           	ld l,c
  10+ B034              .sqrloop:
  11+ B034 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ B036 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ B038 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ B039 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ B03A ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ B03C 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ B03E EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ B03F 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ B040 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ B042              .sqrbit:
  21+ B042 19           	add hl,de
  22+ B043 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ B044 B7           	or a
  24+ B045 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ B047              .sqrfi:
  26+ B047 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ B049 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ B04B CB 38        	srl b
  29+ B04D CB 19        	rr c
  30+ B04F 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ B051 C9           	ret
  32+ B052
  33+ B052
  34+ B052              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ B052 3A E5 9D     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ B055 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ B056 3A E6 9D     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ B059 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ B05A CD 2F B0     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ B05D 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ B05E 32 E5 9D     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ B061 C9           	ret
  43+ B062
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 662  B062                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ B062
   2+ B062
   3+ B062
   4+ B062              ;
   5+ B062              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   6+ B062              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   7+ B062              ;           if carry was 0
   8+ B062              ;               if a >= D
   9+ B062              ;                   A = A - D
  10+ B062              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
  11+ B062              ;           else
  12+ B062
  13+ B062              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  14+ B062              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  15+ B062              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  16+ B062              ;
  17+ B062              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
  18+ B062              ;
  19+ B062              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
  20+ B062              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
  21+ B062
  22+ B062 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
  23+ B063 15                                   dec     d
  24+ B064 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
  25+ B066 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
  26+ B068 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
  27+ B06A 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
  28+ B06B B3                                   or      e
  29+ B06C 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
  30+ B06E 14                                   inc     d
  31+ B06F 15                                   dec     d
  32+ B070 CD 1B B2                             call    BC_Div_DE
  33+ B073                                      ZeroA
  33+ B073 AF          >                        xor a
  34+ B074 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
  35+ B075 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
  36+ B077 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
  37+ B078 C9                                   ret
  38+ B079 AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
  39+ B07A 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
  40+ B07B 67                                   ld      h,a
  41+ B07C 6F                                   ld      l,a
  42+ B07D C9                                   ret
  43+ B07E 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
  44+ B080 67                                   ld      h,a
  45+ B081 6F                                   ld      l,a
  46+ B082                                      SetCarryFlag
  46+ B082 37          >                        scf
  47+ B083 C9                                   ret
  48+ B084
  49+ B084              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  50+ B084 06 08        HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
  51+ B086 CB 27                                sla		a							;
  52+ B088 67                                   ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
  53+ B089 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
  54+ B08B 38 03                                jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
  55+ B08D BA                                   cp      d                           ; what was var Q
  56+ B08E 38 03                                jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
  57+ B090              .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
  57+ B090 B7          >                        or a
  58+ B091 9A                                   sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
  59+ B092                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
  59+ B092 B7          >                        or a
  60+ B093 3F           .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
  61+ B094 CB 14                                rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
  62+ B096 10 F1                                djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
  63+ B098 BA           .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
  64+ B099 30 19                                jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
  65+ B09B                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
  65+ B09B B7          >                        or a
  66+ B09C 06 FE        .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
  67+ B09E 68                                   ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
  68+ B09F CB 27        .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
  69+ B0A1 38 0A                                jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
  70+ B0A3 BA                                   cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
  71+ B0A4 38 01                                jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
  72+ B0A6 9A                                   sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
  73+ B0A7 3F           .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
  74+ B0A8 CB 15                                rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
  75+ B0AA 38 F3                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
  76+ B0AC C9                                   ret
  77+ B0AD 9A           .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
  78+ B0AE                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
  78+ B0AE 37          >                        scf
  79+ B0AF CB 15                                rl      l                           ;
  80+ B0B1 38 EC                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
  81+ B0B3 C9                                   ret
  82+ B0B4 2E FF        .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
  83+ B0B6 C9                                   ret
  84+ B0B7
  85+ B0B7 BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
  86+ B0B8 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
  87+ B0BA 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
  88+ B0BC 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
  89+ B0BE CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
  90+ B0C0 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
  91+ B0C2                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
  91+ B0C2 BA          >                        cp      d
  91+ B0C3 DA C8 B0    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
  92+ B0C6 92                                   sub     d
  93+ B0C7                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
  93+ B0C7 B7          >                        or a
  94+ B0C8              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  94+ B0C8 3F          >                        ccf
  95+ B0C9 CB 13                                rl      e
  96+ B0CB 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
  97+ B0CD 7B                                   ld      a,e
  98+ B0CE C9                                   ret
  99+ B0CF 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 100+ B0D0                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 100+ B0D0 37          >                        scf
 101+ B0D1 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 102+ B0D3 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 103+ B0D5 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 104+ B0D6 C9                                   ret
 105+ B0D7 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 106+ B0D9 C9                                   ret
 107+ B0DA 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 108+ B0DC C9                                   ret
 109+ B0DD
 110+ B0DD
 111+ B0DD              ; Divide 8-bit values
 112+ B0DD              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 113+ B0DD              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 114+ B0DD              ;
 115+ B0DD              ;;;Div8:
 116+ B0DD              ;;;    xor a
 117+ B0DD              ;;;    ld b,8
 118+ B0DD              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 119+ B0DD              ;;;    rl e
 120+ B0DD              ;;;    rla
 121+ B0DD              ;;;    sub c
 122+ B0DD              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 123+ B0DD              ;;;    add a,c
 124+ B0DD              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 125+ B0DD              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 126+ B0DD              ;;;    ld b,a0
 127+ B0DD              ;;;    ld a,e
 128+ B0DD              ;;;    rla
 129+ B0DD              ;;;    cpl
 130+ B0DD              ;;;    ret
 131+ B0DD
 132+ B0DD              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 133+ B0DD              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 134+ B0DD              ;;         A is a copy of E
 135+ B0DD              ;;         HL is the remainder
 136+ B0DD              ;;         BC is not changed
 137+ B0DD              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 138+ B0DD              ;140 bytes
 139+ B0DD              ;145cc
 140+ B0DD
 141+ B0DD              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 142+ B0DD ~                                rla
 143+ B0DD ~                                adc     hl,hl
 144+ B0DD ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 145+ B0DD ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 146+ B0DD ~                                add     hl,bc
 147+ B0DD                                  ENDM
 148+ B0DD
 149+ B0DD              DEequDEDivBC:
 150+ B0DD AF               xor a
 151+ B0DE ED 62            sbc hl,hl
 152+ B0E0 7A               ld a,d
 153+ B0E1                  MacroDEDivBC
 153+ B0E1 17          >                    rla
 153+ B0E2 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 153+ B0E4 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 153+ B0E6 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 153+ B0E8 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 154+ B0E9                  MacroDEDivBC
 154+ B0E9 17          >                    rla
 154+ B0EA ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 154+ B0EC ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 154+ B0EE 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 154+ B0F0 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 155+ B0F1                  MacroDEDivBC
 155+ B0F1 17          >                    rla
 155+ B0F2 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 155+ B0F4 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 155+ B0F6 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 155+ B0F8 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 156+ B0F9                  MacroDEDivBC
 156+ B0F9 17          >                    rla
 156+ B0FA ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 156+ B0FC ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 156+ B0FE 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 156+ B100 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 157+ B101                  MacroDEDivBC
 157+ B101 17          >                    rla
 157+ B102 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 157+ B104 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 157+ B106 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 157+ B108 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 158+ B109                  MacroDEDivBC

 158+ B10C ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 158+ B10E 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 158+ B110 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 173+ B160 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 173+ B162 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3

 174+ B165 17               rla
 175+ B166 2F               cpl
 176+ B167 5F               ld e,a
 177+ B168 C9               ret
 178+ B169
 179+ B169
 180+ B169
 181+ B169              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 182+ B169              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 183+ B169              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 184+ B169              ; Our use
 185+ B169              ; BC = A0
 186+ B169              ; DE = 0C
 187+ B169              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 188+ B169              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 188+ B169 B9          >                        cp     c
 188+ B16A D2 95 B1    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 189+ B16D 47                                   ld      b,a
 190+ B16E 59                                   ld      e,c
 191+ B16F 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 192+ B171 16 00                                ld      d,0
 193+ B173 C3 80 B1                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 194+ B176 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 195+ B177 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 196+ B179 21 E5 9D                             ld      hl,varQ
 197+ B17C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 198+ B17D 16 00                                ld      d,0
 199+ B17F 5F                                   ld      e,a
 200+ B180              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 201+ B180 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 202+ B183 78                                   ld      a,b
 203+ B184 06 10                                ld      b,16
 204+ B186 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 205+ B188 17                                   rla			; ...
 206+ B189 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 207+ B18B ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 208+ B18D 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 209+ B18F 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 210+ B190 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 211+ B191 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 212+ B193 47                                   ld   b,a
 213+ B194 C9                                   ret
 214+ B195 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 215+ B198 C9                                   ret
 216+ B199
 217+ B199              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 218+ B199 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 219+ B19B AF                                   xor a
 220+ B19C CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 221+ B19E 17                                   rla
 222+ B19F BA                                   cp d
 223+ B1A0 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 223+ B1A2
 224+ B1A2 0C                                   inc c
 225+ B1A3 92                                   sub d
 226+ B1A4 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 227+ B1A6 C9                                   ret
 228+ B1A7              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 229+ B1A7 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 230+ B1A9 AF                                   xor a
 231+ B1AA CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 232+ B1AC CB 14                                rl	h
 233+ B1AE              ;    add hl,hl
 234+ B1AE 17                                   rla
 235+ B1AF B9                                   cp c
 236+ B1B0 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 237+ B1B2 2C                                   inc l
 238+ B1B3 91                                   sub c
 239+ B1B4 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 240+ B1B6 C9                                   ret
 241+ B1B7              ;
 242+ B1B7              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 243+ B1B7              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 244+ B1B7              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 245+ B1B7              ;
 246+ B1B7              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 247+ B1B7 ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 248+ B1B7 ~            					rla				; ...
 249+ B1B7 ~            					cp	c			; ...
 250+ B1B7 ~            					jr	1F
 251+ B1B7 ~            					sub	c			; ...
 252+ B1B7 ~            1:
 253+ B1B7 ~            					inc	l			; ...
 254+ B1B7              					ENDM
 255+ B1B7
 256+ B1B7
 257+ B1B7
 258+ B1B7              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 259+ B1B7 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 260+ B1BA 78                               ld a,b
 261+ B1BB 06 08                            ld b,8
 262+ B1BD 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 263+ B1BE ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 264+ B1C0 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 265+ B1C2 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 266+ B1C4 19                               add hl,de
 267+ B1C5 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 268+ B1C7 17                               rla
 269+ B1C8 2F                               cpl
 270+ B1C9 47                               ld b,a
 271+ B1CA 79                               ld a,c
 272+ B1CB 48                               ld c,b
 273+ B1CC 06 08                            ld b,8
 274+ B1CE 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 275+ B1CF ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 276+ B1D1 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 277+ B1D3 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 278+ B1D5 19                               add hl,de
 279+ B1D6 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 280+ B1D8 17                               rla
 281+ B1D9 2F                               cpl
 282+ B1DA 41                               ld b,c
 283+ B1DB 4F                               ld c,a
 284+ B1DC C9                               ret
 285+ B1DD
 286+ B1DD
 287+ B1DD              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 288+ B1DD ~                                    rl  e
 289+ B1DD ~                                    rla
 290+ B1DD ~                                    sub c
 291+ B1DD ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 292+ B1DD ~                                    add a,c
 293+ B1DD ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 294+ B1DD                                      ENDM
 295+ B1DD

 298+ B1DE CB 13       >                        rl  e
 298+ B1E0 17          >                        rla

 299+ B1EB 81          >                        add a,c
 299+ B1EC             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 300+ B1EC                                      EDivC_Iteration

 300+ B1F2 81          >                        add a,c

 313+ B21B              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 314+ B21B ~                                    rla
 315+ B21B ~                                    adc	    hl,hl

 322+ B21B
 323+ B21B              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 324+ B21B              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 325+ B21B              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 326+ B21B              ;min: 738cc
 327+ B21B              ;max: 898cc
 328+ B21B              ;avg: 818cc
 329+ B21B              ;144 bytes
 330+ B21B AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 331+ B21C 67                                   ld h,a
 332+ B21D 6F                                   ld l,a
 333+ B21E 93                                   sub e
 334+ B21F 5F                                   ld e,a
