 357+ B29F             >1:
 358+ B29F                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 358+ B29F 17          >                        rla
 358+ B2A0 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 358+ B2A2 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 358+ B2A3 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 358+ B2A5 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 358+ B2A7             >1:
 359+ B2A7 17                                   rla
 360+ B2A8 4F                                   ld c,a
 361+ B2A9 C9                                   ret
 362+ B2AA
 363+ B2AA              ;Inputs:
 364+ B2AA              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 365+ B2AA              ;Outputs:
 366+ B2AA              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 367+ B2AA              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 368+ B2AA              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 369+ B2AA              ;Otherwise:
 370+ B2AA              ;min: 1107cc
 371+ B2AA              ;max: 1319cc
 372+ B2AA              ;avg: 1201cc
 373+ B2AA 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 374+ B2AB AA                                   xor d
 375+ B2AC F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 376+ B2AD              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 377+ B2AD A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 378+ B2AE F2 B7 B2                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 379+ B2B1 AF                                   xor a
 380+ B2B2 91                                   sub c
 381+ B2B3 4F                                   ld c,a
 382+ B2B4 9F                                   sbc a,a
 383+ B2B5 90                                   sub b
 384+ B2B6 47                                   ld b,a
 385+ B2B7 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 386+ B2B8 B2                                   or d
 387+ B2B9 FA C2 B2                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 388+ B2BC AF                                   xor a
 389+ B2BD 93                                   sub e
 390+ B2BE 5F                                   ld e,a
 391+ B2BF 9F                                   sbc a,a
 392+ B2C0 92                                   sub d
 393+ B2C1 57                                   ld d,a
 394+ B2C2 B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 395+ B2C3 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 396+ B2C5 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 397+ B2C7 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 398+ B2C8 83                                   add a,e
 399+ B2C9 7A                                   ld a,d
 400+ B2CA 8C                                   adc a,h
 401+ B2CB 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 402+ B2CD 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 403+ B2CE 79                                   ld a,c
 404+ B2CF CD EA B2                             call div_fixed88_sub
 405+ B2D2 4F                                   ld c,a
 406+ B2D3 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 407+ B2D4 CD EA B2                             call div_fixed88_sub
 408+ B2D7 51                                   ld d,c
 409+ B2D8 5F                                   ld e,a
 410+ B2D9 F1                                   pop af
 411+ B2DA F0                                   ret p
 412+ B2DB AF                                   xor a
 413+ B2DC 93                                   sub e
 414+ B2DD 5F                                   ld e,a
 415+ B2DE 9F                                   sbc a,a
 416+ B2DF 92                                   sub d
 417+ B2E0 57                                   ld d,a
 418+ B2E1 C9                                   ret
 419+ B2E2
 420+ B2E2 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 421+ B2E5 F1                                   pop af
 422+ B2E6 F0                                   ret p
 423+ B2E7 13                                   inc de
 424+ B2E8 1C                                   inc e
 425+ B2E9 C9                                   ret
 426+ B2EA
 427+ B2EA              ;min: 456cc
 428+ B2EA              ;max: 536cc
 429+ B2EA              ;avg: 496cc
 430+ B2EA 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 431+ B2EC 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 432+ B2ED ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 433+ B2EF 19                                   add hl,de
 434+ B2F0 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 435+ B2F2 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 436+ B2F4 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 437+ B2F6 8F                                   adc a,a
 438+ B2F7 C9                                   ret
 439+ B2F8
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 663  B2F8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ B2F8              asm_tis2:
   2+ B2F8              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ B2F8              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ B2F8 F5           	push af
   5+ B2F9 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ B2FB 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ B2FC 3A E5 9D     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ B2FF 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ B300 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ B301 BB           	cp e
  11+ B302 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ B304 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ B306 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ B308 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ B309 3A E5 9D     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ B30C 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ B30D CD A7 B1     	call asm_div16
  18+ B310 F1           	pop af
  19+ B311 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ B313 B5           	or l
  21+ B314 C9           	ret
  22+ B315              .tis2_set96:
  23+ B315 F1           	pop af
  24+ B316 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ B318 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ B31A C9           	ret
  27+ B31B
  28+ B31B
  29+ B31B              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ B31B              squareregfx:
  31+ B31B 3A 8E C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ B31E 57           	ld d,a
  33+ B31F 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ B320 ED 30        	mul
  35+ B322 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ B323              squareregfy:
  37+ B323 3A 90 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ B326 57           	ld d,a
  39+ B327 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ B328 ED 30        	mul
  41+ B32A 19           	add hl,de
  42+ B32B              squareregfz:
  43+ B32B 3A 92 C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ B32E 57           	ld d,a
  45+ B32F 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ B330 ED 30        	mul
  47+ B332 19           	add hl,de
  48+ B333 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ B334              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ B334 CD 2F B0     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ B337 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ B338 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ B339 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ B33A              normfx:
  55+ B33A 3A 8E C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ B33D E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ B33E 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ B33F 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ B340 CD F8 B2     	call asm_tis2
  60+ B343 32 8E C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ B346              normfy:
  62+ B346 3A 90 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ B349 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ B34A 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ B34B 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ B34C CD F8 B2     	call asm_tis2
  67+ B34F 32 90 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ B352              normfz:
  69+ B352 3A 92 C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ B355 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ B356 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ B357 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ B358 CD F8 B2     	call asm_tis2
  74+ B35B 32 92 C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ B35E              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ B35E C9           	ret
  77+ B35F
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 664  B35F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ B35F              ; Input:
   2+ B35F              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ B35F              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ B35F              ; Output:
   5+ B35F              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ B35F              ;
   7+ B35F              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ B35F              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ B35F              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ B35F              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ B35F              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ B35F              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ B35F              ;
  14+ B35F
  15+ B35F E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ B360 A7                               and     a
  17+ B361 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ B363 E1                               pop     hl
  19+ B364 C9                               ret
  20+ B365
  21+ B365              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ B365              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ B365
  24+ B365 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ B367 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ B368 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ B36A 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ B36B 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ B36C E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ B36E 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ B36F A7                               and     a
  32+ B370 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ B372 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ B374 C9                               ret
  35+ B375
  36+ B375
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 665  B375                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ B375              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ B375              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ B375              negate16:
   4+ B375              negate16hl:
   5+ B375                      ; Input:
   6+ B375                      ;       HL = value
   7+ B375                      ; Output:
   8+ B375                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ B375                      ; Destroys:
  10+ B375                      ;       AF
  11+ B375                      ;
  12+ B375 AF           	xor 	a
  13+ B376 95           	sub 	l
  14+ B377 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ B378 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ B379 94           	sub 	h
  17+ B37A 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ B37B C9           	ret
  19+ B37C
  20+ B37C              negate16de:
  21+ B37C AF           	xor 	a
  22+ B37D 93           	sub 	e
  23+ B37E 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ B37F 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ B380 92           	sub 	d
  26+ B381 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ B382 C9           	ret
  28+ B383
  29+ B383              negate16bc:
  30+ B383 AF           	xor 	a
  31+ B384 91           	sub 	c
  32+ B385 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ B386 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ B387 90           	sub 	b
  35+ B388 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ B389 C9           	ret
  37+ B38A
  38+ B38A
  39+ B38A              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ B38A ~            					xor 	a
  41+ B38A ~            					sub 	l
  42+ B38A ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ B38A ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ B38A ~            					sub 	h
  45+ B38A ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ B38A              					ENDM
  47+ B38A
  48+ B38A              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ B38A ~            					xor 	a
  50+ B38A ~                                sub 	e
  51+ B38A ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ B38A ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ B38A ~                                sub 	d
  54+ B38A ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ B38A              					ENDM
  56+ B38A              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ B38A ~            					xor 	a
  58+ B38A ~                                sub 	c
  59+ B38A ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ B38A ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ B38A ~                                sub 	b
  62+ B38A ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ B38A              					ENDM
  64+ B38A
  65+ B38A              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ B38A ~            					xor 	a
  67+ B38A ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ B38A ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ B38A ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ B38A ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ B38A ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ B38A              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
 666  B38A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ B38A DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ B38C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ B38C BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ B38D D2 A2 B3    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ B390 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ B391 CD 99 B1                             call		asm_div8
   5+ B394 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ B395 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ B397 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ B398 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ B39A 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ B39B 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ B39C DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ B39E E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ B3A0 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ B3A1 C9                                   ret
  15+ B3A2              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ B3A2              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ B3A2 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ B3A4 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ B3A6 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ B3A8 C9                                   ret
  21+ B3A9
  22+ B3A9
  23+ B3A9
  24+ B3A9
  25+ B3A9              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ B3A9                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ B3A9 3A 8E C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ B3AC DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ B3AE E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ B3B0              N96SQX:
  31+ B3B0              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ B3B0 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ B3B1 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ B3B2 ED 30       >			mul
  32+ B3B4 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ B3B5 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ B3B6              N96SQY:
  35+ B3B6 3A 8F C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ B3B9 DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ B3BB E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ B3BD              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ B3BD 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ B3BE 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ B3BF ED 30       >			mul
  39+ B3C1 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ B3C2              N96SQZ:
  41+ B3C2 3A 90 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ B3C5 FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ B3C7 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ B3C9              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ B3C9 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ B3CA 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ B3CB ED 30       >			mul
  45+ B3CD              N96SQADD:
  46+ B3CD 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ B3CE EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ B3CF              N96SQRT:
  49+ B3CF CD 2F B0     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ B3D2              N96NORMX:
  51+ B3D2 3A 8E C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ B3D5 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ B3D7 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ B3D8 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ B3D9 CD DD B5     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ B3DC 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ B3DD DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ B3DF E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ B3E1 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ B3E2 32 8E C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ B3E5              N96NORMY:
  62+ B3E5 3A 8F C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ B3E8 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ B3EA 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ B3EB 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ B3EC CD DD B5     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ B3EF 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ B3F0 DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ B3F2 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ B3F4 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ B3F5 32 8F C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ B3F8              N96NORMZ:
  73+ B3F8 3A 90 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ B3FB E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ B3FD 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ B3FE 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ B3FF CD DD B5     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ B402 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ B403 FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ B405 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ B407 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ B408 32 90 C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ B40B C9           	ret
  84+ B40C
  85+ B40C              ; Normalise vector
  86+ B40C              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  87+ B40C              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  88+ B40C              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  89+ B40C              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  90+ B40C              ;
  91+ B40C              ;
  92+ B40C              ;
  93+ B40C
  94+ B40C              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  95+ B40C 3A 8E C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  96+ B40F                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  96+ B40F 5F          >			ld	e,a
  96+ B410 57          >			ld  d,a
  96+ B411 ED 30       >			mul
  97+ B413 7A                                   ld		a,d
  98+ B414 32 E6 9D                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  99+ B417 7B                                   ld		a,e
 100+ B418 32 E5 9D                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
 101+ B41B 32 E3 9C                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
 102+ B41E 3A 8F C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 103+ B421                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 103+ B421 5F          >			ld	e,a
 103+ B422 57          >			ld  d,a
 103+ B423 ED 30       >			mul
 104+ B425 7A                                   ld		a,d
 105+ B426 32 01 9E                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 106+ B429 7B                                   ld		a,e
 107+ B42A 32 E3 9C                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 108+ B42D 21 E5 9D                             ld		hl,varQ
 109+ B430 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 110+ B431 32 E5 9D                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 111+ B434 3A 01 9E                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 112+ B437 21 E6 9D                             ld		hl,varR
 113+ B43A 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 114+ B43B 32 E6 9D                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 115+ B43E 3A 90 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 116+ B441                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 116+ B441 5F          >			ld	e,a
 116+ B442 57          >			ld  d,a
 116+ B443 ED 30       >			mul
 117+ B445 7A                                   ld		a,d
 118+ B446 32 01 9E                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 119+ B449 7B                                   ld		a,e
 120+ B44A 32 E3 9C                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 121+ B44D 21 E5 9D                             ld		hl,varQ
 122+ B450 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 123+ B451 32 E5 9D                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 124+ B454 3A 01 9E                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 125+ B457 21 E6 9D                             ld		hl,varR
 126+ B45A 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 127+ B45B 32 E6 9D                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 128+ B45E CD 52 B0                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 129+ B461 3A 8E C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 130+ B464 CD D7 B5                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 131+ B467 32 8E C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 132+ B46A 3A 8F C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 133+ B46D CD D7 B5                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 134+ B470 32 8F C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 135+ B473 3A 8F C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 136+ B476 CD D7 B5                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 137+ B479 32 8F C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 138+ B47C C9                                   ret
 139+ B47D
 140+ B47D
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 667  B47D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ B47D              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ B47D              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ B47D              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ B47D              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ B47D              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ B47D              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ B47D              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ B47D 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ B480 CD 96 B4     	call	Num1
  10+ B483 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ B486 CD 96 B4     	call	Num1
  12+ B489 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ B48C CD 96 B4     	call	Num1
  14+ B48F 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ B491 CD 96 B4     	call	Num1
  16+ B494 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ B496              Num1:
  18+ B496 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ B498              .Num2:
  20+ B498 3C           	inc	a
  21+ B499 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ B49A 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ B49C ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ B49E 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ B49F 13           	inc	de
  26+ B4A0 C9           	ret
  27+ B4A1
  28+ B4A1              DispAtoDE:
  29+ B4A1 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ B4A3 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ B4A4 C3 7D B4     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ B4A7
  33+ B4A7              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ B4A7 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ B4A9 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ B4AA 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ B4AD CD BD B4     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ B4B0 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ B4B2 CD 96 B4     	call	Num1
  40+ B4B5 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ B4B7 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ B4B8 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ B4B9 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ B4BB 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ B4BD              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ B4BD 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ B4BF              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ B4BF 3C           	inc	a
  49+ B4C0 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ B4C1 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ B4C3 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ B4C5 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ B4C7              .Blank:
  54+ B4C7 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ B4C9              .DontBlank:
  56+ B4C9 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ B4CB 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ B4CC 13           	inc	de
  59+ B4CD C9           	ret
  60+ B4CE
  61+ B4CE              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ B4CE FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ B4D0 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ B4D2 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ B4D4 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ B4D5 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ B4D8 CD E4 B4     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ B4DB 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ B4DD CD E4 B4     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ B4E0 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ B4E2 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ B4E4              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ B4E4 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ B4E6              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ B4E6 3C           	inc	a
  76+ B4E7 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ B4E8 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ B4EA FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ B4EC 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ B4EE              .Blank:
  81+ B4EE 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ B4F0              .DontBlank:
  83+ B4F0 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ B4F2 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ B4F3 13           	inc	de
  86+ B4F4 C9           	ret
  87+ B4F5              .NoStock:
  88+ B4F5 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ B4F7 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ B4F8 13           	inc	de
  91+ B4F9 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ B4FA 13           	inc	de
  93+ B4FB 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ B4FD 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ B4FE 13           	inc de
  96+ B4FF C9           	ret
  97+ B500
  98+ B500
  99+ B500              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ B500              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ B500              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ B500              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ B500 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ B504 0A 00 00 00
 103+ B508 64 00 00 00
 103+ B50C E8 03 00 00
 103+ B510 10 27 00 00
 104+ B514 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ B518 40 42 0F 00
 104+ B51C 80 96 98 00
 104+ B520 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ B524 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ B528 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ B52C
 107+ B52C              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ B52C CD 3B B5     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ B52F FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ B532 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ B535 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ B537 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ B53A C9                                   ret
 114+ B53B
 115+ B53B DD 22 28 B5  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ B53F ED 53 2A B5                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ B543 DD 21 24 B5                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ B547 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ B549 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ B54B 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ B54D B7                                   or a
 122+ B54E DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ B551 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ B554 2A 28 B5                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ B557 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ B559 22 28 B5                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ B55C DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ B55F DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ B562 2A 2A B5                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ B565 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ B567 22 2A B5                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ B56A 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ B56C 0C                                   inc c
 134+ B56D 3C                                   inc a
 135+ B56E 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ B570 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ B573 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ B576 2A 28 B5                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ B579 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ B57A 22 28 B5                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ B57D DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ B580 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ B583 2A 2A B5                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ B586 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ B588 22 2A B5                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ B58B 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ B58E DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ B590 0C                                   inc c
 149+ B591 0D                                   dec c
 150+ B592 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ B594 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ B597 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ B599 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ B59B 3A 28 B5                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ B59E C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ B5A0 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ B5A3 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ B5A7 C9                                   ret
 159+ B5A8
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
 668  B5A8              ;;    include "./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm"
 669  B5A8              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
 670  B5A8              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
 671  B5A8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ B5A8              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ B5A8 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ B5A9 D2 C4 B5    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ B5AC 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ B5AE CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ B5B0                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ B5B0 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ B5B1 DA C7 B5    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ B5B4 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ B5B5 37                                   scf
   7+ B5B6 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ B5B8 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ B5BA 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ B5BB CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ B5BD CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ B5BF 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ B5C0 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ B5C2 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ B5C3 C9                                   ret
  16+ B5C4 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ B5C6 C9                                   ret
  18+ B5C7 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ B5C8 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ B5CA 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ B5CC C3 BA B5                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ B5CF
  23+ B5CF
  24+ B5CF              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ B5CF              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ B5CF              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ B5CF CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ B5D1 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ B5D3 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ B5D5 CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ B5D7              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ B5D7              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ B5D7              TIS2:
  34+ B5D7 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ B5D8 3A E5 9D     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ B5DB 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ B5DC 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ B5DD              AequAdivDmul96:
  39+ B5DD 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  40+ B5DE E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  41+ B5E0              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  41+ B5E0 BA          >                        cp     d
  41+ B5E1 D2 01 B6    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  42+ B5E4 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  43+ B5E6              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  44+ B5E6 CB 27        	sla			a
  45+ B5E8              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  45+ B5E8 BA          >                        cp      d
  45+ B5E9 DA 07 B6    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  46+ B5EC 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  47+ B5ED 37           	scf
  48+ B5EE CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ B5F0 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ B5F2              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  51+ B5F2 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  52+ B5F3 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  53+ B5F5 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  54+ B5F7 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  55+ B5F8 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  56+ B5FA 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  57+ B5FB 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  58+ B5FC 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  59+ B5FD E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  60+ B5FF B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  61+ B600 C9           	ret
  62+ B601              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  63+ B601              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  64+ B601 79           	ld			a,c
  65+ B602 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  66+ B604 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  67+ B606 C9           	ret
  68+ B607              .TIS2SkipSub:
  69+ B607 B7           	or			a
  70+ B608 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  71+ B60A 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  72+ B60C C3 F2 B5     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  73+ B60F
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 672  B60F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ B60F              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ B60F              fmltu:
   3+ B60F 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ B610 3A E5 9D                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ B613 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ B614 ED 30                                mul
   7+ B616 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ B617 C9                                   ret
   9+ B618
  10+ B618 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ B619 ED 30                                mul
  12+ B61B 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ B61C C9                                   ret
  14+ B61D
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
 673  B61D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ B61D              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ B61D              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ B61D 21 C5 A0     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ B620 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ B622 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ B624 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ B625 C3 31 B6     		jp		DV41
   8+ B628              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ B628 21 C5 A0     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ B62B 3A CD 9C     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ B62E ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ B630 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ B631              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ B631 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ B632 3A E1 9D     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ B635              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ B635 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ B637 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ B639 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ B63A AF           		xor		a
  21+ B63B              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ B63B CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ B63D 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ B63F BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ B640 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ B642              DV8:
  27+ B642 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ B643 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ B644              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ B644 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ B646 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ B648              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ B648              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ B648 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ B64A 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ B64B              .RollRemainder:
  37+ B64B CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ B64D 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ B64F B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ B650 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ B652              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ B652 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ B653              .DontSBC:
  44+ B653 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ B655 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ B657 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ B658 32 E6 9D     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ B65B 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ B65C 32 E3 9C     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ B65F C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ B660              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ B660 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ B661 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ B662 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ B664 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ B666 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ B667 32 E6 9D     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ B66A 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ B66B 32 E3 9C     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ B66E C9           		ret
  61+ B66F              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ B66F 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ B671 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ B672 32 E6 9D     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ B675 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ B676 32 E3 9C     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ B679 C9           		ret
  68+ B67A
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
 674  B67A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ B67A
   2+ B67A              asm_defmutl:
   3+ B67A              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ B67A              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ B67A ED 30        	mul
   6+ B67C 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ B67D C9           	ret
   8+ B67E
   9+ B67E
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
 675  B67E              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
 676  B67E              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
 677  B67E              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
 678  B67E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ B67E              APequQmulA:
   2+ B67E              asm_mult1:
   3+ B67E              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ B67E FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ B680 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ B682 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ B683 3A E5 9D     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ B686 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ B687 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ B689 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ B68B AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ B68C E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ B68E 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ B68F 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ B690 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ B692 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ B693 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ B694 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ B696 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ B697 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ B699 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ B69A 32 E3 9C     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ B69D 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ B69E B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ B69F 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ B6A0 C9           	ret
  27+ B6A1              .mul0:
  28+ B6A1 AF           	xor	a
  29+ B6A2 32 E3 9C     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ B6A5 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ B6A6 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ B6A7 C9           	ret
  33+ B6A8
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 679  B6A8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ B6A8              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ B6A8              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ B6A8              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ B6A8              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ B6A8              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ B6A8              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ B6A8              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ B6A8              LL38:
   9+ B6A8              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ B6A8              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ B6A8              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ B6A8              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ B6A8              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ B6A8              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ B6A8              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ B6A8              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ B6A8              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ B6A8              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ B6A8              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ B6A8              ;	ret
  21+ B6A8              ; calculation table
  22+ B6A8              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ B6A8              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ B6A8              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ B6A8              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ B6A8              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ B6A8              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ B6A8              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ B6A8              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ B6A8              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ B6A8
  32+ B6A8              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ B6A8              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ B6A8              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ B6A8              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ B6A8
  37+ B6A8
  38+ B6A8              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ B6A8 21 E7 9D     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ B6AB AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ B6AC FA B7 B6     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ B6AF 3A E5 9D     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ B6B2 21 E6 9D     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ B6B5 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ B6B6 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ B6B7              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ B6B7 3A E6 9D     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ B6BA 21 E5 9D     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ B6BD              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ B6BD              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ B6BD B7          >                        or a
  51+ B6BE 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ B6BF 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ B6C1              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ B6C1              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ B6C1              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ B6C1 C9           	ret
  57+ B6C2              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ B6C2 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ B6C4 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ B6C6 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ B6C8 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ B6C9 3A E7 9D     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ B6CC EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ B6CE 32 E7 9D     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ B6D1 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ B6D2                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ B6D2 B7          >                        or a
  67+ B6D3 C9           	ret
  68+ B6D4              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ B6D4 32 E7 9D         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ B6D7                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ B6D7 B7          >                        or a
  71+ B6D8 C9               ret
  72+ B6D9              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ B6D9              ;--	push	bc
  74+ B6D9              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ B6D9              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ B6D9              ;--	sub		b
  77+ B6D9              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ B6D9              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ B6D9              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ B6D9              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ B6D9              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ B6D9              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ B6D9              ;--	ret
  84+ B6D9
  85+ B6D9              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ B6D9              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ B6D9              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ B6D9              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ B6D9              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ B6D9              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ B6D9              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ B6D9              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ B6D9              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ B6D9              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ B6D9              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ B6D9              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ B6D9              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ B6D9              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ B6D9              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ B6D9              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ B6D9              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ B6D9              ;;;;	ret
 109+ B6D9              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ B6D9              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ B6D9              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ B6D9              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ B6D9              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ B6D9              ;;;;	ret
 117+ B6D9              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ B6D9              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ B6D9              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ B6D9              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ B6D9              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ B6D9              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ B6D9              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ B6D9              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ B6D9              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ B6D9              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ B6D9              ;;;;	ret
 134+ B6D9              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ B6D9              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ B6D9              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ B6D9              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ B6D9              ;;;;	ret

   1+ B6D9              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ B6D9              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ B6D9              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ B6D9

   6+ B6D9              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ B6D9 3A CD 9C     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ B6DC 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ B6DD              moveship4breg:
  10+ B6DD              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ B6DD              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ B6DD              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ B6DD 3A FB 9C     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ B6E0 32 E5 9D     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ B6E3 21 0E C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ B6E6 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ B6E7 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ B6E9 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ B6EA 32 E6 9D     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ B6ED 23           		inc		hl
  21+ B6EE 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ B6EF 32 E7 9D     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ B6F2 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ B6F3 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ B6F4 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ B6F5 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y
  27+ B6F6 32 E3 9C     		ld		(varP),a					; P  \ over-written	 P = nosevx lo
  28+ B6F9 23           		inc		hl
  29+ B6FA 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y
  30+ B6FB EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip sign  AP = nosevx * - 1
  31+ B6FD CD BF AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ B700 23                   inc     hl
  33+ B701 23                   inc     hl
  34+ B702 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  35+ B703 2B                   dec     hl
  36+ B704 3A CC 9C             ld      a,(regX)
  37+ B707 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-aX   \ their comment
  38+ B708 32 E3 9C             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ B70B 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ B70C 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ B70D 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ B70E 32 E6 9D             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ B711 23                   inc     hl
  44+ B712 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;  INWK+1,Y
  45+ B713 32 E7 9D             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  46+ B716 23                   inc     hl
  47+ B717 23                   inc     hl
  48+ B718 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ B719 CD BF AE             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ B71C 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ B71D 2B                   dec     hl
  52+ B71E 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+1,Y  \ hi
  53+ B71F 3A CC 9C             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ B722 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ B723 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ B724 32 E3 9C             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  57+ B727 3A EE 9C             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ B72A 32 E5 9D             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ B72D 23                   inc     hl
  60+ B72E 23                   inc     hl
  61+ B72F 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ B730 32 E6 9D             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ B733 23                   inc     hl
  64+ B734 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  65+ B735 32 E7 9D             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ B738 23                   inc     hl
  67+ B739 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ B73A 32 E3 9C             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ B73D 23                   inc     hl
  70+ B73E 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ B73F EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ B741 CD BF AE             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ B744 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ B745 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ B746 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ B747 3A CC 9C             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ B74A 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ B74B 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment
  79+ B74C 32 E3 9C             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  80+ B74F 23                   inc     hl
  81+ B750 23                   inc     hl
  82+ B751 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  83+ B752 32 E6 9D             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  84+ B755 23                   inc     hl
  85+ B756 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y

  88+ B75B 2B                   dec     hl
  89+ B75C 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y

 681  B769              ;INCLUDE "MoveShip5-MVS5.asm"
 682  B769              ;INCLUDE "PAequAmulQusgn-MLU2.asm"
 683  B769              ;INCLUDE "PAequDustYIdxYmulQ-MLU1.asm"
 684  B769              ;INCLUDE "PlanetP12addInwkX-MVT6.asm"
 685  B769                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ B769              ;;;LL28:
   2+ B769              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ B769              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ B769              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ B769              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ B769              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ B769              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ B769              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ B769              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ B769              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ B769              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ B769              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ B769              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ B769              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ B769              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ B769              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ B769              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ B769              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ B769              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ B769              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ B769              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ B769              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ B769              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ B769              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ B769              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ B769              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ B769              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ B769              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ B769              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ B769              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ B769              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ B769              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ B769              ;;;	ret
  34+ B769              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ B769              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ B769              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ B769              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ B769              ;;;	ret
  39+ B769
  40+ B769              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ B769 59             ld    e,c
  42+ B76A 67             ld    h,a
  43+ B76B 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ B76D              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ B76D 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ B76E B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ B76F C8             ret z
  48+ B770 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ B773 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ B775              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ B775 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ B777 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ B778 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ B77A C9             ret
  55+ B77B
  56+ B77B              HL_Div_C:
  57+ B77B              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ B77B              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ B77B              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ B77B 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ B77D AF                   xor a
  62+ B77E              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ B77E 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ B77F 17                   rla
  65+ B780 B9                   cp c
  66+ B781 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ B783 91                   sub c
  68+ B784 2C                   inc l
  69+ B785              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ B785 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ B787 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ B788 32 E6 9D             ld  (varR),a
  73+ B78B C9                   ret
  74+ B78C
  75+ B78C
  76+ B78C
  77+ B78C              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ B78C              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ B78C              BFRDIV:
  80+ B78C F5           		push	af
  81+ B78D 3A E5 9D     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ B790 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ B791 F1           		pop		af
  84+ B792 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ B794 CA AB B7     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ B797              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ B797 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ B799 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ B79A              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ B79A 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ B79C AF           		xor a
  92+ B79D              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ B79D 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ B79E 17           		rla
  95+ B79F B9           		cp c
  96+ B7A0 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ B7A2 2C           		inc l
  98+ B7A3 91           		sub c
  99+ B7A4              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ B7A4 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ B7A6 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ B7A7 32 E6 9D     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ B7AA C9           		ret
 104+ B7AB              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ B7AB 32 E6 9D     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ B7AE C9           		ret
 107+ B7AF              ;	push	af
 108+ B7AF              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ B7AF              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ B7AF              ;	pop		af
 111+ B7AF              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ B7AF              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ B7AF              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ B7AF              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ B7AF              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ B7AF              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ B7AF              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ B7AF              ;	sla		a
 119+ B7AF              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ B7AF              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ B7AF              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ B7AF              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ B7AF              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ B7AF              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ B7AF              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ B7AF              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ B7AF              ;	scf
 128+ B7AF              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ B7AF              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ B7AF              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ B7AF              ;LL2:
 132+ B7AF              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ B7AF              ;LL2Good:
 134+ B7AF              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ B7AF              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ B7AF              ;	ret
 137+ B7AF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
 686  B7AF                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ B7AF              RequAdivQ:
   2+ B7AF              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ B7AF              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ B7AF 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ B7B0 3A E5 9D     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ B7B3 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ B7B5 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ B7B7 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ B7B8 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ B7BA AF               xor a
  11+ B7BB              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ B7BB CB 21            sla c
  13+ B7BD 17               rla
  14+ B7BE BA               cp d
  15+ B7BF 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ B7C1 0C               inc c
  17+ B7C2 92               sub d
  18+ B7C3              LL64:
  19+ B7C3 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ B7C5 32 E4 9D     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ B7C8 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ B7C9 32 E6 9D     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ B7CC C9               ret
  24+ B7CD              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ B7CD 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ B7CF 32 E6 9D     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ B7D2 32 E4 9D     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ B7D5 C9           	ret
  29+ B7D6
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
 687  B7D6              ;    INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RSequABSrs-LL129.asm"

   1+ B7D6              asm_mult12:
   2+ B7D6              RSequQmulA:
   3+ B7D6              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ B7D6 CD 7E B6     	call APequQmulA
   5+ B7D9 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ B7DA 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ B7DB 32 E7 9D     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ B7DE 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ B7DF 32 E6 9D     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ B7E2 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ B7E3 C9           	ret
  12+ B7E4

   1++B7E4              CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15:
   2++B7E4                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX+1 ,XX15VecX
   2++B7E4 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
   2++B7E7 32 8E C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecX),a
   3++B7EA                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, XX15VecY
   3++B7EA 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
   3++B7ED 32 8F C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecY),a
   4++B7F0                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
   4++B7F0 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
   4++B7F3 32 90 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecZ),a
   5++B7F6 C9                   ret

   9++B800 32 8F C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecY),a
