  32+ B856
  33+ B856              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ B856              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ B856              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ B856 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ B857 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ B858 32 E5 9D     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ B85B 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ B85C EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ B85E CD BF AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ B861              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ B861              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ B861              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ B861 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ B862 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ B864 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ B865 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ B866 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ B868 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ B86A              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ B86A CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ B86C              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ B86C FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ B86E DA 7B B8    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ B871 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ B873 37           		scf
  56+ B874 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ B876 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ B878              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ B878 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ B879 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ B87A C9           		ret
  62+ B87B              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ B87B B7           	or			a
  64+ B87C CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ B87E 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ B880 C3 78 B8     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ B883
  68+ B883              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ B883              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ B883
  71+ B883
  72+ B883
  73+ B883
  74+ B883              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ B883 CD AE B9     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ B886 32 20 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ B889 C3 BF B8     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ B88C
  79+ B88C              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ B88C AF           		xor		a
  81+ B88D 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ B88E 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ B891 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ B893 CA 83 B8     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ B896 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ B899 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ B89A 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ B89D CD 74 B9     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ B8A0 32 1E C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ B8A3 C3 BF B8     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ B8A6              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ B8A6              TIDY:
  93+ B8A6 DD 01                break
  94+ B8A8              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ B8A8              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ B8A8 CD E4 B7     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ B8AB CD A9 B3     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ B8AE CD 1D B8     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ B8B1              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ B8B1 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ B8B4 E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ B8B6 CA 8C B8     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ B8B9              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ B8B9 CD 3A B9             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ B8BC 32 1C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ B8BF              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ B8BF CD F7 B7     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ B8C2 CD A9 B3     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ B8C5              ;calc sidev x
 110+ B8C5 CD 30 B8     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ B8C8 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ B8CB 32 E5 9D     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ B8CE 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ B8D1 CD D6 B7     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ B8D4 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ B8D7 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ B8D8 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ B8DB CD 56 B8     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ B8DE                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ B8DE A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ B8DF CA E4 B8    >                        jp	    z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ B8E2 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ B8E4              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ B8E4 32 16 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ B8E7              ;calc sidev y
 124+ B8E7 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ B8EA 32 E5 9D     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ B8ED 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ B8F0 CD D6 B7     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ B8F3 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ B8F6 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ B8F7 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ B8FA CD 56 B8     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ B8FD                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ B8FD A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ B8FE CA 03 B9    >                        jp	    z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ B901 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ B903              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ B903 32 24 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ B906              ;calc sidev z
 137+ B906 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ B909 32 E5 9D     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ B90C 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ B90F CD D6 B7     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ B912 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ B915 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ B916 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ B919 CD 56 B8     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ B91C                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ B91C A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ B91D CA 22 B9    >                        jp	    z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ B920 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ B922              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ B922 32 18 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ B925              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ B925 21 21 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ B928 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ B92A AF                   xor     a
 153+ B92B              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ B92B 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ B92C 23           		inc		hl
 156+ B92D 23           		inc		hl
 157+ B92E 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ B930 CD 0A B8     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ B933 CD A9 B3     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ B936              ;calc sidev x
 161+ B936 CD 43 B8     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ B939
 163+ B939 C9           		ret
 164+ B93A
 165+ B93A
 166+ B93A
 167+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ B93A              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ B93A
 239+ B93A
 240+ B93A              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ B93A              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 242+ B93A              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ B93A 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ B93D 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 243+ B940 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ B943 CD D6 B7     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ B946              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ B946 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ B949 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 246+ B94C 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ B94F CD BF AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ B952 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ B953 E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ B955 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ B957              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ B957 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ B95A 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ B95B E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ B95D FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ B95F FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ B961 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ B962 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ B964 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ B965 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 261+ B966 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ B967 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ B969 CD 1B B2     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ B96C FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ B96E EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ B970 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ B972 B0           		or		b
 268+ B973 C9           		ret
 269+ B974
 270+ B974
 271+ B974              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ B974              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 273+ B974              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ B974 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ B977 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 274+ B97A 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ B97D CD D6 B7     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ B980              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ B980 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ B983 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 277+ B986 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ B989 CD BF AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ B98C 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ B98D E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ B98F FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ B991 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ B994 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ B995 E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ B997 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ B999 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ B99B 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ B99C E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ B99E 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ B99F 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 291+ B9A0 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ B9A1 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ B9A3 CD 1B B2     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ B9A6 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ B9A8 EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ B9AA E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ B9AC B0           		or		b
 298+ B9AD C9           		ret
 299+ B9AE
 300+ B9AE              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ B9AE              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 302+ B9AE              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ B9AE 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ B9B1 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 303+ B9B4 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ B9B7 CD D6 B7     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ B9BA              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ B9BA 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ B9BD 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 306+ B9C0 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ B9C3 CD BF AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ B9C6 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ B9C7 E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ B9C9 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ B9CB 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ B9CE 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ B9CF E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ B9D1 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ B9D3 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ B9D5 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ B9D6 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ B9D8 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ B9D9 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 320+ B9DA 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ B9DB 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ B9DD CD 1B B2     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ B9E0 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ B9E2 EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ B9E4 E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ B9E6 B0           		or		b
 327+ B9E7 C9           		ret
 328+ B9E8
 329+ B9E8
 330+ B9E8
 331+ B9E8              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ B9E8              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ B9E8              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ B9E8              ;;		push	bc
 335+ B9E8              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ B9E8              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ B9E8              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ B9E8              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ B9E8              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ B9E8              ;;		push	bc
 341+ B9E8              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ B9E8              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ B9E8              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ B9E8              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ B9E8              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ B9E8              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ B9E8              ;;		push	bc
 348+ B9E8              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ B9E8              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ B9E8              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ B9E8              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ B9E8              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ B9E8              ;;		push	bc
 354+ B9E8              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ B9E8              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ B9E8              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ B9E8              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ B9E8              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ B9E8              ;;		push	bc
 360+ B9E8              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ B9E8              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ B9E8              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ B9E8              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ B9E8              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ B9E8              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ B9E8              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ B9E8              ;;		push	bc
 368+ B9E8              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ B9E8              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ B9E8              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ B9E8              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a

 373+ B9E8              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ B9E8              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ B9E8              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX

 381+ B9E8
 382+ B9E8              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 383+ B9E8              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 384+ B9E8              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv

 691  B9E8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ B9E8
   2+ B9E8              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ B9E8 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ B9E9 D2 07 BA    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ B9EC 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ B9EE CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ B9F0 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ B9F2                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ B9F2 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ B9F3 DA F8 B9    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ B9F6 92                                   sub     d
   8+ B9F7                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ B9F7 B7          >                        or a
   9+ B9F8 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ B9F9 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ B9FB 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ B9FD 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ B9FE C9                                   ret
  14+ B9FF 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ BA00 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ BA01 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ BA03 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ BA05 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ BA06 C9                                   ret
  20+ BA07 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ BA09 C9                                   ret
  22+ BA0A
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
 692  BA0A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ BA0A              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ BA0A              TIS1:
   3+ BA0A 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ BA0B 3A CC 9C     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ BA0E 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ BA0F 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ BA10              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ BA10 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ BA11 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ BA12 32 E5 9D     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ BA15 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ BA16 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ BA18 CD BF AE     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ BA1B              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ BA1B              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ BA1B              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ BA1B 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ BA1C E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ BA1E 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ BA1F 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ BA20 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ BA22 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ BA24 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ BA25              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ BA25 CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ BA27 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ BA29 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ BA2B DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ BA2D              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ BA2D CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ BA2F 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ BA31 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ BA32 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ BA33 C9           		ret
  35+ BA34

  90+ BAD5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  91+ BAD5              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
  92+ BAD5 ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
  93+ BAD5 ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
  94+ BAD5 ~                                    xor     (hl)
  95+ BAD5 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  96+ BAD5 ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
  97+ BAD5 ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
  98+ BAD5 ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
  99+ BAD5 ~            .XSame:                 and     a
 100+ BAD5 ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 101+ BAD5 ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 102+ BAD5 ~                                    NegHL
 103+ BAD5 ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
 104+ BAD5 ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 105+ BAD5 ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 106+ BAD5 ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 107+ BAD5 ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
 108+ BAD5 ~                                    ld      a,l
 109+ BAD5 ~                                    and     a
 110+ BAD5 ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 111+ BAD5                                      ENDM

# file opened: ./Hardware/drive_access.asm
   1+ BCC6              M_GETSETDRV             equ $89
   2+ BCC6              F_OPEN                  equ $9a
   3+ BCC6              F_CLOSE                 equ $9b
   4+ BCC6              F_READ                  equ $9d
   5+ BCC6              F_WRITE                 equ $9e
   6+ BCC6              F_SEEK                  equ $9f
   7+ BCC6
   8+ BCC6              FA_READ                 equ $01
   9+ BCC6              FA_APPEND               equ $06
  10+ BCC6              FA_OVERWRITE            equ $0C
  11+ BCC6
  12+ BCC6              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset
  13+ BCC6              ; Failure HL = -1 , carry set, errno set
  14+ BCC6 F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  14+ BCCA DD E5
  15+ BCCC AF                                   xor	    a	; a = 0 means get default drive into A
  16+ BCCD CF                                   rst	    $08
  17+ BCCE 89                                   db	    $89
  18+ BCCF 32 D9 BC                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  19+ BCD2 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  19+ BCD6 C1 F1
  20+ BCD8 C9                                   ret
  21+ BCD9 00           DefaultDrive:	        db	0
  22+ BCDA
  23+ BCDA              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  24+ BCDA              ;	Function:	Open a file read for reading/writing
  25+ BCDA              ;	In:		ix = filename
  26+ BCDA              ;			b  = Open filemode
  27+ BCDA              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  28+ BCDA              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  29+ BCDA E5           fOpen:	                push	hl
  30+ BCDB DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
  31+ BCDE 3A D9 BC                             ld	    a,(DefaultDrive)
  32+ BCE1 CF                                   rst	    $08
  33+ BCE2 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  34+ BCE3 E1                                   pop	    hl
  35+ BCE4 C9                                   ret
  36+ BCE5
  37+ BCE5              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  38+ BCE5              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  39+ BCE5              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  40+ BCE5              ;			bc  = amount to read
  41+ BCE5              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  42+ BCE5              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  43+ BCE5 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
  44+ BCE6 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  45+ BCE7 E5                                   push    hl
  46+ BCE8 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
  47+ BCEB CF                                   rst	    $08
  48+ BCEC 9D                                   db	    F_READ
  49+ BCED E1                                   pop	    hl
  50+ BCEE C9                                   ret
  51+ BCEF
  52+ BCEF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  53+ BCEF              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  54+ BCEF              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  55+ BCEF              ;			bc  = amount to read
  56+ BCEF              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  57+ BCEF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  58+ BCEF B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
  59+ BCF0 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  60+ BCF1 E5                                   push	hl
  61+ BCF2 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
  62+ BCF5 CF                                   rst	    $08
  63+ BCF6 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
  64+ BCF7 E1                                   pop	    hl
  65+ BCF8 C9                                   ret
  66+ BCF9
  67+ BCF9              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  68+ BCF9              ;	Function:	Close open file
  69+ BCF9              ;	In:		a  = handle
  70+ BCF9              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  71+ BCF9              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  72+ BCF9 B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
  73+ BCFA C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  74+ BCFB CF                                   rst	    $08
  75+ BCFC 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
  76+ BCFD C9                                   ret
  77+ BCFE
  78+ BCFE              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  79+ BCFE              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  80+ BCFE              ;	In:		a   = file handle
  81+ BCFE              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
  82+ BCFE              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
  83+ BCFE              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
  84+ BCFE              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  85+ BCFE DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
  86+ BD01 CF                                   rst	    $08
  87+ BD02 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
  88+ BD03 E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
  89+ BD06 C9                                   ret
  90+ BD07
  91+ BD07              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  92+ BD07              ; Init the file system
  93+ BD07              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  94+ BD07 CD C6 BC     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
  95+ BD0A C9                                   ret
  96+ BD0B
  97+ BD0B              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  98+ BD0B              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
  99+ BD0B              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 100+ BD0B              ;		    ix = address to load to
 101+ BD0B              ;           bc = filelength
 102+ BD0B              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 103+ BD0B CD C6 BC     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 104+ BD0E C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 105+ BD11                                      ; get file size
 106+ BD11 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 107+ BD14 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 108+ BD17 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 109+ BD19 CD DA BC                             call    fOpen
 110+ BD1C 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 111+ BD1E FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 112+ BD20 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 113+ BD22 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 114+ BD25 F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 115+ BD26 CD E5 BC                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 116+ BD29 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 117+ BD2B F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 118+ BD2C CD F9 BC                             call	fClose			; close file
 119+ BD2F 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 120+ BD31 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 121+ BD34 C9                                   ret
 122+ BD35              ;
 123+ BD35              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 124+ BD35              ;
 125+ BD35 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 126+ BD37 C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 127+ BD38
 128+ BD38              .error_closing:
 129+ BD38 C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 130+ BD39 D1                                   pop	de
 131+ BD3A C1                                   pop	bc
 132+ BD3B C9                                   ret
 133+ BD3C
 134+ BD3C              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 135+ BD3C              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 136+ BD3C              ; In:		hl = file name
 137+ BD3C              ;		    ix = address to save from
 138+ BD3C              ;		    bc = size
 139+ BD3C              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 140+ BD3C CD C6 BC     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 141+ BD3F C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 142+ BD42 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 143+ BD45 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 144+ BD47 CD DA BC                             call    fOpen
 145+ BD4A 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 146+ BD4C FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 147+ BD4E 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 148+ BD50 DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 149+ BD53 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 150+ BD54 CD EF BC                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 151+ BD57 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 152+ BD59 F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 153+ BD5A CD F9 BC                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 154+ BD5D C9           .error:                 ret
 155+ BD5E              ;
 156+ BD5E              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 157+ BD5E              ;
 158+ BD5E DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 159+ BD61 C9                                   ret
 160+ BD62
# file closed: ./Hardware/drive_access.asm

  18+ BE0F
  19+ BE0F              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ BE0F              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ BE0F              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ BE0F C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ BE10 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ BE11 23           	inc			hl
  25+ BE12 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ BE13 23           	inc			hl
  27+ BE14 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ BE15 23           	inc			hl
  29+ BE16 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ BE17 23           	inc			hl
  31+ BE18 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ BE19 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ BE1A 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ BE1C                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ BE1C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ BE20 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ BE23 E1           	pop			hl
  37+ BE24 C1           	pop			bc
  38+ BE25 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ BE27 C9           	ret
  40+ BE28
  41+ BE28
  42+ BE28              print_boiler_text:
  43+ BE28              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ BE28              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ BE28 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ BE29 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ BE2A 23           	inc			hl
  48+ BE2B 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ BE2C 23           	inc			hl
  50+ BE2D 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ BE2E 23           	inc			hl
  52+ BE2F 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ BE30 23           	inc			hl
  54+ BE31 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ BE32 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ BE33 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ BE35 C5           	push		bc
  58+ BE36 D1           	pop			de
  59+ BE37 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  60+ BE3A E1           	pop			hl
  61+ BE3B C1           	pop			bc
  62+ BE3C 10 EA        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ BE3E C9           	ret

# file opened: ./Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm
   1++BE3F
   2++BE3F
   3++BE3F 3A 4B A3     	ld		a,(Fuel)
   4++BE42 11 ED BD     	ld		de,txt_fuel_level
   5++BE45 0E 9C        	ld	c, -100
   6++BE47 CD 51 BE     	call	.Num1
   7++BE4A 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
   8++BE4C CD 51 BE     	call	.Num1
   9++BE4F 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  10++BE51              .Num1:
  11++BE51 06 2F        	ld	b,'0'-1
  12++BE53              .Num2:
  13++BE53 04           	inc		b
  14++BE54 81           	add		a,c
  15++BE55 38 FC        	jr		c,.Num2
  16++BE57 91           	sub 	c
  17++BE58 C5           	push	bc
  18++BE59 F5           	push	af
  19++BE5A 79           	ld		a,c
  20++BE5B FE FF        	cp		-1
  21++BE5D CC 66 BE     	call	z,.InsertDot
  22++BE60 78           	ld		a,b
  23++BE61 12           	ld		(de),a
  24++BE62 13           	inc		de
  25++BE63 F1           	pop		af
  26++BE64 C1           	pop		bc
  27++BE65 C9           	ret
  28++BE66              .InsertDot:
  29++BE66 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'
  30++BE68 12           	ld		(de),a
  31++BE69 13           	inc		de
  32++BE6A C9           	ret

  67+ BE6B 2A 47 A3     GetCash:                ld      hl,(Cash)
  68+ BE6E EB                                   ex      de,hl
  69+ BE6F DD 2A 49 A3                          ld      ix,(Cash+2)
  70+ BE73 FD 21 FE BD                          ld		iy,txt_cash_amount
  71+ BE77 CD 3B B5                             call 	DispDEIXtoIY	; This will write out with 0 termination after last digit
  72+ BE7A FD 7E 00     .ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal
  73+ BE7D 32 0A BE                             ld		(txt_cash_fraction),a
  74+ BE80 21 FF BD     .UpdateInteger:         ld		hl,txt_cash_amount+1	; Now was there only 1 digit
  75+ BE83 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)					; if so we leave it alone so its "0.0"
  76+ BE84 FE 00                                cp		0
  77+ BE86 C8                                   ret		z
  78+ BE87 FD 36 00 00                          ld		(IY),0					; Else we erase last digit as it went to fraction
  79+ BE8B C9                                   ret

   1++C0C2

   5++C0C3 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b

  51+ C103 06 60                                ld		b,src_y_centre

  56+ C10D 3A DA 9E     src_get_name:           ld      a,(Galaxy)
  57+ C110                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
  57+ C110 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
  58+ C113 ED 4B EF 9E                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
  59+ C117 ED 43 5B E8                          ld      (GalaxyTargetSystem),bc
  60+ C11B CD 64 FC                             call    galaxy_system_under_cursor
  61+ C11E FE 00                                cp      0

  63+ C121 CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
  64+ C124 21 06 AC                             ld		hl,name_expanded
  65+ C127 CD 61 AB                             call	CapitaliseString
  66+ C12A 21 06 AC                             ld		hl, name_expanded
  67+ C12D 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  68+ C12F C9                                   ret
  69+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  71+ C130 ED 4B EF 9E                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  72+ C134 ED 5B ED 9E                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  73+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  74+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  75+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  76+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  79+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  80+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  81+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  82+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  83+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  84+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  85+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  86+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  87+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  88+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  89+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  90+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  92+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  93+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  94+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  95+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  96+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  97+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
  98+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a
  99+ C165 C6 60                                add		a,src_y_centre
 100+ C167 47                                   ld		b,a
 101+ C168              .RedrawSprite:          MMUSelectSpriteBank
 101+ C168 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE

 103+ C16F CD A1 C1                             call    src_name_current

 148+ C1CD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 149+ C1CD 3A DA 9E     src_calc_distance:      ld      a,(Galaxy)                                      ; Default in 0 distance
 150+ C1D0                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 150+ C1D0 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 151+ C1D3 11 24 C0                             ld      de,src_dist_amount
 152+ C1D6 21 36 C0                             ld      hl,src_default_dist
 153+ C1D9 ED A0                                ldi
 154+ C1DB ED A0                                ldi
 155+ C1DD ED A0                                ldi
 156+ C1DF ED A0                                ldi
 157+ C1E1 ED A0                                ldi
 158+ C1E3 ED 4B ED 9E                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 159+ C1E7 ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc
 160+ C1EB ED 4B EF 9E                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 161+ C1EF ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 162+ C1F3 CD F7 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance                            ; get distance into HL
 163+ C1F6 DD 2A 76 9E                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 164+ C1FA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 165+ C1FD FD 21 3B C0                          ld      iy,src_distance_val
 166+ C201 CD 3B B5                             call    DispDEIXtoIY                                    ; use DEIX as distance and write to string at location IY
 167+ C204 FD E5                                push    iy
 168+ C206 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ; hl = iy
 169+ C207 11 3B C0                             ld      de,src_distance_val
 170+ C20A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				                            ;Push last digit to post decimal
 171+ C20B 32 28 C0                             ld		(src_fraction),a
 172+ C20E 2B                                   dec     hl
 173+ C20F CD 5F B3                             call    compare16HLDE
 174+ C212 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number
 175+ C214 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 176+ C215 32 26 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+2),a
 177+ C218 2B                                   dec     hl
 178+ C219 CD 5F B3                             call    compare16HLDE
 179+ C21C 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 180+ C21E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 181+ C21F 32 25 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+1),a
 182+ C222 2B                                   dec     hl
 183+ C223 CD 5F B3                             call    compare16HLDE
 184+ C226 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 185+ C228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 186+ C229 32 24 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount),a
 187+ C22C C9           .done_number:           ret
 188+ C22D
 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 208+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 209+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 210+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 211+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 212+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 214+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 215+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 216+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 217+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 220+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 221+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 221+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 221+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 223+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 223+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 223+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 224+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 225+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 226+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 226+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 226+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 227+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 228+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 228+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 228+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 229+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 230+ C284 C9                                   ret
 231+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 232+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 233+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 234+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 236+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 237+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 238+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 239+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 240+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 241+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 242+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 243+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 244+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl
 245+ C2A4 23                                   inc     hl
 246+ C2A5 ED 5B 2F C2                          ld      de,(PosScan2)
 247+ C2A9 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 248+ C2AD 21 C1 C0                             ld      hl,src_buffer_size
 249+ C2B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
 250+ C2B1 AF                                   xor     a
 251+ C2B2 C9                                   ret
 252+ C2B3
 253+ C2B3 CD 08 A4     src_label_ssytem:       call	copy_system_to_working
 254+ C2B6 3A DA 9E                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 255+ C2B9                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 255+ C2B9 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 256+ C2BC CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
 257+ C2BF 21 06 AC                             ld		hl,name_expanded
 258+ C2C2 CD 61 AB                             call	CapitaliseString
 259+ C2C5 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_row)
 260+ C2C8 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 261+ C2CA 47                                   ld		b,a					    ; b = effective pixel row
 262+ C2CB 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)
 263+ C2CE C6 03                                add		a,local_label_shift_x
 264+ C2D0 4F                                   ld		c,a                     ; c = effective pixel col
 265+ C2D1 1E 00        .GetStringName:         ld      e,0
 266+ C2D3 21 06 AC                             ld      hl,name_expanded
 267+ C2D6 7E           .getStringLoop:         ld      a,(hl)
 268+ C2D7 23                                   inc     hl
 269+ C2D8 1C                                   inc     e
 270+ C2D9 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; String must have a terminator to work
 271+ C2DB 20 F9                                jr      nz,.getStringLoop
 272+ C2DD 16 08                                ld      d,8
 273+ C2DF C5                                   push    bc
 274+ C2E0 CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; first attemps
 275+ C2E3 C1                                   pop     bc
 276+ C2E4 FE 00                                cp      0
 277+ C2E6 28 19                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 278+ C2E8 78                                   ld      a,b
 279+ C2E9 C6 08                                add     8
 280+ C2EB 47                                   ld      b,a
 281+ C2EC C5                                   push    bc
 282+ C2ED CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 283+ C2F0 C1                                   pop     bc
 284+ C2F1 FE 00                                cp      0
 285+ C2F3 28 0C                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 286+ C2F5 78                                   ld      a,b
 287+ C2F6 D6 10                                sub     16
 288+ C2F8 47                                   ld      b,a
 289+ C2F9 C5                                   push    bc
 290+ C2FA CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 291+ C2FD C1                                   pop     bc
 292+ C2FE FE 00                                cp      0
 293+ C300 C0                                   ret     nz
 294+ C301 1E FF        .OKToPrint:             ld		e,$FF
 295+ C303 21 06 AC                             ld		hl,name_expanded
 296+ C306                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 296+ C306 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 297+ C30A CD 24 E2                             call	l2_print_7at
 298+ C30D C9                                   ret
 299+ C30E
 300+ C30E              name_if_possible:
 301+ C30E 3A 18 C0     SRCpixelRowToRefRow:    ld		a,(local_name_row)
 302+ C311 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 303+ C313 47                                   ld		b,a					; b = effective pixel row
 304+ C314 CB 3F                                srl		a
 305+ C316 CB 3F                                srl		a
 306+ C318 CB 3F                                srl		a					; divide by 8 to get character row
 307+ C31A                                  ;	sub		2					; don;t write over header TODO tweaks
 308+ C31A 21 AB 9D                             ld		hl,IndexedWork
 309+ C31D ED 31                                add		hl,a
 310+ C31F 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 311+ C320 FE 00                                cp		0
 312+ C322 20 04                                jr		nz, SRCtryAbove		; if its not empty don't print *(need to test +-1 row TODO)
 313+ C324 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 314+ C326 18 12                                jr		SRCFoundRow
 315+ C328 2B           SRCtryAbove:            dec		hl
 316+ C329 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 317+ C32A FE 00                                cp		0
 318+ C32C 20 04                                jr		nz, SRCtryBelow		; if its not empty don't print *(need to test +-1 row TODO)
 319+ C32E 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 320+ C330 18 08                                jr		SRCFoundRow
 321+ C332 23           SRCtryBelow:            inc		hl
 322+ C333 23                                   inc		hl
 323+ C334 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 324+ C335 FE 00                                cp		0
 325+ C337 C8                                   ret		z
 326+ C338 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 327+ C33A CD 08 A4     SRCFoundRow:            call	copy_system_to_working
 328+ C33D 3A DA 9E     SRCSmallSizeName:       ld      a,(Galaxy)
 329+ C340                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 329+ C340 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 330+ C343 CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
 331+ C346 21 06 AC     SRCCapitaliseName:      ld		hl,name_expanded
 332+ C349 CD 61 AB                             call	CapitaliseString
 333+ C34C 21 06 AC     SRCPrintName:           ld		hl, name_expanded
 334+ C34F 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_row)
 335+ C352 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 336+ C354 47                                   ld		b,a					; b = effective pixel row
 337+ C355 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)
 338+ C358 C6 03                                add		a,local_label_shift_x

 356+ C382 DD E5                                push    ix

 361+ C38E 4F                                   ld		c,a
 362+ C38F 3A EE 9E     SRCcalcLocaldy:         ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 363+ C392 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 364+ C393 79                                   ld		a,c
 365+ C394 90                                   sub		b
 366+ C395 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 367+ C397 28 02                                jr		z,SRCpositivedy
 368+ C399 ED 44        SRCnegativedy:          neg
 369+ C39B FE 26        SRCpositivedy:          cp		local_max_range_y
 370+ C39D 30 48                                jr		nc,SRCtoofar
 371+ C39F 3A D4 9D     SRCcalcLocaldx:         ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 372+ C3A2 4F                                   ld		c,a
 373+ C3A3 3A ED 9E                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 374+ C3A6 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 375+ C3A7 79                                   ld		a,c
 376+ C3A8 90                                   sub		b
 377+ C3A9 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 378+ C3AB 28 02                                jr		z,SRCpositivedx
 379+ C3AD ED 44        SRCnegativedx:          neg
 380+ C3AF FE 14        SRCpositivedx:          cp		local_max_range_x
 381+ C3B1 30 34                                jr		nc,SRCtoofar
 382+ C3B3 3A D2 9D     SRCOKToPlot             ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
 383+ C3B6 21 EE 9E                             ld		hl,PresentSystemY
 384+ C3B9 96                                   sub		(hl)
 385+ C3BA CB 27                                sla		a								; * 2
 386+ C3BC C6 60                                add		src_y_centre

 388+ C3C1 47                                   ld		b,a

 457+ C479              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 458+ C479 3A F0 9E     src_UpPressed:          ld     a,(TargetSystemY)
 459+ C47C                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 459+ C47C A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 459+ C47D CA 10 C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 460+ C480 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 461+ C481 3A EE 9E                             ld      a,(PresentSystemY)
 462+ C484 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 463+ C485 FA 8D C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 464+ C488                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 464+ C488 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 464+ C48A D2 10 C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 465+ C48D 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 466+ C48E 3D                                   dec     a
 467+ C48F 32 F0 9E                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 468+ C492 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 469+ C495 C9                                   ret
 470+ C496              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 471+ C496 3A EE 9E     src_DownPressed:        ld     a,(PresentSystemY)
 472+ C499 47                                   ld      b,a
 473+ C49A 3A F0 9E                             ld      a,(TargetSystemY)
 474+ C49D 4F                                   ld      c,a
 475+ C49E                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 128,src_BoundsLimit
 475+ C49E FE 80       >                        cp     128
 475+ C4A0 CA 10 C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 476+ C4A3 90                                   sub     b
 477+ C4A4 FA AC C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 478+ C4A7                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit
 478+ C4A7 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 478+ C4A9 D2 10 C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 479+ C4AC 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 480+ C4AD 3C                                   inc    a
 481+ C4AE 32 F0 9E                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 482+ C4B1 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 483+ C4B4 C9                                   ret
 484+ C4B5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 485+ C4B5 3A EF 9E     src_LeftPressed:        ld      a,(TargetSystemX)           ; we can't move left if target is zero
 486+ C4B8                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 486+ C4B8 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 486+ C4B9 CA 10 C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 487+ C4BC 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 488+ C4BD 3A ED 9E                             ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 489+ C4C0 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 490+ C4C1 FA C9 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 491+ C4C4                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 491+ C4C4 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 491+ C4C6 D2 10 C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 492+ C4C9 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 493+ C4CA 3D                                   dec     a
 494+ C4CB 32 EF 9E                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 495+ C4CE CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 496+ C4D1 C9                                   ret
 497+ C4D2              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 498+ C4D2 3A ED 9E     src_RightPressed:       ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 499+ C4D5 47                                   ld      b,a
 500+ C4D6 3A EF 9E                             ld      a,(TargetSystemX)
 501+ C4D9 4F                                   ld      c,a
 502+ C4DA                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,src_BoundsLimit
 502+ C4DA FE FF       >                        cp     255
 502+ C4DC CA 10 C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 503+ C4DF 90                                   sub     b
 504+ C4E0 FA E8 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 505+ C4E3                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit
 505+ C4E3 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 505+ C4E5 D2 10 C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 506+ C4E8 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 507+ C4E9 3C                                   inc    a
 508+ C4EA 32 EF 9E                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 509+ C4ED CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 510+ C4F0 C9                                   ret
 511+ C4F1              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 512+ C4F1 2A ED 9E     src_HomePressed:        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)

 514+ C4F7 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 515+ C4FA C9                                   ret

 517+ C4FB 3A DA 9E     src_RecenterPressed:    ld      a,(Galaxy)      ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working

 519+ C501 ED 4B EF 9E                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)

  27+ C08E              GCM_print_boiler_text:
  28+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C08E C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C08F 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C090 23           	inc			hl
   7++C091 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C092 23           	inc			hl
   9++C093 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C094 23           	inc			hl
  11++C095 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C096 23           	inc			hl
  13++C097 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C098 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C099 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C09B C5           	push		bc
  17++C09C D1           	pop			de
  18++C09D                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C0A1 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C0A4 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C0A5 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C0A6 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C0A8 C9           	ret
  24++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

  91+ C129 E5                                   push    hl

 197+ C278              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 198+ C278              ; The main loop handles the find key
 199+ C278              loop_gc_menu:           JumpIfMemTrue TextInputMode,AlreadyInInputMode  ;if we are in input mode then go directly there
 199+ C278 3A D0 9E    >                        ld      a,(TextInputMode)
 199+ C27B A7          >                        and     a
 199+ C27C CA 95 C2    >                        jp      z, AlreadyInInputMode
 200+ C27F 3E 4E        .StartFindCheck:        ld      a,c_Pressed_Find                        ;Is F pressed
 201+ C281 CD 10 9B                             call    is_key_pressed
 202+ C284 C0                                   ret     nz                                      ;the main loop handles find key
 203+ C285 CD 88 9B                             call    initInputText                           ;Initialise find input
 204+ C288                                      SetMemTrue TextInputMode                        ;Set input mode to true
 204+ C288 AF          >                        xor     a
 204+ C289 32 D0 9E    >                        ld      (TextInputMode),a
 205+ C28C                                      SetMemToN gcCursorBlink, gcBlinkVal             ; set up blink
 205+ C28C 3E 10       >                        ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 205+ C28E 32 D9 C1    >                        ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 206+ C291 CD 20 C2     .DisplayInputbar:       call    gc_display_find_text                    ; now prep the boiler plate input text
 207+ C294 C9                                   ret                                             ; and exit so next interation handles new input as we have to rescan keyboard
 208+ C295              ;Already in input mode post pressing find
 209+ C295 CD A0 9B     AlreadyInInputMode:     call    InputName                               ; Call input routine to parse a key
 210+ C298                                      JumpIfMemFalse InputChanged, .blinkNoDelay      ; no key they bypass rest of input
 210+ C298 3A 74 9B    >                        ld      a,(InputChanged)
 210+ C29B A7          >                        and     a
 210+ C29C C2 A9 C2    >                        jp      nz, .blinkNoDelay
 211+ C29F              .WasItEnter:            JumpIfMemTrue EnterPressed, .FindEnterPressed   ; if enter was pressed then find
 211+ C29F 3A 73 9B    >                        ld      a,(EnterPressed)
 211+ C2A2 A7          >                        and     a
 211+ C2A3 CA B5 C2    >                        jp      z, .FindEnterPressed
 212+ C2A6 CD 2E C2                             call    gc_display_find_string                  ; update string
 213+ C2A9 CD 58 C2     .blinkNoDelay:          call    blink_cursor
 214+ C2AC                                      CallIfMemEqNusng    gcCursorBlink, gcBlinkVal, gc_display_find_string ; on blink we get a double update but we can live with that
 214+ C2AC 3A D9 C1    >                        ld   a,(gcCursorBlink)
 214+ C2AF FE 10       >                        cp   gcBlinkVal
 214+ C2B1 CC 2E C2    >                        call    z,gc_display_find_string
 215+ C2B4 C9                                   ret
 216+ C2B5              .FindEnterPressed:      SetMemFalse EnterPressed                        ; reset enter
 216+ C2B5 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 216+ C2B7 32 73 9B    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 217+ C2BA                                      SetMemFalse TextInputMode                       ; leave input mode
 217+ C2BA 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 217+ C2BC 32 D0 9E    >                        ld      (TextInputMode),a

 220+ C2C5 21 53 9B                             ld      hl,InputString
 221+ C2C8 11 5E E8                             ld      de,GalaxySearchString
 222+ C2CB CD D0 F6                             call    GalaxyCopyLoop
 223+ C2CE CD 39 FB                             call    find_system_by_name
 224+ C2D1 FE FF                                cp      $FF                                     ; 0 denotes found FF, failure
 225+ C2D3 28 1D                                jr      z,.FindNoMatch
 226+ C2D5 3A FB E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+3)
 227+ C2D8 4F                                   ld      c,a
 228+ C2D9 3A F9 E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+1)
 229+ C2DC 47                                   ld      b,a
 230+ C2DD ED 43 EF 9E                          ld      (TargetSystemX),bc
 231+ C2E1 CD 85 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 232+ C2E4 11 08 B0                             ld		de,galactic_find_position               ; Wipe input area on screen
 233+ C2E7 21 73 C0                             ld      hl,galactic_find_match
 234+ C2EA                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 234+ C2EA ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 235+ C2EE CD C8 E0                             call	l1_print_at
 236+ C2F1 C9                                   ret
 237+ C2F2              .FindNoMatch:           ; if not found display "Not found"
 238+ C2F2                                      ; move curor if found

 240+ C2F5 21 58 C0                             ld      hl,galactic_find_no_match
 241+ C2F8                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 241+ C2F8 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1

 263+ C324 3A F0 9E     gc_UpPressed:           ld     a,(TargetSystemX+1)

 279+ C34C 3D                                   dec    a
 280+ C34D 32 EF 9E                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a

# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C070
   2++C070              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C070              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C070 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C071 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C072 23           	inc			hl
   7++C073 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C074 23           	inc			hl
   9++C075 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C076 23           	inc			hl
  11++C077 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C078 23           	inc			hl
  13++C079 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C07A EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C07B 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C07D C5           	push		bc
  17++C07E D1           	pop			de
  18++C07F                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C07F ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C083 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C086 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C087 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C088 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C08A C9           	ret
  24++C08B
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C2C5
   2++C2C5              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C2C5              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C2C5 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C2C6 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C2C7 23           	inc			hl
   7++C2C8 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C2C9 23           	inc			hl
   9++C2CA 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C2CB 23           	inc			hl
  11++C2CC 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C2CD 23           	inc			hl
  13++C2CE E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C2CF EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C2D0 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C2D2 C5           	push		bc
  17++C2D3 D1           	pop			de
  18++C2D4                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C2D4 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C2D8 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C2DB E1           	pop			hl
  21++C2DC C1           	pop			bc
  22++C2DD 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C2DF C9           	ret
  24++C2E0

 302+ C4E3
 303+ C4E3              ; HL = value to add on
 304+ C4E3              ; de = Unit of Measure

 307+ C4E6 28 03                                jr      z,.FoundEnd
 308+ C4E8 23                                   inc     hl
 309+ C4E9 18 F8                                jr      SDAddUoMtoHL

 312+ C4EF C9                                   ret

 317+ C4F1 EB                                   ex      hl,de
 318+ C4F2 CD 78 C2                             call    SDCopyLoop
 319+ C4F5 C9                                   ret
