 141+ C1A4 CD 5C C1                             call    LaunchConsole
 142+ C1A7              .NextBuffer:            MMUSelectLayer2
 142+ C1A7 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 143+ C1AB CD 15 E1                             call    l2_flip_buffers
 144+ C1AE 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF                           ; Clear upper 2 thirds to white
 145+ C1B0 32 AA E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 146+ C1B3 CD CA E0                             call    l2_set_color_upper2
 147+ C1B6 3E E3                                ld      a,COLOUR_TRANSPARENT            ; Lower third transparent
 148+ C1B8 32 AA E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 149+ C1BB CD F6 E0                             call    l2_cls_lower_third
 150+ C1BE CD 07 C1                             call    LaunchTubeEdges
 151+ C1C1 CD 5C C1                             call    LaunchConsole
 152+ C1C4 3E FF        .SetUpTimers:           ld      a,init_countdown
 153+ C1C6 32 00 C1                             ld      (launch_countdown),a
 154+ C1C9 21 0E C0                             ld      hl,launchdraw_table
 155+ C1CC 22 01 C1                             ld      (launch_table_idx),hl
 156+ C1CF AF                                   xor     a
 157+ C1D0 32 05 C1                             ld      (current_offsetX),a
 158+ C1D3 32 06 C1                             ld      (current_offsetY),a
 159+ C1D6              .SetupGalaxy:           MaxThrottle
 159+ C1D6 3A E0 9D    >                        ld      a,(SHIPMAXSPEED)
 159+ C1D9 32 E1 9D    >                        ld      (DELTA),a
 159+ C1DC 57          >                        ld      d,a
 159+ C1DD 1E 04       >                        ld      e,4
 159+ C1DF ED 30       >                        mul
 159+ C1E1 ED 53 E2 9D >                        ld      (DELT4Lo),de
 160+ C1E5                                      ZeroThrottle; DEBUG
 160+ C1E5 AF          >                        xor     a
 160+ C1E6 32 E1 9D    >                        ld      (DELTA),a
 160+ C1E9 32 E2 9D    >                        ld      (DELT4Lo),a
 160+ C1EC 32 E3 9D    >                        ld      (DELT4Lo+1),a
 161+ C1EF              ; To launch we need to set docked flag to transition FE and at teh end of the transition set to FD to rebuild universe
 162+ C1EF 3E FE                                ld      a,$FE
 163+ C1F1 32 F4 9D                             ld      (DockedFlag),a
 164+ C1F4 C9                                   ret
 165+ C1F5
 166+ C1F5
 167+ C1F5              draw_docking_ship:      MMUSelectLayer1
 167+ C1F5 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 168+ C1F9 CD 80 E0                             call    l1_cls
 169+ C1FC CD 9A E0                             call    l1_attr_cls
 170+ C1FF                                      MMUSelectSpriteBank
 170+ C1FF ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 171+ C203 CD A4 E4                             call    sprite_cls_cursors
 172+ C206                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 172+ C206 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 173+ C20A CD 03 E0                             call    asm_l2_double_buffer_on
 174+ C20D 3E FF        .CurrentBuffer:         ld      a,$FF                           ; Clear upper 2 thirds to white
 175+ C20F 32 AA E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 176+ C212 CD CA E0                             call    l2_set_color_upper2
 177+ C215 3E E3                                ld      a,COLOUR_TRANSPARENT            ; Lower third transparent
 178+ C217 32 AA E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 179+ C21A CD F6 E0                             call    l2_cls_lower_third
 180+ C21D CD 07 C1                             call    LaunchTubeEdges
 181+ C220 CD 5C C1                             call    LaunchConsole
 182+ C223              .NextBuffer:            MMUSelectLayer2
 182+ C223 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 183+ C227 CD 15 E1                             call    l2_flip_buffers
 184+ C22A 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF                           ; Clear upper 2 thirds to white
 185+ C22C 32 AA E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 186+ C22F CD CA E0                             call    l2_set_color_upper2
 187+ C232 3E E3                                ld      a,COLOUR_TRANSPARENT            ; Lower third transparent
 188+ C234 32 AA E0                             ld      (l2_cls_byte),a
 189+ C237 CD F6 E0                             call    l2_cls_lower_third
 190+ C23A CD 07 C1                             call    LaunchTubeEdges
 191+ C23D CD 5C C1                             call    LaunchConsole
 192+ C240 3E FF        .SetUpTimers:           ld      a,init_countdown
 193+ C242 32 00 C1                             ld      (launch_countdown),a
 194+ C245 21 87 C0                             ld      hl,dockingdraw_table
 195+ C248 22 03 C1                             ld      (docking_table_idx),hl
 196+ C24B AF                                   xor     a
 197+ C24C 32 05 C1                             ld      (current_offsetX),a
 198+ C24F 32 06 C1                             ld      (current_offsetY),a
 199+ C252 AF           .SetupGalaxy:           xor     a ; palcehodler as it would cause next macro to fail re initialise all universe banks
 200+ C253                                      ZeroThrottle
 200+ C253 AF          >                        xor     a
 200+ C254 32 E1 9D    >                        ld      (DELTA),a
 200+ C257 32 E2 9D    >                        ld      (DELT4Lo),a
 200+ C25A 32 E3 9D    >                        ld      (DELT4Lo+1),a
 201+ C25D 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 202+ C25F 32 F4 9D                             ld      (DockedFlag),a ; we don't kill off shipts as we kill them on launch
 203+ C262 C9                                   ret
 204+ C263
 205+ C263 CD 07 C1     loop_launch_ship:       call    LaunchTubeEdges
 206+ C266 3E FF                                ld      a,init_countdown
 207+ C268 32 00 C1                             ld      (launch_countdown),a
 208+ C26B 2A 01 C1                             ld      hl,(launch_table_idx)
 209+ C26E 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)
 210+ C26F 79                                   ld      a,c
 211+ C270 FE FF                                cp      $FF
 212+ C272 28 1E                                jr      z,.FinishedLaunch
 213+ C274 23                                   inc     hl
 214+ C275 46                                   ld      b,(hl)                 ; bc = top left
 215+ C276 23                                   inc     hl
 216+ C277 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 217+ C278 23                                   inc     hl
 218+ C279 56                                   ld      d,(hl)                 ;de = width and height
 219+ C27A 23                                   inc     hl
 220+ C27B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                 ; a = colour
 221+ C27C 23                                   inc     hl
 222+ C27D 22 01 C1                             ld      (launch_table_idx),hl
 223+ C280 67                                   ld      h,a
 224+ C281 C5 D5                                push    bc,,de
 225+ C283                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 225+ C283 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 226+ C287 CD 3B E2                             call    l2_draw_fill_box        ; ; "l2_draw_fill_box bc=rowcol, de=heightwidth h=color"
 227+ C28A D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
 228+ C28C 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 229+ C28E CD 4B E2                             call    l2_draw_box             ; "l2_draw_box bc=rowcol, de=heightwidth a=color"
 230+ C291 C9                                   ret
 231+ C292 3E FD        .FinishedLaunch:        ld      a,$FD                   ; now seed that we need a universe rebuild post launch
 232+ C294 32 F4 9D                             ld      (DockedFlag),a
 233+ C297 C9                                   ret
 234+ C298
 235+ C298 CD 07 C1     loop_docking_ship:      call    LaunchTubeEdges
 236+ C29B 3E FF                                ld      a,init_countdown
 237+ C29D 32 00 C1                             ld      (launch_countdown),a
 238+ C2A0 2A 03 C1                             ld      hl,(docking_table_idx)
 239+ C2A3 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)
 240+ C2A4 79                                   ld      a,c
 241+ C2A5 FE FF                                cp      $FF
 242+ C2A7 28 1E                                jr      z,.FinishedDocking
 243+ C2A9 23                                   inc     hl
 244+ C2AA 46                                   ld      b,(hl)                 ; bc = top left
 245+ C2AB 23                                   inc     hl
 246+ C2AC 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 247+ C2AD 23                                   inc     hl
 248+ C2AE 56                                   ld      d,(hl)                 ;de = width and height
 249+ C2AF 23                                   inc     hl
 250+ C2B0 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 251+ C2B1 23                                   inc     hl
 252+ C2B2 22 03 C1                             ld      (docking_table_idx),hl
 253+ C2B5 67                                   ld      h,a
 254+ C2B6 C5 D5                                push    bc,,de
 255+ C2B8                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 255+ C2B8 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 256+ C2BC CD 3B E2                             call    l2_draw_fill_box
 257+ C2BF D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
 258+ C2C1 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 259+ C2C3 CD 4B E2                             call    l2_draw_box
 260+ C2C6 C9                                   ret
 261+ C2C7              .FinishedDocking        ForceTransition ScreenStatus              ; Force move to status screen
 261+ C2C7 3E 04       >                        ld      a,ScreenStatus
 261+ C2C9 32 8A 88    >                        ld      (ScreenTransitionForced), a
 262+ C2CC C9                                   ret
 263+ C2CD
 264+ C2CD
 265+ C2CD
# file closed: ./Transitions/launch_ship.asm
 901  C2CD
 902  C2CD              ; Bank 70  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 903  C2CD                  SLOT    UniverseBankAddr
 904  C2CD                  PAGE    BankUNIVDATA0
 905  C2CD              	ORG	    UniverseBankAddr,BankUNIVDATA0
 906  C000                  INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/univ_ship_data.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/univ_ship_data.asm
   1+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   2+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   3+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
   4+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
   5+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
   6+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   7+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   8+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
   9+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  10+ C000
  11+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  12+ C000 55 6E 69 76  StartOfUniv:        DB "Universe PG"
  12+ C004 65 72 73 65
  12+ C008 20 50 47
  13+ C00B 58           StartOfUnivN:       DB "X"
  14+ C00C              ; NOTE we can cheat and pre allocate segs just using a DS for now
  15+ C00C
  16+ C00C              ;   \ -> & 565D \ See ship data files chosen and loaded after flight code starts running.
  17+ C00C              ; Universe map substibute for INWK
  18+ C00C              ;-Camera Position of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  19+ C00C                                     INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/AIRuntimeData.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/AIRuntimeData.asm
   1++C00C              ;-Camera Position of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C00C              StartOfShipRuntimeData      EQU $
   3++C00C 00           UBnKxlo                     DB  0                       ; INWK+0
   4++C00D 00           UBnKxhi                     DB  0                       ; there are hi medium low as some times these are 24 bit
   5++C00E 00           UBnKxsgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK+2
   6++C00F 00           UBnKylo                     DB  0                       ; INWK+3 \ ylo
   7++C010 00           UBnKyhi                     DB  0                       ; INWK+4 \ yHi
   8++C011 00           UBnKysgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK +5
   9++C012 00           UBnKzlo                     DB  0                       ; INWK +6
  10++C013 00           UBnKzhi                     DB  0                       ; INWK +7
  11++C014 00           UBnKzsgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK +8
  12++C015              ;-Zero page for when we page data temporarily into page zero to read a second ship, e.g. missile tracking
  13++C015              ZeroPageUBnKxlo             EQU UBnKxlo    - StartOfShipRuntimeData
  14++C015              ZeroPageUBnKxhi             EQU UBnKxhi    - StartOfShipRuntimeData
  15++C015              ZeroPageUBnKxsgn            EQU UBnKxsgn   - StartOfShipRuntimeData
  16++C015              ZeroPageUBnKylo             EQU UBnKylo    - StartOfShipRuntimeData
  17++C015              ZeroPageUBnKyhi             EQU UBnKyhi    - StartOfShipRuntimeData
  18++C015              ZeroPageUBnKysgn            EQU UBnKysgn   - StartOfShipRuntimeData
  19++C015              ZeroPageUBnKzlo             EQU UBnKzlo    - StartOfShipRuntimeData
  20++C015              ZeroPageUBnKzhi             EQU UBnKzhi    - StartOfShipRuntimeData
  21++C015              ZeroPageUBnKzsgn            EQU UBnKzsgn   - StartOfShipRuntimeData
  22++C015              ;-Rotation Matrix of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  23++C015              ; Rotation data is stored as lohi, but only 15 bits with 16th bit being  a sign bit. Note this is NOT 2'c compliment
  24++C015              ; Note they seem to have to be after camera position not quite found why yet, can only assume it does an iy or ix indexed copy? Bu oddly does not affect space station.
  25++C015 00 00        UBnkrotmatSidevX            DW  0                       ; INWK +21
  26++C017              UBnkrotmatSidev             equ UBnkrotmatSidevX
  27++C017 00 00        UBnkrotmatSidevY            DW  0                       ; INWK +23
  28++C019 00 00        UBnkrotmatSidevZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +25
  29++C01B 00 00        UBnkrotmatRoofvX            DW  0                       ; INWK +15
  30++C01D              UBnkrotmatRoofv             equ UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  31++C01D 00 00        UBnkrotmatRoofvY            DW  0                       ; INWK +17
  32++C01F 00 00        UBnkrotmatRoofvZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +19
  33++C021 00 00        UBnkrotmatNosevX            DW  0                       ; INWK +9
  34++C023              UBnkrotmatNosev             EQU UBnkrotmatNosevX
  35++C023 00 00        UBnkrotmatNosevY            DW  0                       ; INWK +11
  36++C025 00 00        UBnkrotmatNosevZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +13
  37++C027              ; -- Note these must be here for initialise blast as it does a 12 byte ldir
  38++C027              ; . Note missile explosion will have to have logic to cause linger if a blast is to be enqued
  39++C027 00           UBnKMissileBlastRange:      DB  0                       ; copied in when setting up a missile
  40++C028 00           UBnKMissileBlastDamage:     DB  0                       ; copied in when setting up a missile
  41++C029 00           UBnKMissileDetonateRange:   DB  0                       ; copied in when setting up a missile, allows for proximity missiles
  42++C02A 00           UBnKMissileDetonateDamage:  DB  0                       ; copied in when setting up a missile
  43++C02B              ; -- Metadata for ship to help with bank managment
  44++C02B              UBnKStartOfRuntimeData:
  45++C02B 00           UBnKSlotNumber              DB  0
  46++C02C 00           UbnKShipUnivBankNbr         DB  0                       ; Present ship universe bank number
  47++C02D 00           UBnkShipModelBank           DB  0                       ; Bank nbr ship was from
  48++C02E 00           UBnKShipModelNbr            DB  0                       ; Ship Id with in the bank
  49++C02F 00           UBnKShipModeID              DB  0                       ; Absolute ship id
  50++C030              ; -- Ship AI data
  51++C030 00           UBnKMissleHitToProcess      DB  0                       ; This is used for enquing missle blasts as we can only do one missile at a time, could make it multi but neeed to smooth CPU usage
  52++C031 00           UBnKMissileTarget           DB  0                       ; This is the ship slot number for the target from 0 to n if the missile is not hostile to us, if the target is $FF then its us
  53++C032 00           UBnKSpeed                   DB  0                       ; INWK +27
  54++C033 00           UBnKAccel                   DB  0                       ; INWK +28
  55++C034 00           UBnKRotXCounter             DB  0                       ; INWK +29
  56++C035 00           UBnKRotZCounter             DB  0                       ; INWK +30
  57++C036 00           UBnKRAT                     DB  0                       ; temporary for rotation magnitude or roll counter, for debugging state
  58++C037 00           UBnKRAT2                    DB  0                       ; temporary for rotation threshold
  59++C038 00           UBnKCNT                     DB  0                       ; temp for calculating roll and pitch
  60++C039 00           UBnKCNT2                    DB  0                       ; roll threshold, max angle boynd ship will slow down
  61++C03A 00           univRAT                     DB  0               ; 99
  62++C03B 00           univRAT2                    DB  0               ; 9A
  63++C03C 00           univRAT2Val                 DB  0               ; 9A
  64++C03D 00           UBnKexplDsp                 DB  0                       ; INWK +31 clear exploding/display state|missiles
  65++C03E 00           UBnkDrawAllFaces            DB  0
  66++C03F 00           UBnkaiatkecm                DB  0                       ; INWK +32 ai_attack_univ_ecm i.e. AI type
  67++C040 00           UBnKSpawnObject             DB  0
  68++C041 00           UBnkCam0yLo                 DB  0                       ; INWK +33 ????
  69++C042 00           UBnkCam0yHi                 DB  0                       ; INWK +34?????
  70++C043 00           UBnKEnergy                  DB  0                       ; INWK +35
  71++C044 00           UBnKECMCountDown            DB  0                       ; counts down ECM usage if activated reducing energy too in update loop
  72++C045 00           UBnKECMFitted               DB  0                       ; Does ship have ECM, true false
  73++C046              ZeroPageUBnKEnergy          EQU UBnKEnergy    - StartOfShipRuntimeData
  74++C046              ZeroPageUBnKECMCountDown    EQU ECMCountDown  - StartOfShipRuntimeData
  75++C046              ZeroPageUBnKECMFitted       EQU UBnKECMFitted - StartOfShipRuntimeData
  76++C046 00           UBnKMissilesLeft            DB  0
  77++C047 00           UBnKCloudCounter            DB  0                       ; cloud pixels
  78++C048 00           UBnKCloudRadius             DB  0                       ; cloud pixels
  79++C049              UBnKRuntimeSize             EQU $-UBnKStartOfRuntimeData
  80++C049              ; Flags work as follows:
  81++C049              ; UBnKSpawnObject - signals on death to spawn cargo items
  82++C049              ; 0 -                   Spawn Cargo 1
  83++C049              ; 1 -                   Spawn Cargo 2
  84++C049              ; 2 -                   Spawn Cargo 3
  85++C049              ; 3 -                   Spawn Cargo 4
  86++C049              ; 4 -                   Spawn Alloy 1
  87++C049              ; 5 -                   Spawn Alloy 2
  88++C049              ; 6 -                   Spawn Alloy 3
  89++C049              ; 7 -                   Spawn Alloy 4
  90++C049
  91++C049              ; UBnkaiatkecm
  92++C049              ; Bit	                Description
  93++C049              ; 7 -                   AI Enabled Flag
  94++C049              ; 6 -                   Ship Visible = ShipOnScreen/NotCloaked (cleared or set by check visible or cloaking override)
  95++C049              ; 5 -                   Ship is exploding if set, note if its a missile and one already equeued this will have to linger
  96++C049              ;                       linger can be done by not erasing ship unit missile equeue handled
  97++C049              ; 4 -                   Ship marked as exploded, cleared once aknowledged then bit 5 takes over and UBnKCloudCounter
  98++C049              ; 3 -                   Display state - Plot as a Dot
  99++C049              ; 2 -                   Nbr of Missiles bit 2
 100++C049              ; 1 -                   Nbr of Missiles bit 1
 101++C049              ; 0 -                   ECM present flag
 102++C049              ; ShipNewBitsAddr (in blueprint)
 103++C049              ;Bit	                Description
 104++C049              ;#0	Trader flag         * 0 = not a trader  * 1 = trader
 105++C049              ;                       80% of traders are peaceful and mind their own business plying their trade between the planet and space station, but 20% of them moonlight as bounty hunters (see bit #1)
 106++C049              ;                       Ships that are traders: Escape pod, Shuttle, Transporter, Anaconda, Rock hermit, Worm
 107++C049              ;#1 Bounty hunter flag  * 0 = not a bounty hunter* 1 = bounty hunter
 108++C049              ;                       If we are a fugitive or a serious offender and we bump into a bounty hunter, they will become hostile and attack us (see bit #2)
 109++C049              ;                       Ships that are bounty hunters: Viper, Fer-de-lance
 110++C049              ;#2	Hostile flag        * 0 = not hostile  * 1 = hostile
 111++C049              ;                       Hostile ships will attack us on sight; there are quite a few of them
 112++C049              ;                       Ships that are hostile: Sidewinder, Mamba, Krait, Adder, Gecko, Cobra Mk I, Worm, Cobra Mk III, Asp Mk II, Python (pirate), Moray, Thargoid, Thargon, Constrictor
 113++C049              ;#3	Pirate flag         * 0 = not a pirate * 1 = pirate
 114++C049              ;                       Hostile pirates will attack us on sight, but once we get inside the space station safe zone, they will stop
 115++C049              ;                       Ships that are pirates: Sidewinder, Mamba, Krait, Adder, Gecko, Cobra Mk I, Cobra Mk III, Asp Mk II, Python (pirate), Moray, Thargoid
 116++C049              ;#4	Docking flag        * 0 = not docking * 1 = docking
 117++C049              ;                       Traders with their docking flag set fly towards the space station to try to dock, otherwise they aim for the planet
 118++C049              ;                       This flag is randomly set for traders when they are spawned
 119++C049              ;                       Ships that can be docking: Escape pod, Shuttle, Transporter, Anaconda, Rock hermit, Worm
 120++C049              ;#5	Innocent bystander  * 0 = normal * 1 = innocent bystander
 121++C049              ;                       If we attack an innocent ship within the space station safe zone, then the station will get angry with us and start spawning cops
 122++C049              ;                       Ships that are innocent bystanders: Shuttle, Transporter, Cobra Mk III, Python, Boa, Anaconda, Rock hermit, Cougar
 123++C049              ;#6	Cop flag            * 0 = not a cop * 1 = cop
 124++C049              ;                       If we destroy a cop, then we instantly become a fugitive (the Transporter isn't actually a cop, but it's clearly under police protection)
 125++C049              ;                       Ships that are cops: Viper, Transporter
 126++C049              ;#7	Scooped, docked, escape pod flag
 127++C049              ;                       For spawned ships, this flag indicates that the ship been scooped or has docked (bit 7 is always clear on spawning)
 128++C049              ;                       For blueprints, this flag indicates whether the ship type has an escape pod fitted, so it can launch it when in dire straits
 129++C049              ;                       Ships that have escape pods: Cobra Mk III, Python, Boa, Anaconda, Rock hermit, Viper, Mamba, Krait, Adder, Cobra Mk I, Cobra Mk III (pirate), Asp Mk II, Python (pirate), Fer-de-lance
 130++C049
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/AIRuntimeData.asm
  20+ C049              ; moved to runtime asm
  21+ C049              ;                        INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ShipPosVars.asm"
  22+ C049              ;                        INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/RotationMatrixVars.asm"
  23+ C049

  25+ C049              ;                    [roofv x y z ] roof vector (up)
  26+ C049              ;                    [sidev x y z ] side vector (right)

  28+ C049              ;;rotZCounter                 equ UBnkrotZCounter         ; INWK +30UBnkDrawCam0xLo   DB  0               ; XX18+0

   2++C049 00 00        UBnkTransmatSidevX          DW  0               ; XX16+0
   3++C04B              UBnkTransmatSidev           EQU UBnkTransmatSidevX
   4++C04B 00 00        UBnkTransmatSidevY          DW 0                ; XX16+2
   5++C04D 00 00        UBnkTransmatSidevZ          DW 0                ; XX16+2
   6++C04F 00 00        UBnkTransmatRoofvX          DW 0
   7++C051              UBnkTransmatRoofv           EQU UBnkTransmatRoofvX
   8++C051 00 00        UBnkTransmatRoofvY          DW 0                ; XX16+2
   9++C053 00 00        UBnkTransmatRoofvZ          DW 0                ; XX16+2
  10++C055 00 00        UBnkTransmatNosevX          DW 0
  11++C057              UBnkTransmatNosev           EQU UBnkTransmatNosevX
  12++C057 00 00        UBnkTransmatNosevY          DW 0                ; XX16+2
  13++C059 00 00        UBnkTransmatNosevZ          DW 0                ; XX16+2
  14++C05B 00 00        UbnkTransmatTransX          DW 0
  15++C05D 00 00        UbnkTransmatTransY          DW 0
  16++C05F 00 00        UbnkTransmatTransZ          DW 0
  17++C061              XX16                        equ UBnkTransmatSidev
  18++C061              ;-- XX16Inv --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  19++C061 00 00        UbnkTransInvRow0x0          DW 0
  20++C063 00 00        UbnkTransInvRow0x1          DW 0
  21++C065 00 00        UbnkTransInvRow0x2          DW 0
  22++C067 00 00        UbnkTransInvRow0x3          DW 0
  23++C069 00 00        UbnkTransInvRow1y0          DW 0
  24++C06B 00 00        UbnkTransInvRow1y1          DW 0
  25++C06D 00 00        UbnkTransInvRow1y2          DW 0
  26++C06F 00 00        UbnkTransInvRow1y3          DW 0
  27++C071 00 00        UbnkTransInvRow2z0          DW 0
  28++C073 00 00        UbnkTransInvRow2z1          DW 0
  29++C075 00 00        UbnkTransInvRow2z2          DW 0

  44+ C0A6              ; Post clipping the results are now 8 bit
  45+ C0A6 00           UBnkVisibility              DB  0               ; replaces general purpose xx4 in rendering
  46+ C0A7 00           UBnkProjectedY              DB  0

  51+ C0B9 00           VarBackface                 DB 0
  52+ C0BA              ; Heap (or array) information for lines and normals
  53+ C0BA              ; Coords are stored XY,XY,XY,XY
  54+ C0BA              ; Normals
  55+ C0BA              ; This needs re-oprganising now.
  56+ C0BA              ; Runtime Calculation Store
  57+ C0BA
  58+ C0BA              FaceArraySize               equ 30
  59+ C0BA              EdgeHeapSize                equ 40
  60+ C0BA              NodeArraySize               equ 40
  61+ C0BA              LineArraySize               equ 50
  62+ C0BA              ; Storage arrays for data
  63+ C0BA              ; Structure of arrays
  64+ C0BA              ; Visibility array  - 1 Byte per face/normal on ship model Bit 7 (or FF) visible, 0 Invisible
  65+ C0BA              ; Node array corresponds to a processed vertex from the ship model transformed into world coordinates and tracks the node list from model
  66+ C0BA              ; NodeArray         -  4 bytes per element      0           1            2          3
  67+ C0BA              ;                                               X Coord Lo  Y Coord Lo   Z CoordLo  Sign Bits 7 6 5 for X Y Z Signs (set = negative)
  68+ C0BA              ; Line Array        -  4 bytes per eleement     0           1            2          3
  69+ C0BA              ;                                               X1          Y1           X2         Y2
  70+ C0BA 00 00 00...  UbnkFaceVisArray            DS FaceArraySize            ; XX2 Up to 16 faces this may be normal list, each entry is controlled by bit 7, 1 visible, 0 hidden
  71+ C0D8 00 00 00...  UBnkNodeArray               DS NodeArraySize * 4        ; XX3 Holds the points as an array, its an array not a heap
  72+ C178 00 00 00...  UBnkNodeArray2              DS NodeArraySize * 4        ; XX3 Holds the points as an array, its an array not a heap
  73+ C218 00 00 00...  UbnkLineArray               DS LineArraySize * 4        ; XX19 Holds the clipped line details
  74+ C2E0              UBnkLinesHeapMax            EQU $ - UbnkLineArray
  75+ C2E0 00 00 00...  UbnkEdgeProcessedList DS EdgeHeapSize
  76+ C308              ; Array current Lengths
  77+ C308 00           UbnkFaceVisArrayLen         DS 1
  78+ C309 00           UBnkNodeArrayLen            DS 1
  79+ C30A 00           UbnkLineArrayLen            DS 1                        ; total number of lines loaded to array
  80+ C30B 00           UbnkLineArrayBytes          DS 1                        ; total number of bytes loaded to array  = array len * 4
  81+ C30C              XX20                        equ UbnkLineArrayLen
  82+ C30C              varXX20                     equ UbnkLineArrayLen
  83+ C30C
  84+ C30C 00           UbnkEdgeHeapSize            DS 1
  85+ C30D 00           UbnkEdgeHeapBytes           DS 1
  86+ C30E 00           UBnkLinesHeapLen            DS 1

  88+ C310 00           UbnKEdgeRadius              DS 1
  89+ C311 00           UbnKEdgeShipType            DS 1
  90+ C312 00           UbnKEdgeExplosionType       DS 1
  91+ C313

  94+ C313              ; Lines

 135+ C53A              ZeroUnivPitchAndRoll:   MACRO
 136+ C53A ~                                    xor     a
 137+ C53A ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 138+ C53A ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 139+ C53A                                      ENDM
 140+ C53A
 141+ C53A              MaxUnivPitchAndRoll:    MACRO
 142+ C53A ~                                    ld      a,127
 143+ C53A ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 144+ C53A ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 145+ C53A                                      ENDM
 146+ C53A
 147+ C53A              RandomUnivPitchAndRoll: MACRO
 148+ C53A ~                                    call    doRandom
 149+ C53A ~                                    or      %01101111
 150+ C53A ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 151+ C53A ~                                    call    doRandom
 152+ C53A ~                                    or      %01101111
 153+ C53A ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 154+ C53A                                      ENDM
 155+ C53A
 156+ C53A              RandomUnivSpeed:        MACRO
 157+ C53A ~                                    call    doRandom
 158+ C53A ~                                    and     31
 159+ C53A ~                                    ld      (UBnKSpeed),a
 160+ C53A                                      ENDM
 161+ C53A
 162+ C53A              MaxUnivSpeed:           MACRO
 163+ C53A ~                                    ld      a,31
 164+ C53A ~                                    ld      (UBnKSpeed),a
 165+ C53A                                      ENDM

 167+ C53A              ZeroUnivAccelleration:  MACRO

 179+ C548 32 2E C3                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a
 180+ C54B C9                                   ret
 181+ C54C
 182+ C54C              AequN1xorN2:            MACRO  param1,param2
 183+ C54C ~                                    ld      a,(param1)
 184+ C54C ~                                    xor     param2
 185+ C54C                                      ENDM
 186+ C54C
 187+ C54C              N0equN1byN2div256:      MACRO param1,param2,param3
 188+ C54C ~                                    ld      a,param3                        ;
 189+ C54C ~                                    ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 190+ C54C ~                                    ld      a,param2                        ; A = XX16 element
 191+ C54C ~                                    ld      d,a
 192+ C54C ~                                    mul
 193+ C54C ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 194+ C54C ~                                    ld      (param1),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 195+ C54C                                      ENDM
 196+ C54C
 197+ C54C              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 198+ C54C 21 00 C0     ResetUBnkData:          ld      hl,StartOfUniv
 199+ C54F 11 3A 05                             ld      de,UBnk_Data_len
 200+ C552 AF                                   xor     a
 201+ C553 CD AB 99                             call    memfill_dma
 202+ C556 C9                                   ret
 203+ C557              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 204+ C557 21 0C C0     ResetUbnkPosition:      ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 205+ C55A 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 206+ C55C AF                                   xor     a
 207+ C55D 77           .zeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a
 208+ C55E 23                                   inc     hl
 209+ C55F 10 FC                                djnz    .zeroLoop
 210+ C561 C9                                   ret
 211+ C562
 212+ C562 3E 80        FireECM:                ld      a,ECMCounterMax                 ; set ECM time
 213+ C564 32 44 C0                             ld      (UBnKECMCountDown),a            ;
 214+ C567 3A F7 9C                             ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 215+ C56A                                      ReturnIfALTNusng ECMCounterMax
 215+ C56A FE 80       >                        cp    ECMCounterMax
 215+ C56C D8          >                        ret	 c
 216+ C56D 3E 80                                ld      a,ECMCounterMax
 217+ C56F 32 F7 9C                             ld      (ECMCountDown),a
 218+ C572 C9                                   ret
 219+ C573
 220+ C573              ; A ship normally needs enough energy to fire ECM but if its shot then
 221+ C573              ; it may be too low, in which case the ECM does a saftey shutdown and returns 1 energy
 222+ C573              ; plus a 50% chance it will blow the ECM up
 223+ C573 3A 44 C0     UpdateECM:              ld      a,(UBnKECMCountDown)
 224+ C576                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 224+ C576 A7          >                        and     a
 224+ C577 C8          >                        ret     z
 225+ C578 3D                                   dec     a
 226+ C579 32 44 C0                             ld      (UBnKECMCountDown),a
 227+ C57C 21 43 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKEnergy
 228+ C57F 35                                   dec     (hl)
 229+ C580 F0                                   ret     p
 230+ C581 CD E9 C5     .ExhaustedEnergy:       call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; if it ran out of energy it was as it was also shot or collided as it checks in advance. Main ECM loop will continue as a compromise as multiple ships can fire ECM simultaneously
 231+ C584 C9                                   ret
 232+ C585
 233+ C585 3A 33 C0     UpdateSpeedAndPitch:    ld      a,(UBnKAccel)
 234+ C588                                      JumpIfAIsZero .SkipAccelleration
 234+ C588 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 234+ C589 CA A7 C5    >                        jp	    z, .SkipAccelleration
 235+ C58C 47                                   ld      b,a
 236+ C58D 3A 32 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSpeed)
 237+ C590                                      ClearCarryFlag
 237+ C590 B7          >                        or a
 238+ C591 88                                   adc     a,b
 239+ C592                                      JumpIfPositive  .DoneAccelleration
 239+ C592 F2 96 C5    >                        jp		p, .DoneAccelleration
 240+ C595              .SpeedNegative:         ZeroA
 240+ C595 AF          >                        xor a
 241+ C596 47           .DoneAccelleration:     ld      b,a
 242+ C597 3A 26 C3                             ld      a,(SpeedAddr)
 243+ C59A                                      JumpIfAGTENusng b, .SpeedInLimits
 243+ C59A B8          >                        cp     b
 243+ C59B D2 9F C5    >                        jp		nc,.SpeedInLimits
 244+ C59E 47                                   ld      b,a
 245+ C59F 78           .SpeedInLimits:         ld      a,b
 246+ C5A0 32 32 C0                             ld      (UBnKSpeed),a
 247+ C5A3                                      ZeroA
 247+ C5A3 AF          >                        xor a
 248+ C5A4 32 33 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 249+ C5A7              .SkipAccelleration:     ; handle roll and pitch rates
 250+ C5A7 C9                                   ret
 251+ C5A8
 252+ C5A8              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 253+ C5A8              ; This sets the position of the current ship if its a player launched missile
 254+ C5A8 CD 83 C8     UnivSetPlayerMissile:   call    InitialiseOrientation           ; Copy in Player  facing
 255+ C5AB CD 57 C5                             call    ResetUbnkPosition               ; home position
 256+ C5AE 3E 05                                ld      a,MissileDropHeight             ; the missile launches from underneath
 257+ C5B0 32 0F C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),a                     ; so its -ve drop height
 258+ C5B3 3E 80                                ld      a,$80                           ;
 259+ C5B5 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                    ;
 260+ C5B8 3E 03                                ld      a,3                             ; set accelleration
 261+ C5BA 32 33 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                   ;
 262+ C5BD                                      ZeroA
 262+ C5BD AF          >                        xor a
 263+ C5BE 32 34 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 264+ C5C1 32 35 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 265+ C5C4 3E 03                                ld      a,3
 266+ C5C6 32 36 C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT),a
 267+ C5C9 3C                                   inc     a
 268+ C5CA 32 37 C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT2),a
 269+ C5CD 3E 16                                ld      a,22
 270+ C5CF 32 39 C0                             ld      (UBnKCNT2),a
 271+ C5D2                                      MaxUnivSpeed                            ; and immediatley full speed (for now at least) TODO
 271+ C5D2 3E 1F       >                        ld      a,31
 271+ C5D4 32 32 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKSpeed),a
 272+ C5D7 C9                                   ret
 273+ C5D8              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 274+ C5D8              ; this applies blast damage to ship
 275+ C5D8 3A A4 9E     ShipMissileBlast:       ld      a,(CurrentMissileBlastDamage)
 276+ C5DB 47                                   ld      b,a
 277+ C5DC 3A 43 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)                   ; Reduce Energy
 278+ C5DF 90                                   sub     b
 279+ C5E0 C3 E9 C5                             jp      UnivExplodeShip
 280+ C5E3 18 04                                jr      UnivExplodeShip
 281+ C5E5 32 43 C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
 282+ C5E8 C9                                   ret
 283+ C5E9              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 284+ C5E9              ; This sets the ship as a shower of explosiondwd
 285+ C5E9 DD 01        UnivExplodeShip:        break
 286+ C5EB 3A 3F C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
 287+ C5EE F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled      ; Set Exlpoding flag and mark as just been killed
 288+ C5F0 E6 7F                                and     Bit7Clear                       ; Remove AI
 289+ C5F2 32 3F C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a
 290+ C5F5 AF                                   xor     a
 291+ C5F6 32 43 C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
 292+ C5F9                                      ;TODO
 293+ C5F9 C9                                   ret
 294+ C5FA
 295+ C5FA CD 33 C6     UnivSetDemoPostion:     call    UnivSetSpawnPosition
 296+ C5FD 3E 81                                ld      a,%10000001                     ; AI Enabled has 1 missile

 322+ C649 32 0C C0     .setXlo:                ld      (UBnKxlo),a
 323+ C64C 32 0F C0     .setYlo:                ld      (UBnKylo),a
 324+ C64F 0F           .setXsign:              rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 325+ C650 47                                   ld      b,a
 326+ C651 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 327+ C653 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a

 329+ C657 0F                                   rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right

 331+ C659 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; and set y sign
 332+ C65B 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a

 335+ C661 E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set y hi to random 0 to 31
 336+ C663 32 10 C0                             ld      (UBnKyhi),a                     ;
 337+ C666 CB 08        .setXHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 338+ C668 78                                   ld      a,b
 339+ C669 E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set x hi to random 0 to 31
 340+ C66B 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; save shifted into c as well
 341+ C66C 32 0D C0                             ld      (UBnKxhi),a
 342+ C66F 3E 50        .setZHigh:              ld      a,80                            ; set z hi to 80 - xhi - yhi - carry
 343+ C671 98                                   sbc     b
 344+ C672 99                                   sbc     c
 345+ C673 32 13 C0                             ld      (UBnKzhi),a

 434+ C733
 435+ C733 7C           ADDHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 436+ C734 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 437+ C736 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 438+ C737 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 439+ C738                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 439+ C738 FA 50 C7    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEOppSGN
 440+ C73B 78           ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 441+ C73C B2                                   or      d
 442+ C73D                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 442+ C73D FA 42 C7    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDESameNeg
 443+ C740 19                                   add     hl,de
 444+ C741 C9                                   ret
 445+ C742 7C           ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 446+ C743 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 447+ C745 67                                   ld      h,a
 448+ C746 7A                                   ld      a,d
 449+ C747 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 450+ C749 57                                   ld      d,a
 451+ C74A 19                                   add     hl,de
 452+ C74B 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 453+ C74D B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 454+ C74E 67                                   ld      h,a
 455+ C74F C9                                   ret
 456+ C750 7C           ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
 457+ C751 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 458+ C753 67                                   ld      h,a
 459+ C754 7A                                   ld      a,d
 460+ C755 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 461+ C757 57                                   ld      d,a
 462+ C758 B7                                   or      a
 463+ C759 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 464+ C75B 38 04                                jr      c,ADDHLDEOppInvert
 465+ C75D 78           ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 466+ C75E B4                                   or      h
 467+ C75F 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 468+ C760 C9                                   ret
 469+ C761              ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 469+ C761 AF          >                    xor a
 469+ C762 95          >                    sub l
 469+ C763 6F          >                    ld l,a
 469+ C764 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 469+ C765 94          >                    sub h
 469+ C766 67          >                    ld h,a
 470+ C767 78                                   ld      a,b
 471+ C768 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 472+ C76A B4                                   or      h
 473+ C76B 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 474+ C76C C9                                   ret
 475+ C76D
 476+ C76D              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 477+ C76D 7C           SUBHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 478+ C76E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 479+ C770 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 480+ C771 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 481+ C772                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 481+ C772 FA A0 C7    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDEOppSGN
 482+ C775 78           SUBHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 483+ C776 B2                                   or      d
 484+ C777                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 484+ C777 FA 81 C7    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameNeg
 485+ C77A B7                                   or      a
 486+ C77B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 487+ C77D                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 487+ C77D FA 94 C7    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 488+ C780 C9                                   ret
 489+ C781 7C           SUBHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 490+ C782 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 491+ C784 67                                   ld      h,a
 492+ C785 7A                                   ld      a,d
 493+ C786 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 494+ C788 57                                   ld      d,a
 495+ C789 B7                                   or      a
 496+ C78A ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 497+ C78C                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 497+ C78C FA 94 C7    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 498+ C78F 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 499+ C790 F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 500+ C792 67                                   ld      h,a
 501+ C793 C9                                   ret
 502+ C794              SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:      NegHL                                                        ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 502+ C794 AF          >                    xor a
 502+ C795 95          >                    sub l
 502+ C796 6F          >                    ld l,a
 502+ C797 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 502+ C798 94          >                    sub h
 502+ C799 67          >                    ld h,a
 503+ C79A 78                                   ld      a,b
 504+ C79B EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 505+ C79D B4                                   or      h
 506+ C79E 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 507+ C79F C9                                   ret
 508+ C7A0 B7           SUBHLDEOppSGN:          or      a                                               ; here HL and DE are opposite so we can add the values
 509+ C7A1 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 510+ C7A2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 511+ C7A4 67                                   ld      h,a
 512+ C7A5 7A                                   ld      a,d
 513+ C7A6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 514+ C7A8 57                                   ld      d,a
 515+ C7A9 19                                   add     hl,de
 516+ C7AA 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 517+ C7AB B4                                   or      h
 518+ C7AC 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 519+ C7AD C9                                   ret

 521+ C7AE
 522+ C7AE              SBCHLDESigned:          JumpOnBitSet h,7,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 522+ C7AE CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 522+ C7B0 C2 C1 C7    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 523+ C7B3              SBCHLDEhlPos:           JumpOnBitSet h,7,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 523+ C7B3 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 523+ C7B5 C2 C1 C7    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNeg

 525+ C7BA C9                                   ret

 527+ C7BD 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 528+ C7BE CB FA                                set     7,d

 531+ C7C5 C2 CD C7    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg

 533+ C7CA CB FC                                set     7,h

 535+ C7CD CB BA        SBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg:      res     7,d
 536+ C7CF 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 537+ C7D0 CB FA                                set     7,d
 538+ C7D2 CB FC                                set     7,h
 539+ C7D4 C9                                   ret
 540+ C7D5
 541+ C7D5              ; Roate around axis
 542+ C7D5              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
 543+ C7D5              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
 544+ C7D5              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
 545+ C7D5              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
 546+ C7D5              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
 547+ C7D5              ; var RAT2 gives direction
 548+ C7D5              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
 549+ C7D5              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
 550+ C7D5              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
 551+ C7D5 2A C8 9C     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
 552+ C7D8 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 553+ C7D9 23                                   inc     hl
 554+ C7DA 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 555+ C7DB EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 556+ C7DC 7C                                   ld      a,h
 557+ C7DD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 558+ C7DF FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 559+ C7E1 7C                                   ld      a,h
 560+ C7E2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 561+ C7E4 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 562+ C7E6 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 563+ C7E7 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 564+ C7E9 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 565+ C7EA B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 566+ C7EB CD 6D C7                             call    SUBHLDESignedv3 ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 567+ C7EE              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 568+ C7EE E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 569+ C7EF 7D                                   ld      a,l
 570+ C7F0 32 E6 9D                             ld      (varR),a
 571+ C7F3 7C                                   ld      a,h
 572+ C7F4 32 E7 9D                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 573+ C7F7              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 574+ C7F7 2A CA 9C                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 575+ C7FA 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 576+ C7FB 23                                   inc     hl
 577+ C7FC 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 578+ C7FD 7A                                   ld      a,d
 579+ C7FE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 580+ C800 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 581+ C802 7A                                   ld      a,d
 582+ C803 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 583+ C805 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 584+ C806                                      ShiftDERight1
 584+ C806 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 584+ C808 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 585+ C80A                                      ShiftDERight1
 585+ C80A CB 3A       >			   srl d
 585+ C80C CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 586+ C80E                                      ShiftDERight1
 586+ C80E CB 3A       >			   srl d
 586+ C810 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 587+ C812                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 587+ C812 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 587+ C814 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 588+ C816 3A 3B C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 589+ C819 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 590+ C81B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 591+ C81D B2                                   or      d
 592+ C81E 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 593+ C81F              ;;; ld      a,e
 594+ C81F              ;;;     or      iyh
 595+ C81F              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 596+ C81F              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 597+ C81F E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 598+ C820                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 599+ C820              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 600+ C820 CD 33 C7                             call    ADDHLDESignedv3 ; do add using hl and de
 601+ C823 E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 602+ C824              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 603+ C824              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 604+ C824 2A CA 9C                         ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 605+ C827 5E                               ld      e,(hl)
 606+ C828 23                               inc     hl
 607+ C829 56                               ld      d,(hl)
 608+ C82A EB                               ex      de,hl
 609+ C82B 7C                               ld      a,h
 610+ C82C E6 80                            and     $80
 611+ C82E FD 67                            ld      iyh,a
 612+ C830 7C                               ld      a,h
 613+ C831 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 614+ C833 CB 3F                            srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 615+ C835 5F                               ld      e,a
 616+ C836 FD 7C                            ld      a,iyh
 617+ C838 57                               ld      d,a
 618+ C839 B7                               or      a               ; clear carry
 619+ C83A CD 6D C7                         call    SUBHLDESignedv3
 620+ C83D              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 621+ C83D E5                               push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 622+ C83E 7D                               ld      a,l
 623+ C83F 32 E3 9C                         ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 624+ C842 7C                               ld      a,h
 625+ C843 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 626+ C845 32 01 9E                         ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 627+ C848              ;-- Set up TQ
 628+ C848 2A C8 9C                         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 629+ C84B              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 630+ C84B 5E                               ld      e,(hl)
 631+ C84C 23                               inc     hl
 632+ C84D 56                               ld      d,(hl)
 633+ C84E 7A                               ld      a,d
 634+ C84F E6 80                            and     $80
 635+ C851 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 636+ C853 7A                               ld      a,d
 637+ C854 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 638+ C856 57                               ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 639+ C857                                  ShiftDERight1
 639+ C857 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 639+ C859 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 640+ C85B                                  ShiftDERight1
 640+ C85B CB 3A       >			   srl d
 640+ C85D CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 641+ C85F                                  ShiftDERight1
 641+ C85F CB 3A       >			   srl d
 641+ C861 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 642+ C863                                  ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 642+ C863 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 642+ C865 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 643+ C867 3A 3B C0                         ld      a,(univRAT2)
 644+ C86A FD AC                            xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 645+ C86C E6 80                            and     $80
 646+ C86E B2                               or      d
 647+ C86F 57                               ld      d,a
 648+ C870              ;;; ld      a,e
 649+ C870              ;;;     or      iyh
 650+ C870              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 651+ C870 E1                               pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 652+ C871              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 653+ C871 CD 6D C7                         call    SUBHLDESignedv3 ; do add using hl and de
 654+ C874              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 655+ C874 EB                               ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 656+ C875 2A CA 9C                         ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 657+ C878 73                               ld      (hl),e
 658+ C879 23                               inc     hl
 659+ C87A 72                               ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 660+ C87B              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 661+ C87B D1                               pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 662+ C87C 2A C8 9C                         ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 663+ C87F 73                               ld      (hl),e
 664+ C880 23                               inc     hl
 665+ C881 72                               ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 666+ C882 C9                               ret
 667+ C883
 668+ C883                                  include "Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
   1++C883              InitialiseOrientation:
   2++C883              ZI1:
   3++C883              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
   4++C883              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
   5++C883              ;  nosev = (0,  0, -1)  nosev = (0, 0, &E000)   E000 = SignBit[96]
   6++C883 21 00 00         ld      hl, 0
   7++C886 22 17 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
   8++C889 22 19 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
   9++C88C 22 1B C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  10++C88F 22 1F C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
  11++C892 22 21 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  12++C895 22 23 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
  13++C898 21 00 60         ld      hl, $6000					; 96 in hi byte
  14++C89B                  ;ld      hl,1
  15++C89B 22 15 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),hl
  16++C89E 22 1D C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),hl
  17++C8A1 21 00 E0         ld      hl, $E000					; -96 in hi byte which is +96 with hl bit 7 set
  18++C8A4 22 25 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl
  19++C8A7 C9               ret
  20++C8A8
  21++C8A8              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
  22++C8A8              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
  23++C8A8              ;  nosev = (-0,  -0, 1) nosev = (0, 0, &6000)
  24++C8A8
  25++C8A8              LaunchedOrientation:
  26++C8A8 CD 83 C8         call    InitialiseOrientation
  27++C8AB                  FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevX+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  27++C8AB 3A 22 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  27++C8AE EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  27++C8B0 32 22 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
  28++C8B3                  FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevY+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  28++C8B3 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
  28++C8B6 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  28++C8B8 32 24 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
  29++C8BB                  FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
  29++C8BB 3A 26 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
  29++C8BE EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  29++C8C0 32 26 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
  30++C8C3 C9               ret
  31++C8C4
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
 669+ C8C4
 670+ C8C4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 671+ C8C4              OrientateVertex:
 672+ C8C4
 673+ C8C4              ;                      [ sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z ]   [ x ]
 674+ C8C4              ;  projected [x y z] = [ roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z ] . [ y ]
 675+ C8C4              ;                      [ nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 676+ C8C4              ;
 677+ C8C4
 678+ C8C4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 679+ C8C4              TransposeVertex:
 680+ C8C4              ;                      [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]
 681+ C8C4              ;  projected [x y z] = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ]
 682+ C8C4              ;                      [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 683+ C8C4              VectorToVertex:
 684+ C8C4              ;                     [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]   [ x ]
 685+ C8C4              ;  vector to vertex = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ] + [ y ]
 686+ C8C4              ;                     [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]   [ z ]
 687+ C8C4              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
 688+ C8C4              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
 689+ C8C4 32 E5 9C     DVID3B2:                ld      (varPhi2),a                     ;DVID3B2 \ Divide 3 bytes by 2, K = [P(HiLo).A]/[INWK_z HiLo], for planet radius, Xreg protected. ; P+2    \ num sg
 690+ C8C7                                      ldCopy2Byte UBnKzlo, varQ               ; [QR} = Ubnk zlohi  (i.e. Inwk_z HiLo)
 690+ C8C7 2A 12 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnKzlo)
 690+ C8CA 22 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),hl
 691+ C8CD 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                    ;
 692+ C8D0 32 E7 9D                             ld      (varS),a                        ; S = inkw z sign
 693+ C8D3 ED 5B E3 9C  DVID3B:                 ld      de,(varP)                       ; K (3bytes)=P(Lo Hi Hi2)/S.R.Q approx  Acc equiv K(0).; get P and P+1 into de
 694+ C8D7 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; num lo
 695+ C8D8 F6 01                                or      1                               ; must be at least 1
 696+ C8DA 32 E3 9C                             ld      (varP),a                        ; store
 697+ C8DD 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; update DE too
 698+ C8DE 3A E5 9C                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; varP Sign     E.D.A = P Lo Hi Hi2
 699+ C8E1 21 E7 9D                             ld      hl,varS                         ; hl = address of VarS
 700+ C8E4 AE                                   xor     (hl)                            ; A = PHi2 Xor S Signs
 701+ C8E5 E6 80                                and     $80                             ;
 702+ C8E7 32 01 9E                             ld      (varT),a                        ; T = Sign bit of A
 703+ C8EA FD 2E 00                             ld      iyl,0                           ; iyl = yReg = counter
 704+ C8ED 3A E5 9C                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ;
 705+ C8F0 E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; A = Ph2 again but minus sign bit
 706+ C8F2              DVL9:                   JumpIfAGTENusng $40,DV14                ; counter Y up; if object is over $40 away then scaled and exit Y count
 706+ C8F2 FE 40       >                        cp     $40
 706+ C8F4 D2 02 C9    >                        jp		nc,DV14
 707+ C8F7                                      ShiftDELeft1                            ; de (or P,P1) > 1
 707+ C8F7 CB 23       >			   sla e
 707+ C8F9 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 708+ C8FB CB 17                                rl      a                               ; and accumulator as 3rd byte
 709+ C8FD FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 710+ C8FF C2 F2 C8                             jp      nz,DVL9                         ; loop again with a max of 256 iterations
 711+ C902 32 E5 9C     DV14:                   ld      (varPhi2),a                     ; scaled, exited Ycount
 712+ C905 ED 53 E3 9C                          ld      (varP),de                       ; store off the value so far
 713+ C909 3A E7 9D                             ld      a,(varS)                        ; zsign
 714+ C90C E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; denom sg7
 715+ C90E                                      ; jp mi,DV9                             ; this can never happen as bit 7 is and'ed out
 716+ C90E 2A E5 9D                             ld      hl,(varQ)                       ; demon lo
 717+ C911 FD 2D        DVL6:                   dec     iyl                             ; counter Y back down, roll S. ;  scale Y back
 718+ C913                                      ShiftHLLeft1
 718+ C913 CB 25       >			   sla l
 718+ C915 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 719+ C917 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; mulitply QRS by 2
 720+ C919 F2 11 C9                             jp      p,DVL6                          ; loop roll S until Abit7 set.
 721+ C91C 22 E5 9D     DV9:                    ld      (varQ),hl                       ; bmi cant enter here from above ; save off so far
 722+ C91F 32 E5 9D                             ld      (varQ),a                        ; Q \ mostly empty so now reuse as hi denom
 723+ C922 3E FE                                ld      a,$FE                           ;  Xreg protected so can't LL28+4
 724+ C924 32 E6 9D                             ld      (varR),a                        ;  R
 725+ C927 3A E5 9C                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; P+2 \ big numerator
 726+ C92A CD 79 AE                             call    PROJ256mulAdivQ                 ; TODO LL31\ R now =A*256/Q
 727+ C92D 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 728+ C92F 32 F9 9D                             ld      (varKp1),a
 729+ C932 32 FA 9D                             ld      (varKp2),a
 730+ C935 32 FB 9D                             ld      (varKp3),a                      ; clear out K+1 to K+3
 731+ C938 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl                           ; Y counter for scale
 732+ C93A                                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,DV12                 ; Ycount +ve
 732+ C93A CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 732+ C93C CA 67 C9    >                        jp      z,DV12
 733+ C93F 3A E6 9D                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; R     \ else Y count is -ve, Acc = remainder.
 734+ C942 ED 5B F8 9D                          ld      de,(varK)                       ; d= k1
 735+ C946 2A FC 9D                             ld      hl,(varK2)                      ; h = k3, l = k2
 736+ C949 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; use e to hold K0 pulled from a
 737+ C94A CB 27        DVL8:                   sla     a                               ; boost up a                     ;  counter Y up
 738+ C94C CB 12                                rl      d                               ; k1
 739+ C94E CB 15                                rl      l                               ; k2
 740+ C950 CB 14                                rl      h                               ; k3
 741+ C952 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 742+ C954 20 F4                                jr      nz,DVL8                         ;
 743+ C956 ED 53 F8 9D  DVL8Save:               ld      (varK),de
 744+ C95A 22 FC 9D                             ld      (varK2),hl                      ; save back K0 to k3
 745+ C95D 3A 01 9E                             ld      a,(varT)
 746+ C960 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; get varT into c reg
 747+ C961 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; a= k3 (sign)
 748+ C962 B1                                   or      c                               ; merge in varT (sign)that was saved much earlier up)
 749+ C963 32 0B 9E                             ld      (varK3),a                       ; load sign bit back into K3
 750+ C966 C9                                   ret
 751+ C967              DV12:                   JumpIfAIsZero   DV13                    ; Y Count zerp, go to DV13
 751+ C967 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 751+ C968 CA 7F C9    >                        jp	    z, DV13
 752+ C96B 3A E6 9D                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; Reduce Remainder
 753+ C96E CB 3F        DVL10:                  srl     a                               ; divide by 2                     ; counter Y reduce
 754+ C970 FD 2D                                dec     iyl
 755+ C972 C2 6E C9                             jp      nz,DVL10                        ; loop y reduce until y is zero
 756+ C975 32 F8 9D                             ld      (varK),a                        ; k Lo
 757+ C978                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 757+ C978 3A 01 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 757+ C97B 32 FB 9D    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 758+ C97E C9                                   ret
 759+ C97F              DV13:                   ldCopyByte  varR,varK                   ; R \ already correct so copy to K lo;DV13   \ Ycount zero \ K(1to2) already = 0
 759+ C97F 3A E6 9D    >                        ld       a,(varR)

 761+ C98B C9                                   ret

 763+ C98C CD C4 C8     PLS6:                   call    DVID3B2                         ; Returns AHL K ( 2 1 0 )
 764+ C98F 3A FB 9D                             ld      a,(varKp3)
 765+ C992 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 766+ C994 21 FA 9D                             ld      hl,varKp2
 767+ C997 B6                                   or      (hl)
 768+ C998 C2 AD C9                             jp      nz,PL44TooBig
 769+ C99B 3A F9 9D                             ld      a,(varKp1)
 770+ C99E FE 04                                cp      4                               ; if high byte > 4 then total > 1024 so too big
 771+ C9A0 30 0B                                jr      nc,PL44TooBig
 772+ C9A2                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; we have a good result regardless
 772+ C9A2 B7          >                        or a
 773+ C9A3 2A F8 9D                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; get K (0 1)
 774+ C9A6 3A FB 9D                             ld      a,(varKp3)                      ; if sign bit high?
 775+ C9A9 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 776+ C9AB C8                                   ret     z                               ; no so we can just return
