 129++D08A              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D08A              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D08A              ;;;;       mul
 132++D08A              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D08A              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D08A              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D08A              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D08A              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D08A              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D08A              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D08A              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D08A              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D08A
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 969+ D08A              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 970+ D08A              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 971+ D08A                                      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
   1++D08A              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
   2++D08A              ; returns with XX15 scaled by Q but also z scaled in a register
   3++D08A              ScaleNormal:
   4++D08A              LL93:
   5++D08A 3A EC 9D             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; scale--
   6++D08D DD 6F        		ld		ixl,a
   7++D08F 3A 92 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkZScaled)				; needs to be in a just in case we abort early
   8++D092 DD 2D        		dec		ixl
   9++D094 F8           		ret		m							; return if q was 0, i.e. no scaling
  10++D095              ScaleLoop:
  11++D095              LL933:
  12++D095 21 8E C0             ld      hl,XX15
  13++D098 CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15	\ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
  14++D09A 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 x sign now
  15++D09B 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 y Lo now
  16++D09C CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2	\ ynormal lo/2
  17++D09E 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 y sign now
  18++D09F 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 z Lo now
  19++D0A0 CB 3E        		srl		(hl)
  20++D0A2 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; znormal lo/2 also into a it came in at the end of LL92
  21++D0A3 DD 2D                dec     ixl                         ; reduce scale
  22++D0A5 F2 95 D0             jp      p,ScaleLoop                 ; LL93-3 loop to lsr xx15
  23++D0A8 C9                   ret
  24++D0A9
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
 972+ D0A9              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 973+ D0A9                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D0A9              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D0A9              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D0A9 3A 29 C3             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D0AC 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D0AD              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D0AD 3A 89 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D0B0 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D0B1                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D0B1 A7          >                        and     a
   8++D0B2 C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D0B3              LL90Loop:
  10++D0B3              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D0B3 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D0B4                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D0B4 2A 85 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D0B7 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D0B9 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D0BB 22 85 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D0BE                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D0BE 2A 82 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D0C1 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D0C3 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D0C5 22 82 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D0C8                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D0C8 2A 88 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D0CB CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D0CD CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D0CF 22 88 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D0D2 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D0D3                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D0D3 A7          >                        and     a
  16++D0D4 C2 B3 D0    >                        jp	    nz,LL90Loop
  17++D0D7 C9                   ret
  18++D0D8
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 974+ D0D8              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 975+ D0D8
 976+ D0D8              ; Backface cull
 977+ D0D8              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 978+ D0D8              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 979+ D0D8              ;
 980+ D0D8
 981+ D0D8                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D0D8 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D0D9 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D0DA E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D0DC 32 8F C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D0DF 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D0E0 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D0E2 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D0E3 E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D0E5 32 91 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D0E8 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D0E9 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D0EB E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D0ED 32 93 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D0F0 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D0F1 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D0F2 32 8E C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D0F5 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D0F6 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D0F7 32 90 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D0FA 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D0FB 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D0FC 32 92 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D0FF C9                                   ret
  24++D100
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
 982+ D100                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D100 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D101 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D102 E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D104 32 95 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D107 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D108 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D10A 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D10B E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D10D 32 97 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D110 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D111 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D113 E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D115 32 99 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D118 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D119 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D11A 32 94 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D11D 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D11E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D11F 32 96 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D122 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D123 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D124 32 98 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
  23++D127 C9                                   ret
  24++D128
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 983+ D128              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 984+ D128              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 985+ D128              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 986+ D128              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 987+ D128              ; return if no faces
 988+ D128              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 989+ D128              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 990+ D128              ; While Z hi <> 0
 991+ D128              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 992+ D128              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 993+ D128              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 994+ D128              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 995+ D128              ; Loop
 996+ D128              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 997+ D128              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 998+ D128              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 999+ D128              ; For each face
1000+ D128              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
1001+ D128              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
1002+ D128              ;        Get Face data into XX12
1003+ D128              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
1004+ D128              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
1005+ D128              ;        else
1006+ D128              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
1007+ D128              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
1008+ D128              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
1009+ D128              ;           While X >= 0
1010+ D128              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
1011+ D128              ;              if  x >= 0
1012+ D128              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
1013+ D128              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
1014+ D128              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
1015+ D128              ;           loop
1016+ D128              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
1017+ D128              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
1018+ D128              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
1019+ D128              ;               X = 1
1020+ D128              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
1021+ D128              ;           else
1022+ D128              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
1023+ D128              ;           endif
1024+ D128              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
1025+ D128              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
1026+ D128              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
1027+ D128              ;               X = 1
1028+ D128              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
1029+ D128              ;           else
1030+ D128              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
1031+ D128              ;           endif
1032+ D128              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
1033+ D128              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
1034+ D128              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
1035+ D128              ;               X = 1
1036+ D128              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
1037+ D128              ;           else
1038+ D128              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
1039+ D128              ;           endif
1040+ D128              ;        endif
1041+ D128              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
1042+ D128              ;        if dot product < 0
1043+ D128              ;           set face visible
1044+ D128              ;        else
1045+ D128              ;           set face invisible
1046+ D128              ;        end if
1047+ D128              ;     else
1048+ D128              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
1049+ D128              ;     end if
1050+ D128              ; Next Face
1051+ D128
1052+ D128 DD 25        ScaleDownXX15byIXH:     dec     ixh
1053+ D12A F8                                   ret     m
1054+ D12B 21 8E C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaled
1055+ D12E CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
1056+ D130 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 x sign now
1057+ D131 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y Lo now
1058+ D132 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2    \ ynormal lo/2
1059+ D134 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y sign now
1060+ D135 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 z Lo now
1061+ D136 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
1062+ D138 C3 28 D1                             jp      ScaleDownXX15byIXH
1063+ D13B C9                                   ret
1064+ D13C
1065+ D13C 21 82 C0     DivideXX18By2:          ld      hl,UBnkDrawCam0xLo
1066+ D13F CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
1067+ D141 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 x sign now
1068+ D142 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y Lo now
1069+ D143 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18+2    \ ynormal lo/2
1070+ D145 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y sign now
1071+ D146 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 z Lo now
1072+ D147 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
1073+ D149 C9                                   ret
1074+ D14A
1075+ D14A              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
1076+ D14A
1077+ D14A              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
1078+ D14A              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
1079+ D14A              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
1080+ D14A              ;
1081+ D14A              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
1082+ D14A              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
1083+ D14A              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
1084+ D14A              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
1085+ D14A              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
1086+ D14A
1087+ D14A              RotateXX15ByTransMatXX16:
1088+ D14A 21 49 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
1089+ D14D CD E1 94                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
1090+ D150 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
1091+ D151 7D                                   ld      a,l
1092+ D152 B0                                   or      b
1093+ D153 32 95 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
1094+ D156 7D                                   ld      a,l
1095+ D157 32 94 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                     ; that is result done for
1096+ D15A
1097+ D15A 21 4F C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
1098+ D15D CD E1 94                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
1099+ D160 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
1100+ D161 7D                                   ld      a,l
1101+ D162 B0                                   or      b
1102+ D163 32 97 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
1103+ D166 7D                                   ld      a,l
1104+ D167 32 96 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                     ; that is result done for
1105+ D16A
1106+ D16A 21 55 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
1107+ D16D CD E1 94                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
1108+ D170 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
1109+ D171 7D                                   ld      a,l
1110+ D172 B0                                   or      b
1111+ D173 32 99 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
1112+ D176 7D                                   ld      a,l
1113+ D177 32 98 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a                     ; that is result done for
1114+ D17A C9                                   ret
1115+ D17B
1116+ D17B                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D17B 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   2++D17C              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   3++D17C              ; EE29:
   4++D17C
   5++D17C              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   6++D17C              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
   7++D17C              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
   8++D17C              ;       Where [x y z] =
   9++D17C              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  10++D17C              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  11++D17C              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  12++D17C              ;
  13++D17C              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  14++D17C              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  15++D17C              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  16++D17C              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  17++D17C              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  18++D17C              ;
  19++D17C              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  20++D17C              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  21++D17C              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  22++D17C              ;
  23++D17C              ; so
  24++D17C              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  25++D17C              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  26++D17C              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  27++D17C              ;
  28++D17C              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  29++D17C              ;
  30++D17C              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  31++D17C              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  32++D17C              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  33++D17C              ;
  34++D17C
  35++D17C
  36++D17C
  37++D17C 3A 89 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  38++D17F                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  38++D17F A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  38++D180 CA AC D1    >                        jp	    z, .ScaleDone
  39++D183 2A 82 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  40++D186 ED 5B 85 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  41++D18A ED 4B 88 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  42++D18E FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  43++D190                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  43++D190 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  43++D192 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  44++D194                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  44++D194 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  44++D196 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  45++D198                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  45++D198 CB 38       >			   srl b
  45++D19A CB 19       >			   rr  c
  46++D19C 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  47++D19D                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  47++D19D A7          >                        and     a
  47++D19E C2 8E D1    >                        jp	    nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  48++D1A1 22 82 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  49++D1A4 ED 53 85 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  50++D1A8 ED 43 88 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  51++D1AC FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  52++D1AE 32 EC 9D                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  53++D1B1 C9                                   ret
  54++D1B2
  55++D1B2              ;;--BackFaceCull:
  56++D1B2              ;;--;debug:jp debug
  57++D1B2              ;;--; DEBUG  force for now
  58++D1B2              ;;--;                        ld     a,MaxVisibility                 ; max visibility                                               ;;;; default max visibility
  59++D1B2              ;;--;                        ld     (LastNormalVisible),a           ; XX4                                                          ;;;;
  60++D1B2              ;;--;
  61++D1B2              ;;--; DEBUG
  62++D1B2              ;;--                         ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4 &  return if no faces
  63++D1B2              ;;--                       ; break
  64++D1B2              ;;--                        call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
  65++D1B2              ;;--                        call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
  66++D1B2              ;;--                        call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
  67++D1B2              ;;--                        call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
  68++D1B2              ;;--
  69++D1B2              ;;--.BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; a = ship normal scale factor
  70++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
  71++D1B2              ;;--; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
  72++D1B2              ;;--                        call    ScaleDrawcam
  73++D1B2              ;;--                        call    CopyDrawCamToScaled
  74++D1B2              ;;--.LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation  ; xx12 = xx15 . XX16
  75++D1B2              ;;--                        call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = xx15.xx16
  76++D1B2              ;;--.PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
  77++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (varV),hl
  78++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
  79++D1B2              ;;--                        srl     a                                                       ;
  80++D1B2              ;;--                        srl     a                                                       ;
  81++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      b,a                                                     ;
  82++D1B2              ;;--                        xor     a
  83++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                                   ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
  84++D1B2              ;;--ProcessNormalsLoop:     push    hl
  85++D1B2              ;;--                        push    bc
  86++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,(hl)                                                  ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
  87++D1B2              ;;--                        and     $1F                                                     ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
  88++D1B2              ;;--                        ;JumpIfAGTENusng c,FaceVisible                                   ; commented out for debuggging the skip
  89++D1B2              ;;--.LL86:                  jp  .LL87 ; force testing of normals
  90++D1B2              ;;--                        jp      .FaceVisible
  91++D1B2              ;;--; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
  92++D1B2              ;;--.LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12
  93++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX17)
  94++D1B2              ;;--                        JumpIfALTNusng 4,.LL92
  95++D1B2              ;;--.LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15
  96++D1B2              ;;--                        jp      .LL89
  97++D1B2              ;;--.Ovflw:                 ld      a,(XX18)
  98++D1B2              ;;--                        srl     a
  99++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (XX18),a
 100++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+6)
 101++D1B2              ;;--                        srl     a
 102++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (XX18+6),a
 103++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+3)
 104++D1B2              ;;--                        srl     a
 105++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (XX18+3),a
 106++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,1                        ; set scale to 1 so when we fall through into LL92, we divide the normal vector by 2 as well
 107++D1B2              ;;--.LL92:                   ld      b,a
 108++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12,   UBnkXScaled
 109++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12+2, UBnkYScaled
 110++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12+4, UBnkZScaled
 111++D1B2              ;;--.LL93                   dec     b
 112++D1B2              ;;--                        jp      m, .LL94
 113++D1B2              ;;--.LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled
 114++D1B2              ;;--                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled
 115++D1B2              ;;--                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled
 116++D1B2              ;;--                        dec     b
 117++D1B2              ;;--                        jp      p,.LL93Loop
 118++D1B2              ;;--; Add normal to XX15
 119++D1B2              ;;--.LL94:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR
 120++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS
 121++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ
 122++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+8)
 123++D1B2              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 124++D1B2              ;;--                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 125++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 126++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkZScaledSign
 127++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR
 128++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaledSign, varS
 129++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ
 130++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)
 131++D1B2              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 132++D1B2              ;;--                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 133++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 134++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkXScaledSign
 135++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varR
 136++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaledSign, varS
 137++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)
 138++D1B2              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 139++D1B2              ;;--                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 140++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 141++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign
 142++D1B2              ;;--; calculate dot product:
 143++D1B2              ;;--.LL89:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ
 144++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 145++D1B2              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 146++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (varT),a
 147++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 148++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 149++D1B2              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 150++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (varS),a
 151++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ
 152++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 153++D1B2              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 154++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (varQ),a
 155++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varT,varR
 156++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)
 157++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign
 158++D1B2              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 159++D1B2              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 160++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (varT),a
 161++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ
 162++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)
 163++D1B2              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 164++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      (varQ),a
 165++D1B2              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varT, varR
 166++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)
 167++D1B2              ;;--                        ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign
 168++D1B2              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 169++D1B2              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product
 170++D1B2              ;;--                        test    $80
 171++D1B2              ;;--                        jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 172++D1B2              ;;--.FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 173++D1B2              ;;--                        call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 174++D1B2              ;;--                        jp          ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 175++D1B2              ;;--.FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 176++D1B2              ;;--                        call        SetFaceAVisible
 177++D1B2              ;;--ProcessNormalLoopEnd:   ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 178++D1B2              ;;--                        inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 179++D1B2              ;;--                        pop         bc
 180++D1B2              ;;--                        pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 181++D1B2              ;;--                        ld          a,4
 182++D1B2              ;;--                        add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 183++D1B2              ;;--                        ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 184++D1B2              ;;--                        dec         b
 185++D1B2              ;;--                        jp          nz,ProcessNormalsLoop
 186++D1B2              ;;--                        ret
 187++D1B2
 188++D1B2
 189++D1B2
 190++D1B2
 191++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    CopyFaceToXX15                                          ;        Get Face data into XX12
 192++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 193++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
 194++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 195++D1B2              ;;;;;                        test    $80
 196++D1B2              ;;;;;                        jp      nz, FaceVisible
 197++D1B2              ;;;;;.BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; a = ship normal scale factor
 198++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 199++D1B2              ;;;;;.ScaleNormal:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
 200++D1B2              ;;;;;                        JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
 201++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
 202++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
 203++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
 204++D1B2              ;;;;;.ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
 205++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
 206++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ShiftDERight1                       ;
 207++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ShiftBCRight1                       ;
 208++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
 209++D1B2              ;;;;;                        JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
 210++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
 211++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
 212++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
 213++D1B2              ;;;;;; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 214++D1B2              ;;;;;.ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
 215++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
 216++D1B2              ;;;;;    call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
 217++D1B2              ;;;;;    call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
 218++D1B2              ;;;;;;    call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
 219++D1B2              ;;;;;    call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
 220++D1B2              ;;;;;
 221++D1B2              ;;;;;
 222++D1B2              ;;;;;
 223++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; copy DrawCam to Xx15
 224++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation   ; Xx12 = XX15 (face normal) dot rotation matrix
 225++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18              ; now XX18 = dot product
 226++D1B2              ;;;;;.ProcessNormals:        ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 227++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (varV),hl
 228++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 229++D1B2              ;;;;;                        srl     a                                                       ;
 230++D1B2              ;;;;;                        srl     a                                                       ;
 231++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      b,a                                                     ;
 232++D1B2              ;;;;;                        xor     a
 233++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                                   ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 234++D1B2              ;;;;;.ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 235++D1B2              ;;;;;                        push    bc
 236++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)                                                  ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 237++D1B2              ;;;;;                        and     $1F                                                     ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 238++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ;JumpIfAGTENusng c,FaceVisible                                   ; commented out for debuggging the skip
 239++D1B2              ;;;;;.CheckFaceVisibility:   call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; Get Face data into XX12
 240++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(varXX17)                  ; if scale factor < 4 then skip next bit
 241++D1B2              ;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng 4,.LL92
 242++D1B2              ;;;;;.LargeScaleFactor:      call    CopyXX18toXX15
 243++D1B2              ;;;;;                        jp      .LL89
 244++D1B2              ;;;;;.Ovflw:                 ld      a,(XX18)
 245++D1B2              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 246++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18),a
 247++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+6)
 248++D1B2              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 249++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18+6),a
 250++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+3)
 251++D1B2              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 252++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18+3),a
 253++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,1                        ; set scale to 1 so when we fall through into LL92, we divide the normal vector by 2 as well
 254++D1B2              ;;;;;.LL92:                  ld      b,a
 255++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12,   UBnkXScaled
 256++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12+2, UBnkYScaled
 257++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12+4, UBnkZScaled
 258++D1B2              ;;;;;.LL93                   dec     b
 259++D1B2              ;;;;;                        jp      m, .LL94
 260++D1B2              ;;;;;.LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled
 261++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled
 262++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled
 263++D1B2              ;;;;;                        dec     b
 264++D1B2              ;;;;;                        jp      p,.LL93Loop
 265++D1B2              ;;;;;.LL94:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR
 266++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS
 267++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ
 268++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+8)
 269++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 270++D1B2              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 271++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 272++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkZScaledSign
 273++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR
 274++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaledSign, varS
 275++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ
 276++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)
 277++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 278++D1B2              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 279++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 280++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkXScaledSign
 281++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varR
 282++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaledSign, varS
 283++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)
 284++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 285++D1B2              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 286++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 287++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign
 288++D1B2              ;;;;;.LL89:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ
 289++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 290++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 291++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (varT),a
 292++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 293++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 294++D1B2              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 295++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (varS),a
 296++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ
 297++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 298++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 299++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (varQ),a
 300++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varT,varR
 301++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)
 302++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign
 303++D1B2              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 304++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 305++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (varT),a
 306++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ
 307++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)
 308++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 309++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      (varQ),a
 310++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varT, varR
 311++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)
 312++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign
 313++D1B2              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 314++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product
 315++D1B2              ;;;;;                        test    $80
 316++D1B2              ;;;;;                        jr      nz,.FaceVisible
 317++D1B2              ;;;;;.FaceNotVisible:        ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 318++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 319++D1B2              ;;;;;                        jp      .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 320++D1B2              ;;;;;.FaceVisible:           ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 321++D1B2              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAVisible
 322++D1B2              ;;;;;.ProcessNormalLoopEnd:   ld      hl, CurrentNormIdx
 323++D1B2              ;;;;;                        inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 324++D1B2              ;;;;;                        pop         bc
 325++D1B2              ;;;;;                        pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 326++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld          a,4
 327++D1B2              ;;;;;                        add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 328++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 329++D1B2              ;;;;;                        dec         b
 330++D1B2              ;;;;;                        jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 331++D1B2              ;;;;;                        ret                                 ; If Y >= XX20 all normals' visibilities set, onto Transpose. return
 332++D1B2              ;;;;;
 333++D1B2
 334++D1B2
 335++D1B2
 336++D1B2 3A 14 C0     CheckVisible:           ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
 337++D1B5 E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
 338++D1B7 20 44                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
 339++D1B9 2A 12 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
 340++D1BC 7C                                   ld      a,h
 341++D1BD                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
 341++D1BD FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
 341++D1BF D2 FD D1    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
 342++D1C2 ED 5B 0C C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
 343++D1C6 CD 5F B3                             call    compare16HLDE
 344++D1C9 38 32                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 345++D1CB ED 5B 0F C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
 346++D1CF CD 5F B3                             call    compare16HLDE
 347++D1D2 38 29                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 348++D1D4              .CalculateXX4:          ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
 348++D1D4 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 348++D1D6 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 349++D1D8                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 349++D1D8 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 349++D1DA CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 350++D1DC                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 350++D1DC CB 3C       >			   srl h
 350++D1DE CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 351++D1E0 7C                                   ld      a,h
 352++D1E1 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
 353++D1E3              .DrawAsDotCheck:        JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
 353++D1E3 C2 03 D2    >                        jp	nz,.ShipIsADot
 354++D1E6                                      ; Check visbility distance
 355++D1E6              .SetXX4Dist:            ;break
 356++D1E6 7D                                   ld      a,l
 357++D1E7 1F                                   rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
 358++D1E8 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
 359++D1EA CB 3F                                srl     a
 360++D1EC CB 3F                                srl     a
 361++D1EE 32 3E C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawAllFaces),a        ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
 362++D1F1 3A 3F C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
 363++D1F4 F6 40                                or      ShipIsVisible               ; Visible and not a dot
 364++D1F6 E6 F7                                and     ShipIsNotDot                ;
 365++D1F8 32 3F C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
 366++D1FB                                      ClearCarryFlag
 366++D1FB B7          >                        or a
 367++D1FC C9                                   ret
 368++D1FD              .ShipNoDraw:            ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm  , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr ; Assume its hidden
 368++D1FD 21 3F C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
 368++D200 CB B6       >                        res     ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,(hl)
 369++D202 C9                                   ret
 370++D203 3A 3F C0     .ShipIsADot:            ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
 371++D206 F6 48                                or      ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot   ;
 372++D208 32 3F C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
 373++D20B C9                                   ret
 374++D20C
 375++D20C
 376++D20C              ; TODO remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done
 377++D20C              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 377++D20C 3A 23 C3    >                        ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 377++D20F A7          >                        and a
 377++D210 C8          >                        ret    z
 378++D211                                     ; break
 379++D211 CD 4F CC                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 380++D214 CD 75 96                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 381++D217 CD 06 CF                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 382++D21A                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 383++D21A 3A 29 C3     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 384++D21D FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 385++D21F              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 386++D21F CD 7C D1                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 387++D222 CD 1F CF                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 388++D225 CD CC 95     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 389++D228 CD 97 CE                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 390++D22B 21 E9 C4     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 391++D22E 22 E8 9C                             ld      (varV),hl
 392++D231 3A 23 C3                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 393++D234 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 394++D236 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 395++D238 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 396++D239 AF                                   xor     a
 397++D23A 32 7B D1                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 398++D23D E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 399++D23E C5                                   push    bc
 400++D23F 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 401++D240 E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 402++D242 E5                                   push    hl
 403++D243 21 3E C0                             ld      hl,UBnkDrawAllFaces
 404++D246 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 405++D247 E1                                   pop     hl
 406++D248 DA 8D D3                             jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 407++D24B              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 408++D24B CD 00 D1     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 409++D24E 3A EC 9D                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 410++D251 47                                   ld      b,a
 411++D252                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 411++D252 FE 04       >                        cp      4
 411++D254 DA 8F D2    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 412++D257 CD E1 CE     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 413++D25A C3 1E D3                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 414++D25D 3A 82 C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 415++D260 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 416++D262 32 82 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 417++D265 3A 88 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 418++D268 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 419++D26A 32 88 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 420++D26D 3A 85 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 421++D270 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 422++D272 32 85 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 423++D275 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 424++D277                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 424++D277 3A 8E C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 424++D27A CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 424++D27C 32 8E C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 425++D27F                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 425++D27F 3A 90 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 425++D282 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 425++D284 32 90 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 426++D287                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 426++D287 3A 92 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 426++D28A CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 426++D28C 32 92 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 427++D28F              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 428++D28F              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 429++D28F CD BC CE                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 430++D292 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 431++D293 FA B2 D2                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 432++D296              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 432++D296 3A 8E C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 432++D299 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 432++D29B 32 8E C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 433++D29E                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 433++D29E 3A 90 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 433++D2A1 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 433++D2A3 32 90 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 434++D2A6                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 434++D2A6 3A 92 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 434++D2A9 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 434++D2AB 32 92 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 435++D2AE 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 436++D2AF F2 96 D2                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 437++D2B2              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 438++D2B2              ; Add normal to XX15
 439++D2B2              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 440++D2B2              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 441++D2B2              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 442++D2B2              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 443++D2B2              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 443++D2B2 3A 92 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 443++D2B5 32 E6 9D    >                        ld       (varR),a
 444++D2B8                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 444++D2B8 3A 99 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 444++D2BB 32 E7 9D    >                        ld       (varS),a
 445++D2BE                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 445++D2BE 3A 88 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 445++D2C1 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 446++D2C4 3A 8A C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 447++D2C7 CD A8 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 448++D2CA DA 5D D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 449++D2CD 32 92 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 450++D2D0                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 450++D2D0 3A E7 9D    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 450++D2D3 32 93 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 451++D2D6                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 451++D2D6 3A 8E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 451++D2D9 32 E6 9D    >                        ld       (varR),a
 452++D2DC                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 452++D2DC 3A 95 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 452++D2DF 32 E7 9D    >                        ld       (varS),a
 453++D2E2                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 453++D2E2 3A 82 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 453++D2E5 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 454++D2E8 3A 84 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 455++D2EB CD A8 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 456++D2EE DA 5D D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 457++D2F1 32 8E C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 458++D2F4                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 458++D2F4 3A E7 9D    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 458++D2F7 32 8F C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 459++D2FA                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 459++D2FA 3A 90 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 459++D2FD 32 E6 9D    >                        ld       (varR),a
 460++D300                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 460++D300 3A 97 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 460++D303 32 E7 9D    >                        ld       (varS),a
 461++D306                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 461++D306 3A 85 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 461++D309 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 462++D30C 3A 87 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 463++D30F CD A8 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 464++D312 DA 5D D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 465++D315 32 90 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 466++D318                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 466++D318 3A E7 9D    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 466++D31B 32 91 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 467++D31E              ; calculate dot product LL89
 468++D31E              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 468++D31E 3A 94 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 468++D321 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 469++D324 3A 8E C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 470++D327 CD 0F B6                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 471++D32A 32 01 9E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 472++D32D 3A 95 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 473++D330 21 8F C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 474++D333 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 475++D334 32 E7 9D                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 476++D337                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 476++D337 3A 96 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 476++D33A 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 477++D33D 3A 90 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 478++D340 CD 0F B6                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 479++D343 32 E5 9D                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 480++D346                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 480++D346 3A 01 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 480++D349 32 E6 9D    >                        ld       (varR),a
 481++D34C 3A 97 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 482++D34F 21 91 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 483++D352 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 484++D353 CD A8 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 485++D356 32 01 9E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 486++D359                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 486++D359 3A 98 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 486++D35C 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 487++D35F 3A 92 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 488++D362 CD 0F B6                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 489++D365 32 E5 9D                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 490++D368                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 490++D368 3A 01 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 490++D36B 32 E6 9D    >                        ld       (varR),a
 491++D36E 3A 93 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 492++D371 21 99 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 493++D374 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 494++D375 CD A8 B6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 495++D378 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 496++D37A 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 497++D37C 3A E7 9D                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 498++D37F ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 499++D382 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 500++D384 3A 7B D1     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 501++D387 CD 63 CD                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 502++D38A C3 93 D3                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 503++D38D 3A 7B D1     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 504++D390 CD 5A CD                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 505++D393 21 7B D1     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 506++D396 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 507++D397 C1                                   pop         bc
 508++D398 E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 509++D399 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 510++D39B ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 511++D39D 22 E8 9C                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 512++D3A0 05                                   dec         b
 513++D3A1 C2 3D D2                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 514++D3A4 C9                                   ret
 515++D3A5

1122+ D3A5 ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
1123+ D3A5 ~                    xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC

1126+ D3A5 ~            NodeXPositive\1
1126+ D3A5 ~
1127+ D3A5 ~                    ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
1128+ D3A5 ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
1129+ D3A5 ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo

1131+ D3A5 ~                    add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
1132+ D3A5 ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1Point),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
1133+ D3A5 ~                    xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
1134+ D3A5 ~                    ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
1135+ D3A5 ~                    jp          FinishedThisNode\1
1136+ D3A5 ~            ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract

1142+ D3A5 ~                    sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
1143+ D3A5 ~                    jp          p,SetAndMop\1                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
1144+ D3A5 ~            NodeXNegSignChange\1
1144+ D3A5 ~
1145+ D3A5 ~            ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
1146+ D3A5 ~                    call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
1147+ D3A5 ~                    ld          a,(Ubnk\1PointSign)                 ; XX15+2
1148+ D3A5 ~                    xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
1149+ D3A5 ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1PointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
1150+ D3A5 ~            SetAndMop\1
1150+ D3A5 ~
1151+ D3A5 ~                    ld          (UBnK\0lo),hl                       ; XX15+0
1152+ D3A5 ~            FinishedThisNode\1
1153+ D3A5                                  ENDM
