1245+ D441                      ClearCarryFlag
1245+ D441 B7          >                        or a
1246+ D442 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; 6502 used carry flag compliment
1247+ D444 7D                   ld          a,l
1248+ D445 32 01 9E             ld          (varT),a                            ; t = result low
1249+ D448 7C                   ld          a,h
1250+ D449 32 E4 9D             ld          (varU),a                            ; u = result high
1251+ D44C E2 59 D4             jp          po,MakeNodeClose                    ; no overflow to parity would be clear
1252+ D44F              LL56Overflow:
1253+ D44F FE 00                cp          0                                   ; is varU 0?
1254+ D451 20 16                jr          nz,NodeAdditionsDone                ; Enter Node additions done, UT=z
1255+ D453 3A 01 9E             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ restore z lo
1256+ D456                      ReturnIfAGTENusng 4                              ; >= 4 ? zlo big enough, Enter Node additions done.
1256+ D456 FE 04       >                        cp    4
1256+ D458 D0          >                        ret	 nc
1257+ D459              MakeNodeClose:
1258+ D459              LL140:                                                  ; else make node close
1259+ D459 AF                   xor         a                                   ; hi This needs tuning to use a 16 bit variable
1260+ D45A 32 E4 9D             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1261+ D45D 3E 04                ld          a,4                                 ; lo
1262+ D45F 32 01 9E             ld          (varT),a                            ; T
1263+ D462 C9                   ret
1264+ D463              ;--LL49-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1265+ D463              ProcessVisibleNode:
1266+ D463              RotateNode:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1267+ D463 CD 66 CE             call        XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16                                                                                       ;;;           call      XX12=XX15.XX16
1268+ D466              LL52LL53LL54LL55
1269+ D466              TransposeNode:
1270+ D466 CD A5 D3             call        TransposeXX12NodeToXX15
1271+ D469
1272+ D469              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
1273+ D469              NodeAdditionsDone:
1274+ D469              Scale16BitTo8Bit:
1275+ D469              LL57:                                                   ; Enter Node additions done, z=T.U set up from LL55
1276+ D469 3A E4 9D             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1277+ D46C 21 8F C0             ld          hl,UbnkXPointHi
1278+ D46F B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+1    \ x hi
1279+ D470 21 92 C0             ld          hl,UbnkYPointHi
1280+ D473 B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+4    \ y hi
1281+ D474              AreXYZHiAllZero:
1282+ D474 28 2B                jr          z,NodeScalingDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
1283+ D476              DivideXYZBy2:
1284+ D476                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkXPoint                  ; XX15[0,1]
1284+ D476 2A 8E C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkXPoint)
1284+ D479 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1284+ D47B CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1284+ D47D 22 8E C0    >                    ld    (UbnkXPoint),hl
1285+ D480                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkYPoint                  ; XX15[3,4]
1285+ D480 2A 91 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkYPoint)
1285+ D483 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1285+ D485 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1285+ D487 22 91 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkYPoint),hl
1286+ D48A 3A E4 9D             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1287+ D48D 67                   ld          h,a
1288+ D48E 3A 01 9E             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ z lo
1289+ D491 6F                   ld          l,a
1290+ D492                      ShiftHLRight1
1290+ D492 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1290+ D494 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1291+ D496 7C                   ld          a,h
1292+ D497 32 E4 9D             ld          (varU),a
1293+ D49A 7D                   ld          a,l
1294+ D49B 32 01 9E             ld          (varT),a                            ; T \ z lo
1295+ D49E C3 69 D4             jp          Scale16BitTo8Bit                    ; loop U
1296+ D4A1              NodeScalingDone:
1297+ D4A1              LL60:                                                   ; hi U rolled to 0, exited loop above.
1298+ D4A1              ProjectNodeToScreen:
1299+ D4A1                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; T =>  Q   \ zdist lo
1299+ D4A1 3A 01 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1299+ D4A4 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1300+ D4A7 3A 8E C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointLo)                    ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1301+ D4AA 21 E5 9D             ld          hl,varQ
1302+ D4AD BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1303+ D4AE                      JumpIfALTusng DoSmallAngle                      ; LL69 if xdist < zdist hop over jmp to small x angle
1303+ D4AE DA B7 D4    >                        jp		c,DoSmallAngle
1304+ D4B1 CD AF B7             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ visit up  R = A/Q = x/z
1305+ D4B4 C3 BF D4             jp          SkipSmallAngle                      ; LL65  \ hop over small xangle
1306+ D4B7              DoSmallAngle:                                           ; small x angle
1307+ D4B7              LL69:
1308+ D4B7              ; TODO check if we need to retain BC as this trashes it
1309+ D4B7              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
1310+ D4B7              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
1311+ D4B7 47                   ld      b,a
1312+ D4B8 CD 80 B1             call    DIV16UNDOC
1313+ D4BB 79                   ld      a,c
1314+ D4BC 32 E6 9D             ld      (varR),a
1315+ D4BF               ;;;       call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1316+ D4BF              SkipSmallAngle:
1317+ D4BF              ScaleX:
1318+ D4BF              LL65:                                                   ; both continue for scaling based on z
1319+ D4BF 3A 90 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                  ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1320+ D4C2                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeXPoint                 ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1320+ D4C2 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1320+ D4C4 C2 D7 D4    >                        jp      nz,NegativeXPoint
1321+ D4C7              ; ......................................................
1322+ D4C7              PositiveXPoint:
1323+ D4C7 3A E6 9D             ld          a,(varR)
1324+ D4CA 6F                   ld          l,a
1325+ D4CB 3A E4 9D             ld          a,(varU)
1326+ D4CE 67                   ld          h,a
1327+ D4CF 3E 80                ld          a,ScreenCenterX
1328+ D4D1 ED 31                add         hl,a
1329+ D4D3 EB                   ex          de,hl
1330+ D4D4 C3 E7 D4             jp          StoreXPoint
1331+ D4D7              NegativeXPoint:
1332+ D4D7              LL62:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1333+ D4D7 3A E6 9D             ld          a,(varR)
1334+ D4DA 6F                   ld          l,a
1335+ D4DB 3A E4 9D             ld          a,(varU)
1336+ D4DE 67                   ld          h,a
1337+ D4DF 0E 80                ld          c,ScreenCenterX
1338+ D4E1 06 00                ld          b,0
1339+ D4E3                      ClearCarryFlag
1339+ D4E3 B7          >                        or a
1340+ D4E4 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1341+ D4E6 EB                   ex          de,hl
1342+ D4E7              StoreXPoint:                                            ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1343+ D4E7 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1344+ D4EA FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1345+ D4ED FD 23                inc         iy
1346+ D4EF FD 23                inc         iy
1347+ D4F1              ; ......................................................
1348+ D4F1              LL66:
1349+ D4F1              ProcessYPoint:
1350+ D4F1 AF                   xor         a                                   ; y hi = 0
1351+ D4F2 32 E4 9D             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1352+ D4F5                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; Q \ zdist lo
1352+ D4F5 3A 01 9E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1352+ D4F8 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1353+ D4FB 3A 91 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointLo)                    ; XX15+3 \ rolled y low
1354+ D4FE 21 E5 9D             ld          hl,varQ
1355+ D501 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1356+ D502                      JumpIfALTusng SmallYHop                         ; if ydist < zdist hop to small yangle
1356+ D502 DA 0B D5    >                        jp		c,SmallYHop
1357+ D505              SmallYPoint:
1358+ D505 CD AF B7             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ else visit up R = A/Q = y/z
1359+ D508 C3 0E D5             jp          SkipYScale                          ; LL68 hop over small y yangle
1360+ D50B              SmallYHop:
1361+ D50B              LL67:                                                   ; Arrive from LL66 above if XX15+3 < Q \ small yangle
1362+ D50B CD 8C B7             call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1363+ D50E              SkipYScale:
1364+ D50E              LL68:                                                   ; both carry on, also arrive from LL66, yscaled based on z
1365+ D50E 3A 93 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                  ; XX15+5 \ sign of X dist
1366+ D511 CB 7F                bit         7,a
1367+ D513 C2 26 D5             jp          nz,NegativeYPoint                   ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1368+ D516              PositiveYPoint:
1369+ D516 3A E6 9D             ld          a,(varR)
1370+ D519 6F                   ld          l,a
1371+ D51A 3A E4 9D             ld          a,(varU)
1372+ D51D 67                   ld          h,a
1373+ D51E 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
1374+ D520 ED 31                add         hl,a
1375+ D522 EB                   ex          de,hl
1376+ D523 C3 36 D5             jp          LL50
1377+ D526              NegativeYPoint:
1378+ D526              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1379+ D526 3A E6 9D             ld          a,(varR)
1380+ D529 6F                   ld          l,a
1381+ D52A 3A E4 9D             ld          a,(varU)
1382+ D52D 67                   ld          h,a
1383+ D52E 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
1384+ D530 06 00                ld          b,0
1385+ D532                      ClearCarryFlag
1385+ D532 B7          >                        or a
1386+ D533 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1387+ D535 EB                   ex          de,hl
1388+ D536              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1389+ D536 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1390+ D539 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1391+ D53C FD 23                inc         iy
1392+ D53E FD 23                inc         iy
1393+ D540 C9                   ret
1394+ D541              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1395+ D541              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1396+ D541              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1397+ D541              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1398+ D541              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1399+ D541              CopyNodeToXX15:
1400+ D541                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1400+ D541 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1400+ D542 32 8E C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1401+ D545 23                   inc         hl
1402+ D546                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1402+ D546 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1402+ D547 32 90 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1403+ D54A 23                   inc         hl
1404+ D54B                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1404+ D54B 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1404+ D54C 32 92 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1405+ D54F 23                   inc         hl
1406+ D550              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1407+ D550              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1408+ D550 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1409+ D551 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1410+ D552 47                   ld          b,a
1411+ D553 E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1412+ D555 32 8F C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1413+ D558 78                   ld          a,b
1414+ D559 E6 40                and         $40
1415+ D55B CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1416+ D55D 32 91 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1417+ D560 78                   ld          a,b
1418+ D561 E6 20                and         $20
1419+ D563 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1420+ D565 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1421+ D567 32 93 C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1422+ D56A 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1423+ D56B E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1424+ D56D 32 01 9E             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1425+ D570 C9                   ret
1426+ D571
1427+ D571              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1428+ D571              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1429+ D571              ;..............................................................................................................................
1430+ D571              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1431+ D571              LL48GetScale:
1432+ D571 3A D4 9C             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1433+ D574 5F                   ld          e,a
1434+ D575 CD 41 D5             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1435+ D578              LL48GetVertices:
1436+ D578              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1437+ D578                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1437+ D578 BB          >                        cp      e
1437+ D579 DA B6 D5    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1438+ D57C              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1439+ D57C                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1439+ D57C 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1439+ D57D 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1439+ D57E 32 E3 9C    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1440+ D581 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1441+ D582 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1442+ D584 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1443+ D585                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1443+ D585 21 BA C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1443+ D588 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1443+ D58A 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1444+ D58B E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1445+ D58C                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1445+ D58C A7          >                        and     a
1445+ D58D C2 BC D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1446+ D590              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1447+ D590 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1448+ D591 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1449+ D593 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1450+ D595                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1450+ D595 A7          >                        and     a
1450+ D596 C2 BC D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1451+ D599              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1452+ D599                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1452+ D599 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1452+ D59A 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1452+ D59B 32 E3 9C    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1453+ D59E 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1454+ D59F E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1455+ D5A1 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1456+ D5A2                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1456+ D5A2 21 BA C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1456+ D5A5 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1456+ D5A7 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1457+ D5A8 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1458+ D5A9                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1458+ D5A9 A7          >                        and     a
1458+ D5AA C2 BC D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1459+ D5AD              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1460+ D5AD 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1461+ D5AE ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1462+ D5B0 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1463+ D5B2                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1463+ D5B2 A7          >                        and     a
1463+ D5B3 C2 BC D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1464+ D5B6              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1465+ D5B6 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1466+ D5B9 FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1467+ D5BB                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1468+ D5BB C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1469+ D5BC              NodeIsVisible:
1470+ D5BC              LL49:
1471+ D5BC CD 63 D4             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1472+ D5BF C9                   ret
1473+ D5C0
1474+ D5C0
1475+ D5C0              ProjectNodeToEye:
1476+ D5C0 ED 4B 92 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1477+ D5C4 79           	ld			a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1478+ D5C5 32 E5 9D     	ld			(varQ),a		                    ; VarQ = z
1479+ D5C8 3A 8E C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo which is signed
1480+ D5CB CD 69 B1     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC					; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1481+ D5CE 3A 8F C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1482+ D5D1                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1482+ D5D1 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1482+ D5D3 C2 DE D5    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1483+ D5D6              EyePositiveXPoint:									; x was positive result
1484+ D5D6 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
1485+ D5D8 26 00            ld          h,0
1486+ D5DA 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
1487+ D5DB C3 E5 D5         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1488+ D5DE              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1489+ D5DE 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1490+ D5E0 26 00            ld          h,0
1491+ D5E2                  ClearCarryFlag
1491+ D5E2 B7          >                        or a
1492+ D5E3 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1493+ D5E5              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1494+ D5E5 EB               ex          de,hl
1495+ D5E6 FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1496+ D5E9 FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1497+ D5EC              EyeProcessYPoint:
1498+ D5EC ED 4B 92 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; Now process Y co-ordinate
1499+ D5F0 79           	ld			a,c
1500+ D5F1 32 E5 9D     	ld			(varQ),a
1501+ D5F4 3A 90 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo
1502+ D5F7 CD 69 B1     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	                ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1503+ D5FA 3A 91 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1504+ D5FD                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1504+ D5FD CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1504+ D5FF C2 0A D6    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1505+ D602              EyePositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
1506+ D602 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1507+ D604                  ClearCarryFlag
1507+ D604 B7          >                        or a
1508+ D605 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1509+ D607 C3 0F D6         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1510+ D60A              EyeNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1511+ D60A 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1512+ D60C 26 00            ld          h,0
1513+ D60E 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1514+ D60F              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1515+ D60F EB               ex          de,hl
1516+ D610 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1517+ D613 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1518+ D616 C9               ret
1519+ D617
1520+ D617
1521+ D617
1522+ D617              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1523+ D617              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1524+ D617              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1525+ D617              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1526+ D617              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1527+ D617              ; which can be simplified as:
1528+ D617              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1529+ D617              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1530+ D617              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1531+ D617              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1532+ D617              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1533+ D617              ;      Roll calculations:
1534+ D617              ;
1535+ D617              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1536+ D617              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1537+ D617              ;      Pitch calculations:
1538+ D617              ;
1539+ D617              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1540+ D617              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1541+ D617
1542+ D617
1543+ D617              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1544+ D617                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D617
   2++D617              ; Full version
   3++D617              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D617              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D617              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D617              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D617
   8++D617
   9++D617              ApplyMyRollToNosev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY
   9++D617             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
   9++D617 3A FB 9C    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
   9++D61A 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
   9++D61D             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
   9++D61D 2A 23 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
   9++D620 22 E6 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++D623             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
   9++D623 3A 21 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++D626 32 E3 9C    >                        ld       (varP),a
   9++D629 3A 22 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
   9++D62C EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
   9++D62E CD BF AE    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
   9++D631 ED 53 23 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
   9++D635             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
   9++D635 2A 21 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++D638 22 E6 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++D63B 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
   9++D63E CD BF AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
   9++D641 ED 53 21 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  10++D645 C9                                   ret
  11++D646              ApplyMyRollToSidev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY
  11++D646             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  11++D646 3A FB 9C    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
  11++D649 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  11++D64C             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  11++D64C 2A 17 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
  11++D64F 22 E6 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  11++D652             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  11++D652 3A 15 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
  11++D655 32 E3 9C    >                        ld       (varP),a
  11++D658 3A 16 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  11++D65B EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  11++D65D CD BF AE    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  11++D660 ED 53 17 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  11++D664             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  11++D664 2A 15 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
  11++D667 22 E6 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  11++D66A 3A 18 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  11++D66D CD BF AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  11++D670 ED 53 15 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  12++D674 C9                                   ret
  13++D675              ApplyMyRollToRoofv:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  13++D675             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  13++D675 3A FB 9C    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
  13++D678 32 E5 9D    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  13++D67B             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  13++D67B 2A 1D C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)

  13++D681             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)

  13++D687 3A 1C C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  13++D68A EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  13++D68C CD BF AE    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  13++D68F ED 53 1D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  13++D693             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  13++D693 2A 1B C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
  13++D696 22 E6 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  13++D699 3A 1E C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  13++D69C CD BF AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  13++D69F ED 53 1B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  14++D6A3 C9                                   ret
  15++D6A4
  16++D6A4              ApplyMyPitchToNosev:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatNosevZ, UBnkrotmatNosevY

  18++D6F1             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  18++D6F1 2A 19 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)

  18++D6F7 3A 18 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  18++D6FA CD BF AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  18++D6FD ED 53 19 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  19++D701 C9                                   ret
  20++D702              ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  20++D702             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)

  20++D70B 22 E6 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  20++D70E             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  20++D70E 3A 1F C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
  20++D711 32 E3 9C    >                        ld       (varP),a
  20++D714 3A 20 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  20++D717 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  20++D719 CD BF AE    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  20++D71C ED 53 1D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  20++D720             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  20++D720 2A 1F C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
  20++D723 22 E6 9D    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  20++D726 3A 1E C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  20++D729 CD BF AE    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  20++D72C ED 53 1F C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  21++D730 C9                                   ret
  22++D731
  23++D731
  24++D731              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  25++D731 ~                                    push    bc
  26++D731 ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  27++D731 ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  28++D731 ~                                    ld      b,a
  29++D731 ~                                    ld      a,c
  30++D731 ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  31++D731 ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  32++D731 ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  33++D731 ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  34++D731 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  35++D731 ~                                    add     hl,de
  36++D731 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  37++D731 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  38++D731 ~                                    pop     bc
  39++D731 ~                                    ret
  40++D731 ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  41++D731 ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  42++D731 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  43++D731 ~                                    or      a
  44++D731 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  45++D731 ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++D731 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  47++D731 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++D731 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  49++D731 ~                                    pop     bc
  50++D731 ~                                    ret
  51++D731 ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  52++D731 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  53++D731 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  54++D731 ~                                    pop     bc
  55++D731 ~                                    ret
  56++D731                                      ENDM
  57++D731
  58++D731
  59++D731              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  59++D731 C5          >                        push    bc
  59++D732 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  59++D733 3A 0E C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  59++D736 47          >                        ld      b,a
  59++D737 79          >                        ld      a,c
  59++D738 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  59++D739 FA 4A D7    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  59++D73C             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  59++D73C ED 5B E4 9C >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  59++D740 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++D743 19          >                        add     hl,de
  59++D744 22 E4 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  59++D747 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  59++D748 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++D749 C9          >                        ret
  59++D74A             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  59++D74A ED 5B E4 9C >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  59++D74E 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++D751 B7          >                        or      a
  59++D752 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  59++D754 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  59++D756 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  59++D757 22 E4 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  59++D75A EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  59++D75C C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++D75D C9          >                        ret
  59++D75E             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  59++D75E AF          >                    xor a
  59++D75F 95          >                    sub l
  59++D760 6F          >                    ld l,a
  59++D761 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  59++D762 94          >                    sub h
  59++D763 67          >                    ld h,a
  59++D764 22 E4 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  59++D767 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  59++D768 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++D769 C9          >                        ret
  60++D76A
  61++D76A              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  61++D76A C5          >                        push    bc
  61++D76B 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  61++D76C 3A 11 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  61++D76F 47          >                        ld      b,a
  61++D770 79          >                        ld      a,c
  61++D771 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  61++D772 FA 83 D7    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  61++D775             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  61++D775 ED 5B E4 9C >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  61++D779 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++D77C 19          >                        add     hl,de
  61++D77D 22 E4 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  61++D780 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  61++D781 C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++D782 C9          >                        ret
  61++D783             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  61++D783 ED 5B E4 9C >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  61++D787 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++D78A B7          >                        or      a
  61++D78B ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  61++D78D 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  61++D78F 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  61++D790 22 E4 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  61++D793 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  61++D795 C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++D796 C9          >                        ret
  61++D797             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  61++D797 AF          >                    xor a
  61++D798 95          >                    sub l
  61++D799 6F          >                    ld l,a
  61++D79A 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  61++D79B 94          >                    sub h
  61++D79C 67          >                    ld h,a
  61++D79D 22 E4 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  61++D7A0 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  61++D7A1 C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++D7A2 C9          >                        ret
  62++D7A3
  63++D7A3              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  63++D7A3 C5          >                        push    bc
  63++D7A4 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  63++D7A5 3A 14 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  63++D7A8 47          >                        ld      b,a
  63++D7A9 79          >                        ld      a,c
  63++D7AA A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  63++D7AB FA BC D7    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  63++D7AE             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  63++D7AE ED 5B E4 9C >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  63++D7B2 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++D7B5 19          >                        add     hl,de
  63++D7B6 22 E4 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  63++D7B9 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  63++D7BA C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++D7BB C9          >                        ret
  63++D7BC             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  63++D7BC ED 5B E4 9C >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  63++D7C0 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++D7C3 B7          >                        or      a
  63++D7C4 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  63++D7C6 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  63++D7C8 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  63++D7C9 22 E4 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  63++D7CC EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  63++D7CE C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++D7CF C9          >                        ret
  63++D7D0             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  63++D7D0 AF          >                    xor a
  63++D7D1 95          >                    sub l
  63++D7D2 6F          >                    ld l,a
  63++D7D3 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  63++D7D4 94          >                    sub h
  63++D7D5 67          >                    ld h,a
  63++D7D6 22 E4 9C    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  63++D7D9 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  63++D7DA C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++D7DB C9          >                        ret
  64++D7DC
  65++D7DC              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  66++D7DC 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  67++D7DF              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  68++D7DF              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  69++D7DF              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  70++D7DF
  71++D7DF              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72++D7DF              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  73++D7DF 3A FC 9C     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  74++D7E2 21 F0 9C                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  75++D7E5 B6                                   or      (hl)
  76++D7E6 CA A0 D8                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  77++D7E9                                      ;break
  78++D7E9              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  79++D7E9 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  80++D7EA 2A 0C C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  81++D7ED CD 1B AF                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  82++D7F0 32 E5 9C                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  83++D7F3 22 E3 9C                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  84++D7F6              ; A = Flip sign
  85++D7F6 3A FE 9C                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  86++D7F9 21 0E C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  87++D7FC AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  88++D7FD              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  89++D7FD CD 6A D7                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  90++D800              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  91++D800 32 DE D7                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  92++D803 22 DC D7                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  93++D806              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  94++D806 3A F0 9C                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  95++D809 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++D80A CD 1B AF                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  97++D80D 32 E5 9C                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  98++D810 22 E3 9C                             ld      (varP),hl
  99++D813              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
 100++D813 3A DE D7                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
 101++D816 5F                                   ld      e,a
 102++D817 3A F1 9C                             ld      a,(BET2)
 103++D81A AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
 104++D81B              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
 105++D81B CD A3 D7                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 106++D81E 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 107++D821 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 108++D824              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 109++D824 3A F0 9C                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 110++D827 5F                                   ld      e,a
 111++D828 CD 1B AF                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 112++D82B 32 E5 9C                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 113++D82E 22 E3 9C                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 114++D831              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 115++D831 3A DE D7                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 116++D834 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 117++D837 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 118++D838 3A F1 9C                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 119++D83B AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 120++D83C 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 121++D83D 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 122++D840 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 123++D841 F2 50 D8                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 124++D844 2A E4 9C                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 125++D847 ED 5B DC D7                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 126++D84B B7                                   or      a
 127++D84C 19                                   add     hl,de
 128++D84D C3 6A D8                             jp      .MV44
 129++D850 2A DC D7     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 130++D853 ED 5B E4 9C                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 131++D857 B7                                   or      a
 132++D858 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 133++D85A 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 134++D85C                                      NegHL
 134++D85C AF          >                    xor a
 134++D85D 95          >                    sub l
 134++D85E 6F          >                    ld l,a
 134++D85F 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 134++D860 94          >                    sub h
 134++D861 67          >                    ld h,a
 135++D862 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and suns are sign + 23 bit xpos
 136++D865 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 137++D867 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 138++D86A              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 139++D86A 22 0F C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 140++D86D 3A FC 9C                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 141++D870 5F                                   ld      e,a
 142++D871 2A 0F C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 143++D874 CD 1B AF                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 144++D877 32 E5 9C                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 145++D87A 22 E3 9C                             ld      (varP),hl
 146++D87D 3A FD 9C                             ld      a,(ALP2)
 147++D880 5F                                   ld      e,a
 148++D881 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 149++D884 AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 150++D885 CD 31 D7                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 151++D888 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 152++D88B 22 0C C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 153++D88E                                      ;break
 154++D88E                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
 155++D88E
 156++D88E CD 17 D6                             call    ApplyMyRollToNosev
 157++D891 CD 46 D6                             call    ApplyMyRollToSidev
 158++D894 CD 75 D6                             call    ApplyMyRollToRoofv
 159++D897 CD A4 D6                             call    ApplyMyPitchToNosev
 160++D89A CD D3 D6                             call    ApplyMyPitchToSidev
 161++D89D CD 02 D7                             call    ApplyMyPitchToRoofv
 162++D8A0 3A E1 9D     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 163++D8A3 16 00                                ld      d,0
 164++D8A5 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 165++D8A6 2A 12 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 166++D8A9 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 167++D8AC 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 168++D8AD 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 169++D8AF CD 81 AC                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 170++D8B2 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 171++D8B5 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 172++D8B8 C9                                   ret
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
1545+ D8B9                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D8B9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++D8B9              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
   3++D8B9 3A 35 C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; get roll magnitudeShip Pitch counter
   4++D8BC 47                                   ld      b,a
   5++D8BD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6++D8BF 4F                                   ld      c,a
   7++D8C0 32 3B C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
   8++D8C3 78                                   ld      a,b
   9++D8C4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  10++D8C6 28 3A                                jr      z,.ProcessRoll
  11++D8C8 FE 7F        .CheckPitchDamping:     cp      SignMask8Bit
  12++D8CA 28 01                                jr      z,.NoPitchDamping
  13++D8CC 3D           .ApplyPitchDamping:     dec     a                           ; pitch = pitch-1
  14++D8CD 32 3C C0     .NoPitchDamping         ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  15++D8D0 47                                   ld      b,a
  16++D8D1 B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  17++D8D2 32 35 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  18++D8D5 21 1B C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  19++D8D8 22 C8 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  20++D8DB 21 21 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  21++D8DE 22 CA 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  22++D8E1 CD D5 C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  23++D8E4 21 1D C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  24++D8E7 22 C8 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  25++D8EA 21 23 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  26++D8ED 22 CA 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  27++D8F0 CD D5 C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  28++D8F3 21 1F C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  29++D8F6 22 C8 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  30++D8F9 21 25 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  31++D8FC 22 CA 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  32++D8FF CD D5 C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  33++D902 3A 34 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  34++D905 47                                   ld      b,a
  35++D906 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  36++D908 4F                                   ld      c,a
  37++D909 32 3B C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
  38++D90C 78                                   ld      a,b
  39++D90D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  40++D90F C8                                   ret     z                           ; if no work to do then exit
  41++D910 FE 7F        .CheckRollDamping:      cp      SignMask8Bit
  42++D912 28 01                                jr      z,.NoRollDamping
  43++D914 3D           .ApplyRollDamping:      dec      a                     ; pitch = pitch-1
  44++D915 32 3C C0     .NoRollDamping          ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++D918 47                                   ld      b,a
  46++D919 B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  47++D91A 32 34 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  48++D91D 21 1B C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  49++D920 22 C8 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  50++D923 21 15 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  51++D926 22 CA 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  52++D929 CD D5 C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  53++D92C 21 1D C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  54++D92F 22 C8 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  55++D932 21 17 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  56++D935 22 CA 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  57++D938 CD D5 C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  58++D93B 21 1F C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  59++D93E 22 C8 9C                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  60++D941 21 19 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  61++D944 22 CA 9C                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  62++D947 CD D5 C7                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  63++D94A C9                                   ret
  64++D94B
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
1546+ D94B                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipSpeed.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipSpeed.asm
   1++D94B              SpeedMulAxis:           MACRO   speedreg, axis
   2++D94B ~                                    ld      e,speedreg
   3++D94B ~                                    ld      hl,(axis)
   4++D94B ~                                    ld      a,h
   5++D94B ~                                    ClearSignBitA
   6++D94B ~                                    ld      d,a
   7++D94B ~                                    mul     de
   8++D94B ~                                    ld      a,h
   9++D94B ~                                    SignBitOnlyA
  10++D94B ~                                    ld      c,a
  11++D94B ~                                    ld      e,d
  12++D94B ~                                    ld      d,0
  13++D94B                                      ENDM
  14++D94B
  15++D94B              AddSpeedToVert:         MACRO   vertex
  16++D94B ~                                    ld      hl,(vertex)
  17++D94B ~                                    ld      a,(vertex+2)
  18++D94B ~                                    ld      b,a
  19++D94B ~                                    call    AHLEquBHLaddCDE
  20++D94B ~                                    ld      (vertex),hl
  21++D94B ~                                    ld      (vertex+2),a
  22++D94B                                      ENDM
  23++D94B
  24++D94B
  25++D94B              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  26++D94B 3A 32 C0     ApplyShipSpeed:         ld      a,(UBnKSpeed)                   ; get speed * 4
  27++D94E CB 27                                sla     a
  28++D950 CB 27                                sla     a
  29++D952 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                           ; save pre calculated speed
  30++D954              .ApplyToX:              SpeedMulAxis    a, UBnkrotmatNosevX     ; e =  ABS (nosev x hi) c = sign
  30++D954 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  30++D955 2A 21 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
  30++D958 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  30++D959             >                        ClearSignBitA
  30++D959 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  30++D95B 57          >                        ld      d,a
  30++D95C ED 30       >                        mul     de
  30++D95E 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  30++D95F             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  30++D95F E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  30++D961 4F          >                        ld      c,a
  30++D962 5A          >                        ld      e,d
  30++D963 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
  31++D965              .AddSpeedToX:           AddSpeedToVert UBnKxlo
  31++D965 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  31++D968 3A 0E C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxlo+2)
  31++D96B 47          >                        ld      b,a
  31++D96C CD 48 AC    >                        call    AHLEquBHLaddCDE
  31++D96F 22 0C C0    >                        ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
  31++D972 32 0E C0    >                        ld      (UBnKxlo+2),a
  32++D975              .ApplyToY:              SpeedMulAxis    a, UBnkrotmatNosevY
  32++D975 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  32++D976 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
  32++D979 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  32++D97A             >                        ClearSignBitA
  32++D97A E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  32++D97C 57          >                        ld      d,a
  32++D97D ED 30       >                        mul     de
  32++D97F 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  32++D980             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  32++D980 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  32++D982 4F          >                        ld      c,a
  32++D983 5A          >                        ld      e,d
  32++D984 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
  33++D986              .AddSpeedToY:           AddSpeedToVert UBnKylo
  33++D986 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  33++D989 3A 11 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKylo+2)
  33++D98C 47          >                        ld      b,a
  33++D98D CD 48 AC    >                        call    AHLEquBHLaddCDE
  33++D990 22 0F C0    >                        ld      (UBnKylo),hl
  33++D993 32 11 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKylo+2),a
  34++D996              .ApplyToZ:              SpeedMulAxis    a, UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  34++D996 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  34++D997 2A 25 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
  34++D99A 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  34++D99B             >                        ClearSignBitA
  34++D99B E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  34++D99D 57          >                        ld      d,a
  34++D99E ED 30       >                        mul     de
  34++D9A0 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  34++D9A1             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  34++D9A1 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  34++D9A3 4F          >                        ld      c,a
  34++D9A4 5A          >                        ld      e,d
  34++D9A5 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
  35++D9A7              .AddSpeedToZ:           AddSpeedToVert UBnKzlo
  35++D9A7 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  35++D9AA 3A 14 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzlo+2)
  35++D9AD 47          >                        ld      b,a
  35++D9AE CD 48 AC    >                        call    AHLEquBHLaddCDE
  35++D9B1 22 12 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
  35++D9B4 32 14 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKzlo+2),a
  36++D9B7 C9                                   ret

1547+ D9B8                          INCLUDE "./ModelRender/DrawLines.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/DrawLines.asm
   1++D9B8
   2++D9B8              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   3++D9B8 00           DrawLinesCounter		db	0
   4++D9B9              ; Initial tests look OK
   5++D9B9              LL155:;
   6++D9B9              ClearLine:                                  ; CLEAR LINEstr visited by EE31 when XX3 heap ready to draw/erase lines in XX19 heap.
   7++D9B9                    ;break                                                                             ; ObjectInFront:
   8++D9B9 3E 65        DrawLines:              ld	a,$65 ; DEBUG
   9++D9BB FD 6F                                ld		iyl,a							; set ixl to colour (assuming we come in here with a = colour to draw)
  10++D9BD 3A 0A C3                             ld		a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)			; get number of lines
  11++D9C0                                      ReturnIfAIsZero   						; No lines then bail out.

  11++D9C1 C8          >                        ret     z
  12++D9C2 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a			                ; number of lines still to draw

  14++D9C7              ;LL27:                                       ; counter Y, Draw clipped lines in XX19 ship lines heap
  15++D9C7 4E           DrawXX19ClippedLines:   ld      c,(hl)                          ; (XX19),Y c = varX1

  17++D9C9 46                                   ld      b,(hl)                          ; bc = point1 Y,X

  19++D9CB 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)                          ; c = varX1

1551+ D9E5              ProcessDot:            ; break

1570+ DA0F              ; for each node:
1571+ DA0F              ;     see if node >
1572+ DA0F 00           PNXX20DIV6          DB      0
