1579+ DA1C CD 75 96                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1580+ DA1F CD 06 CF                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1581+ DA22 CD D3 CD                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1582+ DA25 21 31 C3                             ld      hl,UBnkHullVerticies
1583+ DA28 3A 1F C3                             ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#9 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
1584+ DA2B 4F           GetActualVertexCount:   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1585+ DA2C 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1586+ DA2D 16 06                                ld      d,6
1587+ DA2F CD 99 B1                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1588+ DA32 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1589+ DA33 FD 21 D8 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1590+ DA37              LL48:
1591+ DA37 C5           PointLoop:	            push	bc                                  ; save counters
1592+ DA38 E5                                   push	hl                                  ; save verticies list pointer
1593+ DA39 FD E5                                push	iy                                  ; save Screen plot array pointer
1594+ DA3B 78                                   ld      a,b
1595+ DA3C                                      ;break
1596+ DA3C CD 41 D5                             call    CopyNodeToXX15                      ; copy verices at hl to xx15
1597+ DA3F 3A 8F C0                             ld		a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
1598+ DA42 CD 9B 95                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1599+ DA45 CD 86 CC                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1600+ DA48 CD 03 CD                             call	ScaleNodeTo8Bit					    ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1601+ DA4B FD E1                                pop		iy                                  ; get back screen plot array pointer
1602+ DA4D CD C0 D5                             call    ProjectNodeToEye                     ; set up screen plot list entry
1603+ DA50                 ; ld      hl,UbnkLineArrayLen
1604+ DA50                ;  inc     (hl)                                ; another node done
1605+ DA50 FD E5        ReadyForNextPoint:      push	iy                                  ; copy screen plot pointer to hl
1606+ DA52 E1                                   pop		hl
1607+ DA53 3E 04                                ld		a,4
1608+ DA55 ED 31                                add		hl,a
1609+ DA57 E5                                   push	hl                                  ; write it back at iy + 4
1610+ DA58 FD E1                                pop		iy								    ; and put it in iy again
1611+ DA5A E1                                   pop		hl                                  ; get hl back as vertex list
1612+ DA5B 3E 06                                ld		a,6
1613+ DA5D ED 31                                add 	hl,a                                ; and move to next vertex
1614+ DA5F C1                                   pop		bc                                  ; get counter back
1615+ DA60 10 D5                                djnz	PointLoop
1616+ DA62              ; ......................................................
1617+ DA62                                      ClearCarryFlag
1617+ DA62 B7          >                        or a
1618+ DA63 C9                                   ret
1619+ DA64
1620+ DA64              ; ...........................................................
1621+ DA64 CD B2 D1     ProcessShip:            call    CheckVisible                ; checks for z -ve and outside view frustrum, sets up flags for next bit
1622+ DA67 3A 3F C0     .IsItADot:              ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1623+ DA6A E6 68                                and     ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot | ShipExploding  ; first off set if we can draw or need to update explosion
1624+ DA6C C8                                   ret     z                           ; if none of these flags are set we can fast exit
1625+ DA6D                                      JumpOnABitSet ShipExplodingBitNbr, .ExplodingCloud; we always do the cloud processing even if invisible
1625+ DA6D CB 6F       >                        bit 	ShipExplodingBitNbr, a
1625+ DA6F C2 AB DA    >                        jp      nz,.ExplodingCloud
1626+ DA72              ;............................................................
1627+ DA72              .DetermineDrawType:     ReturnOnBitClear    a, ShipIsVisibleBitNbr          ; if its not visible exit early
1627+ DA72 CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1627+ DA74 C8          >                        ret		z
1628+ DA75                                      JumpOnABitClear ShipIsDotBitNbr, .CarryOnWithDraw   ; if not dot do normal draw
1628+ DA75 CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1628+ DA77 CA 9E DA    >                        jp      z,.CarryOnWithDraw
1629+ DA7A              ;............................................................
1630+ DA7A CD E5 D9     .itsJustADot:           call    ProcessDot
1631+ DA7D                                      SetMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsDotBitNbr ; set is a dot flag
1631+ DA7D 21 3F C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1631+ DA80 CB DE       >                        set     ShipIsDotBitNbr,(hl)
1632+ DA82 ED 4B D8 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkNodeArray)          ; if its at dot range get X
1633+ DA86 ED 5B DA C0                          ld      de,(UBnkNodeArray+2)        ; and Y
1634+ DA8A 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; if high byte components are not 0 then off screen
1635+ DA8B B2                                   or      d                           ;
1636+ DA8C C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
1637+ DA8D 7B                                   ld      a,e
1638+ DA8E E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; check to see if Y > 128
1639+ DA90 C0                                   ret     nz
1640+ DA91 43                                   ld      b,e                         ; now b = y and c = x
1641+ DA92 3E FF                                ld      a,L2ColourWHITE_1           ; just draw a pixel
1642+ DA94 3E E0                                ld      a,224
1643+ DA96                                      MMUSelectLayer2                     ; then go to update radar
1643+ DA96 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1644+ DA9A CD 5E E1                             call    ShipPixel                   ;
1645+ DA9D C9                                   ret
1646+ DA9E              ;............................................................
1647+ DA9E CD 15 DA     .CarryOnWithDraw:       call    ProcessNodes                ; process notes is the poor performer or check distnace is not culling
1648+ DAA1 CD 0C D2                             call    CullV2
1649+ DAA4 CD 6E DC                             call    PrepLines
1650+ DAA7 CD B9 D9                             call    DrawLines
1651+ DAAA C9                                   ret
1652+ DAAB              ;............................................................
1653+ DAAB CD 15 DA     .ExplodingCloud:        call    ProcessNodes
1654+ DAAE                                      ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm, ShipKilledBitNbr ; acknowledge ship exploding
1654+ DAAE 21 3F C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1654+ DAB1 CB A6       >                        res     ShipKilledBitNbr,(hl)
1655+ DAB3 3A 47 C0     .UpdateCloudCounter:    ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; counter += 4 until > 255
1656+ DAB6 C6 04                                add     4                           ; we do this early as we now have logic for
1657+ DAB8 DA 80 DB                             jp      c,.FinishedExplosion        ; display or not later
1658+ DABB 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; .
1659+ DABE              .SkipHiddenShip:        ReturnOnMemBitClear  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr
1659+ DABE 3A 3F C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1659+ DAC1 CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1659+ DAC3 C8          >                        ret		z
1660+ DAC4              .IsShipADot:            JumpOnABitSet ShipIsDotBitNbr, .itsJustADot ; if its dot distance then explosion is a dot, TODO later we will do as a coloured dot
1660+ DAC4 CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1660+ DAC6 C2 7A DA    >                        jp      nz,.itsJustADot
1661+ DAC9 2A 12 C0     .CalculateZ:            ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; al = hl = z
1662+ DACC 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
1663+ DACD                                      JumpIfALTNusng 32,.CalcFromZ        ; if its >= 32 then set a to FE and we are done
1663+ DACD FE 20       >                        cp      32
1663+ DACF DA D7 DA    >                        jp		c, .CalcFromZ
1664+ DAD2 26 FE                                ld      h,$FE                       ; .
1665+ DAD4 C3 E2 DA                             jp      .DoneZDist                  ; .
1666+ DAD7              .CalcFromZ:             ShiftHLLeft1                        ; else
1666+ DAD7 CB 25       >			   sla l
1666+ DAD9 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1667+ DADB                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; hl = hl * 2
1667+ DADB CB 25       >			   sla l
1667+ DADD CB 14       >			   rl  h
1668+ DADF                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; h = h * 3 rolling in lower bit
1668+ DADF 37          >                        scf
1669+ DAE0 CB 14                                rl  h                               ;
1670+ DAE2 06 00        .DoneZDist:             ld      b,0                         ; bc = cloud z distance calculateed
1671+ DAE4 4C                                   ld      c,h                         ; .
1672+ DAE5 3A 47 C0     .CalcCloudRadius:       ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; de = cloud counter * 256
1673+ DAE8                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
1674+ DAE8                                      MMUSelectMathsTables
1674+ DAE8 ED 91 50 63 >                     nextreg MathsTablesMMU,    BankMathsTables
1675+ DAEC 44                                   ld      b,h
1676+ DAED CD 6F 00                             call    AEquAmul256DivBLog
1677+ DAF0 57                                   ld      d,a
1678+ DAF1                                      MMUSelectROM0
1678+ DAF1 ED 91 50 FF >                     nextreg EXSDOSMMU0,        BankROM
1679+ DAF5                      ELSE
1680+ DAF5 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ;
1681+ DAF5 ~                                    ld      e,0                         ;
1682+ DAF5 ~                                    call    DEequDEDivBC                ; de = cloud counter * 256 / z distance
1683+ DAF5 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; if radius >= 28
1684+ DAF5                      ENDIF
1685+ DAF5                                      JumpIfALTNusng  28,.SetCloudRadius  ; then set raidus in d to $FE
1685+ DAF5 FE 1C       >                        cp      28
1685+ DAF7 DA FF DA    >                        jp		c, .SetCloudRadius
1686+ DAFA 16 FE        .MaxCloudRadius:        ld      d,$FE                       ;
1687+ DAFC C3 0B DB                             jp      .SizedUpCloud               ;
1688+ DAFF              .SetCloudRadius:        ShiftDELeft1                        ; de = 8 * de
1688+ DAFF CB 23       >			   sla e
1688+ DB01 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1689+ DB03                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1689+ DB03 CB 23       >			   sla e
1689+ DB05 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1690+ DB07                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1690+ DB07 CB 23       >			   sla e
1690+ DB09 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1691+ DB0B 7A           .SizedUpCloud:          ld      a,d                         ; cloudradius = a = d or (cloudcounter * 8 / 256)
1692+ DB0C 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a         ; .
1693+ DB0F DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = a = calculated cloud radius
1694+ DB11 3A 47 C0     .CalcSubParticleColour: ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; colur fades away
1695+ DB14 ED 23                                swapnib                             ; divive by 16
1696+ DB16 E6 0F                                and     $0F                         ; mask off upper bytes
1697+ DB18 CB 2F                                sra     a                           ; divide by 32
1698+ DB1A 21 8C DB                             ld      hl,DebrisColourTable
1699+ DB1D ED 31                                add     hl,a
1700+ DB1F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1701+ DB20 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = pixel colours
1702+ DB22 3A 47 C0     .CalcSubParticleCount:  ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; cloud counter = abs (cloud counter) in effect if > 127 then shrinks it
1703+ DB25                                      ABSa2c                              ; a = abs a
1703+ DB25 CB 7F       >                        bit     7,a
1703+ DB27 CA 2C DB    >                        jp      z,.DoneABSa
1703+ DB2A ED 44       >                        neg
1703+ DB2C             >.DoneABSa:
1704+ DB2C CB 2F        .ParticlePositive:      sra a                               ; iyh = (a /8)
1705+ DB2E CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1706+ DB30 CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1707+ DB32 F6 01                                or  1                               ; bit 0 set so minimum 1
1708+ DB34 DD 6F        .DoneSubParticleCount:  ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = nbr particles per vertex
1709+ DB36 3A 1E C3     .ForEachVertex:         ld      a,(VertexCountAddr)         ; load vertex count into b
1710+ DB39 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
1711+ DB3A 21 D8 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray            ; hl = list of vertices
1712+ DB3D C5 E5        .ExplosionVertLoop:     push    bc,,hl                      ; save vertex counter in b and pointer to verticles in hl
1713+ DB3F DD 68                                    ld      ixl,b                   ; save counter
1714+ DB41 4E                                       ld      c,(hl)                  ; get vertex into bc and de
1715+ DB42 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1716+ DB43 46                                       ld      b,(hl)                  ; .
1717+ DB44 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1718+ DB45 5E                                       ld      e,(hl)                  ; .
1719+ DB46 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1720+ DB47 56                                       ld      d,(hl)                  ; now hl is done with and we can use it
1721+ DB48 DD 7D        .LoopSubParticles:          ld      a,ixl                   ; iyh = loop iterator for nbr of particles per vertex
1722+ DB4A FD 67                                    ld      iyh,a                   ;
1723+ DB4C                                          ;break
1724+ DB4C D5 C5        .ProcessAParticle:          push    de,,bc                  ; save y then x coordinates
1725+ DB4E EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; hl = de (Y)
1726+ DB4F DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1727+ DB51 CD 94 DB                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1728+ DB54 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if off screen skip
1729+ DB55                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NextIteration
1729+ DB55 A7          >                        and     a
1729+ DB56 C2 71 DB    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1730+ DB59 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; de = result for y which was put into hl
1731+ DB5A E1                                           pop     hl                  ; get x back from bc on stack
1732+ DB5B E5                                           push    hl                  ; put bc (which is now in hl) back on the stack
1733+ DB5C D5                                           push    de                  ; save de
1734+ DB5D DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1735+ DB5F CD 94 DB                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1736+ DB62 D1                                           pop     de                  ; get de back doing pop here clears stack up
1737+ DB63 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if high byte has a value then off screen
1738+ DB64                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero .NextIteration ;
1738+ DB64 A7          >                        and     a
1738+ DB65 C2 71 DB    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1739+ DB68 43                                           ld      b,e                 ; bc = y x of pixel from e and c regs
1740+ DB69 4D                                           ld      c,l                 ; iyl already has colour
1741+ DB6A                                              MMUSelectLayer2             ; plot it with debris code as this can chop y > 128
1741+ DB6A ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1742+ DB6E CD 66 E1                                     call    DebrisPixel         ; .
1743+ DB71 C1 D1        .NextIteration:             pop    de,,bc                   ; ready for next iteration, get back y and x coordinates
1744+ DB73 FD 25                                    dec    iyh                      ; one partcile done
1745+ DB75 20 D5                                    jr      nz,.ProcessAParticle    ; until all done
1746+ DB77 E1 C1        .NextVert:              pop     bc,,hl                      ; recover loop counter and source pointer
1747+ DB79 3E 04                                ld      a,4                         ; move to next vertex group
1748+ DB7B ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ;
1749+ DB7D 10 BE                                djnz    .ExplosionVertLoop          ;
1750+ DB7F C9                                   ret
1751+ DB80              .FinishedExplosion:     ;break
1752+ DB80 3A 2B C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSlotNumber)          ; get slot number
1753+ DB83 CD F6 A2                             call    ClearSlotA                  ; gauranted to be in main memory as non bankables
1754+ DB86                                      ClearMemBitN UBnkaiatkecm, ShipExplodingBitNbr
1754+ DB86 21 3F C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1754+ DB89 CB AE       >                        res     ShipExplodingBitNbr,(hl)
1755+ DB8B C9                                   ret
1756+ DB8C
1757+ DB8C
1758+ DB8C FC D8 B4 90  DebrisColourTable:      DB L2ColourYELLOW_1, L2ColourYELLOW_2, L2ColourYELLOW_3, L2ColourYELLOW_4, L2ColourYELLOW_5, L2ColourYELLOW_6, L2ColourYELLOW_7,L2ColourGREY_4
1758+ DB90 6C 48 24 25
1759+ DB94                                      ; set flags and signal to remove from slot list
1760+ DB94
1761+ DB94              ; Hl = HlL +/- (Random * projected cloud size)
1762+ DB94              ; In - d = z distance, hl = vert hi lo
1763+ DB94              ; Out hl = adjusted distance
1764+ DB94              ; uses registers hl, de
1765+ DB94 E5           HLEquARandCloud:        push    hl                          ; random number geneator upsets hl register
1766+ DB95 CD 82 A3                             call    doRandom                    ; a= random * 2
1767+ DB98 E1                                   pop     hl
1768+ DB99 17                                   rla                                 ;
1769+ DB9A 38 0A                                jr      c,.Negative                 ; if buit 7 went into carry
1770+ DB9C 5F           .Positive:              ld  e,a
1771+ DB9D ED 30                                mul
1772+ DB9F 5A                                   ld  e,d
1773+ DBA0 16 00                                ld  d,0
1774+ DBA2                                      ClearCarryFlag
1774+ DBA2 B7          >                        or a
1775+ DBA3 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1776+ DBA5 C9                                   ret
1777+ DBA6 5F           .Negative:              ld  e,a
1778+ DBA7 ED 30                                mul
1779+ DBA9 5A                                   ld  e,d
1780+ DBAA 16 00                                ld  d,0
1781+ DBAC                                      ClearCarryFlag
1781+ DBAC B7          >                        or a
1782+ DBAD ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1783+ DBAF C9                                   ret
1784+ DBB0
1785+ DBB0              GetExperiencePoints:    ; TODO calculate experience points
1786+ DBB0                                      ; TODO mission updates check
1787+ DBB0 C9                                   ret
1788+ DBB1
1789+ DBB1              ; ......................................................
1790+ DBB1 3A 2D C3     KillShip:               ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1791+ DBB4 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1792+ DBB6 C8                                   ret     z
1793+ DBB7 3A 3F C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; remove AI, mark killed, mark exploding
1794+ DBBA F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled  ; .
1795+ DBBC E6 7F                                and     ShipAIDisabled              ; .
1796+ DBBE 32 3F C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ; .
1797+ DBC1                                      SetMemToN   UBnKexplDsp, ShipExplosionDuration ; set debris cloud timer, also usered in main to remove from slots
1797+ DBC1 3E 4B       >                        ld      a,ShipExplosionDuration
1797+ DBC3 32 3D C0    >                        ld      (UBnKexplDsp),a
1798+ DBC6                                      ldWriteZero UBnKEnergy              ; Zero ship energy
1798+ DBC6 AF          >                        xor      a
1798+ DBC7 32 43 C0    >                        ld       (UBnKEnergy),a
1799+ DBCA 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a
1800+ DBCD 3E 12                                ld      a,18
1801+ DBCF 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; Zero cloud
1802+ DBD2                                      ; TODO logic to spawn cargo/plates goes here
1803+ DBD2 C9                                   ret
1804+ DBD3
1805+ DBD3              ; in a = damage
1806+ DBD3 47           DamageShip:             ld      b,a                         ; b = a = damage comming in
1807+ DBD4 3A 2D C3                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1808+ DBD7 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1809+ DBD9 C8                                   ret     z
1810+ DBDA 3A 43 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)              ; get current energy level
1811+ DBDD                                      ClearCarryFlag
1811+ DBDD B7          >                        or a
1812+ DBDE 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; subtract damage
1813+ DBDF D2 E6 DB     .Overkilled:            jp      nc,.DoneDamage              ; if no carry then its not gone negative
1814+ DBE2 CD B1 DB                             call    KillShip                    ; else kill it
1815+ DBE5 C9                                   ret
1816+ DBE6 32 43 C0     .DoneDamage:            ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
1817+ DBE9 C9                                   ret
1818+ DBEA              ; need recovery for energy too
1819+ DBEA              ; Shall we have a "jolt ship off course routine for when it gets hit by a blast or collision)
1820+ DBEA
1821+ DBEA              ;-LL49-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1822+ DBEA              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1823+ DBEA              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1824+ DBEA              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1825+ DBEA              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated
1826+ DBEA              ;
1827+ DBEA              ;  XX16(  1 0)sidev_x   (3 2)roofv_x   (5 4)nosev_x
1828+ DBEA              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1829+ DBEA              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1830+ DBEA              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1831+ DBEA              AddLaserBeamLine:
1832+ DBEA              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1833+ DBEA              GetGunVertexNode:
1834+ DBEA 3A 1C C3             ld          a,(GunVertexAddr)                   ; Hull byte#6, gun vertex*4 (XX0),Y
1835+ DBED 21 D8 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1836+ DBF0 ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1837+ DBF2 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1838+ DBF5              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1839+ DBF5 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1840+ DBF6 23                   inc         hl
1841+ DBF7 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1842+ DBF8 23                   inc         hl
1843+ DBF9 ED 43 8E C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1844+ DBFD 0C                   inc         c
1845+ DBFE C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1846+ DBFF 04                   inc         b
1847+ DC00 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1848+ DC01              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1849+ DC01 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1850+ DC02 23                   inc         hl
1851+ DC03 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1852+ DC04 23                   inc         hl
1853+ DC05 ED 43 90 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1854+ DC09              SetX2PointToXX15:
1855+ DC09 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1856+ DC0C ED 43 92 C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1857+ DC10 3A 12 C0             ld          a,(UBnKzlo)
1858+ DC13 4F                   ld          c,a
1859+ DC14              SetY2PointToXX15:
1860+ DC14 ED 43 94 C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1861+ DC18 3A 0E C0             ld          a,(UBnKxsgn)
1862+ DC1B                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1862+ DC1B CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1862+ DC1D CA 25 DC    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1863+ DC20              LL74DecX2:
1864+ DC20 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1865+ DC22 32 92 C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1866+ DC25              LL74SkipDec:
1867+ DC25 CD F9 C9             call        ClipLine                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1868+ DC28 38 71                jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1869+ DC2A              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1870+ DC2A 2A E8 9D             ld          hl,(varU16)
1871+ DC2D 3A 8E C0             ld          a,(UBnKx1Lo)
1872+ DC30 77                   ld          (hl),a
1873+ DC31 23                   inc         hl
1874+ DC32 3A 90 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy1Lo)
1875+ DC35 77                   ld          (hl),a
1876+ DC36 23                   inc         hl
1877+ DC37 3A 92 C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1878+ DC3A 77                   ld          (hl),a
1879+ DC3B 23                   inc         hl
1880+ DC3C 3A 94 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy2Lo)
1881+ DC3F 77                   ld          (hl),a
1882+ DC40 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1883+ DC42 23                   inc         hl
1884+ DC43 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1885+ DC45 22 E8 9D             ld          (varU16),hl
1886+ DC48 C9                   ret
1887+ DC49
1888+ DC49                  INCLUDE "Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm"

   1++DC49              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC49                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   1++DC49              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC49              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DC49 21 D8 C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DC4C ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DC4E 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DC4F 11 8E C0                             ld          de,UBnkX1
   7++DC52 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DC54 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DC56 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DC58 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DC5A C9                                   ret
  12++DC5B
# file closed: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   3++DC5B                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm
   1++DC5B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC5B              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DC5B 21 D8 C0     getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DC5E ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DC60 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DC61 11 92 C0                             ld          de,UBnkX2
   7++DC64 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   8++DC66 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   9++DC68 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
  10++DC6A ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  11++DC6C C9                                   ret
# file closed: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm
   4++DC6D                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DC6D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC6D              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DC6D ~                                ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
   4++DC6D ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DC6D ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DC6D                                  ENDM
   7++DC6D
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   5++DC6D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   6++DC6D              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
   7++DC6D               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
   8++DC6D 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
   9++DC6E
  10++DC6E              PrepLines:
  11++DC6E              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  12++DC6E
  13++DC6E              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  14++DC6E              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  15++DC6E              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  16++DC6E              ;        or          8
  17++DC6E              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  18++DC6E              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  19++DC6E              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  20++DC6E              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  21++DC6E              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  22++DC6E              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  23++DC6E              ;
  24++DC6E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  25++DC6E              InitialiseLineRead:
  26++DC6E                      ;break
  27++DC6E                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  27++DC6E AF          >                        xor      a
  27++DC6F 32 0A C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  28++DC72                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayBytes                  ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  28++DC72 AF          >                        xor      a
  28++DC73 32 0B C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a
  29++DC76                      ldWriteZero PLEDGECTR
  29++DC76 AF          >                        xor      a
  29++DC77 32 6D DC    >                        ld       (PLEDGECTR),a
  30++DC7A 3A 20 C3             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  31++DC7D DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  32++DC7F FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  33++DC82 21 18 C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  34++DC85 22 E8 9D             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  35++DC88                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  35++DC88 3A 20 C3    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  35++DC8B 32 EC 9D    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  36++DC8E 3A 3D C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  37++DC91                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  37++DC91 CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  37++DC93 CA 9B DC    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  38++DC96 E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  39++DC98 32 3D C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  40++DC9B              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  41++DC9B              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  42++DC9B              CalculateNewLines:
  43++DC9B              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  44++DC9B              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  45++DC9B 21 21 C4             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  46++DC9E                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  47++DC9E 22 E8 9C             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  48++DCA1 3A 1B C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  49++DCA4 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  50++DCA5              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  51++DCA5              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  52++DCA5 2A E8 9C             ld          hl,(varV)
  53++DCA8 E5                   push        hl
  54++DCA9 FD E1                pop         iy
  55++DCAB                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  56++DCAB ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  57++DCAB                      ENDIF
  58++DCAB 3A D4 9C             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  59++DCAE 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  60++DCAF              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  61++DCAF FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  62++DCB2                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  62++DCB2 BA          >                        cp      d
  62++DCB3 DA 05 DD    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  63++DCB6              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  64++DCB6              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  65++DCB6              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  66++DCB6 FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  67++DCB9 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  68++DCBA E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  69++DCBC                      GetFaceAtA
  69++DCBC 21 BA C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  69++DCBF ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  69++DCC1 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  70++DCC2              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  71++DCC2                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  71++DCC2 A7          >                        and     a
  71++DCC3 C2 D7 DC    >                        jp	    nz,VisibileEdge
  72++DCC6              IsFace2Visibile:
  73++DCC6 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  74++DCC7 ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  75++DCC9 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  76++DCCB E5                   push        hl
  77++DCCC                      GetFaceAtA
  77++DCCC 21 BA C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  77++DCCF ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  77++DCD1 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  78++DCD2 E1                   pop         hl
  79++DCD3                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  79++DCD3 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  79++DCD4 CA 05 DD    >                        jp	    z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  80++DCD7              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  81++DCD7              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  82++DCD7              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  83++DCD7 FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  84++DCDA CD 49 DC             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  85++DCDD FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  86++DCE0 CD 5B DC             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
  87++DCE3 CD F9 C9             call        ClipLine
  88++DCE6 38 1D                jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
  89++DCE8              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
  90++DCE8 ED 5B E8 9D          ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
  91++DCEC 21 8E C0             ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
  92++DCEF                      FourLDIInstrunctions
  92++DCEF ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DCF1 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DCF3 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DCF5 ED A0       >                        ldi
  93++DCF7 ED 53 E8 9D          ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
  94++DCFB 21 0A C3             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
  95++DCFE 34                   inc         (hl)
  96++DCFF 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
  97++DD00                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
  97++DD00 FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
  97++DD02 D2 1B DD    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
  98++DD05              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
  99++DD05              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 100++DD05              LL78:
 101++DD05 2A E8 9C             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 102++DD08 3E 04                ld          a,4
 103++DD0A ED 31                add         hl,a
 104++DD0C 22 E8 9C             ld          (varV),hl
 105++DD0F 21 6D DC             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 106++DD12 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 107++DD13 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 108++DD14                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 108++DD14 21 EC 9D    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 108++DD17 BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 108++DD18 C2 A5 DC    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 109++DD1B              CompletedLineGeneration:
 110++DD1B              LL81:
 111++DD1B              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 112++DD1B 3A 0A C3             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 113++DD1E CB 27                sla         a
 114++DD20 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 115++DD22 32 0B C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 116++DD25              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 117++DD25 C9                   ret
 118++DD26
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm

# file opened: ./Universe/Sun/sun_data.asm
   1+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   2+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   3+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   4+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
   5+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
   6+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
   7+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   8+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   9+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
  10+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  11+ C000
  12+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  13+ C000              ;                      0123456789ABCDEF
  14+ C000 53 75 6E 20  StartOfSun:        DB "Sun Data ......."
  14+ C004 44 61 74 61
  14+ C008 20 2E 2E 2E
  14+ C00C 2E 2E 2E 2E
  15+ C010              ; NOTE we can cheat and pre allocate segs just using a DS for now
  16+ C010              CheckRowHLOnScreen:     MACRO   failtarget
  17+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
  18+ C010 ~                                    and     a                               ; .
  19+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
  20+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
  21+ C010 ~                                    and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
  22+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ;
  23+ C010                                      ENDM
  24+ C010
  25+ C010              ; IY = SBnKLineArray + rowValue*2
  26+ C010              IYEquRowN:              MACRO   rowValue                        ; set up iy as target address
  27+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,rowValue
  28+ C010 ~                                    ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
  29+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  30+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  31+ C010 ~                                    push    hl
  32+ C010 ~                                    pop     iy
  33+ C010                                      ENDM
  34+ C010              ;   \ -> & 565D \ See ship data files chosen and loaded after flight code starts running.
  35+ C010              ; Universe map substibute for INWK
  36+ C010              ;-Camera Position of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  37+ C010              SBnKDataBlock:
  38+ C010                                      INCLUDE "./Universe/Sun/SunPosVars.asm"

   1++C010              ;-Camera Position of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C010 00           SBnKxlo                     DB  0                       ; INWK+0
   3++C011 00           SBnKxhi                     DB  0                       ; there are hi medium low as some times these are 24 bit
   4++C012 00           SBnKxsgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK+2
   5++C013 00           SBnKylo                     DB  0                       ; INWK+3 \ ylo
   6++C014 00           SBnKyhi                     DB  0                       ; INWK+4 \ yHi

# file opened: ././Universe/Sun/SunRotationMatrixVars.asm
   1++C01D              ;-Rotation Matrix of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C01D              ; Rotation data is stored as lohi, but only 15 bits with 16th bit being  a sign bit. Note this is NOT 2'c compliment
   3++C01D 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevX            DW  0                       ; INWK +21
   4++C01F              SBnKrotmatSidev             equ SBnKrotmatSidevX
   5++C01F 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevY            DW  0                       ; INWK +23
   6++C021 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +25
   7++C023 00 00        SBnKrotmatRoofvX            DW  0                       ; INWK +15
   8++C025              SBnKrotmatRoofv             equ SBnKrotmatRoofvX
   9++C025 00 00        SBnKrotmatRoofvY            DW  0                       ; INWK +17
  10++C027 00 00        SBnKrotmatRoofvZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +19

  12++C02B              SBnKrotmatNosev             EQU SBnKrotmatNosevX

   1++C033              ;-- XX16 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C033 00 00        SBnkTransmatSidevX          DW  0               ; XX16+0

   5++C066              SBnKProjx                   EQU SBnKProjxLo

   7++C067 00           SBnKProjyHi                 DB  0
   8++C068 00           SBnKProjySgn                DB  0
   9++C069              SBnKProjy                   EQU SBnKProjyLo
  10++C069 00           SBnKProjzLo                 DB  0
  11++C06A 00           SBnKProjzHi                 DB  0
  12++C06B 00           SBnKProjzSgn                DB  0
  13++C06C              SBnKProjz                   EQU SBnKProjzLo
  14++C06C              SXX25                       EQU SBnKProjxLo
  15++C06C
# file closed: ././Universe/Sun/SunXX25Vars.asm
  45+ C06C                                      INCLUDE "./Universe/Sun/SunXX18Vars.asm"

   1++C07E              ;-- transmat0 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  59+ C092 00           SBnKProjectedX              DB  0

  73+ C1A3              SBnKLinesHeapMax            EQU $ - SBnKLineArray

  77+ C1A5              SBnK_Data_len               EQU $ - SBnKDataBlock

  79+ C1A5              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  80+ C1A5 21 10 C0     ResetSBnKData:          ld      hl,SBnKDataBlock
  81+ C1A8 11 95 01                             ld      de,SBnK_Data_len
  82+ C1AB AF                                   xor     a
  83+ C1AC CD AB 99                             call    memfill_dma
  84+ C1AF C9                                   ret
  85+ C1B0              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  86+ C1B0 21 10 C0     ResetSBnKPosition:      ld      hl,SBnKxlo
  87+ C1B3 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
  88+ C1B5 AF                                   xor     a
  89+ C1B6 77           .zeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a
  90+ C1B7 23                                   inc     hl
  91+ C1B8 10 FC                                djnz    .zeroLoop
  92+ C1BA C9                                   ret
  93+ C1BB              ; This uses UBNKNodeArray as the list
  94+ C1BB              ; the array is 256 * 2 bytes
  95+ C1BB              ; counter is current row y pos
  96+ C1BB              ; byte 1 is start x pos
  97+ C1BB              ; byte 2 is end x pos
  98+ C1BB              ; if they are both 0 then skip
  99+ C1BB              ; its always horizontal, yellow
 100+ C1BB
 101+ C1BB              ; PLANET
 102+ C1BB
 103+ C1BB
 104+ C1BB              .SunNoDraw:             SetCarryFlag                    ; ship is behind so do not draw, so we don't care abour draw as dot
 104+ C1BB 37          >                        scf
 105+ C1BC C9                                   ret
 106+ C1BD
 107+ C1BD
 108+ C1BD
 109+ C1BD              SunBankDraw:            MACRO
 110+ C1BD ~            .drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 111+ C1BD ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 112+ C1BD ~                                    inc     hl
 113+ C1BD ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 114+ C1BD ~                                    inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 115+ C1BD ~                                    push    hl,,bc
 116+ C1BD ~                                    cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 117+ C1BD ~                                    IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 118+ C1BD ~                                    ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 119+ C1BD ~                                    sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 120+ C1BD ~                                    inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 121+ C1BD ~                                    call    z, .FixWidth
 122+ C1BD ~                                    ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 123+ C1BD ~                                    ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 124+ C1BD ~                                    call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 125+ C1BD ~            .NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 126+ C1BD ~                                    inc     b
 127+ C1BD ~                                    dec     iyh
 128+ C1BD ~                                    IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 129+ C1BD                                      ENDM
 130+ C1BD
 131+ C1BD
 132+ C1BD
 133+ C1BD              SunDraw:                MMUSelectLayer2
 133+ C1BD ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 134+ C1C1 3A A1 C5     .OptimiseStartPos:      ld      a,(MinYOffset)
 135+ C1C4                                      JumpIfAIsZero .OffsetIsZero     ; if offset is 0 then just initate as normal
 135+ C1C4 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 135+ C1C5 CA D5 C1    >                        jp	    z, .OffsetIsZero
 136+ C1C8                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64, .OffsetLT64  ; if offset >=64 then we adjust and mve to bank 0
 136+ C1C8 FE 40       >                        cp      64
 136+ C1CA DA E2 C1    >                        jp		c, .OffsetLT64
 137+ C1CD D6 40        .OffsetGTE64:           sub     64
 138+ C1CF 32 A1 C5                             ld      (MinYOffset),a          ; adjust offset for bank 2
 139+ C1D2 C3 1A C2                             jp      .StartBank2
 140+ C1D5 06 00        .OffsetIsZero:          ld      b,0                     ; row
 141+ C1D7 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64                  ; counter
 142+ C1DA 21 A3 C0                             ld      hl,SBnKLineArray        ; set hl to start of array
 143+ C1DD C3 F4 C1                             jp      .StartBank1
 144+ C1E0              ;-- Snuck routine in here so that the macro will be happier
 145+ C1E0 3D           .FixWidth:              dec     a                       ; if carry resulted in a value of zero then correct
 146+ C1E1 C9                                   ret
 147+ C1E2 21 A3 C0     .OffsetLT64:            ld      hl,SBnKLineArray        ; adjust hl for line array offset
 148+ C1E5 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 149+ C1E7 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 150+ C1E9 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; set b row to the actual offset
 151+ C1EA 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; iyh = 64 - Y offset
 152+ C1EB 3E 40                                ld      a,64                    ; .
 153+ C1ED 91                                   sub     c                       ; .
 154+ C1EE FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 155+ C1F0 AF                                   xor     a                       ; Ready bank 2 with no offset
 156+ C1F1 32 A1 C5                             ld      (MinYOffset),a          ; .
 157+ C1F4 D9           .StartBank1:            exx
 158+ C1F5 3E 00                                ld      a,LAYER2_SHIFTED_SCREEN_TOP
 159+ C1F7 CD 37 E0                             call    asm_l2_bank_select      ; get in the first bank, we will only then bank select when needed
 160+ C1FA D9                                   exx
 161+ C1FB                                      SunBankDraw
 161+ C1FB 7E          >.drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 161+ C1FC 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 161+ C1FD 23          >                        inc     hl
 161+ C1FE 56          >                        ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 161+ C1FF 23          >                        inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 161+ C200 E5 C5       >                        push    hl,,bc
 161+ C202 BA          >                        cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 161+ C203             >                        IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 161+ C203 CA 12 C2    >                        jp	z,.NoLineDraw
 161+ C206 7A          >                        ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 161+ C207 91          >                        sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 161+ C208 3C          >                        inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 161+ C209 CC E0 C1    >                        call    z, .FixWidth
 161+ C20C 57          >                        ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 161+ C20D 1E D8       >                        ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 161+ C20F CD 8F E2    >                        call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 161+ C212 C1 E1       >.NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 161+ C214 04          >                        inc     b
 161+ C215 FD 25       >                        dec     iyh
 161+ C217             >                        IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 161+ C217 C2 FB C1    >                        jp	nz,.drawLoop
 162+ C21A 3A A1 C5     .StartBank2:            ld      a,(MinYOffset)
 163+ C21D                                      JumpIfAIsZero .OffsetBank2IsZero; if offset is 0 then we just continue, offset can never be >127 else there would be no draw
 163+ C21D A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 163+ C21E CA 32 C2    >                        jp	    z, .OffsetBank2IsZero
 164+ C221 21 23 C1     .NotZeroOffset:         ld      hl,SBnKLineArray + (64 * 2); adjust to correct offset
 165+ C224 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 166+ C226 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 167+ C228 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; iyh = 64 - offset
 168+ C229 3E 40                                ld      a,64                    ; .
 169+ C22B 91                                   sub     c                       ; .
 170+ C22C FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                   ; .
 171+ C22E 41                                   ld      b,c                     ; b = offset row
 172+ C22F C3 3A C2                             jp      .drawLineBank2
 173+ C232 21 23 C1     .OffsetBank2IsZero:     ld      hl,SBnKLineArray + (64 * 2); start with offset adjusted
 174+ C235 06 00                                ld      b,0
 175+ C237 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64
 176+ C23A D9           .drawLineBank2:         exx
 177+ C23B 3E 40                                ld      a,LAYER2_SHIFTED_SCREEN_MIDDLE
 178+ C23D CD 37 E0                             call    asm_l2_bank_select      ; now do the lower bank
 179+ C240 D9                                   exx
 180+ C241              ; Could make this a sub routine but unwrapping saves a call
 181+ C241                                      SunBankDraw
 181+ C241 7E          >.drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 181+ C242 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 181+ C243 23          >                        inc     hl
 181+ C244 56          >                        ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 181+ C245 23          >                        inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 181+ C246 E5 C5       >                        push    hl,,bc
 181+ C248 BA          >                        cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 181+ C249             >                        IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 181+ C249 CA 58 C2    >                        jp	z,.NoLineDraw
 181+ C24C 7A          >                        ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 181+ C24D 91          >                        sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 181+ C24E 3C          >                        inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 181+ C24F CC E0 C1    >                        call    z, .FixWidth
 181+ C252 57          >                        ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 181+ C253 1E D8       >                        ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 181+ C255 CD 8F E2    >                        call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 181+ C258 C1 E1       >.NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 181+ C25A 04          >                        inc     b
 181+ C25B FD 25       >                        dec     iyh
 181+ C25D             >                        IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 181+ C25D C2 41 C2    >                        jp	nz,.drawLoop
 182+ C260 C9                                   ret
 183+ C261
 184+ C261              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 185+ C261              ; This sets current universe object to a star / sun, they use sign + 23 bit positions
 186+ C261 CD A5 C1     CreateSun:              call    ResetSBnKData
 187+ C264 3A DE 9E                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 188+ C267 E6 07                                and     %00000111
 189+ C269 F6 81                                or      %10000001
 190+ C26B 32 18 C0                             ld      (SBnKzsgn),a
 191+ C26E 3A E0 9E                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 192+ C271 E6 03                                and     %00000011
 193+ C273 32 12 C0                             ld      (SBnKxsgn),a
 194+ C276 32 15 C0                             ld      (SBnKysgn),a
 195+ C279 21 00 00                             ld      hl, $0000
 196+ C27C 22 17 C0                             ld      (SBnKzhi),hl
 197+ C27F 3E E3                                ld      a, $E3
 198+ C281 32 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),a
 199+ C284 C9                                   ret
 200+ C285              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 201+ C285              ; This creates a sun relative to space station on launch
 202+ C285 CD A5 C1     CreateSunLaunched:      call    ResetSBnKData
 203+ C288 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 204+ C28B 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 205+ C28D 22 10 C0                             ld      (SBnKxlo),hl
 206+ C290 22 13 C0                             ld      (SBnKylo),hl
 207+ C293 21 00 E0                             ld      hl,$E000
 208+ C296 22 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),hl
 209+ C299 32 12 C0                             ld      (SBnKxsgn),a
 210+ C29C 32 18 C0                             ld      (SBnKzsgn),a
 211+ C29F 3E 06                                ld      a,$06
 212+ C2A1 32 15 C0                             ld      (SBnKysgn),a
 213+ C2A4 C9                                   ret

 215+ C2A5              ; This sets current universe object to a planet,they use sign + 23 bit positions
